Tami Capa ni ama e kalvantami a patoun vaiteh, ka payon sak e naw hoi kahawihoehe hno ka sak e pueng hah A uknaeram thung hoi rawi vaiteh,
khuikanae, hâ katanae onae koe hmai dawk a pabo awh han.
Hatnavah tami kalannaw teh kanî patetlah amae na Pa e uknaeram dawk a ang awh han. Thai nahan hnâ ka tawn e pueng ni teh thai naseh.
Kalvan uknaeram teh law dawk hro e hno hoi a kâvan. Hote hno hah kahmawt e ni teh bout a ramuk teh, lunghawi laihoi a ban teh a tawn e pueng hah a yo hnukkhu hote law hah a ran.
Hahoi, kalvan uknaeram teh aphu kaawm poung e Pale ka tawng e hno kayawtkung hoi a kâvan.
Hote hno kayawtkung ni aphu kaawm poung e Pale hah a hmu toteh, a cei teh a tawn e pueng hah a yo hnukkhu hote Pale hah a ran.
Hahoi, kalvan uknaeram teh talî dawk heng nah aphunphun e tanganaw ka ramuk e tamlawk hoi a kâvan.
Tanga moi a kaman toteh a kongteng lah a sawn teh, a tahungkhai awh. Kahawi e tanganaw hah a rawi awh teh sikrei dawk a pâseng awh. Kahawi hoeh e tanganaw teh a tâkhawng awh.
Hot patetlah talai a pout navah kalvantaminaw ni kum awh vaiteh, tami kalannaw um hoi tamikayonnaw teh rawi ka pek vaiteh,
khuikanae, hâ katanae onae koe hmai dawk a pabo awh han.
Hete hnonaw pueng hah na thai panuek a ou. telah a pacei toteh, ka thaipanuek awh toe Bawipa telah a hnukkâbangnaw ni atipouh awh.
Hatdawkvah, kalvan uknaeram kong ka cang tangcoung e kâlawk kacangkhaikungnaw, a hnukkâbang lah kaawm e tami teh, amae hno aphunphun e, a katha hoi a karuem e naw hah peng ka rasat e imkung hoi a kâvan atipouh.
Hote bangnuenae lawknaw hah koung a dei pouh hnukkhu hote hmuen hah a ceitakhai .
Hathnukkhu amae khothung a pha teh sinakoknaw dawkvah a cangkhai, khothung e taminaw teh a kângairu awh dawkvah, hete tami ni hete lungangnae hoi hete thaonae heh nâ e ne a tawn.
Ahni teh lettama e capa nahoehmaw. A manu teh Meri nahoehmaw. A nawngha teh Jem, Joseph, Simon, Judah tie naw nahoehmaw.
A tawncanunaw haiyah maimouh hoi kahnai lah awm awh hoeh maw. Hat pawiteh hete tami ni hete hnonaw hah na e maw a hmu telah ati awh.
A lungpout awh. Jisuh ni profetnaw teh ama kho, amae ram alawilah doeh barinae ao telah atipouh.
Khothung e naw ni a yuem awh hoeh dawkvah, hote hmuen koe thaonae moikapap sak hoeh.
Hatnavah, Herod bawi ni Jisuh e kamthang hah a thai navah,
het hateh Baptisma kapoekung Jawhan doeh. Duenae koehoi a thaw toe. Hatdawkvah kângairu hnonaw hah a sak thai telah a kut rahim e naw koe a dei pouh.
Herod ni amae a nawngha, Filip e a yu Herodias dawkvah Jawhan hah a man a katek teh thongim vah a paung.
Jawhan ni Herod koe hote napui na la e heh thoung hoeh telah Herod hah atipouh dawkvah,
Jawhan hah thei han a ngai ei rangpuinaw a taki dawkvah thet ngam hoeh. Rangpuinaw ni Jawhan hah profet buet touh lah a pouk awh,
Herod a khenae hnin a pha teh pawi a sak navah Herodias e canu teh pawi thung a lam dawkvah, Herod lung ahawi sak.
Na hei e pueng na poe han telah thoekâbonae hoi lawk a kam.
A manu ni a uen e patetlah Baptisma kapoekung Jawhan e a lû hah hete tongben dawk na poe telah a hei.
Siangpahrang teh a lungmathoe ei lawk yo a kam toung dawkvah a huikonaw e minhmai hah a khet teh, poe hanelah kâ a poe.
Hatdawkvah, tami a patoun teh, Jawhan e lahuen hah thongim thungvah a tâtueng sak.
A lû hah tongben dawk hoi napui ca a poe awh teh napui ca ni a manu koe a sin.
Jawhan e a hnukkâbangnaw a tho awh teh a ro hah a sin awh. A pakawp awh hnukkhu, Jisuh koe a cei awh teh a dei pouh awh.
Jisuh ni a thai nah hote hmuen hah long hoi a ceitakhai teh kingdinae koe vah a cei. Taminaw ni a thai awh dawkvah kho thung hoi a tâco awh teh khok hoi a kâbang awh.
Jisuh ni a cei navah, taminaw a hmu nah a pahren dawkvah kapatawnaw pueng a dam sak.
Tangmin vah a hnukkâbangnaw ni a hnai awh teh, hiteh thingyeiyawn doeh. Kho hai a hmo toe. Rangpuinaw teh canei ran hanlah khonaw dawk cetsak lawi atipouh awh. navah,
Jisuh ni ahnimouh a cei ngai hoeh. A ca awh hanelah poe awh, atipouh.
Ahnukkâbangnaw ni vaiyei panga touh hoi tanga kahni touh hoe laipateh kaimouh koe alouke rawca awmhoeh bout ati. Hahoi, Jisuh ni vaiyei hoi tanga hah hi sin awh haw atipouh.
Hattoteh rangpuinaw hah tahung hanlah kâ a poe.
Tamimaya hah pho van tahung hanelah kâ a poe. Vaiyei panga touh hoi tanga kahni touh hah a sin teh kalvan lah moung laihoi, lunghawi lawk a dei hnukkhu, vaiyei hoi tanga hah a raen teh a hnukkâbangnaw hah a poe.
A hnukkâbangnaw ni hai rangpuinaw hah patuen a poe awh. Rangpuinaw ni kaboumlah a ca awh hnukkhu, ka cawi e a rakhun awh teh tangthung hlaikahni touh akawi.
Ka cat e abuemlah napui hoi camo dei laipalah tongpa dueng 5,000 touh hane a pha awh.
Jisuh ni kamkhueng e taminaw hah a ban sak lahun navah, a hnukkâbangnaw hah long a kâcui sak teh namran lah hmaloe a patoun.
Kamkhueng e naw be a ceisak hnukkhu ratoum hanlah, mon lah soumtinae koe a luen teh, tangmin vah amadueng ao.
Long teh tui lungui vah kahlî ni khak a ngang dawkvah tuicapa ni a hem awh.
Tangmin suimilam pali nah Jisuh teh ahnimouh koe tui van vah a cei.
Hottelah tui van a cei teh a tho e hah a hmu awh navah, kahrai doeh titeh taki hoi a hramki awh.
Jisuh ni na lungpuen awh hanh. Kai doeh taket awh hanh atipouh.
Piter ni Bawipa, nang boipawiteh, tui van hoi nang koe ka tho nahanlah kâ na poe haw atipouh.
Hattoteh hi tho atipouh. Piter ni long van hoi a kum teh Jisuh koe pha hanelah tui van vah a cei.
Kahlî a tang e hah a hmu navah a taki teh tui thung lah a bo dawkvah Bawipa na rungngang haw telah a hram.
Jisuh ni a kut a dâw teh Piter hah a kuet. Yuemnae kayoun e tami bangkongmaw oupvoutnae na tawn atipouh.
Long van a pha roi toteh kahlî a roum.
Long thung kaawmnaw ni a hnai awh teh, nang teh Cathut Capa tangngak doeh ati awh teh a bawk awh.
Namran lah a ceiawh teh Gennesaret ram dawk a pha awh.
Hot hmuen dawk e kaawm e naw ni a nout awh navah, a teng kaawm e hmuen pueng koe, tami a patoun awh dawkvah, ka pataw e pueng hah a thokhai awh.
A kâkhu e hni pawi hah, tek thai nahanlah a kâhei awh. Katek e pueng haiyah damnae a coe awh.
Hatnavah, Jerusalem e Farasinaw hoi cakathutkungnaw teh Jisuh koe a tho awh.
Ayan e kacuenaw e phung hah bangkongmaw na hnukkâbangnaw ni a tapoe awh. Ahnimouh ni kut kamsin laipalah bu a ca awh, telah atipouh awh navah,
Nangmouh ni ayan e phung hah kâuep laihoi bangkongmaw Cathut e kâpoelawk hah na tapoe van awh.
Cathut e kâpoelawk teh na manu hoi na pa bari awh. Apihai manu hoi na pa hawihoehnae ka dei e teh due totouh thei lah awmseh telah a ti.
Hatei, nangmouh ni na cangkhai awh e teh apipatet ni hai a manu na ou, a na pa na ou a poe hane hno hah, het hateh Cathut koe ka poe e doeh toe tet pawiteh,
a manu nakunghai, a na pa nakunghai bari ngai hoeh toe na ti awh. Hottelah patuen patuen na tawm awh e phung hoiyah Cathut e kâpoelawk na eknae doeh.
A lai kathout e taminaw, Isaiah ni nangmouh noe lahoi,
hete miphunnaw teh apâhni hoi na hnai awh teh apâhni hoi na bari a ei a lungthin teh kai hoi ahla.
Tami e kâpoelawk hoiyah a kâpâtu awh teh, ayawmyin lah na bawk awh toe telah sut a dei e hah a tang tangngak atipouh.
Hattoteh ka kamkhuengnaw hah ama koe a kaw teh, thai awh nateh panuek awh haw.
Thung lah ka kâen e ni tami heh khin sak hoeh. Thung lahoi ka tâcawt e hno ni doeh na khin sak awh, atipouh.
A hnukkâbangnaw ni a hnai awh teh atu na dei e lawk heh Farasinaw ni a thai awh navah a lung apout awh tie na panue maw atipouh awh.
Jisuh ni kalvanlae Apa ni a patûe hoeh e a kung kaawm e pueng hah ka phawk han.
La awm awh nah yawkaw seh. Ahnimouh teh mitdawnnaw kahrawikung mitdawnnaw doeh. A mit ka dawn reira kâhrawi pawiteh kahni touh hoi tangkom dawk ka bawt roi han doeh atipouh.
Piter ni Cathut e bangnuenae hah kaimouh koevah pâpho haw atipouh navah,
Jisuh ni nangmouh teh atu sittouh lungang laipalah maw na o a rah.
Thung lah kâen e pueng teh von dawk ka cet ni teh alawilah a tâcawt tie heh na panuek awh hoeh rah maw.
Thung lahoi ka tâcawt e hno teh lung dawk hoi ka tâcawt e a tho dawkvah tami hah kakhin sak e hno doeh.
Kahawi hoeh e pouknae, tami theinae, kamsoumhoehe napui tongpa yonnae, napui kahlout hoi yonnae, ayâ e hno parunae, kamsoumhoehe kapanuekkhaikung lah kangduenae, ayâ minhmai mathoe saknae teh lungthung hoi a tâco dawkvah,
Tami kakhin sak e hnonaw doeh. Kamsin laipalah rawca canae ni tami khinsak hoeh atipouh.
Hathnukkhu Jisuh teh hote hmuen koehoi a kamthaw teh, Taire hoi Sidon kholah a cei.
Kanaan napui buet touh teh a tâco teh, Devit Capa kai hah na pahren haw. Ka canu teh kahrai ni puenghoi a rek atipouh eiteh kam touh hai pathung hoeh.
A hnukkâbangnaw ni a hrawi awh teh, hote napui bout ban sak leih. Maimouh hnuk a kâbang teh a hram atipouh awh.
Jisuh ni Isarel miphun kahmat e tunaw hloilah alouke miphunnaw onae koe kai hah na patoun hoeh atipouh.
Hote napui ni tabo laihoi Bawipa na rungngang ei bout atipouh.
Hat toteh, Bawipa ni capa e rawca hah ui poe phung nahoeh bout atipouh.
Napui ni hai oe, Bawipa, uinaw tie teh kabawt e burameinaw hah ouk a luep phung nahoehmaw bout atipouh toteh,
Oe! napui nang teh na yuemnae a len tangngak. Na ngainae patetlah nang dawk awmseh atipouh navah, a canu teh hmawi a dam.
Jisuh ni hote hmuen koehoi a cei teh, Galilee tui koe a pha toteh, monsom a luen teh a tahung.
Tami moikapap ni khokkhem, mitdawn, lawka, kamkhuen e hoi alouke patawnae ka tawn e naw hah a thokhai awh teh a khok koevah a ta awh.
A patawnae pueng hah a dam sak dawkvah, lawkanaw ni lawk a dei thai, kamkhuennaw ni a dam awh, khokkhemnaw ni lam a cei awh, mitdawnnaw ni a hmu awh e hah ka kamkhuengnaw ni a hmu awh navah Isarelnaw e Cathut hah a pholen awh.
Hattoteh Jisuh ni a hnukkâbangnaw hah a kaw teh, hete taminaw hah ka pahren poung. Hnin thum touh thung canei tawn laipalah kai koe ao awh toe. Lam vah tawn a langvaih, ka ti dawkvah, rawca cat laipalah ceisak hane ka ngainae awm hoeh atipouh.
A hnukkâbangnaw ni, het yit touh e tami kapap e naw ni kaboumlah a ca awh hane rawca hah hi kahrawngum vah kaimouh ni bangtelamaw ka hmu thai awh han atipouh awh.
Jisuh ni nangmouh koe vaiyei na yit touh maw kaawm atipouh. Ahnimouh ni vaiyei sari touh hoi tanga youn touh ao bout atipouh awh.
Hattoteh tami kamkhuengnaw hah talai dawk tahung sak hanelah kâ a poe.
Vaiyei sari touh hoi tanganaw hah a la teh lunghawinae lawk a dei hnukkhu, vaiyei hoi tanga hah a raen teh a hnukkâbangnaw hah patuen a poe.
Rangpui ni a boum awh toteh, ka cawi e hah a racawng awh navah tangthung sari touh akawi.
Ka cat e naw abuemlah napuinaw hoi camonaw e dei laipalah 4,000 touh a pha.
Hote taminaw hah a ceisak hnukkhu Magadan kho lah long hoi a cei.
Farasinaw hoi Sadusinaw a tho awh teh kalvan hoi e mitnout kamnue sak hanlah a kâhei awh teh Bawipa hah a tanouk awh.
Bawipa ni ouk na dei awh e teh tangmin lah tâmai a rapam teh a paling navah kho kahawi han na ti awh.
Amom lah toteh tâmai akawi, bout a paling dawkvah kahlî ka tho han na ti awh. A laikathoutnaw nangmouh ni teh kalvan minhmai hah na kapek panuek awh. A tu e mitnoutnaw hatteh na kapek panuek awh hoeh.
Tami kahawilah kâsak e catounnaw, noutnae na hei awh navah profet Jonah e mitnoutnae hloilah alouke noutnae bangpatet e haiyah na sak pouh awh mahoeh atipouh teh, ahnimouh onae koehoi alouklah a cei.
Namran lah a cei awh toteh a hnukkâbangnaw ni vaiyei sin hane hah yout a pahnim awh.
Jisuh ni Farasinaw hoi Saddusinaw e ton hah kâhruetcuet nateh roun awh, atipouh.
Maimouh ni vaiyei sin awh hoeh dawkvah hete lawk heh a dei telah a hnukkâbangnaw ni buet touh hoi buet touh a kâpankhai awh.
Jisuh ni a panue dawkvah, yuemnae dawk tha kayoun e naw, vaiyei na sin awh hoeh e dawkvah na kâpankhai a vaw.
Vaiyei panga touh hah, tami 5,000 touh ni a ca awh teh tangthung nâyittouh maw kacawi, vaiyei sari touh hah tami 4,000 touh ni a ca teh, tangthung nâyittouh maw kacawi tie hah,
na pâkuem, na pouk awh laipalah, maw na o awh rah.
Farasinaw hoi Saddusinaw e ton hah kâhruetcuet awh, ka ti navah vaiyei heh ka dei ngai e nahoeh tie hah na thai panuek a laipalah bangtelamaw khuet na o a vaw atipouh.
Hat torei teh ton e vaiyei hah roun awh tie nahoeh. Farasinaw hoi Sadusinaw e cangkhainae hah roun awh, tinae doeh telah a hnukkâbangnaw ni a thai panuek awh.
Kaisarea Filippi ram e kho buet touh dawk a pha awh toteh, Jisuh ni Kai heh taminaw ni api na ti a maw telah a hnukkâbangnaw hah a pacei.
Tami tangawn ni Baptisma Jawhan; a tangawn ni Elijah; a tangawn ni Jeremiah, hoehpawiteh alouke profet buet buet touh doeh telah atipouh awh.
Nangmouh ni hai Kai hah api na ti a maw telah a pacei.
Simon Piter ni nang teh kahring e Cathut Capa, Khrih doeh atipouh.
Hatnavah Jisuh ni Simon Barjonah, nang teh na yawhawi. Bangkongtetpawiteh hete hno teh thi hoi tak ni nang koe a pâpho e nahoeh, kalvan kho kaawm e a Pa ni a pâpho pouh e doeh.
Nang koevah ka dei, nang teh Piter doeh. Hete lungsong dawkvah Kaie kawhmoun ka kangdue sak han. Hot teh duenae longkha ni hai tâ thai mahoeh.
Kalvan uknaeram cabinaw teh nang koevah na poe han. Talai van na katek e pueng teh kalvan hai katek lah ao han. Talai van rathap lah kaawm e naw pueng teh kalvan hai rathap lah ao han, telah atipouh.
Hahoi, Bawipa ni Kai teh Khrih doeh tie hah api koehai dei hoeh nahanelah a hnukkâbangnaw kâ a poe.
Hahoi, Jisuh ni Jerusalem ka cei vaiteh kacuenaw, vaihma bawinaw hoi cakathutkungnaw e kut dawk rektapnae moi a khang hnukkhu a thei awh vaiteh apâthum hnin vah bout a thaw nahane kong hah a hnukkâbangnaw koe a dei pouh.
Hatnavah Piter ni Bawipa yue hanelah aloukcalah a kaw teh, nang dawk bawt nahan seh atipouh.
Hahoi, Bawipa ni a kamlang sin teh Piter koe, nang Setan ka hnuk lah kâhnawnh. Nang teh kai hanlah payonnae lah na o atipouh. Bangkongtetpawiteh nang ni Cathut hoi ka kâkuen e hno dawk na lungthin pen laipalah tami hoi kâkuen e hno dawk lung na pen.
Hattoteh Jisuh ni a hnukkâbangnaw koe apihai ka hnukkâbang han ka ngai e teh amahoima kâpahnawt vaiteh, amae thingpalam hrawm hoi ka hnuk kâbang naseh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh apihai amae hringnae ka rungngang e teh hringnae a sung han. Kai kecu dawk hringnae ka sung e teh hringnae a hmu han.
Tami ni talaivan abuemlah koung ka coe nakunghai muitha hringnae sung pawiteh bangmaw aphu kaawm. A hringnae hah bang hno hoi maw a ratang thai han.
Tami Capa teh Apa e bawilennae hoi kalvantaminaw hoi a tho han. Hattoteh tami pueng ni a tawk e phu a hmu awh han.
Atangcalah na dei pouh awh. Tami Capa amae uknaeram dawk a kum toteh hi kangdout e tami tangawn duenae kâhmo mahoeh rah, atipouh.
Jisuh ni Piter, Jem, Jem e nawngha Jawhan tinaw hah, hnin taruk a poung hnukkhu a kaw teh ka rasang e mon dawk soumtinae koe a ceikhai.
Ahnimae hmalah a mei a kâthung pouh. A minhmai teh kanî patetlah a ang teh, a khohna e teh raeng patetlah a pangaw.
Mosi hoi Elijah hai a kamnue teh Bawipa hoi lawk a kapan awh.
Hatnavah Piter ni Bawipa hete hmuen koe o a nep. Nang hanlah buet touh, Mosi hanlah buet touh, Elijah hanlah buet touh rim kathum touh hah na ngainae awm pawiteh kaimouh ni ka sak awh han atipouh.
Hottelah a dei lahun nah ka ang e tâmai ni a ramuk awh teh, het hateh ka pahren e Capa doeh, ahni dawk ka lungkuep tangngak. Ahnie lawk hah tarawi pouh awh, telah tâmai thung hoi lawk a tho.
A hnukkâbangnaw ni a thai awh navah a taki awh teh a tabo awh.
Jisuh ni a tho teh ahnimanaw hah kut hoi a tek teh, thaw awh, taket awh hanh telah atipouh.
Ahnimouh ni a moung awh teh a khet awh navah, Jisuh hloilah apihai hmawt awh hoeh.
Monsom hoi a kum a torei teh Jisuh ni tami Capa teh duenae koehoi a thaw hoehroukrak, atu na hmu awh e hno hah api koehai dei awh hanh telah a hnukkâbangnaw hah a kâ a poe.
Hattoteh a hnukkâbangnaw ni Elijah hmaloe a tho han telah bangkongmaw cakathutkungnaw ni ati awh, telah a pacei awh.
Jisuh ni Elijah teh hmaloe a tho vaiteh bangpueng hah kahawicalah a pathoup han tangngak.
Ka dei e teh Elijah a tho toe. Taminaw ni a panue awh hoeh dawk a ngai awh e pueng patetlah a tak dawk a sak awh toe. Hot patetvanlah tami Capa haiyah hote taminaw kut dawk a khang han atipouh.
Baptisma kapoekung Jawhan doeh a dei ngai nah tie hah a hnukkâbangnaw ni a thai panuek awh.
Tami ka kamkhuengnaw koe a pha awh toteh tami buet touh ni rek a hnai teh, a khokcuengkhuem teh,
Bawipa ka capa hah pahren nateh rungngang haw. Khek a man teh puenghoi a patang toe. Hmai dawk, tui dawk voutsout a rawp toe.
Na hnukkâbangnaw koe ka thokhai ei toe, ahnimouh ni hawi sak thai awh hoeh atipouh.
Jisuh ni yuemnae ka tawn hoeh e naw, lung kalen e phun, nangmouh hoi cungtalah nâ totouh maw ka o han rah. Nangmouh hah nâ totouh maw na panguep awh han rah. Camo hah hi thokhai awh, atipouh.
Jisuh ni kahrai hah a yue toteh, kahrai teh hote camo thung hoi a tâco. Camo teh hmawi a dam.
Hattoteh a hnukkâbangnaw ni soumtinae koe, Jisuh a hnai awh teh, kaimouh ni teh hote kahrai hah bangkongmaw ka pâlei thai awh hoeh vaw atipouh awh.
Jisuh ni, nangmouh teh yuemnae na tawn awh hoeh dawkvah, na pâlei thai awh hoeh. Atangcalah na dei pouh awh, nangmouh ni antam mu tittouh mah yuemnae na tawn awh pawiteh, hote mon hah hmuen koehoi kâtakhoe na tetpawiteh, hmuen koehoi a kâtakhoe han. Yuemnae na tawn awh pawiteh na tithai awh hoeh e awm mahoeh.
Hatei, ratoumnae, rawcahainae laipalah hot patet e muithakathout tâcawt thai hoeh atipouh.
Jisuh ni Galilee ram ao awh lahun nah, tami Capa teh taminaw e kut dawk pahnawt nahane tueng a hnai toe.
Ahnimouh ni a thei awh han. Apâthum hnin bout a thaw han telah a hnukkâbangnaw koe a dei pouh. Ahnimouh teh a lung puenghoi a mathoe awh.
Kapernuam kho dawk a pha toteh, bawkim dawk tamuk kacawngkungnaw Piter koe a tho awh teh, nangmae Bawipa ni cawng e tamuk poe hoeh maw atipouh awh. Hatnavah Piter ni a poe telah atipouh.
Piter ni imthung a kâen toteh, Jisuh ni Piter bangtelamaw na pouk. Talai bawinaw ni na maw tamuk a cawng awh. Ama e Capa koe maw a cawng. Ayâ koe maw a cawng telah a pacei.
Piter ni ayâ koe doeh a cawng atipouh navah, Jisuh ni hat pawiteh, Capa teh a hlout. Hatei, hotnaw ni maimouh kecu dawk a payon awh hoeh nahanlah talî koe cet nateh hradang hah sawn haw.
A pasuek na man e tanga hah lat nateh, a pahni baw pouh. Shekel tangka buet touh na hmu han. Hote tangka hah lat nateh kai hane hoi nama hane ahnimouh koe poe atipouh.
Hatnavah a hnukkâbangnaw ni Jisuh koe a tho awh teh, kalvan uknaeram dawkvah apimaw kalenpoung han telah a pacei awh.
Jisuh ni camo ca buet touh a kaw teh a hnukkâbangnaw rahak vah a ta.
Atangcalah na dei pouh awh. Nangmouh ni na kâthung awh teh camo patetlah na coung awh hoehpawiteh kalvan uknaeram dawk nâtuek hai na phat awh mahoeh.
Hatdawkvah apipatet hai hete camo patetlah kârahnoum e teh kalvan uknaeram dawk kalenpounge lah ao han.
Apipatethai ka min lahoi camo buetbuet touh ka dâw e teh, kai ka dâw e lah ao toe.
Kai na ka yuem e hete camo buetbuet touh hah ka yon sak e teh lahuen dawk talungsum awi laihoi kadung poung e talî dawk pabawt pawiteh ahni hanlah bet ahawi.
Sak payonnae dawkvah talaivan taminaw teh a yawthoe awh. Sak payonnae kaawm han. Hatei, payonnae ka sak sak e teh a yawthoe.
Na kut khok ni na payon sak pawiteh kut khok hah tâtueng. Kut khok kuep laihoi ayungyoe hmai dawk a yungyoe na bo hlak teh kut khok kuep laipalah hringnae dawk na kâen pawiteh bet ahawi.
Na mit ni na payon sak pawiteh na mit hah cawngkhawih. Na mit kahni touh hoi hell hmai dawk na bo hlak teh mit vang dueng hoi hringnae dawk na kâen pawiteh bet ahawi.
Nangmouh ni hete camo buetbuet touh hah na hnep awh hoeh nahanlah kâhruetcuet awh. Na dei pouh awh. Ahnimae kalvantaminaw ni kalvan kho vah kaawm e Pa e minhmai hah pou a hmu awh toe.
Hothloilah, tami Capa teh kahmat e naw rungngang hanlah doeh a tho.
Bangtelamaw na pouk awh. Tu 100 touh ka tawn e ni tu buet touh lam payon lah kahmat pawiteh, ahni ni tu 99 touh e hah mon vah cetakhai vaiteh, lam ka payon ni teh kahmat e tu buet touh hah tawng mahoeh na maw.
Atangcalah na dei pouh awh. A hmu toteh lam ka payon hoeh ni teh kahmat hoeh e 99 touh hlakvah kahmat e buet touh dawk hoe a konawm.
Hot patetvanlah kalvan kho kaawm e nangmae na Pa ni hete camo buet touh boehai rawk sak hanlah a ngainae awm hoeh.
Na hmaunawngha ni nang dawk a sakpayon e awm pawiteh cet sin nateh namamouh roi dueng a yonnae pâpho pouh nateh yue. Na lawk hah tarawi pawiteh na hmaunawngha teh na hmu toe.
Na lawk hah tarawi hoehpawiteh tami kahni kathum touh kapanuekkhaikung lah kaw ei. Hahoi, kaawm e lawk pueng caksak awh.
Hotnaw e lawk hah tarawi hoehpawiteh kawhmoun koe dei pouh. Kawhmoun e lawk hah ngai hoehpawiteh Jentelnaw hoi tamuk kacawngnaw patetlah pouk awh.
Atangcalah na dei pouh awh, talai van na katek awh e pueng teh kalvan kho hai katek lah ao han. Talai van rathap e pueng teh kalvan kho hai rathap lah ao han.
Bout ka dei e teh, talai van vah nangmouh thung dawk tami kahni touh ni lungkânging lahoi na ratoum awh pawiteh, na ratoum e pueng hah kalvan kho kaawm e a Pa ni na poe han.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, bangpatet e hmuen koehai ka min lahoi tami kahni kathum touh kamkhueng pawiteh ahnimae lungui kai ka o atipouh.
Hatnavah Jisuh hah Piter ni rek a hnai teh, Bawipa hmaunawngha ni kai dawk a sakpayon e hah avai na yit touh maw ka ngaithoum han telah a pacei teh, Jisuh ni vai sari touh na ngaithoum han ka tet hoeh.
Avai rui sari let sari totouh na ngaithoum han ka ti.
Hatdawkvah kalvan uknaeram teh, amae sannaw hah tangka lai ka dei pouh e siangpahrang buet touh hoi a kâvan.
Cayin koung to hoiyah tangka a thong cum touh laiba ka tawn e san buet touh hah a hmalah a thokhai awh.
Ahni ni laiba patho nahan a tawn hoeh dawkvah ama hoi a yucanaw a tawn e hnonaw pueng yawt nateh laiba patho naseh telah a bawi ni kâ a poe.
Hote san ni a tabo teh Bawipa, na pahren ei, laiba kaawm e pueng hah na patho han atipouh navah,
A bawipa ni a pahren teh laiba kaawm e pueng hah a raphoe pouh teh a hlout sak.
Hote san teh a cei navah ama koe tangka 100 touh ka ba e san van hai a hmu toteh, tangka na patho leih ti teh a lahuen dawk a kara pouh.
Hote san van ni hai a khok rahim a tabo pouh teh, kai hah na pahren ei, laiba kaawm e pueng hah na patho han doeh telah a kâhei ei nakunghai,
tha laipalah laiba a patho hoehroukrak thongim thung vah a paung.
Hottelah e hno hah alouke sannaw ni a hmu awh navah, a lung puenghoi a pataw awh teh, a sakyoe e pueng hah amamae bawipa koe a cei awh teh a dei pouh awh.
Hat toteh, a bawipa ni hote san hah a kaw teh, Oe! san kathout, nang ni na kâhei dawkvah na laiba pueng hah ka raphoe teh na hlout sak.
Kai ni na pahren e patetlah nang ni na san hui hah, na pahren kawi nahoehmaw atipouh.
A bawipa teh a lungkhuek dawkvah a laiba pueng koung a patho hoehroukrak rektapkungnaw kut dawk patang palai sak hanlah a poe.
Nangmouh haiyah hmaunawngha reira hah lungthin katang hoi na ngaithoum awh hoehpawiteh kalvanlae Apa ni hot patetvanlah nangmouh lathueng vah a sak van han.
Jisuh ni, hete lawknaw be a dei hnukkhu, Galilee ram a ceitakhai teh Jordan tui namran, Judea ram lah a cei.
Taminaw ni a hnuk a kâbang awh, hote hmuen koe kapatawnaw a dam sak.
Farasinaw ni atengvah a tho awh teh, sak payonnae pueng dawk hoi tami ni amae yu hah ama kawi maw titeh a tanouk awh.
Bawipa ni apuengcue vah sak lah kaawm e teh tongpa hoi napui kahni touh dueng doeh sak lah kaawm.
Hote dawkvah tongpa ni a na pa hoi a manu a ceitakhai teh, a yu hoi a kâpahlawm dawkvah hote kahni touh roi teh buet touh lah ao han telah Cakathoung dawk a dei e hah na touk awh boihoeh maw.
Hatdawkvah yuvâ roi teh kahni touh nahoeh, buet touh doeh. Cathut ni buet touh lah a pahlawm tangcoung e hno hateh tami ni kapek hanh naseh atipouh.
Farasinaw ni hottelah pawiteh manae ca poe hoi ma hanlah bangkong Mosi ni kâ a poe atipouh awh.
Nangmae lungthin a pata dawkvah yu hoi kama hanlah Mosi ni a dei. Apuengcue teh hottelah na hoeh.
Na dei pouh awh, uicuknae laipalah a yu heh a ma teh alouke napui ka lat e tami teh amae a yu koe a yon. Ma lah kaawm e napui hah ka lat e tami haiyah ayâ yu koe a yon atipouh.
A hnukkâbangnaw ni yuvâ dawk hettelah awm pawiteh yu lat laipalah o e heh ahawi atipouh.
Bawipa ni hote lawk hah tami pueng ni koung dâw a mahoeh. Dâw thainae kâ kahmawt e ni dueng doeh a dâw thai.
Tami tangawn teh a manu von thung hoi a bokhai e lah a tho. A tangawn teh yu la hoeh hanelah ayâ ni cingthui e lah ao. Atangawn teh kalvan uknaeram kecu dawk yu lat laipalah ao. Hete lawk heh ka dâw thai e teh dâw naseh atipouh.
Hatnavah camonaw lathueng vah kut toung sin hoi ratoum pouh hanlah atengvah camonaw hah a thokhai awh e hah a hnukkâbangnaw ni a yue awh.
Jisuh ni, hote camonaw hah thokhai a ngoun seh kai koe a tho awh hoeh nahanlah ngang awh hanh. Kalvan uknaeram teh hot patet e camonaw e ram doeh atipouh teh,
Camonaw e van vah kut a toung hnukkhu alouklah a cei.
Hathnukkhu, tami buet touh a tho teh, Bawi kahawi, yungyoe hringnae coe thai nahanlah bangpatet e hnokahawi maw ka sak han telah a pacei.
Jisuh ni Bangkong, kai hah Bawi kahawi na tipouh. Cathut buet touh dueng doeh kahawi. Hringnae dawk kâen na ngai pawiteh kâpoelawknaw hah tarawi atipouh.
Bangpatet e, kâlawknaw maw ka tarawi han kawi telah bout a pacei toteh, tami thet hanh, uicuk hanh, ayâ e hno parawt hanh, laithoe kampangkhai hanh,
manu na pa barih, ma hoi kâkuen e tami hah nama patetlah lungpataw telah atipouh.
Hote tami ni, hote kâlawknaw pueng teh kanawca hoi koung ka tarawi toe. Bangmaw sak hane a panki rah atipouh.
Kuepnae koe pha na ngai pawiteh cet nateh na hnopai pueng hah yawt nateh mathoemara pueng hah kabawm. Hottelah na sak pawiteh kalvan kho vah hno na tawn han. Hathnukkhu ka hnukkâbang haw, telah atipouh.
Hote tami teh hnopai moi ka tawn e lah ao dawkvah, hote lawk hah a thai navah lungmathoe laihoi a ban.
Bawi Jisuh ni atangcalah na dei pouh awh, tangka moi ka tawn e ni teh kalvan uknaeram thung a kâen han a ru.
Bout na dei pouh awh. Bawi tangreng ni Cathut uknaeram thung dawk a kâen hlak teh Kalauk ni phuengvang khu dawk a kâen heh bet a yawi. Telah a hnukkâbangnaw koe atipouh.
Ahnimouh ni a thai awh nah a kângairu awh dawkvah, hat pawiteh apimaw hloutnae dawk ka phat thai han atipouh awh.
Jisuh ni ahnimanaw hah a khet teh, het heh tami hanlah teh coung thai hoeh, hatei, Cathut hanelah teh, a cawngca e hnopueng a coung thai atipouh.
Hattoteh Piter ni, kaimouh ni teh ka tawn awh e pueng ceitakhai hoi na hnuk ka kâbang awh toe. Bangpatet e tawkphu maw ka coe awh han atipouh.
Jisuh ni atangcalah na dei pouh awh. A cawngca e hnopueng a katha lah pathoupnae tueng dawkvah tami Capa ni a bawilennae bawitungkhung dawkvah a tahung toteh, ka hnukkâbang e nangmouh teh tungkhung hlaikahni touh dawk tahung laihoi Isarel miphun hlaikahni touh hah lawk na ceng awh han.
Apipatethai ka min kecu dawk imlaw, hmaunawngha, manu napa, yucanaw buetbuet touh ka cettakhai e teh a let cum touh a coe vaiteh a yungyoe hringnae râw hah a pang han.
Hnukkatengnaw ni hma ahman vaiteh hmakahmannaw ni hnuk a teng awh han.
Bangnuenae lah, kalvan uknaeram teh misur takha dawk thaw tawk hanelah, amom vah ka tâcawt ni teh thawkatawkung ka tawng e imkung hoi a kâvan.
Katawknaw hoi haiyah lawk a kâcat awh teh, hnin touh e tawk e hah tangka phek touh poe hanlah misur takha koe a patoun.
Amom suimilam tako nah bout a tâco teh, alouke taminaw ni hno yonae koe thaw tawk laipalah sut a kangdue awh e hah a hmu dawkvah,
nangmouh hai misur takha koe cet awh, kâki lah na poe awh han atipouh. Ahnimouh ni a cei awh.
Hahoi, suimilam hlaikahni hoi tangmin suimilam kathum nah haiyah, a tâco teh ahmaloe e patetlah bout a coun.
Tangminlah suimilam panga na haiyah bout a tâco boteh, alouke taminaw sut a kangdue awh e hah a hmu navah, thaw tawk laipalah hete hmuen koe bangkongmaw sut na kangdue awh, atipouh navah;
Ahnimouh ni apinihai na coun awh hoeh atipouh awh toteh, nangmouh hai kaie misur takha koe cet awh. Kâki lah na poe awh han atipouh.
Tangmin a pha toteh misur takha katawnkung ni amae tangka ka kuenkung hah a kaw teh, thaw katawknaw heh koung pâkhueng nateh a hnukteng ka tawk e koehoi ahmaloe ka tawk e totouh kutphu poe leih atipouh.
Hatdawkvah tangminlah suimilam panganae koehoi katawknaw ni tangka phek touh a dâw awh.
Ahmaloe katawknaw ni teh kapap hmu han doeh telah pouknae hoi a tho awh eiteh, tangka phek touh a dâw awh.
Hottelah be a dâw a hnukkhu imkung koe a phuenang awh.
A hnukkhu e ka kâennaw teh suimilam buet touh dueng a tawk awh ei, kanî rui rui khumbei khang laihoi ka tawk e kaimouh hoi reikâvan lah na poe atipouh awh.
Imkung ni hai ka hui, nang dawk kamsoumhoehe hno ka sak hoeh. Tangka phek touh hoi nouh kai hoi lawk kâdaw roi ei, nama e hno hah lat nateh cet leih.
A hnukkhu kâen e naw hai nang hoi reikâvan lah poe hanlah ka ngainae ao.
Kai ni kama e hno hah ka sak ngai e patetlah ka sak mahoeh na maw. Kai kahawi e heh nang ni na ut maw atipouh.
Hot patetlah hnukteng e ni hma ahman han. Hma kahman e ni hnuk a teng han. A kaw e tami apap ei nakunghai a rawi e tami ayoun atipouh.
Jisuh ni Jerusalem lah a cei nah lam vah, a hnukkâbang hlaikahni touh hah soumatinae koe a kaw teh,
maimouh teh atuvah Jerusalem kho lah cei awh. Tami Capa teh vaihma bawinaw hoi cakathutkungnaw e kut dawk na poe awh han. Ahnimouh ni a due hanlah ao telah yon na pen awh han.
Tami Capa hah panuikhainae, hemnae, thingpalam dawk het sak hanlah Jentelnaw kut dawk a poe awh han. Apâthum hnin vah bout ka thaw han atipouh.
Hatnavah Zebedee e a canaw e a manu ni a capanaw hoi Bawipa koe a hnai awh teh, a bawk awh hnukkhu hno hah a hei awh. Bawipa ni bangpatet e hno maw na ngai telah a pacei.
Ahni nihaiyah hete ka capa roi hah na ram thungvah aranglah buet touh avoilah buet touh tahung thainae kâ poe haw atipouh.
Jisuh ni a canaw koe, na hei e hah na panuek awh hoeh atipouh. Ka nei han kawi manang na nei thai han maw. Ka khang hane Baptisma hah na khang thai awh han maw telah a pacei navah, kaimouh roi ni ka sak thai roi han atipouh roi dawkvah,
Kaie manang teh na nei thai yawkaw han. Ka khang hane Baptisma haiyah na khang thai yawkaw awh han. Hatei, kaie avoilah aranglah tahung thainae kâ teh Pa ni a rakueng pouh tangcoung e naw koe dueng doeh poe lah awm ti atipouh.
Alouke a hnukkâbang hra touh ni a thai awh toteh hote hmaunawngha roi koe a lungkhuek awh.
Jisuh ni a kaw awh teh na panue awh e patetlah Jentel bawinaw teh kâtawnnae a tawn awh.
Sak thainae kalen ka tawn e lah ao awh.
Nangmouh teh hottelah sak awh hanh. Tami Capa teh amae thaw hah ayâ patoun hanlah tho hoeh.
Ayâ e thaw tawk hanlah, tami kapap ratang hanlah a hringnae poe hanlah a tho dawkvah, hot patetlah nangmouh thung dawk kalen lah o ka ngai e teh nangmae thaw katawkkung lah awm naseh. Nangmouh thung dawk a lû lah tawk han ka ngai e teh nangmae san lah awm naseh atipouh.
Jeriko kho hoi a tâco awh navah tami moikapap ni a hnuk a kâbang awh.
Lam teng sut ka tahung e mitdawn kahni touh roi ni Jisuh a tho tie a thai roi nah, Devit Capa Jisuh, kaimouh roi hah na pahren ei telah a hram roi.
Taminaw ni duem ao roi nahanlah kâhruetcuetnae a poe awh eiteh, Devit Capa Bawipa kaimouh roi hah na pahren ei telah hoehoe a hram roi.
Jisuh ni a kangdue teh ahnimouh roi hah a kaw. Bangmaw sak sak hane na ngai roi atipouh.
Bawipa, kaimouh roi e ka mit hah ang sak haw atipouh roi.
Jisuh ni ahnimouh roi hah a pahren dawkvah ahnimouh roi e mit hah a kut hoi a tek pouh. Hat nah tahma vah a mit hmawi a ang roi dawkvah a hnuk a kâbang roi.
Jerusalem kho teng Olive Mon rahim kaawm e Bethphage kho a pha awh navah Jisuh ni a hnukkâbang kahni touh hmalah a patoun.
Hmalae kho dawk cet roi nateh hawvah sut pâkhi e Lamanu hoi a ca hah na hmu roi han. Arui rasu roi nateh kai koe hrawi roi haw.
Tami buetbuet touh ni bangkongmaw na rasu tetpawiteh, Bawipa ni a panki tet pouh roi. Hottelah na tet pouh roi pawiteh ahni ni tang na poe han telah lawk a thui.
Hete hno pueng hateh profetnaw ni sut a dei e lawk a kuep nahane doeh.
Zion canu teh dei pouh. Khenhaw! na siangpahrang teh nang koe a tho lahun, Ama teh tami nuen kahawicalah ao teh La manu hoi Laca a kâcui.
Jisuh ni kâ a poe e patetlah a hnukkâbang roi ni hmalah a cei roi teh a sak roi.
Lamanu hoi a ca hah a hrawi roi teh, La van vah amamae hni a phai pouh teh Bawipa ni, a kâcui.
Touk thai hoeh e tami moikapap ni amamae hninaw hah lam dawk a phai awh. Atangawnnaw ni thingbunaw a bouk awh teh lam dawk a phai awh.
A hnuk lah, a hmalah ka cet e taminaw ni Devit Capa koevah Hosanna kahring Cathut min lahoi ka tho e teh yawhawinae awm lawiseh. Kalvan kadeng lah Hosanna telah a hram awh.
Jerusalem kho thung a kâen navah kho thung abuemlah a puen awh teh hete tami heh apimaw telah a kâpacei awh.
Ka kamkhueng e taminaw ni, het hateh Galilee ram Nazareth kho e profet Jisuh doeh atipouh awh.
Jisuh ni Cathut e bawkim thung a kâen teh, bawkim thung hno kayawtnaw hoi ka ran e naw hah a hrek, tangka kathungnaw e caboinaw hoi âbakhu kayawtnaw e tungkhungnaw hai koung a tanawt pouh.
Cakathoung dawkvah ka im teh ratoumnae im telah a kaw awh han ati e, hote im hah nangmouh ni dingca im lah na sak awh, atipouh.
Hatnavah, mitdawnnaw hoi a khokkhemnaw ni bawkim ama koevah a tho awh teh ahnimae patawpanatnae pueng a dam sak pouh.
Jisuh ni kângairu hno a sak e naw hoi camonaw ni hai bawkim vah Devit Capa teh Hosanna awmseh telah a hram awh e lawk hah vaihma bawinaw hoi cakathutkungnaw ni a thai awh navah a lungkhuek awh.
Hetnaw ni bangtelamaw a dei awh, tie hah na thai ou telah Jisuh hah a pacei awh. Jisuh ni oe, ka thai, sanu kanetnaw e pahni dawk hoi Bawipa pholennae hah ka rakueng tie lawk hah vai touh boehai na touk boi awh hoeh maw atipouh.
Hattoteh ahnimanaw hah Bethani kho lah a ceitakhai teh hote karum hah aloum sak.
Amom lah khopui koe bout a ban navah a von a hlam.
Lam teng vah a hna dueng kanaw e thaibunglung kung buet touh hah a hmu. A kung koe a cei sin navah a paw banghai ao hoeh dawk atu hoi nâtuek hai nang dawk a paw paw sak hanh lawih atipouh. Hote thaibunglung kung teh tang a ke.
A hnukkâbangnaw ni a hmu awh dawkvah, thaibunglung kung ni tang a ke toe telah kângairu hoi a dei awh.
Jisuh ni, Atangcalah na dei pouh awh. Nangmouh ni oupvoutnae kaawm hoeh e yuemnae na tawn awh pawiteh, thaibunglung kung dawk sak e patetlah na sak thai a hloilah, hote mon patenghai a onae hmuen koehoi kampuen nateh tuipui dawk bawt haw na tet pouh pawiteh, na tie patetlah kaawm han.
Yuemnae na tawn pawiteh, ratoum laihoi na hei awh e hno pueng na hmu awh han atipouh.
Bawkim dawk bout a kâen teh a cangkhai lahun nah vaihma bawinaw hoi kacuenaw ni a tho awh teh, na e kâtawnnae lahoi maw het patet e hnonaw hah na sak, apini maw hete kâtawnnae na poe, telah a pacei awh.
Jisuh ni buet touh na pacei a van han, na dei thai awh pawiteh doeh hete hnonaw hah na e kâtawnnae lahoi maw ka sak tie hah ka dei van han.
Jawhan e Baptisma heh nâ lahoi e maw. Kalvan koehoi e maw, tami koehoi e maw telah a pacei. Hatnavah amamouh hoi amamouh a kâpacei awh teh, Kalvan koehoi tet pouh pawiteh, nangmouh ni Jawhan hah bangkongmaw na yuem awh hoeh telah bout na pacei han.
Tami koehoi tet pouh pawiteh tamimaya taki bout a tho, Jawhan hah tami pueng ni profet patetlah a pouk awh dawkvah, ati awh.
Hatdawkvah Jisuh koe, ka panuek awh hoeh atipouh awh. Jisuh ni hai hot patetvanlah hete hnotithainae hah apie kâtawnnae lahoi maw ka sak tie hah ka dei van mahoeh.
Bangtelamaw na pouk awh. Tami buet touh ni capa kahni touh a tawn. Kacue koevah a cei teh, ka capa, sahnin kaie misur takha dawk cet nateh thaw tawk loe atipouh.
A capa ni ka cet mahoeh atipouh. Hatei, a hnukkhu vah pan a kângai teh bout a cei.
A na pa ni kanaw e capa koe a cei teh ahmaloe e patetlah bout a dei pouh. Oe! Ka cei han bawipa, atipouh eiteh cet hoeh.
Hote capa kahni touh roi dawk api hah maw a na pa ngainae ka sak telah a pacei. Capa kacue e ni atipouh awh. Jisuh ni, atangcalah na dei pouh awh. Tamuk kacawngnaw hoi a tak kâyawtnaw ni nangmouh hlakvah Cathut uknaeram dawk a kâen awh.
Jawhan ni lannae lahoi nangmouh koe a tho eiteh nangmouh ni ama na tang awh hoeh. Tamuk kacawngnaw hoi a tak kâyawtnaw ni a yuem awh. Hote hah na hmu a ei teh na lungkâthung awh hoeh, yuemnae na tawn awh hoeh.
Bangnuenae lawk alouke heh thai awh haw. Imkung buet touh ni misur takha buet touh a tawn. Khoup a tumdum teh, misur katinnae tangkom a tai. Imrasang buet touh a sak. Takhakatawkkungnaw koe a hlai sak teh alouke ram dawk a cei.
A paw tue a pha toteh, a paw khi sak hanlah a sannaw hah takhakatawkkungnaw onae koe a patoun.
Hahoi takhakatawkkungnaw ni a sannaw hah a man awh teh buet touh hah a hem awh. Buet touh hah a thei awh. Buet touh hah talung hoi a dei awh.
Ahmaloe e hlak kapap lah takha katawnkung ni bout a patoun. Takha ka ring e naw ni ahmaloe e patetlah bout ati awh.
A hnukteng vah takha katawnkung ni, hotnaw ni ka capa hah a bari awh han doeh ati dawkvah, amae capa hah a patoun.
Takhakatawkkungnaw ni capa hah a hmu awh toteh het hateh râw kacoekung doeh. Tho awh, thei awh vaiteh, a râw hnonaw hah lat a sei telah a kapan awh teh,
Takha katawnkung e Capa hah a man awh teh takha alawilah a thei awh.
Takha katawnkung, a tho toteh, hote takhakatawkkungnaw hah bangtelamaw ati han telah a pacei.
Tamimaya ni hote tami kahawihoehnaw hah, ka patawpoung lah a raphoe vaiteh, a paw paw tue nah a paw ka poe hanelah, alouke takhakatawkkungnaw a hlai sak han atipouh awh.
Jisuh ni im kasaknaw ni a hnoun awh e talung ni im takin a rasang poungnae koe bout a pha. Hot hateh kahring Cathut ni a sak e doeh. Maimae mithmu hai kângairu hanlah ao tie lawk hah Cakathoung dawk na touk boi awh hoeh maw.
Hatdawkvah na dei pouh awh. Cathut uknaeram hah nangmouh koehoi lat vaiteh, ram e a paw kapaw hane naw koevah poe lah kaawm han.
Apipatethai hote talung van kabawt e teh ka rek han. Apipatethai a van vah hote talung ni a bosin e teh vitkatip lah ao han atipouh.
Hote bangnuenae hah vaihma bawinaw hoi Farasinaw ni a thai awh navah kaimouh doeh na dei sin nah tie hah a panue awh.
Bawipa man hanlah a tawng awh ei, tamimaya hah a taki awh, ahnimouh ni profet patetlah khak a pouk awh dawkvah.
Jisuh ni kamkhuengnaw koe, bangnuenae lawk bout a dei pouh.
Kalvan uknaeram teh siangpahrang buet touh ni, a capa hanlah yu paluennae ka sak pouh e hoi a kâvan.
Yu paluennae buven hanlah a sannaw hah, a patoun teh a coun tangcoung e naw, akawsak ei teh ahnimouh ni tho laipalah ao awh.
Alouke a sannaw hah bout a patoun teh ka coun tangcoung e naw koevah hettelah dei pouh awh. Buven hane kawi teh coungkacoe koung kalawng toe. Maito hoi alouke saring kathâw kathâwnaw hai ka thei teh hnopai pueng teh atangcoungcalah ao toe. Yu paluennae koe tho a leih tet pouh awh atipouh.
Hatei, ahnimouh ni banglahai pouk a laipalah a tangawn ni law a ceitakhai awh, a tangawn ni hno yonae koe a ceitakhai awh.
Kaawm rae naw ni a sannaw hah a man awh teh a rektap awh, a thei awh.
Hote siangpahrang ni a thai navah a lungkhuek, amae ransanaw a patoun teh a tuk sak dawkvah tami ka thet e hotnaw hah koung a thei sak. Ahnimae kho hai hmai a sawi pouh awh.
Hathnukkhu siangpahrang ni amae a sannaw hah a kaw teh kaie yu paluennae bu teh coungkacoe lawng lah ao. Ka coun e naw ni a kamcu awh hoeh dawkvah,
cet awh nateh lamsalun, lamcawngket koe na hmu awh e pueng hah yu paluennae buven hanlah kaw awh nateh coun awh, atipouh.
A sannaw ni hai lam tangkuem dawk a cei awh teh tami kahawi, kahawihoeh, a hmu awh e pueng hah a pâkhueng awh toteh yu paluennae bu hah kakawi lah a ven awh.
Siangpahrang ni ka tho e naw khet hanlah a kâen navah, Yu paluennae khohna ka kho hoeh e tami buet touh a hmu.
Ka hui, yu paluennae khohna laipalah bangkongmaw na kâen, atipouh. Ahni ni lawk tho thai laipalah ao.
Hattoteh siangpahrang ni a sannaw koe, ahnie a kutkhok katek awh nateh khuika hâ katanae, alawilah hmonae koe tâkhawng awh.
Hot patetvanlah, ka kaw e apap eiteh ka rawi e a youn ca atipouh.
Hattoteh Farasinaw a tâco awh. Bangtelah hoi maw a lawk dei e lahoi maimouh ni a yon man thai awh han titeh a kâdei awh.
Ama e hnukkâbangnaw hoi Herod e hnukkâbangnaw hah a patoun awh teh, Bawipa, nang teh lawkkam na cak. Apihai na taket hoeh, apie minhmai hai na khen laipalah Cathut e lamthung lawkkatang hah na pâtu tie hah ka panue awh.
Hatdawkvah bangtelamaw na pouk. Sizar koe tamuk poe kawi maw, poe hoeh han kawi maw, na dei a pouh haw, telah a pacei awh.
Jisuh ni ahnimae hawihoehnae hah a panue dawkvah, a lai kathoutnaw, bangdawkmaw kai heh na tanouk cak awh.
Tamuk tangka buet touh ma na patue awh, atipouh teh rahum tangka phek touh a sin pouh awh.
Hete mei, hete a ka pâphonae heh apie maw telah a pacei.
Sizar e mei, Sizar e ka pâphonae atipouh awh. Jisuh ni Sizar e hno teh Sizar koe poe awh. Cathut e hno teh Cathut poe awh, atipouh.
Hote lawknaw hah a thai awh navah, a kângairu awh teh alouklah a cei awh.
Hat hnin vah bout thaw hringnae awm hoeh ka tet e Sadusinaw ateng vah a tho awh teh a pacei awh.
Saya, Mosi nihaiyah tongpa teh ca sak laipalah dout pawiteh catoun a pout hoeh nahanlah a nawngha ni hote napui hah a yu lah a la han telah a dei.
Kaimouh thung dawk hmaunawngha sari touh kaawm e ao. Apasueke ni a yu a la teh ca khe laipalah a due dawkvah a yu hah a nawngha hanlah a ceitakhai pouh.
Hot patetvanlah buet touh hnukkhu buet touh, hmaunawngha sari touh ni hote napui hoi ao awh hnukkhu a due awh.
A hnukteng vah hote napui hai a due van.
Hottelah ao dawkvah boutthawnae hnin dawk teh hote napui hah hmaunawngha sari touh thung dawk apie yu lah maw ao han. Ahnimouh ni be bout a yu na awh, telah atipouh awh.
Jisuh ni, nangmouh teh Ca Kathounge lawk hah na thai panuek awh hoeh, Cathut e bahu hai na panue awh hoeh dawkvah na tawm payon awh.
Boutthawnae hnin dawk teh yuvânae awm mahoeh toe, yu paluennae hai awm mahoeh toe.
Kalvan tami, Cathut e taminaw patetlah doeh o awh han.
Hothloilah, kadout tangcoungnaw boutthawnae dawk teh, Cathut ni kai teh Abraham e Cathut, Isak e Cathut, Jakop e Cathut lah ka o telah nangmouh koe a dei e hah na touk boi awh hoeh maw. Cathut teh kadoutnaw e Cathut nahoeh. Kahringnaw e Cathut doeh telah atipouh.
Rangpui ni hote cangkhainae lawk hah a thai awh toteh a kângairu awh.
Sadusinaw hah lawk tho sak thai hoeh toe tie hah Farasinaw ni a thai awh toteh cungtalah a kamkhueng awh.
Ahnimouh thung dawk kâlawk ka cangkhai e buet touh ni a tanouk nahanlah buet touh a pacei.
Saya, kâlawk thung dawk bangpatet e kâpoelawk hah maw kalenpoung atipouh.
Jisuh ni, na Cathut, kahring Cathut hah na lungthin abuemlah, na muitha abuemlah, na pouknae abuemlahoi na lungpataw han.
Het hateh apasuekpoung e hoi kalenpounge kâpoelawk doeh.
Hothloilah, nama hoi kâkuen e hah nama hoi kâvan lah na lungpataw han tie apâhni e kâpoelawknaw teh apasuek e hoi a kâtarawi.
Hete kâpoelawknaw kahni touh hateh kâlawk puenghoi profetnaw ni dei e pueng e a kung lah ao atipouh.
Farasinaw a kamkhueng awh navah Jisuh ni a pacei.
Khrih heh banglah maw na pouk awh. Apie Capa lah maw na pouk awh, atipouh. Ahnimouh ni Devit Capa atipouh awh.
Hat pawiteh Devit ni Khrih hah muitha lahoi Bawipa telah bangkongmaw a kaw.
Devit ni a dei e teh, kahring Cathut ni na taran pueng hah na khok rahim ka ta hoehroukrak kaie aranglah tahung telah Bawipa ni kaie Bawipa koevah atipouh.
Hottelah Devit ni Khrih hah Bawipa telah kaw pawiteh bangtelamaw a capa lah ao han telah atipouh.
Api buet touh ni hai lawk kam touh boehai pathung thai awh hoeh. Hat hnin hoi teh apinihai lawk bout pacei ngam awh hoeh toe.
Hathnukkhu Jisuh ni a hnukkâbangnaw hoi tamimaya koe lawk a dei pouh.
Cakathutkungnaw hoi Farasinaw teh Mosi e tahungnae dawk a tahung awh.
Hatdawkvah ahnimouh ni a dei awh e pueng hah tarawi a nateh sak pouh awh. Ahnimae sak e patetlah teh sak awh hanh. Bangkongtetpawiteh, a dei awh e patetlah a sak awh hoeh dawk doeh.
Ahnimouh ni ka ri ni teh phu ka ru e hnonaw hah a roup awh teh taminaw e loung dawk ouk a patue awh. Amamouh ni hote hnonaw teh a kutdawn ca hoi boehai takhoe ngai awh hoeh.
A sak awh e hno pueng hah ayâ ni hmu nahanlah doeh a sak awh. A tampa dawk a kawm sin awh e akana a len sak awh teh, khohna dawk e akana a saw sak awh.
Buvennae hoi sinakoknaw koe kahawi e tahungnae hah a lungpataw awh,
hno yonae koe barinae, kacangkhaikung telah kawnae hah a ngai awh.
Nangmouh teh Rabbi telah kawnae hah dâw awh hanh. Khrih buet touh dueng doeh nangmouh na kacangkhaikung na tawn awh. Nangmouh pueng teh hmaunawngha lah na o awh.
Talai van vah apihai apa telah kaw awh hanh. Kalvan kho vah nangmae na Pa buet touh dueng doeh kaawm.
Saya telah kawnae hai dâw awh hanh. Khrih dueng doeh nangmouh na kacangkhaikung lah ka awm.
Nangmouh thung dawk kalenpounge tami teh nangmae patoun patang e lah ao han.
Apipatethai amahoima kârasang e teh a rahim vah pabo lah kaawm han. Apipatethai amahoima kârahnoum e teh tawm lah kaawm han.
A laikathout e cakathutkungnaw hoi Farasinaw yawthoe lah na o awh. Kalvan uknaeram teh ayânaw hanlah na khan awh teh namamouh hai na kâen awh hoeh, kâen han kangainaw haiyah na ngang awh.
A laikathout e cakathutkungnaw hoi Farasinaw yawthoe lah na o awh. Lahmainu e im hah na lawp awh teh a kamphawng hoeh nahanlah kasaw poung lah na ratoum awh. Hatdawkvah hoe kalen e yonphukhangnae hah na khang awh han.
A laikathout e cakathutkungnaw hoi Farasinaw, yawthoe lah na o awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh, tami buet touh hai namamae bawknae dawk kâen sak hanlah talî hoi a oung pheng na katin awh teh, na kâen sak hnukkhu teh namamouh hlak let hni e hell ca lah na o sak awh.
Kahrawikung mit ka dawnnaw, yawthoe lah na o awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh, Bawkim hah noe lahoi thoe ka bo e teh cak hoeh. Bawkim thung e sui hah noe hoi thoe ka bo e doeh ka cak na ti awh.
Tamipathu, mitdawnnaw, nâ e hno maw ka talue. Sui maw, nahoeh pawiteh sui ka thoungsak e Bawkim na ou.
Thuengnae khoungroe noe lahoi thoe ka bo e teh cak hoeh, thuengnae khoungroe van kaawm e thuengnae hno hah noe lahoi thoe ka bo e teh a cak na ti awh.
Mitdawnnaw, bangpatet e hno maw hoe ka talue. Hote thuengnae hno na ou, Hote thuengnae hno hah ka thoungsak e thuengnae khoungroe na ou.
Hatdawkvah thuengnae khoungroe hah noe lahoi thoe na bo pawiteh thuengnae khoungroe khuehoi avan e kaawm hno pueng hah mek na noe teh thoe na bo toe.
Bawkim hah noe lahoi thoe na bo pawiteh a thung kaawm e khuehoi thoe mek na bo toe.
Kalvan kho noe hoi thoe ka bo e teh Cathut e bawitungkhung hoi, a van ka tahung e khuehoi mek na noe teh thoe na bo toe.
A laikathout cakathutkungnaw hoi Farasinaw yawthoe lah na o awh. Nangmouh ni teh anhla a pawhiknaw hoi sawngpam totouh hra touh dawk buet touh na hmoun awh. Hatei, kâlawk thung dawk hoi hoe alawkpui e lannae, pahrennae yuemnae hah lat na hnoun awh. Hete hnonaw na sak han roeroe lah ao. A lathueng lah dei e hai sak laipalah awm awh hanh.
Kahrawikung mitdawnnaw, tui dawk manging buet touh boehai ao hoeh nahanlah na raci awh ei kalauk hah na payawp awh.
A laikathout e cakathutkungnaw hoi Farasinaw yawthoe lah na o awh. Manang hoi tongben hah avanlah na pâle awh ei a thung lah teh lawpnae hoi dumyennae hoi na kawi awh.
Mit ka dawn e Farasinaw, manang hoi tongben hah a thung lah hmaloe pâle awh. Hottelah na sak pawiteh doeh alawilah hai thoung tih.
A laikathout e cakathutkungnaw hoi Farasinaw yawthoe lah na o awh. Avan ka pangaw dui hluk e tangkom hoi na kâvan awh. Hote tangkom teh alawilah hroung ahawi. Athung teh tami hru, khinnae a cawngca hoi akawi.
Hot patetvanlah alawilah, taminaw hmalah teh tamikalan patetlah na o awh, athunglah teh laithoenae hoi dumyennae hoi na kawi awh.
A laikathout e cakathutkungnaw hoi Farasinaw, yawthoe lah na o awh. Profetnaw e phuen hah na sak awh teh tami kalannaw e phuen hah na pathoup awh.
A mintoenaw e se nah kaawm awh pawiteh profetnaw theinae dawk ka bawk awh mahoeh na ti awh.
Hottelah na tet awh pawiteh profetnaw ka thet awh e catoun lah ka o awh tie hah namamouh hoi namamouh ni na kampangkhai awh toe.
Hatdawkvah mintoenaw e a sakyoe awh e totouh phat awh.
Hrunthoe catounnaw bangtelamaw lawkcengnae hell thung hoi na hlout a thai han raw vaw.
Hatdawkvah thai awh haw, nangmouh koevah, profetnaw, a lungkaang naw, cakathutkungnaw ka patoun han. A tangawn teh na thei awh vaiteh thingpalam dawk na pathout awh han. Atangawn hah sinakoknaw dawk na hem awh teh, kho buet touh hoi buet touh na rektap awh teh na hrek awh han.
Hatdawkvah, tamikalan Abel e thi koehoi athung bawkim hoi thuengnae khoungroe rahak na thei awh e Berekhiah capa Zekhariah e a thi totouh talai van dawk rabawk lah kaawm tangcoung e tami kalannaw e thi teh nangmae lû dawk ka bawt han.
Atangcalah na dei pouh awh. Hete hno pueng heh, hete catounnaw van vah ka phat han.
Oe! Jerusalem, Jerusalem, profetnaw kathetkung, nang koe patoun lah kaawm e naw talung hoi kadêikung, Âpui ni a canaw hah a rathei rahim a pâkhueng e patetlah na canaw hah kamkhueng sak hanlah avai moikapap ngainae ka tawn toe. Hatei, nang ni teh na ngai hoeh.
Thai haw, na onae im teh tami kingkadi lah doeh ceitakhai lah ao toe.
Na dei pouh awh, Bawipa min lahoi ka tho e hah yawhawinae awm naseh telah na dei awh hoehroukrak, atu hoi teh nangmouh ni ka minhmai hah na hmawt a mahoeh toe atipouh.
Jisuh ni bawkim dawk hoi a tâco teh alouklah a cei navah, bawkim saknae imnaw hah pâtue hanlah a hnukkâbangnaw ni rek a hnai awh.
Jisuh ni hete hnonaw pueng hah na hmu awh nahoehmaw. Atangcalah na dei pouh awh. Raphoe laipalah talung buet touh e avan, buet touh kangna hai kamhmung mahoeh atipouh.
Hathnukkhu, Olive Mon dawk a tahung navah, a hnukkâbangnaw ni alouknaw bawk laipalah Jisuh koe rek a hnai awh teh, hote hnonaw teh nâtuek maw a tho han, let na tho nahane hoi talaivan a pout nahane minoutnaw teh bangtelamaw ao han na dei pouh haw atipouh awh.
Jisuh ni, ahnimouh koevah, apipatet ni hai na dum awh hoeh nahanlah kâhruetcuet awh.
Tami kapap ni kai doeh Khrih ati vaiteh, Kaie min lahoi haiyah tho a vaiteh, tami kapap hah a dum awh han.
Taran kâtuknae hoi, tarankâtuk nahane kamthang hai na thai awh han. Hatei, na puen awh hoeh nahanelah, kâhruetcuet awh. Hote hnonaw teh kaawm han. Hatei a poutnae nahoeh rah.
Miphun buet touh hoi buet touh, uknaeram buet touh hoi buet touh a kâtaran awh han. Kho tangkuem a takang vaiteh, lacik a pung han, tâlî a no han.
Hotnaw hateh runae kamtawngnae doeh.
Hat torei teh taminaw ni rektap hanlah, thei hanlah na man awh han. Ka min kecu dawk tami pueng ni na pahnawt awh han.
Hat torei teh tami kapap ni lawkkam raphoe vaiteh, buet touh hoi buet touh a kâpahnawt awh vaiteh, buet touh hoi buet touh a kâmaithoe awh han.
Profet kaphawk pap vaiteh tami kapap a dum awh han.
Hounlounnae apap han, lungpatawnae a roum han.
Apipatethai apout ditouh ka khang e teh hloutnae a hmu han.
Uknaeram kamthang kahawi heh miphun pueng koe lawkpanuesaknae lah ao na hanlah, talaivan pueng dawk pâpho lah kaawm han. Hahoi, teh poutnae a pha han.
Hatdawkvah profet Daniel ni a dei e patetlah panuetthopounge karaphoekung kathounge hmuen dawk kangdue e na hmu awh torei teh, Cakathoung ka touk e ni thai panuek naseh.
Hottelah hmu lah awm pawiteh, Judea ram kaawm e naw ni monsom lah yawng awh naseh.
Lemphu kaawm e ni imthungkhu e hno la hanlah kum hanh naseh.
Laikawk koe kaawm e ni hai a khohna la hanlah hnuklah kamlang hanh lawiseh.
Hot na hnin toteh camo ka neng e napui hoi camosen kaawm e napuinaw teh puenghoi a ru awh han.
Na yawng awh nahane teh pâding tue hoi sabbath hnin dawk a kâvoe hoeh nahanlah ratoum awh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, talaivan pek a kamtawng hoi atu totouh kaawm boihoeh rae, ao hnukkhu hoi hai bout kaawm hoeh hane puenghoi runae teh hatnae tueng nah a tâco han.
Hote tueng teh saw pawiteh apipatet ni hai hlout thai mahoeh. Rawi e taminaw hane kecu dawk hote tueng hah a duem sak han.
Hattoteh apipatet ni hai hi doeh Khrih ao, haw doeh Khrih ao ka tet nakunghai yuem awh hanh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, khrihkaphawknaw hoi profetkaphawknaw tâcawt vaiteh, rawi tangcoung e naw patenghai dum thai pawiteh dum thai nahanelah, kalenpounge mitnout hoi kângairunae hnonaw hah a kamnue sak awh han.
Thai awh haw, sut na dei pouh awh.
Hatdawkvah, ahnimouh ni Khrih teh thingyeiyawn doeh ao ka tet awh nakunghai tâcawt awh hanh. Imthung doeh ao ka tet nakunghai yuem awh hanh.
Sumpa teh kanîtho koehoi apalik nah kanîloum totouh a ang e patetlah tami Capa teh ka tho han.
Ro aonae koe langtanaw ni a kamkhueng han.
Hatnae tueng runae hnukkhu, kanî teh vaitalahoi a hmo han. Thapa teh ang mahoeh. Âsinaw teh kalvan hoi a bo awh han. Kalvannaw e bahu teh a kahuet awh han.
Hattoteh tami Capa e mitnout teh kalvan vah a kamnue han. Talai van tami pueng ni a khuika awh vaiteh, tami Capa ni kalenpounge bahu hoi kalenpounge bawilennae tâmai kâcui vaiteh a kum e hah na hmu awh han.
Hahoi a kalvantaminaw hah kacaipounge mongka lawk hoi patoun vaiteh, talai takin pali touh koe e kalvan apoutnae koehoi avanglae apoutnae koe totouh, a rawi tangcoung e taminaw hah a pâkhueng awh han.
Thaibunglung kung hoi bangnuenae hah pâkuem awh. Thaibunglung kung ni a dawn a cawn teh a hnanaw a naw toteh, kompawi a hnai toe tie hah na panue awh.
Hot patetlah hote a konglam abuemlah na hmu awh toteh, tami Capa teh takhang koe totouh a tho toe tie hah panuek awh.
Atangcalah na dei pouh awh. Atu e catounnaw be a due awh hoehnahlan hote konglam pueng ka tâcawt han.
Kalvan hoi talai teh a rawk han, hatei ka lawk teh a kangning han.
Hote tueng teh apinihai panuek hoeh. Kalvan e kalvantaminaw ni hai panuek hoeh. Apa ni dueng doeh a panue.
Tami Capa a kum toteh Noah senae patetlah kaawm han.
Noah ni tuikamuem hoehnahlan hoi long thung a kâen ditouh tami pueng ni a canei awh, a kâpaluen awh, a kâhâ awh.
Tui kamuem a tho toteh taminaw pueng koung raphoe ditouh a thada e patetlah tami Capa a kum toteh hotpatetlah ka tâcawt han.
Hattoteh law kaawm e tami kahni touh dawk buet touh a la vaiteh buet touh a ceitakhai han.
Cakang ka phawm roi e napui kahni touh dawk buet touh a la vaiteh buet touh a ceitakhai han.
Nangmae Bawipa teh nâtuek maw a tho han ti na panue awh hoeh dawkvah ring awh.
Tamru a tho nahane tueng heh imkung ni panuek pawiteh a paru thai hoeh nahanlah a ring han doeh tie teh na panue awh.
Hatdawkvah coungkacoe awm awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh na poukhoehnae tueng dawk tami Capa teh ka tho han.
Bawipa ni amae imthungnaw hah atueng a pha toteh rawcanaw poe sak hanlah kaukkung lah a rawi e yuemkamcunae hoi lungangnae hoi kakuep e san kahawi teh apimaw .
Bang patet e san hai hottelah a sak e hah a Bawipa ni a hmu pouh e teh a yawhawi.
Atangcalah na dei pouh awh. Bawipa ni hot patet e san koevah a hnopai kaawm e pueng hah a poe han.
Hatei, san kathout ni teh a lungthin dawk hoi ka Bawipa heh tho hnai mahoeh telah a pouk laihoi,
a huinaw hah a hem a bo teh hounloun, yamuhrinaw hoi a canei awh.
A bawipa teh a poukhoehnae hoi a panuehoehnae tueng dawk a tho teh,
hote san hah puenghoi yue vaiteh khuikanae, hâ katanae hmuen koe ka kâsak e naw hoi cungtalah hmuen a hmoun pouh awh han.
Kalvan uknaeram teh yupaluenkung dawn hanlah hmaiim patuep hoi ka cet awh e tanglakacuem hra touh hoi a kâvan.
Hote tanglanaw thung dawk panga touh teh a lungang awh. Hatei, panga touh e teh a pathu awh.
Ka pathu e naw teh, hmaiim dueng a sin awh teh, atui sin awh hoeh.
A lungkaangnaw teh, hmaiim hoi, satuium dawk, atui khuehoi a sin sin awh rah.
Yupaluenkung a tho hoeh navah, hote tanglanaw ni a ngam awh teh, muet a i awh.
Karumsaning toteh, khenhaw! yupaluenkung a tho toe, tâcawt awh nateh, dawn a leih, telah a oung.
Hote tanglakacuemnaw ni a thaw awh teh hmaiimnaw hah a kârakueng awh.
A lungkaang hoeh e naw ni kaimae hmaiim hmai a due toe. Nangmae satui hah youn touh na poe awh haw telah a lungkaangnaw koe a hei awh.
A lungkaang e naw van ni hai nangmouh hane khuehoi atui khout hoeh. Hatdawkvah na hno awh hanelah atui kâyawt e koe na ran awh pawiteh bet kahawi han telah atipouh awh.
Hotnaw ni atui ran hanelah a cei awh lahun navah, yupaluenkung a tho toteh, coungkacoe kaawm e tanglanaw teh yupaluenkung hoi cungtalah pawi thung a kâen a hnukkhu takhang hah a khan awh.
Hathnukkhu alouknaw a tho awh. Bawipa, Bawipa kaimouh han tho paawng ei telah a kâhei awh.
Bawipa ni atangcalah na dei pouh awh, nangmouh na panuek awh hoeh, telah atipouh.
Hatdawkvah tami Capa a tho nahane hnin hoi atueng teh na panue awh hoeh dawkvah ring awh.
Kalvan uknaeram teh ahlanae ram koe kahlawng ka cet e hoi a kâvan. Ahni ni, kho louk lah cei hane pouknae a tawn dawkvah, a kut rahim e naw hah a kaw teh a hnonaw hah a hnawng. Ahnimouh teh amamae a coung thai awh e patetlah buet touh koe talen panga,
buet touh koe kahni, buet touh koe buet touh a poe hnukkhu a ceitakhai (Talen buet touh heh Deinari 6,000 hoi a kâvan ).
Talen panga touh ka dâw e ni a cei teh a yoran dawkvah alouke apung talen panga touh a hmu.
Hote patetvanlah talen kahni touh ka dâw e van nihai, alouke apung talen kahni touh a hmu.
Talen buet touh ka dâw e niteh, Bawipa e talen hah talai a tai teh talai thungvah a hro.
A hnin a tha moi a saw hnukkhu hotnaw e Bawipa a tho teh, tangka e a kong hah a dei.
Talen panga touh ka dâw e ni yah, apung e talen panga touh a sin teh, Bawipa nang ni kai koe talen panga touh na pâkuem sak. Alouke talen panga touh ka pung sak atipouh.
Bawipa ni, ahawi nang teh kahawi e hoi yuemkamcu e san., nang teh titca e hno dawk yuemkamcu dawkvah, kapap e hno hai na kuem sak han. Na Bawipa lunghawinae thungvah kâen van leih atipouh.
Talen kahni touh ka dâw e nihai, Bawipa talen kahni touh na kuem sak teh, alouke talen kahni touh ka pung sak atipouh.
Bawipa ni, ahawi. Yuemkamcu e san kahawi. Hno titca e dawk yuemkamcu toe. Hno kapap e hai na kuem sak han. Na Bawipa lunghawinae thung kâen van haw, atipouh.
Talen buet touh ka dâw e nihai, Bawipa nang teh pacipali lah na kaawm e na tho dawkvah, na patuehoehnae hmuen koe na ka a niteh, na heihoehnae hmuen koe na ka pâkhueng e na tho tie hah ka panue.
Hatdawkvah, ka taki teh, nange talen buet touh hah talai thung ka hro toe. Atu na talen roup ao atipouh.
A bawipa ni, ka pangak pasa e san kathout, atipouh.
Ka heihoehnae koe ka pâkhueng tie hah na panuek katang pawiteh kaie talen hah bangkongmaw hno yorannaw kut dawk na hruek hoeh vaw. Hottelah na hrueng pawiteh kai bout ka tho toteh, tangka a manu hoi apung hah ka hmu han ei.
Hatdawkvah, talen buet touh e hah a kut dawk hoi lawmh awh. Talen hra touh ka tawn e hah poe sin awh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, apipatet hai ka tawn e teh, hoe kapap a tawn nahanlah rek poe sin han rah. Apipatethai ka mathoe e teh a tawn e ca patenghai he lawp pouh lah ao han.
Cungkeihoehe hote san hah, khuikanae hoi hâ katanae aonae koe, alawilah hmonae thungvah tâkhawng awh, atipouh.
Tami Capa teh a Bawilennae hoi kalvantami kathoungnaw hoi a tho toteh, a bawilennae bawitungkhung dawkvah a tahung han.
A hmalah miphun pueng a kamkhueng sak vaiteh, tukhoumkung ni tu hoi hmae a kapek e patetlah tami pueng hah a kapek han.
Tunaw hah aranglah, hmaenaw hah avoilah a ta han.
Hat toteh, siangpahrang ni aranglah kaawm e koevah, tho awh, a Pa e yawhawinae kacoenaw, talaivan sak pasuek hoi nangmouh hanlah sut pathoup e uknaeram hah pang awh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, ka vonhlam nah na paca awh. Tui kahran nah nei han tui na poe awh. Imyin lah ka o nah na khetyawt awh.
Caici lah ka o nah na khohna sak awh. Ka patawpanat nah na khetyawt awh. Thongim ka bo nah na hloe awh, ati pouh.
Hat torei teh tami kalannaw niyah, Bawipa nâtuek maw na vonhlam e hah ka hmu awh teh na paca awh. Tui na kahran e hah nâtuek maw ka hmu awh teh na nei hanlah tui na poe a vaw.
Imyin lah na o e hah nâtuek maw na hmu awh teh na khetyawt awh. Caici lah na o e hah nâtuek maw na hmu awh teh, na khohna sak awh.
Na patawpanat nah nâtuek maw na hloe awh teh, nang koe ka tho awh, telah ati awh han.
Hattoteh siangpahrang ni atangcalah na dei pouh awh. Nangmouh ni hete ka nawnghanaw thung dawkvah kathoengpounge koevah na sak awh e pueng hateh, kai koe na sak awh e doeh toe telah bout ati pouh awh han.
Hat toteh, siangpahrang ni, avoilah kaawmnaw koevah, nangmouh thoebo lah na kaawmnaw, kahraimathout hoi amae a hunaw hanlah sut rakueng pouh e a yungyoe hmai thungvah kai koehoi kâtakhoe awh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, ka von a hlam nah ca han rawca na poe awh hoeh, tui kahran navah nei hane tui na poe awh hoeh.
Imyin lah ka o navah na khen na yawn awh hoeh, caici lah ka o navah na kho na hnat sak awh hoeh, ka patawpanat nahai thoseh, thongim thung ka o nahai thoseh, na tho na awm sin awh hoeh.
Hotnaw ni vah, Bawipa, na vonhlam e, tui na kahran e, imyin lah na o e, caici lah na o e, na patawpanat e, thongim thung na onae hah nâtuek maw na hmu awh teh na khenyawn laipalah, na paca laipalah ka o awh, ati awh han.
Hattoteh siangpahrang ni, atangcalah na dei pouh awh. Nangmouh ni hete ka nawnghanaw thung dawk, ka thoung poung e koe na sak awh hoeh e pueng teh kai koe na sak awh hoeh toe, ati pouh awh han.
Hotnaw teh a yungyoe reknae koe cet awh vaiteh, tami kalannaw teh a yungyoe hringnae koe a cei awh han a ti.
Jisuh ni hete lawknaw koung a dei hnukkhu, a hnukkâbangnaw koevah,
Hnin hni touh a loum hnukkhu teh, ceitakhai pawi hnin ao han toe titeh na panue awh. Hattoteh tami Capa hah thingpalamnae dawk thei sak hanlah, poe e lah kaawm han atipouh.
Hatnavah, vaihma bawinaw, cakathutkungnaw hoi kho thung e kacuenaw teh vaihma kacue Kaiaphas e toeim vah a kamkhueng awh teh,
Jisuh hah huenghai hoi bangtelah ne man thai vaiteh thei thai awh han tie hah a kâpankhai awh.
Hatei, pawi na hnin vah man awh hanh ei sei. Tami pueng ruengrueng tet a langvaih ati awh.
Bethani khovah ka hrikbei e Simon im Jisuh ao navah,
napui buet touh ni hmuitui aphu kaawm poung e talungpangaw bom a sin teh bu a ca lahun nah a lû dawk a awi pouh.
A hnukkâbangnaw ni a hmu awh navah, bangkongmaw a kaseikasak ati awh teh a lungkhuek awh.
Hote hmuitui hah aphu moikapap lah yo vaiteh karoedengnaw poe hanelah ao ati awh.
Jisuh ni a panue toteh hote napui hah bangkongmaw na tarawk awh. Ahni ni kai koe hnokahawi a sak toe.
Karoedengnaw teh nangmouh koe doeh pou ao awh. Kai teh nangmouh koe pou kaawm mahoeh.
Hete hmuitui hah ka tak dawk a awi e teh, ka ro pakawp nahanlah a rakuengnae doeh toe.
Atangcalah na dei pouh awh. Talaivan kamthang kahawi deinae hmuen pueng koevah, hete napui pou pouk nahanelah, a hnosak e heh dei lah kaawm van han atipouh.
Hatnavah a hnukkâbang hlaikahni touh thung dawk e Judah Isakarot ni vaihma bawinaw koe a cei teh,
Jisuh hah nangmae kut dawk na poe thai pawiteh, nangmouh ni kai hah tangka nâyittouh maw na poe awh han atipouh. Ahnimouh ni ngun tangka 30 touh na poe han atipouh awh.
Hahoi teh, Bawipa hah pahnawt thai nahanelah, Judah ni atueng kanhlongnae hah sut a ring.
A hnukkâbangnaw ni tonphuenhoehe pawi apasuek hnin vah, ceitakhai pawi ca nahane hmuen hah nâ e koe maw rakueng sak hanlah na ngai atipouh awh.
Bawipa ni, khothung tami buet touh e im vah cet awh nateh, Bawipa ni lawk na thui e teh, a tue a hnai toe, a hnukkâbangnaw hoi cungtalah ceitakhai pawi heh nangmouh im vah ka hno awh han ati tet pouh awh, atipouh.
A hnukkâbangnaw ni a dei pouh e patetlah a sak awh teh, ceitakhai pawi hah atangcoungcalah a rakueng pouh awh.
Tangmin lavah, a hnukkâbangnaw hlaikahni touh hoi bu cungtalah a ven awh.
A ca awh lahun navah Bawipa ni, atangcalah na dei pouh awh. Nangmouh thung dawk buet touh ni kai hah na pahnawt awh han atipouh.
Hat torei teh, a hnukkâbangnaw a lung puenghoi a mathoe awh teh, Bawipa kai maw telah lengkaleng a pacei awh.
Bawipa ni kawlung dawk kai hoi rei ka tapu e ni kai na pahnawt han.
Cakathoung dawk thut e patetlah tami Capa teh ka cet han. Hatei, tami Capa ka pahnawt e teh a yawthoe. Ahni teh khe hoeh ngala pawiteh bet ahawihnawn atipouh.
Bawipa ka pahnawt e Judah Isakarot ni hai Rabbi kai maw telah a pacei navah, na dei e patetlah oe nang doeh atipouh.
A ca awh lahun navah, Jisuh ni vaiyei a la teh, lunghawi lawk a dei hnukkhu, a raen teh, hete vaiyei teh ka tak doeh. Lat awh nateh cat awh, telah a hnukkâbangnaw koe atipouh.
Manang hai a la teh lunghawi lawk a dei hnukkhu ahnimanaw hah a poe teh, nangmouh pueng ni net awh.
Hete manang teh lawkkam katha doeh. Taminaw hlout nahanlah ka rabawk e ka thi doeh.
Na dei pouh awh. Hete misurtui patet e a katha e misurtui nangmouh hoi cungtalah a Pa e uknaeram dawk bout ka nei hoehroukrak, atu hoi bout ka net mahoeh toe.
Hahoi teh la a sak awh teh Olive Mon lah a luen awh.
Hat toteh, Cakathoung dawk a thut e teh, tukhoumkung hah hem awh vaiteh, a tunaw ni paringparang lah ao awh han ati e patetlah, sahnin tangmin lah nangmouh pueng ni kai kecu dawk na lung a pout awh han.
Hatei, bout ka thaw hnukkhu nangmouh hmalah, Galilee ram lah ka cei han, telah Jisuh ni atipouh.
Hetnaw ni nang kecu dawk a lung ka pout awh nakunghai kai teh ka lung khoeroe pout mahoeh, telah Piter ni a ti.
Jisuh ni, atangcalah na dei pouh. Sahnin tangmin ahlui a khawng hoehnahlan kai hah vai thum touh na pahnawt han atipouh.
Piter ni, nang hoi rei due han nakunghai kai ni na pahnawt mahoeh bout atipouh. Alouke a hnukkâbangnaw ni hai hot patetvanlah a dei awh.
Hatnavah Jisuh ni Gethsemani hmuen koe ahnimouh hoi rei a pha toteh, kai teh hote hmuen koe ratoum hanlah ka cei han, hete hmuen koe la tahung awh lah a, telah a hnukkâbangnaw koe atipouh.
Piter hoi Zebedee e a capa roi a hrawi. Hatnavah Bawipa teh a lungmathoe, lungpuen hoi ao dawkvah,
Jisuh ni due han totouh ka lungreithai. Hie a hmuen koe awm awh nateh kai hoi cungtalah ring awh, telah a hnukkâbangnaw kathum touh koe a dei pouh.
Hathnukkhu hmalah hrawt bout a cei teh, a tabo laihoi oe a Pa coung thai pawiteh hete manang na takhoe pouh haw. Hatei, kaie ka ngainae patetlah tho laipalah, na ngainae patetlah tho lawiseh telah a ratoum.
A hnukkâbangnaw aonae koe a pha navah, ahnimouh ni di a i takhai e a hmu navah, nangmouh ni suimilam buet touh kangna hai kai hah na ring thai awh hoeh maw.
Tacueknae koehoi na hlout thai awh nahan ratoum laihoi ring awh. Muitha ni teh a ngai poung ei, takthai ni teh coung thai hoeh telah Piter koe atipouh.
Hahoi bout a cei teh Oe a Pa hete manang hah ka net laipalah roun thai hoehpawiteh, na ngainae patetlah phat lawiseh telah bout a ratoum.
Hat hnukkhu a hnukkâbangnaw onae koe bout a tho teh, ahnimanaw teh muet bout a i awh e a hmu navah,
a ceitakhai teh ahmaloe a ratoum e patetlah apâthum lah bout a ratoum.
A hnukkâbangnaw onae koe bout a tho teh, atuteh duem ip awh lawih. Tami Capa teh tamikayonnaw e kut dawk pahnawt nahane tueng teh a pha toe.
Thaw awh, cet a lei sei. Kai na kapahnawtkung teh a tho toe atipouh.
Hottelah a dei lahun navah a hnukkâbang hlaikahni touh dawk ka bawk van e Judah Isakarot teh a tho. Vaihma bawinaw hoi khothung e tami kacuenaw ni a patoun awh e naw teh tahloi hoi bongpainaw a sin awh teh a tho awh.
Bawipa kapahnawtkung niyah, kai ni ka paco e teh Jisuh doeh, ahni hah man awh telah hote taminaw koe noutnae a poe e patetlah,
Bawipa koe rek a hnai teh, kacangkhaikung yawhawinae awmseh ati teh a paco.
Jisuh ni ka hui bang panki e dawk maw na tho atipouh navah, hote taminaw a tho awh teh Jisuh hah a man awh.
Hatnavah Jisuh hnukkâbang e buet touh ni a kut a dâw teh tahloi a rasa hnukkhu, vaihma kacue e a san buet touh hah a bouk navah a hnâ thouk a pet.
Jisuh ni na tahloi hah amae tabu dawk bout tat leih. Tahloi ka patuem e tami pueng teh tahloi hoi a due awh han.
Atu roeroe vah a Pa koe kahei thai tie hai thoseh, kâhet pawiteh kalvan ransahuipui aphu hlaikahni touh hlak kapap lah Kai koe a patoun han tie hah nang ni na pouk hoeh maw.
Hat pawiteh, Cakathoung dawk a thut e patetlah, hettelah o han tie hnonaw hah bangtelavai a kuep thai telah a ti.
Hatnavah Jisuh ni Dingca man e patetlah kai man hanlah rama, bongpainaw na sin awh teh na tho a bo vaw. Kai ni Bawkim thung hnin ka due na cangkhai eiteh, nangmae rahak ka tahung navah nangmouh ni kai hah na man awh hoeh.
Hot hateh, Cakathoung akuep nahane doeh telah tami kamkhuengnaw hah a dei pouh. Hattoteh a hnukkâbangnaw pueng ni Bawipa hah parang a yawng takhai awh.
Jisuh ka man e naw ni Bawipa hah, cakathutkungnaw hoi kacuenaw a kamkhuengnae vaihma kacue Kaiaphas koe a ceikhai awh.
Piter hai vaihma kacue e toeim totouh, Bawipa hoi kahlat lah a kâbang. A hnukteng bangtelamaw ati awh tie a panue nahanlah athung a kâen teh ka ring e naw hoi reirei a tahung.
Vaihma bawinaw hoi kacuenaw, sanhedrin lawkcengkungnaw pueng ni Jisuh thei thai nahanlah laithoe kampangkhainae a tawng awh ei hmawt awh hoeh.
Laithoe kampangkhai hanelah moi a tho awh ei, Bangpatete kapanuekkhaikung hai tawn awh hoeh. A hnukteng vah laithoe kampangkhaikung kahni touh a tho roi teh,
ahni ni, kai ni Cathut e Bawkim hah ka raphoe vaiteh hnin thum touh hoi bout ka cum thai han telah a dei titeh kapanuekkhaikung lah a kangdue roi.
Vaihma kacue ni a kangdue teh, kam touh boehai bout na dei mahoeh maw. Hetnaw ni bangtelamaw kapanuekkhaikung lah a kangdue awh, atipouh navah Jisuh teh lawkkamuem lah ao.
Vaihma kacue ni nang teh Cathut e Capa, Khrih hoi Khrih hoeh e hah kaimouh koe na dei nahanlah kahring Cathut noe lahoi kâ na poe atipouh.
Hatnavah, Jisuh ni na dei e patetlah atueng. Hothloilah ka dei e teh, hmalae atueng dawk tami Capa ni bawilennae aranglah a tahung teh kalvan e tâmainaw dawk tahung lahoi a tho e hah na hmu awh han atipouh.
Hatnavah vaihma kacue ni amae angki a phi teh hete tami ni Cathut ka tapuet lah a dei toe. Bangpatet e kapanuekkhaikung maw bout a ngai rah. Cathut ka tapuet lah a dei e hah atu roeroe vah nangmouh ni na thai awh toe.
Bangtelamaw na pouk awh, atipouh navah, hotnaw ni ahni teh due han a kamcu telah bout a dei awh.
Hattoteh a minhmai hah tamtui hoi a tamthawi awh.
Kut hoi a thaw awh, tangawn ni a tambei awh, oe Khrih nang hah apinimaw na tambei tie hah profet lahoi dei leih, atipouh awh.
Piter ni toeim alawilah longkha koe a tahung navah sannu buet touh ni a tho teh nang haiyah Galilee tami Jisuh hoi cungtalah e doeh atipouh navah,
Piter ni na dei e hah ka panuek hoeh telah taminaw e hmalah a oun.
Hathnukkhu Piter ni im longkha alawilah a tâco navah alouke napui buet touh ni bout a hmu teh haw kaawm e naw koe, het haiyah Nazareth tami Jisuh hoi cungtalah e doeh atipouh.
Piter ni ahni hah ka panuek hoeh telah thoe a ka bo teh bout a oun.
Hathnukkhu moung ao teh hote hmuen koe kangdoutnaw ni Piter e a teng a tho awh teh, atangcalah nang haiyah hotnaw koe na ka bawk e doeh. Na lawk ni ma a pâpho toe telah atipouh awh.
Piter ni ahni hah ka panuek hoeh ati teh thoe a kâbo. Hat nah tahma vah ahlui a khawng.
Jisuh ni Ahlui a khawng hoehnahlan, vai thum touh kai hah na pahnawt han ati e lawk hah Piter ni hlawt a pouk navah alawilah a tâco teh khawngsauek laihoi a ka.
Amom vah vaihma bawinaw hoi tamimaya dawk e kacuenaw ni Jisuh thei hanelah a kâpankhai awh.
Hahoi Bawipa hah a katek awh teh Pailat siangpahrang kut dawk tawngtang a poe awh.
Hatnavah, Bawipa ka pahnawt e Judah Isakarot ni Bawipa a dum e hah a hmu navah, pan a kângai teh, tangka 30 touh hah vaihma bawinaw, bawknae koelah kacuenaw koevah bout a poe.
Ka payon toe, yon ka tawn hoeh e tami e a thi hah ka pahnawt payon toe telah ati. Ahnimouh van ni hai kaimouh hoi bangtelamaw kâkuet a vaw. Nama e hno hah nama ni khen lawih atipouh awh.
Ahni ni hote tangka hah Bawkim dawk vu a tâkhawng teh alouklah a cei hnukkhu a kaithi.
Vaihma bawinaw ni hote tangka a la awh teh a thi phu doeh. Hno kuemnae dawk pâseng kawi nahoeh telah a kapan awh teh,
Hlaam ka bo e talai hmuen hah Jentelnaw e phuen hanelah hote tangka hoi a ran awh.
Hote kecu dawkvah atu totouh hote talai hmuen hah ‘thi talai telah a kaw awh.
Profet Jeremiah ni a dei e teh, Isarelnaw ni aphu khoe e tami e aphu tangka 30 touh hah a la awh teh Cathut ni lawk na thui e van patetlah,
Hlaam ka bo e talai hmuen hah ka ran awh tie lawk hah, hatnavah a kuep.
Jisuh teh ram kaukkung hmalah a pha navah, ram kaukkung ni nang teh Judah siangpahrang katang maw telah a pacei. Jisuh ni na pacei e patetlah atang doeh atipouh.
Vaihma bawinaw hoi kacuenaw ni yon a pen awh navah kam touh boehai pathung hoeh.
Pailat bawi ni nange avanglah moikapap ni a kampangkhai e hah na thai hoeh maw atipouh nakunghai,
Kam touh boehai a pathung hoeh e hah ram kaukkung ni a ka ngai lah a ru.
Hote pawi dawkvah ram kaukkung ni thongkabawtnaw thung dawk hoi tami kapap ni a ngai e tami buetbuet touh hah ouk tha e lah ao.
Hatnavah paung e naw thung dawk Barabas tie min kamthang e tami buet touh ao.
Taminaw a kamkhueng awh toteh Pailat bawi ni nangmouh ni apimaw hlout sak hanlah na ngai awh, Barabas maw hoehpawiteh Khrih tie Jisuh hah maw, telah taminaw hah a pacei.
Hettelah a paceinae teh ahnimouh ni a ut awh dawkvah Jisuh a man sak ati e hah Pailat bawi ni a panue dawk doeh.
Hothloilah, lawkcengnae tungkhung dawk a tahung navah a yu ni tami a patoun teh, hote tamikalan hah bang telah hai tet hanh. Sahnin roeroe vah kai ni ahni kecu dawk ka mang lah puenghoi ka khang toe, telah lawk a thui.
Tami ka kamkhuengnaw ni Barabas hlout sak vaiteh Jisuh thei sak hanlah vaihma bawinaw hoi kacuenaw ni taminaw hah a uen awh.
Hatdawkvah ram ka uk bawi ni het tarawi thung dawk, nangmouh ni api hah maw hlout sak han na ngai awh telah bout a pacei navah; ‘Barabas doeh hlout sak ka ngai awh telah a dei awh.
Pailat bawi ni ‘hah pawiteh Khrih tie Jisuh hah te bangtelamaw ti han telah bout a pacei navah; ahnimouh pueng ni ‘ahni hateh thingpalam dawk hetnae khang seh telah ati awh.
Ram kaukkung bawi ni hai ‘bangkongmaw, bangmaw a sakpayon telah a pacei navah, ahni teh thingpalam dawk het lah awmseh telah hoe a hram awh.
Pailat bawi ni tâ laipalah taminaw ni hoehoe a coukdouk awh e hah a hmu toteh, tui a la teh taminaw e a hmalah a kut a kamsin teh, hete tamikalan e a thi hoi kai teh ka bet hoeh, na ngai e patetlah sak a lawih a ti.
Hote tami pueng ni, ahni e a thi teh kaimae lû dawk, ka catounnaw e a lû dawk bawt lawiseh ati awh.
Pailat bawi ni hai Barabas hah a tha pouh. Jisuh hah a hem hnukkhu thingpalam dawk thei hanelah a poe.
Hat torei teh ram kaukkung e a ransanaw ni Jisuh hah bawi imthung lah a hrawi awh teh, ransahu abuemlah a kamkhueng sak.
A khohna hah a rading pouh awh, hni paling a kâkhu sak awh.
Pâkhinglukhung a kâmuk sak awh. Sonron buet touh aranglah a sin sak awh teh, a hmalah khokcuengkhuem sin awh teh, Judah siangpahrang, nang koe yawhawinae awm naseh ti hoi a pacekpahlek awh.
Tamtui hoi a tamthawi awh sonron hah a la pouh awh teh a lû dawk a hem pouh awh.
Hottelah a pacekpahlek awh hnukkhu, a kâkhu e hah a rading pouh awh teh, amae kâkhu e hah bout a kâkhu sak awh teh, thingpalam dawk het hanlah a tâcokhai awh.
A cei awh lahun nah Simon tie Sairen tami, buet touh a hmu awh teh, thingpalam hah hmatara a hrawm sak awh.
Luhru hmuen tie Galgotha a pha awh toteh,
tâsi kakhat hoi a kalawt awh e misurtui kathut poung e hah nei sak hanlah a poe awh. A patek teh nei han ngai hoeh.
Thingpalam dawk a pathout awh hnukkhu cungpam a rayu awh teh a kâkhu e hni hah a kâravei awh.
Hote hmuen koe tahung laihoi a ring awh.
Yon pâphonae ca a vo pouh e teh, ‘het e tami teh Judah siangpahrang Jisuh doeh, telah a thut awh teh a lû lathueng a vo pouh awh.
Hatnavah Bawipa hoi cungtalah dingca kahni touh aranglah buet touh, avoilah buet touh thingpalamnae dawk a pathout awh.
Lam dawk ka cet kaawm e naw ni Bawkim hah ka raphoe vaiteh hnin thum touh hoi bout ka sak han e, namahoima kâhloutsak haw.
Cathut e Capa katang lah na awm pawiteh namahoima rungngang nateh, thingpalamnae dawk hoi kum leih telah a lû kahek awh teh pacekpahleknae lawk a dei awh.
Hot patetvanlah vaihma bawinaw, cakathutkungnaw, tami kacuenaw niyah ayânaw teh a rungngang thai,
Amahoima teh kârungngang thai hoeh bo. Judah siangpahrang katang na tetpawiteh thingpalamnae dawk hoi atu kum naseh. Kum pawiteh ka yuem awh han.
Ahni teh Cathut a kâuep toe. Kai teh Cathut Capa doeh ati toe. Hatdawkvah Cathut ni ahni dawk a ngainae awm pawiteh atu roeroe vah kârungngang na seh telah a dudam awh teh a dei awh.
Hot patetlah Bawipa hoi cungtalah thingpalamnae dawk a het awh e dingcanaw ni hai a pathoe awh teh yon a pen awh.
Kanî tuengtalueng a thunnae koehoi suimilam kathum totouh talai van pueng dawk kho a hmo.
Tangmin lah suimilam kathum navah Jisuh ni ‘Eli, Eli, Lama Sabakhthani. telah a hram. Hot hateh, Ka Cathut, ka Cathut bangkongmaw na pahnawt tinae doeh.
Hote hmuen koe kangdout e a tangawn ni a thai awh navah Elijah doeh a kaw ati awh.
Tami buet touh ni tang a yawng teh, napon a sin teh, misurtui kathut e hoi a kalawt hnukkhu rayung dawk a takei teh nei sak hanlah a poe.
Alouknaw ni tat yawkaw, Elijah ni ahni rungngang hanlah a tho ou, tho hoeh ou tie heh khen a haw sei ati awh.
Jisuh ni tha hoi bout a hram teh hringnae a thouk.
Hattoteh Bawkim thung e yaphni a lû hoi a khok totouh a kâphi. Talai a kâhuet. Lungsongnaw a kâbawng.
Tangkom pueng a kamawng teh, ka ip tangcoung e tami kathoungnaw moikapap a thaw awh teh,
Bawipa a thaw hnukkhu, ahnimanaw teh tangkom thung hoi a tâco awh teh khopui kathoung thungvah a kâen awh, tami moikapap koe a kamnue awh.
Jisuh ka ring e ransabawi hoi ransahu ni talai a kâhuet e a hmu awh toteh a taki awh dawkvah Cathut e Capa tangngak doeh ati awh.
Galilee kho e Jisuh khetyawt hanlah a hnukkâbang e napuinaw ni hote hmuen koevah ahlanae koehoi a khet awh.
Hote napuinaw dawkvah Meri Magdalin, Jem hoi Joseph e a manu Meri hoi Zebedee e capanaw e manu tinaw a bawk awh.
Tangmin lah a pha toteh Arimathea kho e kabawipounge Joseph, a hnukkâbang van e buet touh a tho teh,
Pailat bawi koe a kâen teh Jisuh e ro hah a hei. Pailat ni a ro hah poe lah awmseh telah kâ a poe.
Joseph ni a ro hah a la teh lukkarei ka pangaw e hoi a kayo hnukkhu,
ama hanelah lungsong dawk thuk e tangkom katha thung vah a ta. Lungphenpui hoi takhang a teng teh a ceitakhai .
Meri Magdalin hoi alouke Meri teh hote tangkom hmalah a tahung roi.
Atangtho toteh vaihma bawinaw hoi Farasinaw ni Pailat bawi koe a kamkhueng awh teh,
‘hot e kadumyenkung ni kai teh apâthum hnin kathâw han telah a due hoehnahlan a dei e hah ka panue awh rah.
Hatdawkvah a hnukkâbangnaw ni tangmin vah a ro hah a la awh teh, ahni teh duenae koehoi a thaw toe telah tami pueng koe dei awh pawiteh ahmaloe e payon e hlak a hnukkhu e payon e hoe kalen han telah ngaihrinae a tawn awh dawkvah, tangkom hah hnin thum touh thung ring hanlah kâ na poe haw atipouh awh.
Pailat ni ‘nangmouh koe ka ring e tamihu touh ao. Cet awh nateh a coung thai totouh a uep thai nahanlah ring awh atipouh.
Ahnimouh ni a cei awh teh talung hah mitnoutnae tacik a kin awh hnukkhu ka ring e naw a ta awh teh, tangkom hah kahawicalah a ring awh.
Sabbath aloum hnukkhu, hnin sari touh dawk apasuek hnin amom kho meimei dai nah Magdalin hoi alouke Meri tinaw hai, tangkom khet hanlah a cei awh.
Hatnavah puenghoi Tâlî a no. Cathut e kalvantami ni kalvan hoi a kum teh tangkom khannae talung a paawng teh hote talung van a tahung.
A minhmai teh sumpapalik e patetlah a kamnue. A khohna e hai tâmai patetlah a pangaw.
Karingnaw ni kalvantami hah a taki awh lawi a pâyaw awh teh meimei a due awh.
Kalvantami niyah taket awh hanh. Thingpalamnae dawk thei e Jisuh doeh na tawng awh, tie ka panue.
Hete hmuen koe awm hoeh toe. A dei tangcoung e patetlah a thaw toe. Tho awh nateh Bawipa a yannae hah khenhaw.
Karang poung lah ban awh nateh duenae koehoi a thaw toe tie hah a hnukkâbangnaw koe dei pouh awh. Nangmouh hmalah Galilee ram vah a kamnue han. Hawvah nangmouh ni Bawipa hah na hmu awh han ka ti toe telah kalvantami ni napuinaw koe a dei.
Hote napuinaw ni a taki awh eiteh, a lunghawi awh dawkvah, tangkom koehoi karanglah a ban awh teh a hnukkâbangnaw koe hote kamthang hah dei pouh hanelah a yawng awh.
A cei awh lahun nah Jisuh ni sut a dawn teh, na konawm awh atipouh. Hote napuinaw ni rek a hnai awh teh a khok hah a tapam awh laihoi a tabo awh teh a bawk awh.
Jisuh ni takinae tawn awh hanh. Cet awh nateh, hete kamthang lawk hah dei pouh awh. Hote ram dawkvah ahnimouh ni kai hah na hmu awh han atipouh.
Hote napuinaw ni a cei awh navah ka ring e atangawnnaw ni khothung a kâen awh teh kaawm e hno pueng hah vaihma bawinaw koe a thaisak awh.
Hahoi vaihma bawinaw ni kacuenaw hoi pouknae kapoenaw hoi a kamkhueng awh teh, a kâpan awh. Ka ring e ransanaw hah tangka moikapap a poe awh teh,
tangmin ka i awh lahun navah a hnukkâbangnaw a tho teh a ro hah a paru awh, telah a dei awh.
Hote kong hah siangpahrang ni bout thai pawiteh kaimouh ni ka dum awh vaiteh nangmouh koe a lungkhuek hoeh nahanlah ka sak awh han, telah atipouh awh.
Hatdawkvah ransanaw ni tangka a la awh teh a dei pouh e patetlah a sak awh. Hettelah hoi hote kamthang teh Judahnaw rahak vah sahnin ditouh a kamthang.
Hlaibun touh e a hnukkâbangnaw ni Galilee ram lah a cei awh. Bawipa ni lawk a thui e mon dawk a luen awh navah Bawipa hah a hmu awh teh a bawk awh.
