Lam dawk ka cet kaawm e taminaw nihaiyah, hei, bawkim ka raphoe vaiteh hnin thum touh hoi ka cum han ka tet e,
namahoima kârungngang haw, thingpalam dawk hoi kum haw, telah a lû a kahek awh teh, pacekpahleknae lawknaw hah a dei awh.
Hot patetvanlah, vaihma bawinaw, cakathutkungnaw nihaiyah, hete tami ni ayânaw teh a rungngang thai ei, amahoima teh kârungngang thai hoeh bo vaw.
Kaimouh ni ka hmu awh vaiteh, ka yuem awh nahan, Isarel siangpahrang, Messiah teh thingpalam dawk hoi atu roeroe kum na ei seh, telah a panuikhai awh. Bawipa hoi thingpalam dawk rei hete ni hai a pacekpahlek van.
Kanî tuengtalueng a thun hoi tangmin lahsa suimilam kathum totouh, thung talai van abuemlah kho king a hmo.
Tangmin lahsa suimilam kathum navah Jisuh ni, Eloi Eloi Lama sabakhthani, telah puenghoi a hram. A deingainae teh, ka Cathut ka Cathut bangkongmaw kai na ceitakhai tinae doeh.
A teng vah, kangdout e tami tangawn ni a thai awh navah, Elijah doeh a kaw ati awh.
Tami buet touh ni a yawng teh, napon hah misurtui kathut dawk, a ranup teh, cakui dawk a mawp teh, Jisuh nei sak han lah, a pahni dawk a tuh pouh teh, awm nah nei, thingpalam dawk hoi kum sak hanelah, Elijah a kum hoi a kum hoeh e khenhaw sei ati awh.
Jisuh teh kacaipounglah a hram teh, a thouk.
Hatnavah, bawkim e lukkarei yaphni a som hoi khok koe totouh a kâphi.
Hottelah a thouk e hah a hmalah kangdout e ransabawi buet touh ni a hmu nah, hete tami teh Cathut e Capa katang doeh, telah a ti.
Napuinaw ni hai ahlanae koe a kangdue awh teh a khet awh.
Hote napuinaw teh, Jisuh Galilee ram ao nah, ka khenyawn e Salome, Meri Magdalin, Jem kanawhnawn e hoi Joseph e manu Meri tinaw hoi Jerusalem totouh Jisuh hnuk kâbang e alouke napuinaw hah doeh.
Atangtho teh sabbath hnin lah ao toung dawkvah, tangmin lah a pha toteh,
Cathut uknaeram ka ngaihawi e lah kaawm e, bari kaawm e lawkceng bawi Arimathea tami Joseph ni, taranhawi lahoi, Pailat bawi koe a cei teh, Jisuh e a ro hah a hei.
Pailat bawi ni, Jisuh tang a due e hah a panue nah, a kângairu dawkvah, ransabawi buet touh a kaw teh, a duenae a saw toung maw, telah a pacei.
Ransabawi ni, a due toe, atipouh e a thai dawkvah, Jisuh ro hah la hanelah kâ a poe.
Hatdawkvah, Joseph ni ro hah a rasu teh, ama ni a ran e lukkarei hoi a kayo teh, talung tangkom dawk a thak teh, lungphenpui hoi tangkom takhang hah a teng.
Meri Magdalin, Joseph manu Meri tinaw ni ro pakawpnae hmuen hah a khet awh.
Sabbath hnin abaw hoi Meri Magdalin, Jem manu Meri hoi Salome tinaw teh, Jisuh ro hluk nahanelah hmuitui a ran awh.
Hnin sari touh dawk apasuek hnin, amom kanî a tâco navah, ahnimouh teh tangkom koe a cei awh.
Ahnimouh ni, tangkom takhang tengnae lungphen pui hah apini mouh na paawng pouh han vaiyoe, titeh buet touh hoi buet touh a kâpan awh navah, a khet awh teh, tangkom kamawng tangcoung e hah a hmu awh.
Hote lungphenpui teh hroung a len.
Napuinaw ni tangkom thung a kâen awh navah, thoundoun buet touh teh ka pangawpekyek e angkidung a kho teh, aranglah ka tahung e a hmu awh navah, a taki awh teh a kalue awh.
Ahni ni na kângairu awh hanh. Thingpalam dawk a thei awh e Nazareth tami Jisuh hah nangmouh ni na tawng awh. Ahni teh bout a thaw toe. Hi awm hoeh toe. A ro tanae hmuen hah khen haw hei.
Nangmae hmalah, Galilee ram lah a cei e hah Piter hoi a hnukkâbangnaw koe dei pouh awh. A dei tangcoung patetlah hote ram dawk nangmouh ni Bawipa teh na hmu awh han atipouh.
Hote napuinaw teh tangkom thung hoi a tâco awh teh, pâyaw kângairu laihoi a yawng awh. A taki awh dawk ayânaw koe a pâpha awh.
Bawipa teh hnin sari touh dawk apasuek hnin amom a thaw hnukkhu, kahraituilinaw sari touh a pâlei pouh e Meri Magdalin koe a mei hmaloe a kâpatue.
Meri ni hai a cei teh, Bawipa e a taminaw khuika laihoi ao awhnae koe hete kamthang hah a dei pouh.
Jisuh teh a hring lah ka hmu toe tie hah ahnimouh koe a dei pouh ei yuem awh hoeh.
Hathnukkhu, a hnukkâbangnaw kahni touh roi teh khote lah a cei roi lahun nah, ahnimouh roi koe meilam phunlouk lahoi Jisuh ni a kamnue pouh.
Ahnimouh roi teh, let a ban roi teh, hote kamthang hah alouke a hnukkâbangnaw koe a dei pouh roi ei, ahnimouh ni yuem awh hoeh.
Hathnukkhu a hnukkâbangnaw hlaibun touh teh, rawca a ca awh lahun navah, ahnimouh koe Jisuh ni a kamnue pouh. Bout ka thaw e Jisuh hah ka hmu awh toe telah a dei awh e lawk hah a yuem awh hoeh dawkvah, ahnimae a yuemhoehnae hoi a lung a patanae hah a yue.
Nangmouh ni talaivan pueng cet awh nateh, hnosak puengpa koevah kamthang kahawi hah dei awh.
Apipatethai ka yuem ni teh baptisma ka coe e tami teh rungngang lah ao han. Ka yuem hoeh e tami teh lawkcengnae koe a pha han.
Kayuemnaw koe kamnuek hane kângairu hnonaw teh, ka min lahoi kahraituilinaw a pâlei awh han. Lawk kathanaw a pan awh han.
Tahrunnaw hah a kut hoi a man awh han. Asue ka net awh nakunghai banglah awm mahoeh. Kapatawnaw e tak dawk kut a toung awh toteh a dam awh han, telah a ti.
Hottelah Jisuh ni lawk be a thui hnukkhu, kalvan lah a luen teh, Cathut e aranglah a tahung.
A hnukkâbangnaw ni kho tangkuem a cei awh teh, kamthang kahawi hah a pâpho awh. Cathut ni ahnimouh dawk hoi thaw a tawk teh, kângairu hno a sak awh e lahoi, a pâpho awh e hah lawkkatang doeh tie a caksak awh. Amen.
Ka talue poung e Theophilus, maimouh dawk kamnuek tangcoung e a konglamnaw hah,
apuengcue hoi kahmawt ni teh kapanuekkhainaw hoi lawk dawk thaw katawknaw ni maimouh koe a dei tangcoung e patetlah tami moikapap ni ca lahoi thut hanelah a panki awh.
Kai ni hai apuengcue hoi ka kamtu e a konglamnaw pueng teh atang katang tie na panue thai nahanelah,
hote konglamnaw teh nang koe pou hruek hane kawi lah ao telah ka pouk.
Judah ram ka uk e Herod Siangpahrang kut rahim vah Abijah tie vaihma miphun dawk hoi e vaihma Zekhariah teh ao. Ahnie a yu teh Aron e catoun, a min teh Elizabeth,
ahnimouh roi teh kâpoelawknaw pueng a tarawi roi, tounhoehe lah ao teh, Cathut hmalah tamikalan lah ao roi.
Elizabeth teh carôe dawkvah ahnimouh roi teh ca tawn roi hoeh. A kum haiyah a cue poung roi toe.
Hatnavah, Zekhariah teh amae a huinaw hoi cungtalah atueng a pha toung dawkvah, Cathut hmalah vaihma thaw a tawk lahun nah,
vaihmanaw e singyoe patetlah cungpam a khoe. Cathut e bawkim thung a kâen teh hmuitui hmai sawinae a sak.
Hottelah Cathut koe a sak lahun navah taminaw pueng teh alawilah a ratoum awh.
Hatnavah Cathut e kalvantami teh Zekhariah hmalah a kamnue teh hmuitui hmaisawi thuengnae aranglah a kangdue.
Zekhariah ni a hmu navah a kalue teh a taki.
Kalvantami ni Zekhariah taket hanh, nange ratoumnae teh Cathut ni a thai toe. Na yu Elizabeth teh ca tongpa a khe han, a min teh Jawhan telah na phung han.
Nang teh na konawm vaiteh na lunghawi han, hote ca tongpa na khe kecu dawk taminaw pueng hai a konawm awh han.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, ahni teh Cathut hmalah ka talue e tami lah ao han. Misurtui hoi parui kawinaw pueng net mahoeh. A manu e von thung ao nahoi Kathoung Muitha hoi akawi han.
Ahni ni Isarel catounnaw moikapap Cathut koe lah a kamlang sak han.
Ahni teh Cathut ni a tha e laicei lah ao vaiteh Profet Elijah patetlah muitha hnotithainae hoi kakawi e tami lah ao han. A napanaw hoi a capanaw kâpo sak vaiteh lawk ka ngai hoeh e taminaw hah tami kalannaw e lungangnae lam koe lah bout a hrawi han. Cathut e taminaw teh Bawipa hanelah coungkacoe lah ao thai nahan kârakueng awh telah a dei.
Zekhariah ni kalvantami koevah hote hno a coung thai han doeh telah bangtelah hoi maw ka panue thai han. Bangkongtetpawiteh, kai teh, ka matawng toe, ka yu hai a matawng toe telah atipouh.
Kalvantami ni kai teh Gabriel doeh, hete lunghawinae kamthang nang koe dei hanelah, na ka patoun e Cathut hmalah ka kangdout e doeh.
Nang teh kaie lawk na tang hoeh dawkvah hete hno a kuep hoehnahlan totouh lawk dei thai laipalah, na lawk a a han. Kaie ka lawk teh atueng a pha toteh a kuep han telah a dei pouh.
Taminaw ni Zekhariah teh ngaihawi laihoi a ring awh teh bangkongmaw bawkim thung atu sittouh a o vaw titeh a kângairukhai awh.
Ahni teh bawkim thung hoi a tâco navah lawk a dei thai hoeh dawkvah, kamnuenae a hmu telah a panue awh. Zekhariah teh a lawk a a dawkvah a kut khok hoi ahnimanaw koe a yavai pouh
Vaihma thaw a tawk e atueng abaw hnukkhu Zekhariah teh im lah a ban.
Hathnukkhu hoi a yu Elizabeth teh camo a neng dawkvah thapa yung panga touh imthungkhu a kamung.
Cathut ni taminaw e hmalah kaie yeiraiponae pueng na la pouh toe a ti.
Thapa yung taruk navah Cathut ni kalvantami Gabriel koe, Galilee ram Nazareth kho dawk kaawm e tangla koe a patoun.
Hote tangla teh Devit miphun a min Joseph ka kâphung e tami hoi kâhâ tangcoung e lah ao. A min teh Meri doeh.
Kalvantami ni Meri koe a tho teh na konawm haw, yawhawinae ka coe e napui nang teh Cathut ni na okhai telah atipouh.
Meri ni hote lawk a thai navah a lungtâsue teh hote lawk teh bangpatet e lawk maw ati teh a kâpouk.
Kalvantami ni hai Meri na lungpuen hanh. Nang teh Cathut koe minhmai kahawi na hmu toe.
Nang teh camo na neng vaiteh ca tongpa na khe han, a min teh Jisuh telah na phung han.
Hote capa teh ka lentoe poung e tami lah ao vaiteh Lathueng Poung e Capa telah kaw lah ao han. Cathut ni ahni teh a na pa Devit e bawitungkhung a poe han.
Ahni ni Jakop catounnaw hah pout laipalah a uk han. Ahnie uknaeram teh poutnae awm mahoeh telah atipouh.
Meri ni kai teh tongpa hoi kâ panuenae awmhoeh rah, hete hno heh kai koe bangtelamaw a coung thai han telah kalvantami hah a pacei.
Kalvantami ni Kathoung Muitha nang dawk a pha toteh Lathueng Poung e bahu nang dawk ao han. Hatdawkvah khe lah kaawm e kathounge camo hah Cathut capa telah kaw lah ao han.
Hothloilah cakaroe telah kaw e nange na hui Elizabeth teh camo a nengnae thapa yung taruk touh a pha toe.
Cathut hanelah ka coung thai hoeh e hno buet touh hai awm hoeh telah bout a dei pouh.
Meri ni kai teh Cathut e a sannu doeh, Bawipa e lawk patetlah kai dawk kuep lawiseh telah a dei pouh hnukkhu kalvantami ni a ceitakhai .
Hathnukkhu Meri ni, Judah ram mon dawk kaawm e kho buet touh dawk karanglah a cei hnukkhu,
Zekhariah im dawk a kâen teh Elizabeth a pato.
Meri ni a patonae lawk Elizabeth ni a thai navah a von thung e camo teh a kâroe. Elizabeth teh Kathoung Muitha hoi akawi teh,
nang teh napuinaw pueng hlak yawkahawipoung e lah na o. Nange na von thung kaawm e camo hai a yawkahawi e tami doeh.
Ka Bawipa e a manu ni kai koe a pha navah yawhawinae bangkongmaw kai ni ka coe.
Nange na lawk kai ni ka thai navah kaie ka von thung e camo teh a lunghawi teh a coukdouk.
Bawipa ni a dei e lawk a kuep mingming han doeh telah ka yuem e napui teh a yawkahawi e doeh telah a hram laihoi a dei.
Meri nihai, ka lungthin ni Cathut a pholen teh,
ka muitha ni ka rungngangkung Cathut dawk a lunghawi.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, amamae a sannu a kârahnoumnae na hmu pouh toe. Atu hoi hmalah ka tho hane a tami pueng ni a yawkahawi e tami telah na dei awh han.
Athaonae hoi kakawi e Cathut ni hno kalen kai hanlah na sak pouh toe. A min teh thoung raw naseh.
Cathut ka taket e taminaw teh Bawipa e pahrennae ahnimouh dawk pou a kangning.
A kut hoi a hnotithainae teh a kamnue sak toe. Kâoupkâpawi e taminaw teh koung kathek kayak awh toe.
Bawitungkhungnaw dawk hoi khobawinaw a pabo teh, ka kârahnoum e taminaw a tawmdawm toe.
A von kahlamnaw ka boum ca lah a paca vaiteh, katangrengnaw a kuthrawng lah a ban sak toe.
Maimae mintoenaw ni a dei e patetlah,
Abraham koehoi a catounnaw koe pahrennae pou a sak hanelah a pouk teh, amae san Isarelnaw a tawmdawm toe telah atipouh.
Meri teh Elizabeth koe thapa yung thum touh ao hnukkhu a ma im bout a ban.
Elizabeth teh a khenae hnin thapa a kuep navah ca tongpa teh a khe.
Cathut ni ka taluepoung e pahrennae Elizabeth koe a kamnue sak e hah imteng e a huikonaw ni a thai navah, ahni hoi cungtalah a konawm awh.
Ataroe hnin vah, camo e vuensoma hanelah, a tho awh teh, a na pa e a min Zekhariah patetlah phung hane a kâdei awh.
A manu ni telah na phung mahoeh, Jawhan telah na phung han atipouh.
Ahnimouh ni hai, nangmae miphun dawk telah min phung e tami buet touh hai awmhoeh rah atipouh awh.
Hathnukkhu, a na pa ni bangtelamaw phung han a ngai telah a pacei awh.
A na pa ni hai calung a hei teh Jawhan telah a min a thut navah, taminaw pueng ni kângai a ru awh.
Telah a thut tahma vah Zekhariah teh lawk bout a dei thai teh Cathut a pholen.
Imteng kaawmnaw pueng ni a taki awh teh, hete a konglamnaw pueng teh Judah ram pueng koe koung a kamthang.
Ka thai e naw pueng ni a lung thung a pâkuem awh teh, hete camo teh bangpatet e tami lah maw ao han titeh a kâpankhai awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh Bawipa e hnotithainae teh camo hoi cungtalah ao.
Camo e a na pa Zekhariah teh, Kathoung Muitha hoi akawi teh profet lawk a dei,
Isarelnaw e kahring Cathut teh yawhawinae awmseh. Bangkongtetpawiteh Bawipa ni amae a taminaw na kountouk teh ratangnae na sak pouh toe.
Talaivan pek kamtawng hoi amae profet kathoungnaw ni a dei e patetlah,
maimouh hanelah rungngangnae ki teh a sanpa Devit e catoun dawk hoi a tho sak toe.
Hete hloutnae teh maimouh na ka taran e naw hoi ka maithoe e naw pueng, kut dawk hoi hloutnae doeh.
Maimae mintoenaw koe lung na patawnae kamnue sak hane hoi,
maimanaw taran kut dawk hoi na rungngang vaiteh,
hringyung lam lungpuennae tawn laipalah thoungnae, lannae lahoi Cathut bawk thai nahan,
maimae na pa Abraham koe thoungnae lawk a kam e hah pahnim hoeh nahanelah doeh.
Camo nang, nang hai Lathueng Poung e profet telah na kaw awh han.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, maimae Cathut ni yonnae a ngaithoum teh rungngangnae dawk pha thainae a kong hah, amae taminaw koe pâpho vaiteh, Cathut e lamthung rakueng hanelah, nang teh hmalah na cei han.
Hote pahrennae lahoi kalvan hoi kanî raeng maimouh dawk a pha teh,
hmonae hoi duenae tâhlip dawk kaawm e naw koe a ang vaiteh, maimouh koe roumnae lamthung na patue awh han telah a dei.
Hote camo teh, a roung takhang teh muitha thaonae hoi akawi. Isarel miphunnaw koe a kamnue hoehroukrak thingyeiyawn vah ao.
Hatnavah Sizar Augustus ni talaivan milu parei hanelah kâ a poe.
Siria ram dawk Quirinius ni a uk navah, hote miilu pareinae teh hmaloe pasuek poung e lah ao.
Taminaw pueng teh min poe hanelah ama kho lengkaleng a ban awh.
Devit e catoun lah kaawm e Joseph hoi a ham tangcoung lah kaawm e Meri teh min poe hanelah,
Galilee ram Nazareth kho koehoi Judah ram Bethlehem telah min poe e Devit kho lah a cei roi. Hatnavah Meri e a von thung e camo teh a tang toe.
Bethlehem kho ao navah, camo khe nahan hnin a kuep toung dawkvah camin teh a khe.
A kâhat nahane hmuen ao hoeh dawkvah, camo teh hni hoi a kayo teh maito dokko dawk a pâ i roi.
Hote ram dawk, tukhoumnaw ni khohmo vah amamae tuhu hah kahrawngum vah a ring awh.
Hatnavah Cathut e kalvantami buet touh ahnimouh koe a kamnue teh Cathut e raeng teh atengpam pheng a ang dawkvah, ahnimouh teh a lungtâsue awh teh a taki awh.
Kalvantami nihai, na lungtâsue awh hanh awh, taminaw pueng hane, lunghawinae kamthang kahawi nangmouh koe na dei pouh awh. Hote kamthang kahawi ni tami pueng lunghawinae koe a pha sak han.
Sahnin vah, Devit kho dawk, rungngangkung Bawi Khrih teh a khe toe.
Nangmouh ni bangtelah hoi maw na panue awh han tetpawiteh, camo teh hni hoi a kayo vaiteh maito dokko dawk a payan e na hmu awh han telah atipouh.
Hatnavah, kalvantaminaw hoi kalvanlae ransahu a kamnue awh teh, Bawipa a pholen awh.
Cathut teh lathoung poung lah bawilennae awm lawiseh. Talai van roumnae awm lawiseh, telah a ti awh.
Kalvantaminaw, kalvan lah a luen hnukkhu tukhoumnaw ni, maimanaw Bethlehem kho koe lah cet awh sei. Cathut ni na patue e hno khen a sei telah buet touh hoi buet touh a ka dei awh.
Hathnukkhu, ahnimanaw teh karanglah a cei awh teh, Joseph hoi Meri ni maito dokko dawk a pâ i e camo hah a hmu awh.
A hmu hnukkhu hoi amamouh ni a thai e camo e a kong hah hmuen tangkuem koe a pâpho awh.
Tukhoumnaw ni, a dei e lawk kathainaw pueng ni kângai lah a ru awh.
Meri teh hote a konglamnaw pueng a pâkuem teh luepluep a pouk.
Tukhoumnaw teh amamouh koe pâpho pouh e patetlah a hmu awh navah Cathut a pholen awh teh a ban awh.
Ataroe hnin a pha navah camo teh vuensoma awh, camo a von hoeh nahlan vah kalvantami ni min poe e patetlah Jisuh telah a phung awh.
Hathnukkhu hoi Mosi e kâlawk patetlah kâpasu thoungnae hnin a kuep navah, a manu hoi a na pa ni camo teh Jerusalem kho lah a ceikhai roi.
Ca caminnaw pueng teh Cathut hanelah thoungsak han telah kâlawk dawk thut tangcoung e patetlah Cathut koe a kâhnawng hnukkhu,
Âbakhu kahni touh hoi thuengnae na sak han telah kâlawk dawk a dei e patetlah a sak awh.
Hatnavah Jerusalem kho dawk Simeon tie tami buet touh ao. Hote tami teh tamikalan, a lawk dawk kaawm e tami, Isarelnaw hloutnae ka ngaihawi e tami lah ao. Kathoung Muitha teh ahni dawk ao.
Ahni teh Bawipa Khrih hah na hmu hoehnahlan na dout mahoeh telah, Kathoung Muitha e pâpho pouh e ka coe e tami lah ao.
Hatnavah, ahni teh Muitha lahoi bawkim dawk a cei teh, a manu hoi a na pa ni Camo teh kâlawk patetlah sak hanelah a hrawi roi.
Simeon ni ahni hah a tawm teh, Cathut a pholen.
Bawipa, na lawk patetlah nange na san kai lungmawngnae ka hmu toe.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, Bawipa e miphunnaw tawmdawm hanelah hai thoseh,
Jentelnaw ang sak hanelah hai thoseh,
Isarel taminaw pueng hanelah rakueng tangcoung e rungngangnae teh atu ka mit hoi ka hmu toe telah a dei.
Hote lawk hah Joseph hoi Meri ni a thai navah kângai lah a ru roi.
Simeon ni ahnimanaw hah yawhawinae a poe teh, Meri koevah, hete camo teh Isarelnaw moikapap rawp nahane hoi thaw nahanelah ao vaiteh, oun e lah ao nahanelah hruek e lah ao toe.
Taminaw e pouknae pueng a kamnue nahanelah, na lungthin hai tahloi ni a sei han telah a dei.
Asher miphun, Fanuel e canu Anna telah a min kâphung e profet napui a kum kacue e buet touh ao. Ahni teh a vâ hoi kum sari touh ao hnukkhu hoi,
a kum, rui taroe kum pali totouh lahmai lah ao teh, ratoumnae hoi rawcahainae lahoi yah, khohmo khodai Cathut koe a kâpoe teh bawkim dawk ao.
Ahni hai tang a kâen teh Cathut a pholen. Jerusalem kho dawk ratangnae kangaihawinaw pueng koe hote Como e a kong a dei pouh.
A manu hoi na pa ni hai Cathut e kâlawk patetlah koung a tarawi hnukkhu, ama kho Galilee ram Nazareth kho lah a ban roi.
Camo hai a roung teh lungangnae hoi akawi. Cathut e lungmanae teh ahni dawk ao.
Kum tangkuem ceitakhai pawi saknae tueng a pha navah a manu hoi a na pa teh Jerusalem kho lah ouk a cei awh.
Jisuh kum hlaikahni touh a pha navah pawi e singyoe patetlah Jerusalem kho lah a cei awh teh,
pawi a baw hnukkhu vah a manu hoi a na pa teh a ban roi nah, camo Jisuh teh Jerusalem khovah ao e hah panuek roi hoeh.
A huikonaw hoi a tho mue telah a pouk dawkvah hnin touh lamcei a cei awh toe.
Camo teh a huikonaw koe ao hoeh toung dawkvah, Jerusalem kho lah bout a ban roi.
Hnin thum touh a ro hnukkhu vah, Jisuh teh bawkim dawk kacangkhainaw e rahak a tahung teh ahnimanaw hoi lawk kâ pacei awh e hah a manu hoi a na pa ni a hmu roi.
Jisuh e lungangnae hoi panuenae lawk ka thai e naw pueng ni a kângairu awh.
A na pa yuvâ ni ahni teh a kâhmo navah, a kângairu roi. A manu niyah ka ca bangkongmaw kaimouh roi koe telah koe na o. Na pa kaimouh roi ni ka puen roi dawkvah na tawng roi atipouh.
Jisuh ni bangkongmaw kai khuek na tawng roi vaw, kai teh a Pa e im dawk ka o han tie hah na panuek hoeh na maw.
Hateiteh, Jisuh ni a dei e a manu hoi a na pa ni thai panuek roi hoeh.
Hattoteh Jisuh ni ahnimouh koe a cei van teh Nazareth kho a pha navah a manu hoi a na pa e kâ a ngai pouh. A manu ni teh hete a konglamnaw pueng a lungthin dawk khik a pâkuem.
Jisuh teh thoumthai lungangnae dawk a roung teh, Cathut hmalah hoi tami hmalah, minhmai kahawi a hmu.
Tiberia Siangpahrang kum hrahlaipanga touh bawi a tawk navah Pontius Pailat teh Judah ram dawk ukkung bawi a tawk. Galilee ram dawk Herod, Iturea hoi Trakhonitis ram dawk Herod e a nawngha Filip, Abilen ram dawk Lisanias telah khobawi lah lengkaleng a tawk awh.
Annas hoi Kaiaphas teh vaihma kacue a tawk roi nah, Cathut e lawk teh kahrawngum kaawm e Zekhariah capa Jawhan koe a pha.
Profet Isaiah e cauk dawk a thut e patetlah kahrawngum hramkhai e lawk teh, Cathut tho nahan lam rasoun awh.
Lamthungnaw palan awh. Ravonaw paten awh. Karasangnaw hah rahnoum sak awh. Ka lawngkoi e lamthungnaw palan awh.
Lam kamathoutnaw rasoun awh.
Taminaw pueng ni Cathut e rungngangnae a coe awh han ati e patetlah, Jawhan teh Jordan tui koe a tengpam a kâhlai teh, yon pankângainae Baptisma kong a hramkhai.
Hatnavah, tui baptisma ka coe hanelah ka tho e tamihunaw koe, Jawhan ni lawk a dei e teh, tahrun catounnaw ka tho hane lawkcengnae dawk hoi, na hlout thai nahanelah apinimaw kâhruetcuetnae na poe awh vaw.
Pankângainae hoi kamcu e hno tarawi awh. Abraham teh maimae na pa telah na lungthung pouk awh hanh. Atangcalah na dei pouh awh. Cathut ni hete talung dawk hoi Abraham e catounnaw a tâco sak thai.
Thingkung koe cakâ sut pangawi lah ao toung dawkvah, a paw kahawi ka paw hoeh e a kung pueng teh ka tâtueng vaiteh hmai dawk koung ka phum han telah a dei.
Tami kamkhuengnaw ni telah pawiteh kaimouh ni bangtelamaw ka sak awh han telah a pacei awh navah,
Jawhan ni angki yung hni touh ka tawn e ni ka tawn hoeh e rei naseh. Ca han ka tawn e ni hot patetlah sak van na seh telah bout atipouh.
Tamuk kacawngnaw baptisma coe hanlah a tho awh teh, saya kaimanaw ni bangtelamaw ka sak awh han telah a pacei awh navah,
nangmae na Bawipa ni na cawng sak e a hloilah cawng awh hanh atipouh.
Ransa thaw katawknaw ni hai kaimouh ni bangtelamaw ka sak awh han telah a pacei awh navah, Jawhan ni apipatet koe hai, ka kamsoum hoeh lahoi tangka lawm awh hanh, het awh hanh awh, na hmu e kutphu dawk na lungkuep awh, telah atipouh.
Taminaw ni a ngaihawi awh teh Jawhan heh Messiah han vaimoe telah a pouk awh.
Jawhan ni hai kai ni nangmanaw teh tui dawk doeh baptisma na poe awh. Hatei kai hlak kalen e a tho han. Ahnie khokkhawm rui patenghai rading pouh hane lah ka kamcu hoeh. Ahni ni nangmanaw teh Kathoung Muitha hoi hmai dawkvah Baptisma na poe awh han.
Ahni teh a kut dawk para a patuep teh, katin tangcoung e cakang a hut sak dawkvah, cataknaw teh capai dawk a cui sak vaiteh, cahiknaw teh ka roum thai hoeh e hmai dawk a phum han atipouh.
Hottelah alouke kamthang kahawi aphunphun lahoi a pâpho pouh.
Hathnukkhu hoi Herod bawi ni a nawngha e a yu Herodias hoi thoseh, amae payonpakainae puenghoi thoseh, Jawhan ni a pâpho pouh teh a yue.
Jawhan hah thongim rek a paung dawkvah, Herod teh ahmaloe e yon van hete yonnae hoi rek a kâthap.
Taminaw pueng ni baptisma a coe navah Jisuh hai baptisma a coe teh ratoum lahun navah, kalvan a kamawng teh,
Kathoung Muitha teh âbakhu patetlah Jisuh van a cu teh, nang teh ka pahren poung e hoi ka lungkuep e capa doeh telah, kalvan lahoi lawk a tho.
Hatnavah Jisuh teh a kum 30 kalekkalak a pha. Taminaw e hmunae pouknae lahoi teh Jisuh na pa teh Joseph,
Joseph na pa Heli, Heli na pa Matthat, Matthat na pa Levih, Levih na pa Melkhi, Melkhi na pa Jannai, Jannai na pa Joseph.
Joseph na pa teh Mattathias, Mattathias na pa Amos, Amos na pa Nahum, Nahum na pa Esli, Esli na pa Naggai,
Naggai na pa Maath, Maath na pa Mattathias, Mattathias na pa Shimei, Shimei na pa Josek, Josek na pa Joda,
Joda na pa Joanan, Joanan na pa Resa, Resa na pa Zerubbabel, Zerubbabel na pa Shealtiel, Shealtiel na pa Neri,
Neri na pa Melkhi. Melkhi na pa Addi, Addi na pa Kosam, Kosam na pa Elmadam, Elmadam na pa Er,
Er na pa Joshua, Joshua na pa Eliezer, Eliezer na pa Jorim, Jorim na pa Matthat, Matthat na pa Levih,
Levih na pa Simon, Simon na pa Judah, Judah na pa Joseph, Joseph na pa Jonan, Jonan na pa Eliakim,
Eliakim na pa Melea, Melea napa Menna, Menna na pa Mattatha, Mattatha na pa Nathan, Nathan na pa Devit,
Devit na pa Jesi, Jesi na pa Obed, Obed na pa Boaz, Boaz na pa Salmon, Salmon na pa Nahshon,
Nahshon na pa Amminadab, Amminadab na pa Aram, Aram na pa Hezron, Hezron na pa Perez, Perez na pa Judah.
Judah na pa Jakop, Jakop na pa Isak, Isak na pa Abraham, Abraham na pa Terah, Terah na pa Nahor,
Nahor na pa Serug, Serug na pa Reu, Reu na pa Peleg, Peleg na pa Eber, Eber na pa Selah.
Selah na pa Kainan, Kainan na pa Arphaxad, Arphaxad na pa Shem. Shem na pa Noah, Noah capa Lamek,
Lamek na pa Methuselah, Methuselah capa Enok, Enok na pa Jared, Jared na pa Mahalaleel, Mahalaleel na pa Kainan,
Kainan na pa Enok, Enok na pa Seth, Seth na pa Adam, Adam na pa Cathut.
Jisuh teh Kathoung Muitha hoi akawi teh, Jordan tui koehoi a ban navah, Muitha ni kahrawngum vah a hrawi.
A hnin 40 touh thung rawca cat laipalah Kahraimathout e tacueknae a kâhmo teh hote tueng aloum hnukkhu a von a hlam.
Hatnavah, Kahraimathout ni Bawipa nang teh Cathut e capa katang pawiteh hete talung heh vaiyei lah a coung nahanlah kâ poe haw.
Jisuh ni hai tami teh vaiyei hoi dueng hring hoeh. Cathut e lawk hoi kâkawk han telah Cakathoung dawk a dei atipouh.
Kahraimathout ni mon ka rasang poung koe Jisuh hah bout a hrawi teh, het talaivan uknaeram pueng dawngdengca a pâtue teh,
Hete kâtawnnae pueng kai koe koung na poe toe, kai ni poe han ka ngai e tami teh ka poe thai dawkvah Bawipa, nang hai na poe thai.
Kai na bawk pawiteh, hetnaw pueng nange hnopai lah koung a coung han telah atipouh.
Jisuh ni, nang Setan, kaie ka hnuklah kâhnawnh. Bawipa na Cathut doeh nang ni na bawk han, hote Cathut dueng doeh na pholen han telah Cakathoung dawk a kâthut.
Ahni ni Jisuh teh Jerusalem kho dawk bout a hrawi teh bawkim lemphu som dawk a kangdue sak hnukkhu,
Cakathoung dawk a thut e patetlah nang ka tawm hanelah kalvantaminaw nang hanelah a ta toung dawkvah,
nange na khok teh talung dawk na hmang hoeh nahanelah, a kut hoi na tawm awh han telah a dei. Hatdawkvah, nang teh Cathut e ca katang lah na awm pawiteh, hete a som dawk hoi tâtawt haw atipouh.
Jisuh nihai, Cakathoung dawk a thut e patetlah na Cathut teh tanouktacak hanh telah bout atipouh.
Telah Kahraimathout ni a tacuek hnukkhu Jisuh koehoi a tâco.
Hathnukkhu hoi Jisuh teh Muitha hoi akawi teh Galilee ram lah a ban. A kamthang teh kho tengpam pueng koe koung a ka kâhei.
Sinakoknaw pueng dawk a cangkhai teh, taminaw pueng ni Bawipa teh a pholen awh.
A onae Nazareth kho dawk bout a pha navah singyoe patetlah Sabbath hnin vah sinakok thung a kâen teh Cakathoung touk hanelah a kangdue.
Ahni koe profet Isaiah e cakalawng a poe awh teh, a kadai navah a hmu e ca teh,
Cathut e Muitha teh kai dawk ao.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, karoedengnaw koe kamthang kahawi dei hanelah kai hah satui na awi toe. A lungkareknaw dam sak hanelah, sannaw hlout sak hanelah, mitdawnnaw mit bout ang sak hanelah, rektap kakhangnaw hlout sak hanlah kai teh Cathut e kamthang kahawi dei hanelah na patoun toe telah a tho.
Sinakok ka ring koe cauk bout a poe teh a tahung. Athung kaawm e naw pueng ni Bawipa teh takuetluet a khet awh.
Jisuh ni nangmouh ni na thai awh e patetlah Cakathoung dawk a thut e lawk teh atu a kuep toe telah a ti.
Taminaw pueng ni Bawipa a oup awh teh, a dei e lawk hah a kângairukhai awh. Hete tami teh Joseph e capa nahoehmaw ati awh.
Jisuh nihai, nang tâsibawi na patawnae dam sak haw telah ouk na dei awh, kaimouh ni kamthang ka thai e patetlah nang ni Kapernuam kho dawk hno na sak e naw hah ama kho dawk hai bout sak haw telah kai hai bout na ti awh han. Hatei, kai ni atangcalah ka dei e teh,
apipatet e profet hai, ama onae kho dawk, minhmai kahawi hmawt bawi hoeh.
Lawkkatang bout ka dei e teh, profet Elijah se nah a kum kum thum tangawn totouh kalvan a khan pouh teh, khoram thung puenghoi canei a takang navah, Isarel miphun dawk lahmai napui moi ao.
Hateiteh, Sidon ram Zarephath kho dawk e lahmai napui buet touh koe dueng doeh Elijah teh a patoun.
Profet Elisha se na haiyah, Isarel miphun dawk ka hrikbei e tami moikapap ao. Hateiteh Siria tami Naaman buet touh dueng ni doeh thoungnae a hmu telah atipouh.
Sinakok thung kaawm e taminaw pueng ni hote lawk a thai awh navah a lung puenghoi a khuek awh.
Hahoi a thaw awh teh, kho alawilah Jisuh a sawn awh, monsom lungha dawk hoi tanawt hanelah Jisuh teh a hrawi awh.
Hatei Jisuh ni ahnimouh rahak hoi alouklah a kâ takhoe .
Galilee ram Kapernuam kho dawk a pha navah, Sabbath hnin dawk cangkhainae a tawn.
Kâtawnnae lahoi, a cangkhai dawkvah, a cangkhai e lawk hah tamimaya ni a kângairukhai awh.
Hote sinakok thung kahraimathout ni a man e tami buet touh ao.
Oe! Nazareth tami Jisuh, nang teh kai hoi bangmaw na kâkuet. Kai na raphoe hanelah maw na tho. Nang apimaw tie na panue nang teh Cathut e kathoungpounge tami doeh telah puenghoi a hram.
Jisuh ni a yue teh, duem awm! Hote tami thung hoi tâcawt telah, kâ a poe navah, kahraimathout ni hote tami teh taminaw e alungui vah a rawp sak teh, runae poe laipalah a tâco takhai.
Taminaw pueng ni a kângairu awh teh, hete lawk heh bangpatete lawk ma aw, kakhine muithanaw hah bahu hoi kâtawnnae lahoi kâ a poe teh koung a tâco awh bo aw, telah buet touh hoi buet touh a kâpankhai awh.
Hote a kamthang teh kho tengpam pueng koe koung a kamthang.
Sinakok thung hoi a tâco hnukkhu Simon e a masei napui puenghoi a pataw dawkvah Jisuh teh a kaw awh.
Jisuh ni hote napui teng a kangdue teh, patawnae hah a yue navah, ahni teh tang a dam teh Jisuh a khetyawt.
Kanî a khup navah taminaw ni patawnae aphunphun ka tawn e taminaw Jisuh koevah a hrawi awh. Jisuh ni ka pataw e taminaw pueng dawk kut a toung teh a dam sak.
Kahraituilinaw nihai, Jisuh teh Cathut Capa doeh ati awh teh, a hramki teh taminaw koehoi a tâco awh. Kahrai, muitha kathoutnaw ni hai Jisuh teh a panue dawkvah Jisuh ni hai ahnimanaw lawk kam touh boehai dei sak hoeh.
Khodai navah kahrawngum a cei teh, taminaw ni Jisuh teh a tawng awh. Ahni koe a pha awh navah, ahnimouh koehoi alouklah bout cei hoeh nahanlah a cakâ awh.
Jisuh ni hai Cathut uknaeram hoi kâkuen e kamthang kahawi teh alouke khoram dawk kai ni ka dei han.
Hot hanelah doeh kai na patoun telah a dei pouh hnukkhu Galilee ram lae sinakoknaw dawk kamthang kahawi a pâpho.
Hnin touh hnin vah Gennesaret talî teng Jisuh a kangdue navah tamihunaw ni Cathut e lawk thai hanelah Jisuh koevah a tho awh.
Jisuh ni tuirai lah ka kâhat e long kahni touh a hmu. Tangakamankungnaw teh long dawk hoi a kum teh tamlawk a pâsu awh.
Hote longnaw thung dawk e Simon e long thung a kâen teh, long tahruet haw telah atipouh. Hote long dawk a tahung teh, taminaw hah a cangkhai.
A pâbaw hnukkhu vah, tui adungnae koe lah bout tahruet ei, tamlawk kadai nateh tanga heng ei telah Simon koe kâ a poe.
Simon ni hai Bawipa kaimanaw ni karum tuettuet ka heng awh toe. Hatei, buet touh hai ka man awh hoeh. Hatei nang ni kâ na poe e patetlah ka heng han atipouh.
A dei e patetlah a heng navah tanga moikapap a kâman teh tamlawk meimei a kâphi.
Alouke long dawk kaawm e a huikonaw kabawp hanelah a kaw. Huikonaw a tho awh teh long kahni touh dawk tanga a pâseng awh navah tanga teh yikkawi teh long teh tui dawk meimei a bo.
Simon Piter ni a hmu navah, Jisuh e a khok koe a tabo teh, Bawipa kai teh tamikayon doeh, Kai na cettakhai leih atipouh.
Bangkongmaw telah a dei pouh tetpawiteh a man e tanganaw a khet navah a huikonaw Zebedee e capa Jem hoi Jawhan, Simon hoi kaawm e taminaw teh a kângairu awh.
Jisuh ni taket awh hanh, nang teh atu hoi tami kamankung lah na coung sak han telah atipouh.
A kongteng lah long a hruek awh hnukkhu, ahnimanaw ni a tawn awh e pueng koung a ceitakhai awh teh a hnuk a kâbang awh.
Bawipa teh kho buet touh dawk ao navah a takbuem lah ka hrikbei e tami buet touh ni a hmu navah a tabo teh, Bawipa na panki pawiteh kai na thoungsak haw atipouh.
Jisuh nihai, kai ni na panki, thoung lawih atipouh. A kut a dâw teh hote tami teh a tek tahma vah tang a dam.
Jisuh ni hete kong api koehai dei hanh lah a atipouh. Vaihmanaw koe cet nateh kâpâtueh, hahoi na damnae hah lawkpanuesaknae lah ao nahan, Mosi e kâ poe e patetlah thuengnae hah poe haw, atipouh.
Hatei hote kamthang teh hoe a kamthang dawkvah tamihupui teh a lawk thai hane dawk hai thoseh, patawpanatnae dam han ngai dawk hai thoseh, a kamkhueng awh.
Hatei Jisuh teh kahrawngum a cei teh a ratoum.
Hnin touh hnin vah Jisuh ni cangkhainae a tawn navah, Jerusalem kho, Judah ram hoi Galilee ram dawk e kaawm e Farasinaw hoi cakathutkungnaw a tahung awh teh, patawnae dam sak hanelah Cathut e hnotithainae teh Jisuh dawk ao.
Hatnavah a kutkhok kamkhuen e tami buet touh Jisuh koe a thokhai awh teh, aonae koe phakhai hanelah a panki awh.
Hatei tami muen akawi teh kâen nahane lamthung a pâphawng awh hoeh dawkvah, Jisuh a onae tueng koe lemphu a rake awh teh phailei dawk hoi a pabo awh.
Jisuh ni hotnaw e a yuemnae a hmu navah, ka kamkhuen e tami hanlah, ka ca na yonnae teh ngaithoum lah o toe atipouh.
Cakathutkungnaw hoi Farasinaw ni hat e tami ni bangkongmaw Cathut pathoenae lawk a dei. Cathut hloilah apimaw yon ka ngaithoum thai telah a lungthung hoi ati awh.
Jisuh ni ahnimae lungthin thung a pouknae a panue dawkvah bangkongmaw telah na pouk awh.
Bang lawk maw dei ka yawihnawn, na yon ngaithoum lah ao toe tie maw dei kayawi, thaw nateh cet leih tie maw ka yawihnawn.
Tami Capa teh talai van dawk yon ngaithoum thainae kâ a tawn tie a panue thai awh nahan thaw leih, phailei kalawng nateh, nama im cet leih telah ka kamkhuen e koe a dei pouh.
Hote tami ni hai taminaw pueng e hmalah tang a thaw teh, amae phailei a kalawng teh Cathut pholen laihoi ama im vah a cei.
Tami pueng a kângairu awh teh, maimanaw ni kângairunae atu hmu awh toe telah a dei awh teh Cathut a pholen awh.
Hathnukkhu hoi Jisuh teh a cei navah tamuk ka cawng e Levih, im dawk ka tahung e a hmu navah ka hnukkâbang atipouh.
Hote tami hai a tawn e naw pueng a ceitakhai teh a hnuk a kâbang.
Hot hnukkhu hoi, Levih ni Jisuh hanelah ama im dawk pawi kalenpoung a sak teh, tamuk kacawngnaw hoi alouke a hnukkâbangnaw teh cungtalah bu rei a ca awh.
Cakathutkungnaw hoi Farasinaw ni bangkongmaw tamuk ka cawng, tami kahawihoehnaw hoi bu rei a canei awh vaw telah a hnukkâbangnaw koe a phuenang awh.
Jisuh nihai, a tak kadamnaw ni tâsibawi panki hoeh, kadamhoehnaw ni dueng doeh tâsibawi a panki awh.
Tamikalannaw kaw hanelah ka tho hoeh, tamikayonnaw pankângai hanelah doeh ka tho atipouh.
Tami tangawn ni Jawhan hnukkâbangnaw hoi Farasinaw teh, rawca a hai awh teh pou ratoum awh hoeh maw. Bangkongmaw Bawipa nange na hnukkâbangnaw teh rawca a hai awh hoeh vaw, telah a pacei awh.
Jisuh ni yu kalatkung teh a huikonaw hoi cungtalah ao navah rawca ouk a hai boimaw.
Hatei yu kalatkung teh a huikonaw hoi kapek teh lanae tueng ka phat han. Hat torei teh, ahnimanaw hai rawca a hai awh van han.
Bangnuenae lahoi a dei pouh e teh, angki ka pawn e hah lukkarei katha e hoi bo boihoeh. Hottelah bo pawiteh lukkarei katha e ni kapawn e hoehoe a kâphi sak han.
Hot patetvanlah, misurtui katha e hah karuem e phaivuen um dawk hlun boihoeh. Hottelah hlun pawiteh misurtui katha e ni phaivuen um karuem e hah tangpawk sak vaiteh atui hoi a um a rawk han.
Misurtui katha e teh phaivuen um katha dawk hlun pawiteh kahni touh hoi a cuem han.
Karuem e misurtui ka net tangcoung e tami teh a katha e misurtui tang net ngai hoeh, a karuem e misurtui hoe atui e a panue dawkvah, telah atipouh.
Sabbath hnin vah Jisuh teh catun law dawk a cei navah, a hnukkâbangnaw ni catun vui a pahroe awh teh a kut hoi a kanawi teh a ca awh.
Hatnavah, Farasinaw ni sabbath hnin dawk sak hoeh hane kawi hno bangkongmaw na sak awh, telah a pacei awh.
Bawipa ni, Devit ni a huikonaw hoi a vonhlam navah,
Cathut e imthung a kâen teh vaihmanaw dueng ni a cakawi e vaiyei hah a ca teh, a huikonaw hai a poe e hah vai touh boehai na touk boi awh hoeh maw.
Hothloilah tami Capa teh sabbath Bawi lah ao atipouh.
Alouke Sabbath hnin dawk, Jisuh teh, sinakok thung a kâen teh cangkhainae a tawn navah aranglae kut kamkhuen e tami buet touh ao.
Sabbath hnin vah, ahnie patawnae a dam sak han maw, dam sak mahoeh maw tie hah cakathutkungnaw hoi Farasinaw ni Jisuh yon a pen thai awh nahanlah a tuet awh.
Jisuh ni ahnimae a pouknae a panue dawkvah, a kut ka kamkhuen hanelah, alungui kangdout haw atipouh e patetlah hote tami ni, a kangdue.
Jisuh ni hai kai ni nangmanaw lawk na pacei awh han. Sabbath hnin dawk bang hno maw sak kawi, hnokahawi maw, hno kathout maw sak han. Hringnae rungngang han maw, thei han maw, telah rangpuinaw a pacei.
Hahoi, tamimaya e tengpam a khet teh na kut dâw haw atipouh navah, ahni ni a kut a dâw teh avanglae kut patetlah bout ao.
Tamimaya teh puenghoi a lungkhuek awh, Jisuh hah bangtelamaw ti awh han telah a kâpankhai awh.
Hatnae tueng dawk, Bawipa teh ratoum hanelah mon dawk a luen teh, Cathut koe karum tuettuet a ratoum.
Khodai toteh gunceinaw a kaw teh,
Piter telah min katha poe e Simon hoi a nawngha Andru, Jem hoi Jawhan, Filip hoi Bartholomew
Mathai hoi Thomas, Alfe capa Jem hoi Zealot telah kaw e Simon (Zealot tinae teh miphun kampangkhai tinae doeh).
Jem e a nawngha Judah hoi Jisuh kâyawt e Judah Iskariot, hote tami hlaikahni touh a rawi teh Guncei telah min a poe.
Ahnimanaw hoi cungtalah, Bawipa teh mon hoi a kum teh tanghling dawk a kangdue. Lawk thai han kangainaw hoi dam han kangainaw pueng teh Jerusalem kho lahoi thoseh, Judah ram, tui teng kaawm e naw, Taire hoi Sidon kho, avoivang lahoi ka tho e naw pueng teh a hnukkâbangnaw hoi cungtalah ao awh.
Kakhine muithanaw ni a pacekpahlek e naw pueng hai a tho teh a dam awh.
Bawipa e thung hoi bahu a tâco teh, taminaw pueng a dam sak dawkvah tamimaya ni Bawipa tek hanlah a panki awh.
Hatnavah Jisuh ni a hnukkâbangnaw koe lah a kamlang teh, ka mathoe e nangmanaw teh na yawhawi awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh Cathut uknaeram teh nangmae ram doeh.
Nangmanaw atu von ka hlam e naw na yawhawi awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh, na von a paha awh han. Atu ka kap e nangmanaw teh na yawhawi awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh, na panui awh han.
Tami Capa kecu dawk taminaw ni nangmanaw na hmuhma awh han, na pahnawt awh han, thoe na bo awh nah na yawhawi awh.
Hatnae tueng nah, na konawm awh. Lunghawinae lungthin hoi doukcouk awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh kalvan vah nangmouh ni na hmu hane tawkphu a len poung. Ahnimae mintoenaw ni hai profetnaw hah hottelah doeh ati awh.
Hatei ka bawi tangrengnaw na yawthoe awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh nangmouh teh atu na lungkuep awh toe.
Von kapahanaw nangmouh teh na yawthoe awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh nangmouh teh na vonhlam awh han. Atu na kapanuinaw na yawthoe awh, nangmouh teh na khuika awh han.
Ayânaw ni na lunghawikhai nah, na yawthoe awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh, ahnimae a na mintoenaw ni profetkaphawknaw hah hottelah doeh ati awh.
Ka lawk ka thai naw, nangmouh koe ka dei e teh na tarannaw lungpataw awh, nangmouh ka maithoe e naw koe ahawinae sak awh.
Nangmouh thoe na ka bo e naw yawhawinae poe awh. Na ka pacekpahlek e naw hanelah ratoum pouh awh.
Na hmaibei vang tambei pawiteh avanglae bout patueng pouh awh. Na hni ka lat e tami hah angki bout poe sin awh.
Nang koe ka hete pueng hah poe awh. Na hno ka lawm e tami koe bout het hanh lawi.
Ayânaw ni nang koe sak sak na ngai e patetlah ayânaw koe sak van awh.
Nangmouh lungpataw e dueng na lungpataw awh pawiteh bangmaw aphu kaawm. Tami kahawihoehnaw ni pateng amamouh lungpataw e taminaw hah bout a lungpataw awh nahoehmaw.
Nangmouh koe ahawinae ka sak dueng na pathung awh pawiteh bangmaw aphu kaawm. Tami kahawihoehnaw ni patenghai hottelah ngoun teh a sak awh nahoehmaw.
Bout hmu han doeh ti ngaihawi lahoi ayânaw hno na cawi sak pawiteh, nangmouh dawk oup hane kawi bangmaw kaawm han. Tami kahawihoehnaw pateng bout hmu hane ngai dawk buet touh hoi buet touh telah a kâ cawi awh hoeh na maw.
Nangmouh ni na tarannaw lungpataw awh. Hnokahawi sak pouh awh. Hno buetbuet touh bout ka hmu han doeh ti ngaihawinae tawn laipalah hno cawi sak awh. Hottelah na sak pawiteh nangmouh ni tawkphu na hmu awh hane teh a lenpoung vaiteh, ka rasang poung e Cathut ca lah na coung awh han.
Nangmae na Pa teh pahrennae a tawn e patetlah nangmouh hai pahrennae tawn awh.
Ayânaw e hno a kâhmo e dawk lawk ceng awh hanh. Telah na tet hoehpawiteh lawkcengnae dawk hoi na hlout awh han. Ayânaw yon pen awh hanh, na pen awh hoehpawiteh yonpennae dawk hoi na hlout awh han. Ayânaw e yon ngaithoum awh, hottelah na sak awh pawiteh nangmae yon hai ngaithoum lah ao han.
Ayânaw hah poe awh, na poe pawiteh ayânaw ni bout na poe awh han. Khuecue nue laihoi, padep laihoi, karuek laihoi, puk kacawi lah, na poe awh han. Bangkongtetpawiteh ayânaw na poe e patetlah bout na hmu awh han.
Hathnukkhu hoi bangnuenae lah mit ka dawn ni mit ka dawn teh lam a hrawi thai han maw. Kahni touh hoi tangkom dawk bawt roi mahoeh maw.
A hnukkâbang e tami teh kacangkhaikung hlak talue hoeh. Hatei, kakueplah ka kamtu e a hnukkâbang e naw pueng teh kacangkhaikung patetlah ao han.
Namae mit dawk e thingtaboung na pouk laipalah, hmaunawngha e mit dawk e songnawng khuek na hmu pouh.
Namae mit dawk e thingtaboung na hmawt laipalah, na hmaunawngha e mit dawk e songnawngca cawngkhawi hanlah khuek na panki awh vaw. Tami kahawi lah na kâsak e tami, namae mit dawk e thingtaboung hmaloe cawngkhawi ei. Hathnukkhu na hmaunawngha mit dawk e sonawngca cawngkhawi hanelah kacaicalah na hmu han.
A paw kahawi ka paw hoeh e thingkung teh a kung kahawi na hoeh.
A paw khet laihoi a kung nout thai lah o. Pâkhingkung dawk thaibunglung paw ouk khi boi hoeh. Pâkhing dawk misurpaw khi boihoeh.
Tami kahawi ni hno kahawi, lungthin thung hoi ouk a tâcokhai. Tami kathout ni hno kathout amae lungthin thung hoi ouk a tâcokhai. Bangkongtetpawiteh, lungthin thung ka poum e patetlah a kâko hoi ouk a dei.
Kaie kâlawk na tarawi laipalah, Bawipa, Bawipa telah na kaw a vaw.
Kai koe ka tho niteh, ka lawk a thai e patetlah ka tarawi e tami teh, bangpatet lah maw ao tie na panue sak han.
Im a sak navah, lungsong dawk khomkhu kadung poung lah ka tapu ni teh adu ka pabawt e hoi doeh a kâvan. Tui capa a thaw navah lungsong van im a sak dawkvah kâhuen thai hoeh.
Kaie lawk ka thai ni teh ka tarawi hoeh e tami teh, talai dawk im ka sak e hoi doeh a kâvan. Tuicapa a thaw toteh tuicapa ni a suk toteh reppasei lah a kamko telah a cangkhai.
Jisuh ni taminaw koe cangkhainae a pâbaw hnukkhu, Kapernuam kho thung a kâen.
Hote kho dawk ransabawi e a san a pataw teh due hane coungkacoe lah ao.
Hote tami teh a bawipa ni a pahren poung. Jisuh e a kamthang a thai navah, Judahnaw dawk e kacuenaw hah a sanpa dam sak hanelah Jisuh koe a patoun.
Jisuh koe a pha awh navah, Bawipa ahni hanelah hete hno na kabawp hanelah atueng.
Bangkongtetpawiteh ahni ni kaimae miphun a pahren dawkvah sinakok na sak pouh toe telah pahrennae puenghoi a kâhei.
Jisuh teh ahnimouh hoi cungtalah a cei. Ransabawi e im koe a pha tawmlei navah, ransabawi ni a huikonaw a patoun teh, Bawipa namahoima patangnae sak han loe. Kaie imthungkhu nang na kâen hane kamcu hoeh.
Hot patetlah nang koe ka tho hanelah ka kamcu hoeh. Lawk kam touh mah na dei pawiteh ka san teh a dam han doeh.
Bangnuenae lah, kai teh kâtawnnae rahim thaw ka tawk e tami buet touh lah ka o eiteh, ka kut rahim e ransanaw buet touh cet ka tetpawiteh a cei han. Tho ka tetpawiteh a tho han. San haiyah hete thaw tawk ti boum teh a tawk telah ransabawi ni atipouh.
Hote lawk Jisuh ni a thai navah a kângairu teh, a hnukkâbangnaw koe a kamlang teh, nangmouh koe na dei pouh awh. Het patetlah yuemnae ka tawn e Isarelnaw dawk pateng hai kahmawt boihoeh rah atipouh.
Ransabawi ni a patoun e naw im bout a pha navah, ka dam e a sanpa teh a hmu awh.
A tangtho hnin vah, Nain kho dawk a cei teh a hnukkâbangnaw hoi tamihupui teh a hnuk a kâbang awh.
Kho thung e longkha koe a pha navah, lahmainu ni a capa buet touh dueng a tawn e kadout e ro pakawp hanelah kho alawilah a tâcokhai navah kho thung e taminaw hai a kâbang awh.
Bawipa ni hote napui a hmu navah a pahren teh, kap hanh telah atipouh.
Hathnukkhu, Jisuh ni a hnai teh, ro hrawmnae ratang a tek teh ka hrawm e taminaw a kâhat awh. Bawipa ni nange thoundoun thaw leih, kai ni kâ na poe telah atipouh.
Ka dout e tami teh a tahung teh lawk a tho. Jisuh ni hote tami hah a manu koevah a poe.
Taminaw pueng ni a taki awh teh, profet kalenpounge maimouh koe a tho toe. Cathut teh amae a miphunnaw a khetyawt hanelah a tho toe, ati awh teh Cathut a pholen awh.
Hote kamthang teh Judah ram koehoi a tengpam pueng koe koung a kâkahei.
Jawhan e a hnukkâbangnaw ni hote a konglam abuemlahoi Jawhan koe a dei pouh awh.
Hatnavah Jawhan ni a hnukkâbang e tami kahni touh a kaw teh Jisuh koe a patoun teh, Bawipa, nang teh ka tho hane hah toung na maw. Hoehpawiteh alouke ka ngaihawi awh han rah maw telah a pacei sak.
Ahnimouh roi teh Jisuh koe a pha navah, Bawipa, nang teh ka tho hane hah toung na maw, nahoeh pawiteh alouke ka ngaihawi awh han rah maw telah Baptisma Jawhan ni na pacei sak atipouh awh.
Hatnae atueng dawkvah, Jisuh teh tami kapatawnaw a dam sak, muitha kathoutnaw a pâlei, mitdawnnaw hah mit a ang sak.
Jisuh ni Jawhan e laiceinaw koe, nangmouh ni na hmu e, na thai e naw pueng Jawhan koe bout dei pouh awh. Khok kamkhuennaw ni lam a cei thai awh, hrikbeinaw ni thoungnae dawk a pha awh. Kadoutnaw ni a thaw awh.
Karoedengnaw ni hai lunghawinae kamthang a thai awh. Kai dawk lung ka pout hoeh e tami teh a yawkahawi e lah ao atipouh.
Jawhan ni patounenaw a cei hnukkhu vah, Jisuh ni Jawhan hoi kâkuen lah taminaw koe a dei pouh e teh bangpatetlae hno hmu han na ngai dawk maw, kahrawngum na cei awh. Kahlî ni a kahuet e lumpum khet hanelah maw na cei awh.
Na hoehpawiteh kanem ca e angki ka kho e khet hanelah maw na cei awh. Angki kahawi ka kho ni teh rawca kahawi ka cat e taminaw teh siangpahrang e toeim dawk doeh ouk ao.
Profet khet hanelah maw na cei awh han. Profet hlak kalen e tami lahai ka o telah kai ni ka dei.
Cakathoung dawk a thut e teh, khenhaw! nang na cei nahane lamthung ka rasoun hanelah patoune teh na hmalah ka patoun toe telah ka dei nah hote tami doeh ka dei ngai.
Kai ni na dei pouh e teh, napui ni a khe e thung dawk, baptisma Jawhan hlak kalen e profet buet touh boehai awmhoeh. Hateiteh Cathut uknaeram dawk teh kathoengpounge tami hah, ahni hlak a talue.
Tamuk kacawngnaw hoi taminaw pueng ni Jawhan e lawk a thai navah Cathut a pholen awh teh Jawhan koe baptisma a coe awh.
Farasinaw hoi cakathutkungnaw teh Jawhan ni a poe e baptisma a coe ngai awh hoeh dawkvah, ahnimouh hanelah Cathut ni a pouk pouh e hah a pahnawt awh.
Hatdawkvah hete taminaw bang hoi maw ka bangnue han, api hoi maw a kâvan awh.
Ahnimanaw teh pawi koe a tahung awh teh ahnimouh hanlah tapueng longpan ka khawng pouh nakunghai lam awh hoeh. Lungmathoenae la sak pouh nakunghai kap awh hoeh. Hatdawkvah hetnaw teh camonaw hoi doeh a kâvan awh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, baptisma Jawhan ni vaiyei hoi misurtui catnet laipalah ao navah nangmouh ni, hete tami teh kahrai a thung kâen e doeh na ti pouh awh.
Tami Capa teh a ca a nei hoi ao navah, hete tami teh, ka carawng e tami doeh. Tamuk kacawngnaw, tami kahawihoehnaw hoi kâhuiko e doeh bout na ti pouh awh.
Hatei lungangnae dawk teh amamae a canaw pueng koe pathoenae dawk hoi a hlout telah atipouh.
Farasi buet touh ni bu ca hanelah Jisuh a kaw teh, hote Farasi e im dawk a kâen teh caboi dawk a tahung.
Hatnavah hote kho dawk kaawm e napui kahawihoeh e buet touh ni a panue, talungpangaw bom dawk e hmuitui buet touh a sin teh,
Jisuh e hnukkhu lah a khok koe a kangdue, a ka teh mitphi hoi a khok a duk sak teh a sam hoi a hui. A khok hai a paco teh hmuitui a hluk.
Bawipa ka kaw e Farasi ni a hmu navah, hete tami hah profet katang pawiteh, a khok ka tek e napui bangpatet e tami maw ti a panue han. Hete napui teh napui kahawihoehe doeh telah a lung thung hoi ati awh.
Hatnavah, Jisuh ni Simon nang koe ka dei hane lawk buet touh ao atipouh navah, Bawipa dei haw telah bout atipouh.
Jisuh ni hai hno katawnkung koe laiba ka tawn e tami kahni touh ao. Buet touh ni phoisa cumtouh, alouke buet touh ni 50 touh a ba roi.
Ahnimouh roi ni laiba patho thai hoeh dawkvah, hno katawnkung ni a ngaithoum roi. Hat pawiteh, apipatet e ni maw hno katawnkung hah hoe lungpataw han telah a pacei.
Simon nihai, laiba kapap ngaithoum lah kaawm e tami ni hoe a lungpataw han telah, ka pouk atipouh navah Bawipa ni, na pouk e teh a tang doeh atipouh.
Hote napui koe lah a kangvawi teh Simon koe hete napui na hmu maw. Na im dawk ka kâen navah khok pâsu nahane tui na poe hoeh. Hete napui ni teh ka khok dawk mitphi a duk sak teh a sam hoi a hui.
Nang ni kai na paco hoeh, hatei hete napui ni teh im dawk kâen tahma hoi kâhat laipalah ka khok a paco.
Nang ni ka lû dawk satui na hluk pouh hoeh. Hatei, hete napui ni teh ka khok dawk hmuitui hoi na hluk pouh toe.
Hatdawkvah kai ni ka dei e teh, yon moikapap dawk hoi a hlout dawkvah, lungpatawnae moi a kamnue sak. Yon kayounca dueng ngaithoum lah kaawm e ni teh lungpatawnae younca dueng a kamnue sak.
Hote napui hanelah, nang teh na yonnae dawk hoi na hlout toe atipouh.
Caboi dawk ka tahung e naw ni yon ka ngaithoum e tami heh bang patet e tami maw ati awh teh a kâpankhai awh.
Jisuh ni hote napui hanelah, na yuemnae ni na rungngang toe. Lungmawngcalah cet leih atipouh.
Hat hnukkhu hoi Jisuh teh kho touh hoi kho touh a cei teh Cathut uknaeram lunghawinae kamthang a pâpho.
A hnukkâbang hlaikahni touh ni a hnuk a kâbang awh. Patawnae hoi muitha kathoutnaw ni a tek e dawk hoi ka hlout e napuinaw hai a kâbang awh. Hote napui thung dawk kahraituilinaw sari touh ni a tâco takhai e Magdalin telah a kaw awh e Meri hoi,
Herod yung thaw ka tawk e Khuza e a yu Joanna hoi Shusanna hoi, a tawn e hno ka pasoung ni teh Jisuh hoi a hnukkâbangnaw ka paca, ka pânei e, alouke napuinaw hai ao awh.
Tamihupui, kho avoivang lahoi Bawipa koe a tho awh teh, a kamkhueng awh navah bangnuenae lahoi a dei pouh e teh,
Cati kaheikung ni cati kahei hanelah a tâco. Cati a kahei navah a tangawn teh lam dawk a bo dawkvah, khok hoi a coungroe awh teh kalvan e tavanaw ni koung a patu.
Cati tangawn teh talung van vah a bo dawkvah a paw eiteh talai kahawi ao hoeh dawkvah tang a kamyai teh a ke.
A tangawn teh pâkhing um a bo dawkvah, pâkhing ni a yawngyen.
A tangawn teh talai kahawi dawk a bo dawkvah, a paw teh alet cum touh totouh apung teh a paw a paw telah ati. Hottelah a dei hnukkhu vah, thainae hnâ ka tawn pueng ni thai na seh, telah a hramkhai.
A hnukkâbangnaw ni hete bangnuenae teh bangmaw a dei ngai telah Bawipa a pacei awh.
Jisuh ni nangmouh teh Cathut uknaeram hrolawk hah panuethainae na poe awh. Alouke taminaw teh, a hmu awh ei nout thai hoeh nahanelah, a thai awh ei a panue thai hoeh nahanelah ahnimouh koe bangnuenae lahoi ka dei pouh.
Hote bangnuenae teh hettelah ao. Cati teh Cathut e lawk doeh.
Lam dawk kabawt e cati teh, a lawk a thai eiteh, yuemnae, hloutnae dawk a pha thai hoeh nahanelah Kahraimathout ni a tho teh, a lung thung e Cathut lawk hah, oun a lawp ti dei ngainae doeh.
Talung van ka bawt e cati dei ngainae teh, a lawk thai navah lunghawicalah hoi tang a dâw ei, a lung thung a tangpha a payang hoeh dawkvah, Cathut lawk kecu dawk, runae hoi rektapnae a kâhmo toteh tang a rawp ti ngainae doeh.
Pâkhing um ka bawt e cati, tie a dei ngainae teh Cathut lawk a thai teh, talai hno dawk lungpuennae, hnopai ni dumyennae hoi, alouke hnonaw noenae lungthin ni a katek dawkvah a paw paw thai hoeh ti ngainae doeh.
Talai kahawi dawk ka bawt e cati tie a dei ngainae teh, thoungnae hoi lannae lungthin hoi Cathut lawk a thai teh lungsaw lahoi pou a hringkhai tie a dei ngainae doeh.
Hmaiim paang e teh hlaam hoi ouk ramuk boihoeh. Ikhun rahim hai tat boihoeh. Ka kâen e taminaw ni angnae a hmu thai nahanelah hmaiimkhok dawk doeh ouk paang awh.
A hmonae koe kaawm e pueng koung a kamnue han, ramuk lah kaawm e naw pueng koung kamawng han.
Hatdawkvah nangmouh ni na thai e lawknaw kâhruetcuet awh. Ka tawn e tami teh bout poe sin lah o han. Ka mathoe e tami teh a tawn e ca patenghai la pouh lah ao han telah a ti.
Hatnavah a manu hoi a nawnghanaw teh Bawipa koe a tho awh. Kamkhueng e tami apap poung dawkvah Jisuh koe phat thai awh hoeh.
Tami tangawn ni na manu hoi, na nawnghanaw ni na kâhmo han na ngai awh teh alawilah a kangdue awh telah atipouh navah,
Ahni ni Cathut e lawk ka thai ni teh ka tarawi e taminaw doeh kaie ka manu, ka nawngha atipouh.
Hnin touh hnin vah, Jisuh teh a hnukkâbangnaw hoi cungtalah long dawk a luen awh teh tui namran lah cet awh sei ati awh teh a cei awh.
Tui dawk a cei awh navah, Bawipa teh a i. Hatnavah tûilî a tho dawkvah long dawk tui yikkawi teh runae a kâhmo awh.
A hnukkâbangnaw ni Bawipa teh a pâhlaw hnukkhu, Bawipa, Bawipa maimanaw rawknae koe pha a han toe atipouh awh navah, ahni ni, tûilî hoi tuicapa a yue teh a roum sak.
Ahni ni na yuemnae na maw na ta awh, telah a pacei navah, ahnimanaw ni hete tami teh bangpatet e tami nama aw. Tui hoi tûilî patenghai kâ a poe bo teh, ahnimouh ni a lawk a ngai pouh bo aw telah buet touh hoi buet touh a kâpankhai awh.
Galilee ram tui namran lah kaawm e Kerasen ram dawk a pha awh.
Jisuh teh a oung lah a luen navah, atueng moi kasawlah kahraituilinaw ni a man e tami, angki hai kho hoeh, im dawk hai awmhoeh, phuen koe ouk kaawm e Kerasen tami buet touh ni Jisuh teh a dawn.
Bawipa a hmu navah a tabo teh, Lathueng Poung Cathut Capa Jisuh, nang teh kai hoi bangmaw na kâkuet. Kai na rektap hoeh nahanlah pahrennae kahei telah a hramki laihoi a dei.
A deingainae teh, Jisuh ni kakhine muitha tami thung hoi tâcawt telah kâ a poe toung dawk doeh. Hote tami teh kahrai ni ngailawi a tek toung dawkvah, ahni teh a khok roi dawk hlong a buet pouh awh, sumbawtarui hoi a katek awh ei soumsoum a tapo teh hlong hai rekrek a hem teh kahrawngum lah, kahrai ni ouk a hrawi.
Jisuh ni na min apimaw ti teh a pacei navah, hote tami teh kahraituilinaw ni a tek dawkvah ransahupui telah atipouh.
Hathnukkhu hoi kahrainaw ni ka dungpoung e hmuen koe pâlei hane kâ a poe hoeh nahanelah a kâhei awh.
Hote hmuen koevah, vok moikapap teh a paca awh. Hote voknaw thungvah na kâen sak loe telah a kâhei awh navah Jisuh ni kâenh atipouh.
Hatnavah, kahraituilinaw tami thung hoi a tâco awh teh vok thung vah a kâen awh. Voknaw teh pango dawk a tâto awh teh, talî dawk a kâphum awh teh, koung a due awh.
Vok ka khoumnaw ni a kâhmo e hno hah khopui khote koe lah a yawng awh teh a dei awh.
Tami moikapap teh hote hno khet hanelah a tho awh. Jisuh koe a tho awh nah kahraituilinaw ni a man e tami teh hni a kâkhu teh lung kacaicalah hoi Jisuh e khok koe a tahung e hah a hmu awh navah a taki awh.
Kahraituilinaw ni a man e tami a damnae kong hah kahmawtnaw ni alouke taminaw koe patuen a dei pouh awh.
Karasen ram dawk e taminaw pueng ni a taki awh dawkvah ahnimouh koehoi tâco hanelah Bawipa koe a kâhei awh. Bawipa hai long dawk a luen teh a ban.
Kahraituilinaw pâlei pouh e tami ni kai hai nang koe kâbang van han telah a kâhei.
Jisuh ni nama im cet nateh, na imthungnaw koevah, Cathut ni nang koe pahrennae a sak e hah dei loe titeh a ban sak. Ahni ni a cei teh Jisuh ni a lathueng a sak e naw pueng kho thung a dei pouh.
Jisuh teh a ban navah, taminaw pueng ni Bawipa ngaihawi laihoi a dawn awh.
Hatnavah, sinakok ka uk e Jairus tie Bawipa koe a tho teh a khok koevah a tabo.
Kum hlaikahni touh nueng ka phat e canu buet touh a tawn e meimei a due dawkvah, Jisuh a im vah tho hanelah a kaw teh a tho navah, taminaw teh Bawipa koe a kâen awh.
Hatnavah a kum hlaikahni touh thung thikui ni teh a hnopai pueng tâsibawi koe koung a pâbaw khai teh ka dam thai hoeh e napui buet touh teh,
a hnuk lahoi a hnai teh a hni pawi a tek navah a tek tahma a thikuinae teh tang a dam.
Jisuh ni apimaw kai na tek, telah a pacei navah taminaw pueng ni a kâtang awh. Piter hoi a huinaw ni, Bawipa, tamihupui ni nang na kânep e hah kai apinimaw na tek khuet na ti vaw telah atipouh awh.
Jisuh nihai, tami buetbuet touh ni kai na tek toe. Ka tak dawk hoi bahu a tâco e ka panue telah atipouh.
Hote napui ni ka kâhrawk thai mahoeh ti a kâpanue dawkvah, a pâyaw laihoi a tho teh bang patet e kong dawk maw a tek ti hai thoseh, tang a damnae kong hai thoseh, taminaw e hmalah a tabo teh a pâpho.
Jisuh ni, ka canu na lungpuen hanh. Na yuemnae ni na dam sak toe, lungmawngcalah hoi cet leih atipouh.
Telah atipouh navah, sinakok ka uk e im dawk hoi tami buet touh a tho teh, nange na canu a due toe. Saya teh tarawk hanh lawih atipouh.
Jisuh ni a thai navah, taket hanh awh. Yuemnae buet touh dueng mah tawn awh. Telah na tawn awh pawiteh rucatnae dawk hoi na hlout han telah sinakok ka uk e koe atipouh.
Im dawk a pha navah, Piter, Jawhan, Jem hoi napui ca e a manu hoi a na pa hloilah apihai a kâen hoeh nahanelah a cakâ.
Taminaw pueng ni a khuikakhai awh navah, Jisuh ni kap hanh awh. Camo teh dout hoeh, ka ip e doeh, atipouh.
Napui ca a due e hah ahnimanaw ni a panue awh dawkvah, Bawipa teh a panuikhai awh.
Hote taminaw alawilah koung a tâco sak hnukkhu, camo e a kut a kuet pouh teh, camo thaw leih telah a kaw.
Hatnavah ahnie muitha teh a thung bout a kâen dawkvah camo teh tang a thaw. Hahoi rawca poe hanelah kâ a poe.
Hattoteh a manu hoi napanaw teh a kângairu awh. Hatei, hete hnonaw heh api koehai dei hoeh hanelah lawk a thui.
A hnukkâbangnaw hlaikahni touh a kamkhueng sak hnukkhu vah, kahraituilinaw pueng pâlei thainae hoi, kapatawnaw dam sak thainae bahu hoi kâtawnnae a poe.
Cathut uknaeram pâpho han hoi kapatawnaw dam sak hanelah a patoun teh,
kahlong na cei awh navah, bang hno hai kâken awh hanh, sonron, yawngya, vaiyei, phoisa sin awh hanh. Angki hai acawilah sin awh hanh.
Apipatet e im dawk hai na kâen awh navah, hote im dawk hoi na tâco hoehroukrak hote im dawk awm awh. Apinihai im na luen sak awh hoeh pawiteh,
hote kho dawk hoi na tâco awh navah, ahnimouh koe lah noutnae a kamnue thai nahanelah, na khok dawk e vaiphu hah lawkpanuesaknae lah ao nahan takhawng sin awh, telah atipouh.
A hnukkâbangnaw a tâco awh teh kho touh hoi kho touh kamthang kahawi a pâpho awh teh kapatawnaw a dam sak awh.
Jisuh ni hno a sak e naw, Herod bawi ni a thai navah a lungkâounnae a tawn. Bangkongtetpawiteh tami tangawn ni Jawhan teh duenae koehoi a thaw toe ati awh.
Tami tangawn ni Elijah a tho toe ati awh, tangawn ni ayan e profet buetbuet touh a thaw toe ati awh.
Herod ni kai ni Jawhan e a lû ka tâtueng toe. Hatei, telah totouh a kamthang kai ni ka thai e tami teh bangpatet e tami ma aw a titeh Jisuh hmu hanelah a ngai.
Gunceinaw teh Bawipa koe bout a tho awh teh amamouh ni a sak e hnonaw hah a dei pouh awh. Bawipa ni a kaw awh teh, Bethsaida kho teng soumtinae koe vah a hrawi. Tamihupui ni a panue awh teh a hnuk a kâbang awh.
Hote taminaw teh Bawipa ni a kâbang sak teh, Cathut uknaeram kong a pâpho pouh. Kapatawnaw haiyah a dam sak.
Khohmo navah, hnukkâbang hlaikahni touh ni Bawipa a hnai awh teh, hete hmuen teh kingdinae doeh, hatdawkvah ahnimanaw, o i thai nahane hoi canei thai nahanelah tengpam e khonaw koe cetsak lei sei atipouh awh.
Hatei Bawipa ni canei hane nangmouh ni poe awh atipouh. Ahnimanaw ni hai hete taminaw abuemlah hanelah canei hane ka ran awh hoehpawiteh kaimouh koevah vaiyei panga touh hoi tanga kahni touh dueng doeh ka tawn awh, atipouh.
Hottelah atipouh ngainae teh, tami thong panga tabang a pha awh. Hatnavah taminaw 50 touh hoi pâkhueng nateh tahung sak awh, atipouh.
A hnukkâbangnaw ni hai a dei e patetlah a sak awh teh a tahung sak awh.
Jisuh ni vaiyei panga touh hoi tanga kahni touh e a la teh kalvan lah a moung teh lunghawinae lawk a dei hnukkhu vaiyei a raen teh tami rei hanelah a hnukkâbangnaw koe a poe.
Taminaw pueng ni a ca awh teh a boum hnukkhu vah, ka cawi e a pâkhueng navah tangthung hlaikahni touh akawi.
Hnin touh hnin vah Jisuh teh a hnukkâbangnaw hoi cungtalah soumtinae koe a ratoum awh navah, taminaw ni kai api ati awh maw telah a pacei.
Tami tangawn ni nang teh Baptisma Jawhan, tangawn ni Elijah, tangawn ni a yan e profet buetbuet touh ka thaw e doeh telah ati awh.
Jisuh ni nangmouh ni teh kai api na ti a maw telah a pacei navah, Piter ni, nang teh Cathut e Khrih doeh atipouh.
Hote akong hah api koehai dei hoeh hanlah a hnukkâbangnaw pueng hah kâ a poe.
Hothloilah tami Capa teh rucatnae moikapap a khang han. Tami kacuenaw, vaihma bawinaw hoi cakathutkungnaw ni, a hnoun awh vaiteh a thei awh han. Apâthum hnin vah bout a thaw han telah atipouh.
Hathnukkhu hoi taminaw pueng koe a dei pouh e teh, kai hnukkâbang hane ka ngai e tami teh amahoima ka pahnawt naseh. Ama e thingpalam, hnintangkuem a hrawm vaiteh kaie ka hnuk kâbang naseh.
Apihaiyah mae hringnae ka rungngang e tami teh hringnae a sung han. Apihaiyah Kai kecu dawk hringnae ka sung e tami teh a hringnae a rungngang han.
Tami ni talaivan abuemlah koung ka coe nakunghai amae hringnae sung pawiteh bangmaw aphu kaawm.
Apihai, kai hoi ka lawk kayakkhai e tami teh, tami Capa ni hai amae bawilennae, a na pa e bawilennae hoi kalvantami kathoungnaw e bawilennae sin hoi a kum toteh, hote tami hah a kayakhai van han.
Kai ni atangcalah na dei pouh e teh hete hmuen koe kaawm e tami tangawn ni Cathut uknaeram a hmu hoehnahlan dout awh mahoeh rah telah atipouh.
Hottelah a dei hnukkhu hnin taroe touh a pha navah Jisuh ni Piter, Jawhan, Jem a kaw teh ratoum hanelah mon dawk a luen awh.
Ratoum awh lahun nah, a minhmai aloukcalah a kâthung teh, angki hai pangawpekyek lah ao.
Hatnavah tami kahni touh hoi Bawipa teh lawk a kâpan, ahnimouh roi teh Mosi hoi Elijah doeh.
Ahnimouh teh bawilennae hoi a tho awh teh, Jerusalem vah kakuep han toung e Bawipa a due nahane kong hah a kâpankhai awh.
Piter hoi a huinaw teh ihmu ni a paya awh teh mat a ngam awh. Ayawng vak awh navah, bawilennae hoi Bawipa hoi cungtalah kangdout e tami roi a hmu awh.
Hote tami roi Bawipa koehoi a cei navah Piter ni, Bawipa hete hmuen koe o hanelah ahawipoung. Bawipa, nang hanelah rim buet touh, Mosi hanelah buet touh, Elijah hanelah buet touh ka sak awh vai telah muipap lahoi a dei pouh.
Telah a pacei hnukkhu, tâmai ni ahnimanaw teh a kayo. Mosi hoi Elijah teh tâmai thung a kâen navah, hnukkâbangnaw ni a taki awh.
Tâmai dawk hoi lawk ka tho e teh hete tami teh ka lungkuep e ka Capa doeh, ahnie lawk tarawi awh.
Hote lawk a tho hnukkhu, Jisuh teh ama dueng ao. A hnukkâbangnaw ni a hmu awh e hnonaw hah hatnae tueng dawk api koehai dei laipalah ao awh.
Atangtho hnin dawk mon hoi bout a kum awh navah taminaw ni Bawipa teh a dawn awh.
Tamihupui thung hoi tami buet touh ni kaie ka ca khen ei telah a kâhei. Ka capa buet touh dueng doeh ka tawn.
Kahrai ni a man teh, pouk laipalah a hramki, a sawn sak teh kâko dawk hoi potamtui a tâco teh, a tak dawk reithainae a poe hnukkhu tâco hane a ru poung.
Hote kahrai pâlei hanelah hnukkâbangnaw koe ka dei pouh eiteh, ahnimanaw ni pâlei thai awh hoeh telah hramki laihoi atipouh.
Jisuh ni hai yuemnae ka tawn hoeh e, lawkkam ka cak hoeh e, lam ka payon e miphun, kai ni na totouh maw na okhai awh han rah. Na capa kai koe thokhai haw telah atipouh.
Camo a tho navah kahraituili ni talai dawk a kâraphei sak hnukkhu a sawn sak. Jisuh ni kakhine muithanaw a yue teh hote camo a dam sak hnukkhu a na pa koe bout a poe.
Taminaw pueng ni Cathut e taluenae a hmu navah a kângairu awh.
Telah Jisuh ni hno a sak e dawk taminaw pueng ni a kângairu laihoi pholen awh navah, a hnukkâbang koe kaie kâlawk tarawi nateh pâkuem awh. Tami Capa teh taminaw e kut dawk pahnawt nahane atueng a pha toe telah atipouh.
Hote lawk a dei ngainae hah, a hnukkâbangnaw hanelah a hro pouh dawkvah panuek thai awh hoeh. Hote lawk bout pacei ngam awh hoeh.
Hatnavah a hnukkâbangnaw ni apimaw bet ka taluehnawn telah buet touh hoi buet touh a kâounkhai awh.
Jisuh ni ahnimae a pouknae a panue pouh teh, camo buet touh a kaw. Ama e ateng a kangdue sak hnukkhu,
apihai thoseh, kaie minhmai khet laihoi hete camo a dâw, hote tami teh kai hai na ka dâw e lah ao. Kai na ka dâw e teh kai na kapatounkung ka dâw e lah ao. Nangmouh thung dawk kathoengpoung e tami teh ka talue poung e lah ao han atipouh.
Jawhan ni Bawipa, Bawipa, nange na min lahoi kahraituilinaw ka pâlei e tami buet touh ka hmu. Hote tami teh kaimouh hoi cungtalah kâbang ngaihoeh dawkvah ka ngang awh, telah a dei pouh.
Jisuh ni hote tami ngang awh hanh. Nangmae na taran koe lah kaawm hoeh e tami teh nangmouh koe lah kaawm e doeh atipouh.
Bawipa teh kalvan lah tawm hane tueng a hnai navah, Jerusalem kho dawk a cei hane a radoung teh,
Patounenaw hmalah a patoun teh ahnimanaw ni Bawipa han rakueng hanlah a cei awh teh, Samaria kho buet touh dawk a kâen awh.
Jisuh ni Jerusalem kho koe lah a cei e hah, hote kho thung e taminaw ni ngai awh hoeh.
A hnukkâbang e Jem hoi Jawhan ni a hmu navah Bawipa, Elijah ni a sak e patetlah maimouh ni kalvan hoi hmai bo sak vaiteh, ahnimanaw kak sak hanelah, na ngainae o maw telah a pacei awh.
Jisuh ni a kamlang teh, na pouknae namamouh ni na panuek awh hoeh.
Tami Capa teh tami e hringnae thei hanelah tho hoeh, rungngang hanelah doeh a tho telah a yue hnukkhu, kho alouklah a cei awh.
Lam dawk a cei awh navah, tami buet touh ni Bawipa, nang na ceinae pueng koe kai hai ka kâbang han telah atipouh.
Jisuh ni asuinaw ni khu a tawn. Kahlun e tavanaw ni hai tabu a tawn awh. Tami Capa teh lû toung nahan hmuen boehai awmhoeh telah atipouh.
Bawipa ni alouke tami buet touh koevah ka hnukkâbang telah atipouh. Hatei, hote tami ni Bawipa apa hmaloe ka pakawp einei telah atipouh.
Ahni ni hai tami kadoutnaw ni a tami kadoutnaw hah pakawm awh naseh. Nang teh, cet nateh Cathut uknaeram hah pâpho leih, telah atipouh.
Alouke tami buet touh ni Bawipa na hnuk ka kâbang han. Hateiteh ka imthungkhunaw hmaloe kut na man sak ei telah atipouh.
Jisuh ni laikawk kanawknae kuet laihoi hnuklah kangvawi e tami teh Cathut uknaeram hoi kamcu hoeh, telah atipouh.
Hathnukkhu hoi, Bawipa ni alouke tami 72 touh a rawi teh, a cei nahane kho tangkuem koe tami kahni kahni touh hoi hmaloe a patoun.
Bawipa ni ahnimouh koe, canga hanelah moi ao. Ka a e tami a younca. Hatdawkvah ka tawk hane tami a patoun thai nahanelah, law katawnkung koe ratoum awh.
Cet awh, asuihu koe tucanaw tha e patetlah kai ni na patoun awh.
Tangkabom, yawngya, khokkhawm sin awh hanh. Lam dawk na cei awh navah, apihai pato awh hanh.
Api im hai thoseh, na kâen navah, hete im dawk yawhawinae awmseh telah hmaloe dei pouh awh.
Hote im dawk roumnae capa awm pawiteh, nangmouh ni na dei e yawhawinae teh ao han.
Cat net awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh ka tawk e tami teh kutphu hmu hanelah a kamcu. Im buet touh hnukkhu buet touh kampuen awh hanh.
Bangpatet e kho dawk hai na kâen awh navah nangmouh na ka dawn e taminaw ni na hmalah a lawng awh e hah cat awh.
Kapatawnaw dam sak awh. Cathut uknaeram teh nangmouh dawk a kangdue nahan tueng a hnai toe telah dei awh.
Bangpatet e kho dawk hai na kâen navah, kho thung e taminaw ni pasoung hoehpawiteh lam dawk tâcawt awh nateh na khok dawk e vaiphu takhawng sin awh.
Hatei, Cathut uknaeram teh nangmae teng a pha toe tie panuek awh, telah ahnimouh koe dei pouh.
Kai ni na dei pouh e teh ahnoungpoung e hnin nah hote kho teh Sodom kho hlak a khang han.
Oe, Khorazin kho nang teh na yawthoe. Bethsaida nang hai na yawthoe. Bangkongtetpawiteh, nangmouh koe thaonae hno ka kamnue sak e hah Taire kho hoi Sidon kho dawk kamnue sak pawiteh hote khonaw teh napon kâkhu awh vaiteh vaiphu a kâphuen laihoi a tahung awh vaiteh, pankângai awh han doeh toe.
Lawkcengnae hnin dawk teh Taire kho hoi Sidon kho hlak nangmanaw na khang awh han.
Oe, Kapernuam khopui, nang teh kalvan totouh na tawmdawm eiteh phuen totouh pabonae na khang han.
Nangmae lawk ka tarawi e tami teh kaie lawk a tarawi. Nangmouh ka pahnawt e tami teh kai ka pahnawt e doeh. Kai ka pahnawt e tami teh kai na kapatounkung ka pahnawt e doeh telah atipouh.
Hote a hnukkâbang 72 touh teh lunghawi laihoi a ban awh teh, Bawipa nange min lahoi kahraituilinaw patenghai ka pâlei thai awh, telah atipouh awh.
Jisuh ni hai Setan teh sumpapalik patetlah kalvan hoi a tho e hah ka hmu toe.
Nangmouh ni tahrun, aikamnaw lathueng kâtawnnae hoi tarannaw tâ thainae bahu kai ni na poe awh. Bangpatet e ni hai a rucatnae na poe mahoeh.
Hatei, kahrainaw na pâlei thai awh dawk na konawm awh hanh. Nangmae na minnaw hah kalvan thut lah ao e dawk na konawm awh, telah atipouh.
Hatnavah Jisuh ni Kathoung Muitha dawk a konawm teh, kalvan hoi talai ka uk e apa, nang ni a lungkaang kathoumthainaw hanelah na hro pouh e hno, hete camonaw koe na pâpho pouh dawkvah ka lunghawi. Hottelah na ngainae ao dawk katang doeh apa!
Kaie na pa ni hnocawngca pueng kai koe koung na poe toe. Capa hah apimaw telah a Pa hoeh laipalah apinihai panuek hoeh. Pa teh apimaw telah Capa hoi Capa ni a ang sak e tami hoeh laipalah apinihai panuek hoeh telah atipouh.
Hathnukkhu hoi a hnukkâbangnaw koe lah a kangvawi teh, atu na hmu e naw heh nangmouh ni na hmu awh dawkvah nangmae na mit teh a yawhawi.
Kai ni na dei pouh e teh, nangmouh ni na hmu e naw heh profetnaw hoi siangpahrangnaw ni hmu hane a ngai awh eiteh hmawt awh hoeh. Nangmouh ni na thai e naw hah thai han a ngai awh eiteh thai awh hoeh telah a hnukkâbangnaw koe dueng doeh, atipouh.
Hnin touh hnin vah, kâlawk kacangkhaikung buet touh a kangdue teh, saya yungyoe hringnae hmu hanelah bangmaw ka sak han telah a tanouk.
Bawipa ni kâlawk cauk dawk bangtelamaw a thut. Bangtelamaw na touk telah a pacei navah,
Hote tami ni na Cathut teh na lungthin abuemlahoi, na thaonae abuemlahoi, na panuenae abuemlahoi na lungpataw han, na imri hah namahoima patetlah lungpataw telah atipouh.
Bawipa ni na dei e teh a tang doeh. Telah na sak pawiteh na hring han.
Hote tami ni hai apipatet maw kaie ka imri telah amahoima yonnae ka tawn hoeh e patetlah Jisuh bout a pacei.
Jisuh ni tami buet touh teh Jerusalem kho dawk hoi Jeriko kho lah a cei navah dingcanaw hoi a kâhmo. Dingcanaw ni hote tami e angki a phawi pouh teh meimei kadout lah a hem awh teh a ceitakhai awh.
Hote lamthung dawk vaihma buet touh khou a cei teh hote tami a hmu navah oun a roun.
Hot patetvanlah Levih tami buet touh ni hai hote hmuen koe a pha navah, ahni hah a hmu teh alouke lam lahoi a roun.
Hatei, Samaria tami buet touh kahlong a cei. Hote tami ka pataw koe a pha teh, a hmu navah, a pahren.
Ahni koe a hnai teh a hmânaw dawk satui hoi misurtui a hluk pouh, lukkarei hoi a kawm pouh hnukkhu amae saring van a thueng teh rim koe a ceikhai teh a khetyawt.
A tangtho toteh denari kahni touh a rasa teh rim kaukkung koe a poe. Hete tami la khenyawn nateh ka baw e naw pueng bout ka tho torei na patho han telah atipouh. Bangtelamaw na pouk, telah a pacei.
Hote tami kathum touh dawk apimaw dingca kut dawk ka phat e tami hoi ka kâhnai telah a pacei navah,
Kâlawk ka cangkhaikung nihai, ka pataw e tami ka pahren e telah atipouh navah, Jisuh ni nang hai cet nateh hottelah sak loe atipouh.
Jisuh teh a hnukkâbangnaw hoi kahlong lah a cei navah, kho buet touh dawk a kâen awh teh, Martha tie napui buet touh ni ama im vah Bawipa teh a luen sak.
Hote napui ni Meri tie a nawngha buet touh a tawn. Hote Meri teh Jisuh e a khok koe a tahung teh a dei e lawk a thai.
Martha teh pacapanei hane kong dawkvah a lungpuen teh, Jisuh koe Bawipa, ka nawngha ni, ka madueng tawk sak hanelah pak na nat e hah banglahai na pouk hoeh bo aw. Kai thaw na kabawp hanelah patoun haw telah atipouh.
Jisuh ni Martha, Martha, nang teh hno moikapap dawk na kâhruetcuet teh thouk na patang toe. Hatei na panki e hno buet touh ao.
Meri ni hnokahawi yo a rawi toe. Apini hai bout lawm thai mahoeh toe.
Hahoi, hnin touh hnin vah, Bawipa teh hmuen buet touh koevah a ratoum teh a baw hnukkhu, a hnukkâbang buet touh ni Bawipa, Jawhan ni a hnukkâbangnaw ratoumnae a pâtu e patetlah kaimouh hai na pâtu awh haw telah atipouh.
Bawipa ni nangmanaw ni na ratoum awh navah na dei awh hane teh, kalvan kho kaawm e kaimae na Pa, na min barinae awm lawiseh, na uknaeram tho lawiseh.
Na ngainae teh kalvan kho akuep e patetlah talai van hai kuep lawiseh, hnintangkuem von kawk khuem rawca pou na poe haw.
Kaimae tak dawk yonnae kasaknaw, kaimouh ni ka ngaithoum e patetlah kaimae ka yonnae hai na ngaithoum haw, yon tacueknae thung kaimanaw na hrawi hanh. Tamikahawihoehe koehoi na hlout sak haw telah tet awh, atipouh.
Hathnukkhu hoi bout a dei e teh, nangmouh thung dawk tami buet touh ni a hui buet touh a tawn teh, karumsaning vah hote a hui im a cei teh, ka hui,
kahlong lahoi ka hui buet touh a tho. Ka paca hane banghai ka tawn hoeh dawkvah vaiyei kathum touh na cawi sak ei telah atipouh.
Imkung ni kai koe hrawang hanh, takhang hai ka khan toe, ka canaw hai koung a i awh toung dawkvah ka thaw vaiteh na poe thai mahoeh telah imthungkhu hoi atipouh han.
Ka deingainae teh, hote tami teh a hui lah ao dawkvah, a lungpout laipalah a hei dawkvah a ngai e pueng a thaw vaiteh a poe han.
Bout ka dei ngainae teh het awh, na poe han. Tawng awh na pâphawng han. Tho takhawng awh, na takhawng pawiteh paawng pouh lah ao han.
Ka het e tami teh a poe. Ka tawng e tami teh a pâphawng. Ka takhawng e tami teh a paawng pouh.
Apipatet e na pa ni maw a ca ni tanga moi a hei navah tahrun moi ouk a poe boi.
Âdui a hei navah aikam moi ouk poe boi yaw.
Nangmanaw ni tami kahawihoeh lah na o awh nakunghai, na canaw poehno kahawi ouk na poe pawiteh hot hlakvah nangmae kalvanlae na Pa ni ka hete taminaw hah, Kathoung Muitha hoe poe mahoeh maw telah atipouh.
Hahoi hnin touh navah, a lawk ka a e kahrai a pâlei teh, kahrai a tâco hnukkhu lawka teh lawk a dei. Kamkhueng e taminaw teh a kângairu awh.
Tami tangawn ni hete tami ni kahraituilinaw e bawi Beelzebub e min lahoi doeh kahraituilinaw a pâlei ati awh.
A tangawn ni, tanouk hane a ngai awh teh, kalvan lahoi e mitnoutnae a hei awh.
Bawipa ni ahnimae lungthin a panue dawkvah, uknaeram hai buet touh hoi buet touh kâtaran pawiteh a kâkapek han. Hot patetlah imthungkhu hai kâpo hoehpawiteh a rawk han.
Kai ni Beelzebub e min lahoi kahraituilinaw ka pâlei pawiteh, Setan e uknaeram bangtelamaw a kangcoung thai han.
Kai ni Beelzebub e min lahoi kahraituilinaw ka pâlei toung pawiteh nangmae na canaw ni teh apie min lahoi maw a pâlei awh han. Hatdawkvah ahnimanaw ni nangmanaw lawkcengkung lah ao han.
Kai ni Cathut e kutdawn hoi kahraituilinaw ka pâlei pawiteh, nangmouh koe Cathut uknaeram a kangduenae tueng teh a pha katang toe.
A thakasai e ni senehmaica a puengcang kakuep lahoi amae toeim dawk ao navah, hnopainaw dawk lungtâsuenae awm hoeh.
Hatei ahni hlak thakasai e tami a tho teh pet a tâ torei doeh ahni ni kâuepkhai e senehmaica a puengcangnaw a la vaiteh, a tawn e hnopainaw hai ayânaw a rei han.
Kai hoi kaawm hoeh e tami teh kai na taran e doeh. Kai hoi cungtalah kamkhueng hoeh e tami teh kampek e doeh.
Kakhine muitha teh a tâco hnukkhu, a kâhat nahane hmuen a tawng. A pâphawng hoeh dawkvah yampa ka onae im dawk ka ban han a titeh,
A tangtho navah, hote im teh a houng teh apicai e a hmu.
Hat torei teh ama hlak ka mathout e muitha a hui sari touh a hrawi teh hote tami thung a kâen awh. Hote tami teh hmaloe e hlak a hnukkhu e hoe a mathoe telah atipouh.
Hottelah a dei navah napui buet touh ni taminaw e a rahak hoi a dei e teh, Bawipa nang na ka vawn e napui hoi sanu na ka pânei e napui teh a yawhawi telah atipouh.
Jisuh ni Cathut e lawk ka thai ni teh ka tarawi e tami doeh a yawkahawi e tami telah atipouh.
Hahoi tami muen a kamkhueng awh dawkvah, Bawipa ni hete miphun teh miphun kathout doeh. Mitnoutnae a hei navah, profet Jawnah e mitnoutnae hloilah, bangpatet e mitnoutnae hai kamnuek sak mahoeh.
Jawnah ni Nineveh kho dawk e taminaw hanelah mitnoutnae lah ao e patetlah tami Capa hai hete miphunnaw hanelah ao han.
Lawkceng navah aka lae ram ka uk e siangpahrangnu ni hete miphun koe lah a kangdue vaiteh a sung sak han. Bangkongtetpawiteh hote siangpahrangnu teh Solomon e lungangnae lawk tarawi hanelah, talai pout koe lahoi a tho. Hete hmuen koe Solomon hlak ka talue e tami ao.
Lawkceng navah, Nineveh kho e taminaw teh hete miphunnaw hoi cungtalah a thaw vaiteh, hete miphunnaw a yonnae a kamnue sak han. Bangkongtetpawiteh ahnimanaw teh Jawnah ni a dei e lawk dawk hoi pankângai awh. Hete hmuen koe Jawnah hlak kalen e tami ao.
Apinihai hmaiim paang navah ouk ramuk bawi hoeh, tangthung hoi hai ouk ramuk bawi hoeh. Ka kâennaw ni angnae a hmu thai nahanelah, hmaiimkhok dawk doeh ouk ta awh.
Na mit teh na takthai hanelah hmaiim lah ao dawkvah na mit ang pawiteh na tak abuemlah a ang han. Na mitmawm pawiteh na tak abuemlah a hmo han.
Na tak dawk e angnae hah, hmonae lah na coung sak hoeh nahan kâhruetcuet awh.
Puengcang buet touh boehai hmonae cakang lah awm laipalah, na tak abuemlah ang pawiteh, hmaiim teh nangmouh a ang e patetlah na tak abuemlah koung a ang han telah atipouh.
Hahoi hettelah a dei navah, Farasi tami buet touh ni bu ca hanelah a kaw teh caboi dawk a tahung.
Bu a ca hoehnahlan kut kamsin hoeh e Farasi tami ni a hmu navah a kângairu.
Jisuh ni Farasi nangmanaw, avanlah doeh manang, ailo na pâle awh. Athunglah teh hounlounnae, hawihoehnae hoi doeh na kawi awh.
Tamipathunaw, avan lae ka sak e Cathut ni athung lae hai sak hoeh maw.
Hot hlak hoe kahawi e teh, na sak thai toteh mathoenaw hah poe awh, telah na sak pawiteh hno puengpa ni na thoungsak awh han.
Farasinaw, nangmouh teh na yawthoe awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh, songpam, songkeng hoi anhlanaw totouh, pung hra pung touh na poe awh navah, lannae hoi Cathut lungpatawnae teh banglahai na noutna awh hoeh. Apasuek dei e naw hai cettakhai laipalah, a hnukkhu dei e naw hai tarawi awh.
Farasinaw, nangmanaw teh na yawthoe awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh, sinakok dawk ka talue e hmuen koehoi hno yonae koevah ayâ ni bari e hah lung na pataw awh.
Cakathutkungnaw hoi Farasinaw, kakâsaknaw teh na yawthoe awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh ka kamnuek hoeh e phuen hoi na kâvan awh. Hote tangkom van kacetnaw ni phuen ao e panuek awh hoeh telah atipouh.
Hahoi kâlawk kacangkhaikung buet touh ni Bawipa telah pawiteh kaimouh hai yon na pen awh maw, telah atipouh navah,
Kâlawk kacangkhainaw, nangmouh teh na yawthoe awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh, phu thai hoeh e hno ayânaw van na patue awh. Namamouh teh kutdawn hoi boehai na tek awh hoeh.
Nangmouh teh na yawthoe awh. Na mintoenaw ni a thei e profetnaw e phuen na sak awh.
Hatdawkvah nangmouh teh, na mintoenaw e nuencang na tarawi awh. Na mintoenaw ni profetnaw teh a thei awh toe. Nangmouh ni phuen na sak awh.
Hatdawkvah Cathut lungangnae ni profetnaw hoi gunceinaw hah ahnimanaw aonae koe patoun han. Ahnimanaw thung dawk tami tangawn teh a pacekpahlek han, tangawn teh a thei awh han.
Hatdawkvah, Abel e a thi koehoi a kamtawng vaiteh, thuengnae hoi bawkim rahak vah a thei awh e Zekhariah e a thi totouh, talaivan kamtawngnae koehoi palawng tangcoung lah kaawm e profetnaw pueng e a thipaling phu teh hete miphunnaw koe ka suk han.
Kai ni atangcalah ka dei e teh hete miphunnaw koe hote thipaling phu ka suk han telah kai ni ka dei.
Kâlawk kacangkhainaw, nangmouh teh na yawthoe awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh panuenae cabi teh na kuem awh. Namamouh hai na kâen awh hoeh, kâen han kangainaw hai na ngang awh, telah atipouh.
Hottelah taminaw koe a dei pouh navah, cakathutkungnaw hoi Farasinaw ni Bawipa dawk yon a pen thai nahanelah,
a pawp awh teh lawk a dei e man thai nahane a tawng awh teh a konglam a cawngca a pacei awh.
Hatnavah, taminaw touklek thai hoeh lah a kamkhueng awh teh, a kâ katin kâ ka awi awh. Jisuh ni a hnukkâbangnaw koe a dei pouh e teh tami kahawi lah kâsaknae Farasinaw e ton hmaloe pasuek lah roun awh.
Ramuk lah kaawm e naw pueng a kamawng han. Hro lah kaawm e naw pueng a kamphawng han.
A hmonae koe nangmouh ni na dei e naw pueng angnae dawk a thai awh han. Nangmouh ni cawngket vah arulahoi hnâ koe lawknaw na dei e pueng lemphu hoi pathang lah o han.
Ka huinaw, nangmouh koe ka dei e teh, tak ka thet ni teh alouke hno bout ka thet thai hoeh e taket awh hanh.
Bangpatet e tami maw na taki han tetpawiteh tak ka thet thai ni teh hell dawk ka tâkhawng thai e hah taket awh. Atangcalah na dei pouh awh. Hote tami hah taket awh.
Pusu panga touh e hah tangka kahni touh hoi na ran awh nahoehmaw. Hote pusu buet touh boehai Cathut ni pahnim hoeh.
Nangmae na sam hai abuemlahoi koung a touk. Hatdawkvah taket awh hanh. Nangmanaw teh pusunaw hlak aphu hoe na o awh.
Kai ni na dei pouh e teh apihai thoseh, taminaw e hmalah kai na kampangkhai. Cathut e kalvantami e hmalah tami Capa ni hote tami teh ka kampangkhai van han.
Apihai thoseh, taminaw e hmalah kai na hnoun, Cathut e kalvantami e hmalah kai ni ka hnoun van han.
Tami Capa pahni hoi ka dudam e tami teh ngaithoum lah ao thai rah. Kathoung Muitha ka dudam e tami teh nâtuek hai ngaithoumnae hmawt thai mahoeh toe.
Sinakok dawk hai thoseh, ka ukkungnaw hoi kâ katawnnaw koe hai thoseh, nangmanaw hah na hrawi awh navah, bangmaw ka dei han tie kângai awh hanh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, bangtelamaw ka dei han tie hah atueng pha torei teh Kathoung Muitha ni na cangkhai han telah atipouh.
