Tamimaya thung dawk e tami buet touh ni yah, Bawipa ka hmau ni râw kai hai na rei hanelah dei pouh haw telah atipouh navah,
Bawipa ni apinimaw nangmanaw râw rei hanelah kai na rawi a vaw telah a pacei.
Hathnukkhu hoi hounlounnae hah kâhruetcuet nateh roun awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh, hnopai tawn nakunghai hnopai dawk hringnae awmhoeh telah ti pouh.
Bangnuenae lahoi bout a dei pouh e teh, ka tangreng e tami buet touh ni a paw moikapap ka tâcawt e talai kahawi buet touh a tawn.
Hote tangreng ni, cakang ka ta nahan hmuen awmhoeh toe, bangtelamaw ka ti han toung telah a lung thung a pouk.
Ka tâsongnaw ka raphoe vaiteh tâsong kalenpoung lah ka sak hnukkhu cakang hoi hno kahawinaw teh hote hmuen dawk ka pâtung han.
Ka muitha hanelah, nang ni kum moi kasawlah na hno hane hnopainaw koung ka pâtung toe. Duem kâhat lawih, cat net nateh nawm lawih telah ka ti pouh awh han.
Telah a pouk lahun navah Cathut ni tamipathu atu tangduem, nange muitha oun ka lat pawiteh, hnopai na kuem e naw apinimaw a pang han vaw telah tangreng koe atipouh.
Hot patetvanlah ma hanelah hnopai ka pâtung ni teh Cathut hmalah ka mathoe e tami teh hote tangreng bawi hoi doeh a kâvan telah a ti.
Hnukkâbangnaw koe bout a dei pouh e teh, hatdawkvah nangmouh ni bangtelamaw ka canei han telah hring nahanelah ngaihri awh hanh. Bangtelamaw ka khohna han telah na tak hanelah ngaihri awh hanh.
Rawca hlak hringnae aphu awm hoeh na maw. Khohna hlak na tak heh phu awm hoeh na maw.
Vonganaw khenhaw! Hote tavanaw ni cati hai patûe awh hoeh. Cang hai a awh hoeh. A pâtung nahane capainaw hai tawn awh hoeh. Hatei Cathut ni doeh koung a kawkhik. Nangmanaw teh hote tavanaw hlak aphu moi na o awh nahoehmaw.
Apini maw a ngaihri laihoi amae hringnae dong touh a pasaw thai han maw.
Telah kathoengpounge hnoca pateng na sak thai awh hoehpawiteh alouke hnonaw dawk bangkongmaw na ngaihri
Kahrawngum e apeikungnaw bangtelah hoi maw a roung awh, tie khenhaw. Thaw hai tawk awh hoeh, hnicu hai kawng awh hoeh. Hateiteh Solomon siangpahrang e bawilennae ni hote apeikung buet touh boehai phat hoeh.
Yuemnae koe lah tha kayounnaw atu kahring ni teh tangtho takhuen koe ka phat e kahrawng e pho pateng Cathut ni hottelah a khohnat sak pawiteh, hot hlak nangmanaw teh na khohnat sak mahoeh maw.
Hatdawkvah bangtelamaw ka canei awh han tie pouk awh hanh. Na lung hai puen sak awh hanh.
Hote hnonaw teh talaivan miphun pueng ni ouk a tawng e doeh. Hote hnonaw, nangmouh ni na panki e hah nangmae na Pa ni a panue.
Nangmouh teh Cathut uknaeram ma hah tawng awh. Hahoi hote hnonaw teh na thap pouh awh han.
Tuhunaw, taket awh hanh. Nangmae na Pa ni nangmanaw koe ram na poe hane a ngai.
Nangmae hnopainaw yawt awh nateh mathoenaw hah poe awh. Ka pawn thai hoeh e yawngya namamouh hanelah sak awh. Tamru ni a paruhoehnae koe, ahri ni a raphoehoehnae koe kalvan kho vah, ka pout thai hoeh e râw kuem awh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, nangmae râw onae koe nangmae lungthin pouknae hai poe ao han.
Taisawm kacaklah kâyeng nateh hmaiim sut paang awh.
Yuvâ kâpaluennae pawi koehoi a bawipa a tho toteh, tho takhawng navah tang paawng pouh thai nahanelah sut ka ring e san patetlah awm awh.
Bawipa bout a tho toteh, kâhruetcuet laihoi a ring tie bawipa ni a hmu e san teh a yawhawi. Kai ni lawkkatang na dei pouh e teh, a bawipa ni taisawm a kâyeng teh a sannaw a tahung sak teh, ama ni rawca a paca han.
Apâhni e tueng, hoi apâthum e tueng nah Bawipa a tho nah hottelah ka ring e sannaw hah hmawt pawiteh, ahnimouh teh a yawhawi awh.
Imkung ni tamru a tho nahane atueng panuek pawiteh ama im a muk thai hoeh na hanelah a ring han tie hah nangmouh ni na panue awh.
Hatdawkvah nangmouh ni coungkacoe lah ring awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh nangmanaw ni na poukhoehnae atueng dawk tami Capa teh a tho han telah atipouh.
Piter ni Bawipa hete bangnuenae heh kaimouh hane dueng maw na dei, taminaw pueng hanelah maw na dei telah a pacei.
Jisuh ni imkung ni a imthungnaw hanlah atueng pha toteh canei ka rei hanelah a rawi e tami yuemkamcu e hoi a lungkaang niteh, ka kuepcing e san teh apimaw.
Bawipa bout a tho navah hottelah kaawm e san teh a yawhawi.
Lawkkatang na dei pouh e teh bawi ni amae hnopai a tawn e naw pueng a san koe a kuem sak han.
Hateiteh, hote san ni Bawipa tho hnai mahoeh telah a pouk teh amae a san huinaw napui tongpanaw hoi a kâhem awh teh a canei awh teh a parui awh.
Hote san ni a poukhoehnae hnin, a panuehoehnae tueng dawk Bawipa tho pawiteh hote san teh puenghoi yonphu a khang vaiteh yuemkamcu hoeh e taminaw hoi cungtalah ao sak han.
Ama e a bawipa ngainae a panue nahlangva vah, kâhruetcuet lah kaawm hoeh e san teh avai moikapap hem lah ao han.
Hatei, ka panuek hoeh e teh younca doeh hem khai han. Moikapap poe e ni moikapap a patho han. Moikapap kuem sak e koe moikapap hei lah ao han.
Talai van hmai kak sak han doeh ka tho. Hmai ka kang tangcoung e lah o han ka ngainae hoe ao.
Hatei, ka coe hane baptisma buet touh ao rah. Hote Baptisma ka hmu hoehroukrak banghloimaw ka lungrei a thai.
Talai dawk roumnae poe hanelah kai teh ka tho telah na pouk awh maw. Hottelah nahoeh. Buet touh hoi buet touh kâkapek sak hanelah doeh ka tho telah a ti.
Bangtelamaw tetpawiteh, atu hoi teh tami panga touh kaawm e im dawkvah, kathum touh ni kahni touh e a taran vaiteh, kahni touh ni kathum touh e hah a taran han.
A na pa ni a capa, a capa ni a napa, a manu ni a canu, a canu ni a manu, a mani ni a langa, a langa ni a mani a taran vaiteh a kâkapek awh han.
Tamimaya koe bout a dei pouh e teh nangmouh ni kanîloum lah tâmai a tho e na hmu awh navah khorak han doeh telah na ti awh. Na dei awh e patetlah a rak.
Aka lahoi kahlî tho e na hmu navah khumbei a thoe han doeh na ti awh. Na dei awh e patetlah bokheiyah.
Tamikahawi lah ka kâsaknaw nangmouh ni talai hoi kalvanlae mitnoutnae na kapek awh teh na panue thai awh. Bangkongmaw a tue na kapekkaboe thai awh hoeh vaw.
Hothloilah bangkongmaw katang e hno hah namamouh lungpouk na panue thai awh hoeh vaw.
Nang na ka toe e hoi lawkcengkung koe reirei na cei navah, lam vah ahni hoi hnâbonae na sak thai nahanelah panki awh. Telah na sak hoehpawiteh ahni ni nang teh lawkcengkung bawi koe na hrawi vaiteh lawkcengkung ni karingkungnaw kut dawk na poe vaiteh karingkungnaw ni thongim na pabo han.
Tangka pueng koung na patho hoehroukrak thongim thung hoi na tâcawt mahoeh telah kai ni ka dei.
Hatnavah, tami tangawn a tho teh Pailat bawi ni Galilee tami tangawn e a thi teh amamouh hoi amamae thuengnae hoi kâkalawt toe ti teh a dei pouh awh.
Jisuh ni hote Galilee taminaw teh hottelah a khang awh dawkvah alouke Galilee taminaw pueng hlak hoe a yon awh, telah na pouk a maw.
Hoe yon awh hoeh, nangmouh hai pan na kângai awh hoehpawiteh rawknae dawk na pha awh han telah a dei pouh.
Hothloilah, Siloam imrasang ni a rawp sin nah kadout e tami hlaitaroe touh teh Jerusalem kho thung e naw pueng hlak hoe a yonnae ao telah na pouk awh maw.
Hoe yon awh hoeh, nangmouh hai yon pan na kângai awh hoehpawiteh rawknae dawk na pha awh han telah bout a dei pouh.
Bangnuenae bout a dei e teh tami buet touh ni takha dawkvah a ung e thaibunglung buet touh ao. Hote a kung koe a tho teh a paw a tawng ei hmawt hoeh.
Hatnavah takha ka ring e koe kum thum touh thung hete thaibunglung koe ka tho teh a paw ka tawng ei kahmawt bawi hoeh. Lawt tâ tueng leih, bangkongmaw talai runae na poe telah kâ a poe teh takhakaringkung ni Bawipa takum teh awm ei naseh atipouh.
Kai ni a kung tengpam ka tai vaiteh talai kahawi ka poe han rah,
Palawng vah a paw bout paw hoehpawiteh tâtueng yawkaw lawih atipouh.
Jisuh ni sabbath hnin vah sinakok dawk cangkhainae a sak navah,
a kum hlaitaroe touh thung kahrai ni a man teh patawnae ka tawn e napui buet touh ao. Hote napui teh a hnamthun teh kangdout thai hoeh.
Jisuh ni hote napui a hmu navah ama koe a kaw teh nange napui, nang teh na patawnae dawk hoi na hlout toe telah kâ a poe navah,
ahni dawkvah a kut a toung teh ahni teh tang a kangdue thai teh Cathut a pholen.
Hottelah sabbath hnin Jisuh ni patawnae a dam sak dawkvah sinakok kaukkung a lungkhuek teh thaw tawknae hnin hnin taruk touh ao, hote hnin dawkvah patawnae dam hanelah tho awh. Sabbath hnin tho a hanh telah tamihu koe a dei pouh.
Jisuh ni tami kadumyennaw nangmanaw ni sabbath hnin vah marang, maitonaw hah a im dawk na ta awh teh tui nei hanelah ouk na hrawi awh nahoehmaw.
Abraham e canu kum hlaitaroe touh thung Setan ni a katek e napui heh sabbath hnin vah hlout sak thai mahoeh maw telah atipouh.
Hottelah a dei hnukkhu Bawipa ka taran e naw pueng teh yeirai a po awh. Bawipa ni kângairu hnonaw a sak e hah taminaw pueng ni a konawm awh.
Cathut uknaeram teh bang hoi maw a kâvan, bang hoi maw bout ka bangnue han telah atipouh.
Tami buet touh ni hote antam mu hah a la teh, a takha dawk a patue navah, a roung, a kung a len teh kahlun e tavanaw ni a kang dawk a kâhat telah a dei pouh.
Cathut uknaeram teh bang hoi maw bangnue han telah bout atipouh.
Napui ni ton a la teh tahawnbu tangthung kathum touh dawk a phuen teh, hote tahawnbu ka po sak e ton hoi a kâvan telah a ti.
Hatnavah Jisuh teh kho tangkuem a cei teh cangkhainae a sak teh Jerusalem kho lah a cei.
Tami buet touh niyah Bawipa rungngang lah kaawm e tami a younca maw kaawm telah a pacei.
Hatnavah kabueng e takhang dawk kâen hanelah panki awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh tami kapap ni kâen han a ngai ei teh kâen thai hoeh telah kai ni ka dei.
Imkung ni takhang a khan hnukkhu teh nangmouh ni alawilah kangdue laihoi, tho na takhawng awh teh Bawipa, Bawipa kaimouh hane tho paawng ei na ka tet awh nakunghai Bawipa ni nangmanaw nâ hoi ka tho e maw, kai ni na panuek awh hoeh telah bout ati pouh awh han.
Hatnavah nangmouh ni kaimanaw teh nama hoi cungtalah ka canei awh toe. Kaimouh kho vah nama ni cangkhainae na sak toe telah na dei ei nakunghai,
Bawipa ni nangmanaw teh nâ hoi ka tho e maw kai ni na panuek awh hoeh. Hawihoehnae hno na ka sak e taminaw kai koehoi tâcawt awh telah nangmouh koe ati han.
Hatnavah Abraham, Isak, Jakop hoi kamtawng vaiteh profetnaw pueng ni Cathut uknaeram dawk a kâen han, nangmanaw teh alawilah pâlei lah na o awh vaiteh khuikanae, hâ katanae hmuen koe na o han.
Hatnavah kanîtho, kanîloum, atung, aka lahoi tho awh vaiteh Cathut uknaeram thung a tahung awh han.
Hnuk ka teng e tami hma a hman han. Hma ka hman e tami hnuk a teng han, telah atipouh.
Hatnavah Farasi tami tangawn Bawipa koe a tho teh, Herod bawi ni Bawipa nang thei hanlah a ngai dawkvah hie hmuen koehoi tâcawt leih atipouh.
Bawipa ni cet awh nateh hote asui koe dei pouh awh. Kai teh sahnin tangtho kahraituilinaw ka pâlei vaiteh, patawnae karoumsak han, apâthum hnin thaw ka cum han.
Hateiteh, sahnin, tangtho, tawkkahnin e a hninnaw dawkvah kahlawng ka cei han rah. Bangkongtetpawiteh, Jerusalem lawi lah alouke hmuen koe bangpatet e profet nakunghai a due tie awm thai hoeh.
Oe, Jerusalem, Jerusalem, nang teh profetnaw pou na thei. Nang na onae koe patoun e taminaw hai talung hoi pou na dêi. Âpui ni a canaw a rathei rahim vah, koung a ramuk e patetlah nange na canaw pâkhueng hanelah avai moikapap lah na ngaikhai ei, nang ni na ngai hoeh.
Nangmouh na onae im teh tami kingkadi lah ao han. Kai ni ka dei e teh Cathut e ngainae lahoi ka tho e tami teh yawhawinae awm lawiseh telah nangmouh ni na dei hoeh roukrak atu hoi teh nangmouh ni kaie minhmai na hmawt mahoeh telah atipouh.
Jisuh teh sabbath hnin vah bu ca hanelah Farasi bawi buet touh im a kâen teh, hatnavah ahnimouh ni Bawipa teh a tuet awh.
A hmalah phing patawnae ka tawn e tami buet touh teh ao.
Sabbath hnin patawnae dam sak han maw telah Farasinaw hoi cakathutkungnaw hah Jisuh ni a pacei navah,
ahnimouh teh lawkkamuem ao awh. Jisuh ni hote tami a kaw teh patawnae dawk hoi hlout sak hnukkhu bout a tha.
Hathnukkhu ahnimanaw koe, sabbath hnin vah na capa hoehpawiteh na maito tangkom dawk bawt pawiteh rasat laipalah apimouh na kaawm awh han telah a pacei.
Ahnimouh ni lawk kam touh boehai pathung thai awh hoeh.
Hatnavah kaw e tami teh bari kaawm e tahungnae dawk a rawi awh e hah a hmu torei teh ahnimanaw han bangnuenae a dei pouh.
Tami ni yuvâ kâpaluennae pawi koe nang na kaw navah bari kaawm e hmuen koe tahung hanh. Hottelah na tahung pawiteh nang hlak ka talue e tami pawi koe tho pawi teh,
nangmouh ka kaw e tami ni hete tami hmuen poe leih telah a dei han. Hatnavah nang teh yeiraipo hoi ka rahnoum e hmuen koe na kum han.
Tami ni nang na kaw navah cet nateh ka rahnoum e hmuen dawk tahung. Hottelah na awm pawiteh nang ka kaw e tami a tho navah ka hui haw e hmuen koe luen telah ati han. Hatnavah nang hoi cungtalah ka tahung e taminaw hmalah nang teh bari e lah na o han.
Amahoima kârasang e tami teh rahnoum sak lah ao vaiteh, amahoima kârahnoum e tami teh rasang sak lah ao han atipouh.
Jisuh ni ama ka kaw e tami koe bout a dei pouh e teh nang ni amombu, tangminbu na paca navah huikonaw, hmaunawnghanaw, miphunnaw hoi ka tawnta e imtenglawpamnaw na kaw mahoeh. Hottelah na kaw pawiteh a hnuk khu torei nang bout na kaw awh vaiteh na patho awh han.
Pawi na to navah ka mathoe e tami, kuepcing hoeh e tami, a khokkhem e tami hoi a mit ka dawn e taminaw hah kaw awh.
Hottelah na kaw pawiteh yawhawinae ao han. A lamthung teh hote taminaw ni na patho thai hoeh e lah ao dawkvah tami kalannaw a thawnae tueng dawkvah nang teh patho lah na o han telah atipouh.
Caboi koe ka tahung e tami buet touh ni hote lawk a thai navah Cathut uknaeram pawi dawk kâen e tami teh yawhawinae ao telah a dei navah,
Jisuh ni tami buet touh teh ka talue poung lah pawi a sak teh taminaw pueng a kaw.
Pawitonae tueng a pha toteh kaw tangcoung e taminaw koe tami a patoun teh, tho awh bangpuengpa coungkacoe lah ao toe telah a thai sak.
Kaw kamcu e taminaw pueng ni a panuiparingkhai awh. Buet touh ni kai im hmuen ka ran. Ka cei vaiteh ka khet han. Kai na ngaithoum ei telah a kahei.
Buet touh ni kai maito bo panga touh ka ran toe. Ka cei vaiteh ka tanouk han rah. Kai na ngaithoum ei telah a kâhei.
Buet touh ni kai ka yu hoi ka paluen toe. Hatdawkvah kai ka tho thai mahoeh.
A san ni bawipa koe bout a tho teh hote akongnaw a dei pouh. Hatnavah imkung a lungkhuek teh, kho thung lam teng lam rahak kaawmnaw, mathoenaw, kuepcinghoehnaw, khokkhemnaw hoi mitdawnnaw pueng kaw telah a san koe a dei pouh.
A san ni hai Bawipa kâ na poe e patetlah ka sak toe. Hatei tahung nahane hmuen ka houng e ao rah telah a dei pouh.
Hahoi, Bawipa ni kho lawi, lam dawk, takha teng cet ei, kaie im dawk muen akawi thai nahan koung kaw lawih.
Hmaloe kaw e taminaw buet touh hai kaie tangminbu patek mahoeh telah a san koe a dei pouh, telah atipouh.
Hathnukkhu tamihupui teh Bawipa hnuk a kâbang awh teh, a kamlang sin teh a khet navah,
apihai amae manu, napa, yuca, hmaunawnghanaw dueng laipalah amae hringnae patenghai pahnawt hoehpawiteh, ka hnuk kâbang lah awm thai hoeh.
Ama e thingpalam hrawm hoi ka hnuk kâbang hoeh e tami teh ka hnuk kâbang e lah awm thai hoeh.
Nangmouh thung dawkvah tami buetbuet touh ni, imrasang sak hanlah ngai pawiteh, hote im a cum totouh phoisa a khout hoi a khout hoeh e hah hmaloe tahung vaiteh, to laipalah ao han namaw.
Hottelah to laipalah hoi khomkhu a tapu teh im cum thai hoehpawiteh ka hmawt e pueng ni a pathoe awh han nahoehmaw.
Hete tami ni a kamtawng eiteh cum thai hoeh telah a pathoe awh han.
Hothloilah siangpahrang buet touh ni alouke siangpahrang hoi kâtuk han ati navah, ransa 20,000 touh hoi ka târun e hah, ransa 10,000 touh hoi tâ hoi tâ hoeh hane hmaloe pouk mahoeh maw.
Tâ thai mahoeh tetpawiteh alouke Siangpahrang ahlanae koe ao lahun navah laicei a patoun vaiteh roumnae ao thai nahan ngaithoumnae a hei han na vaiyaw.
Hot patetlah nangmanaw pueng hai mae tawn e hnopainaw pueng na cettakhai hoehpawiteh kaie ka hnuk kâbang lah na awm thai hoeh.
Palawi teh ahawi. Hatei palawi teh a paannae kahmat pawiteh bangtelah hoi maw bout paan thai han.
Talai hanelah thoseh, ei lahai thoseh, hawikhangnae ao hoeh toung dawkvah, alawilah ouk a tâkhawng awh. Thai nahane hnâ ka tawn e tami ni thai naseh telah atipouh.
Tamuk kacawngnaw hoi tamikayonnaw ni Bawipa e cangkhainae thai hanelah ama koe a tho awh.
Farasi hoi cakathutkungnaw niyah hete tami teh tamikayonnaw hoi rei a o, ahnimouh hoi cungtalah bu rei a ca telah yon a pen awh.
Hatnavah bangnuenae lawk a dei e teh nangmouh dawk tami buetbuet touh ni tu cum touh a tawn.
Hotnaw thung dawk e tu buet touh kahmat pawiteh 99 touh e tunaw hah kahrawngum a ta vaiteh kahmat e tu buet touh a hmu hoeh roukrak a cei teh tawng laipalah ao han maw.
A hmu torei teh a lunghawi teh a loung dawk a thueng teh,
im a pha torei teh a huikonaw hoi a imrinaw a kaw teh kahmat e tu bout ka hmu toe, cungtalah konawm khai awh haw telah a dei han.
Hot patetlah pankângai han ka tawn hoeh e tami 99 touh hlakvah pankângai e tamikayon buet touh koe kalvan vah a lunghawinae bet ao hnawn telah a ti.
Hottelah napui buet touh ni phoisa phek hra touh a tawn. Phek touh kahmat pawiteh hmai paang vaiteh a hmu hoeh roukrak imthungkhu imka pâthoun vaiteh kahawicalah tawng laipalah ao han maw.
A hmu torei teh a huikonaw hoi imrinaw a kaw vaiteh kahmat e phoisa bout ka hmu toe, cungtalah konawm khai awh haw telah ati han.
Hot patetvanlah, Cathut e kalvantaminaw ni pankângai e tamikayon buet touh dawkvah lunghawinae a tawn awh, telah atipouh.
Bout a dei e teh tami buet touh ni ca tongpa kahni touh a tawn,
A ca cahnoung ni a na pa koe a cei teh apa, ka hmu hane kawi râw na kapek pouh leih telah a kâhei teh a na pa ni hnopainaw pueng a kapek teh a poe.
Hathnukkhu hoi a ca cahnoung ni amae hnopainaw pueng a la teh kahlatpoung e ram dawk a cei teh hote ram dawkvah talai nawmnae dawk a ngai patetlah kho a sak teh hnopainaw pueng koung a kaseikasak.
A tawn e hnopai koung a pâbaw hnukkhu hote ram dawk takang puenghoi a tho teh puenghoi roedengnae koe a pha.
Hatdawkvah hote ram dawk tami buet touh koe o hanelah a cei teh hote tami ni vok ring hanelah a patoun.
Ahni teh vok rawca patenghai ca hane ngai totouh a vonhlam, hatei apinihai rawca banghai poe awh hoeh.
Hatnavah a lung vuk a ang teh apa im vah aphu hmu hanelah hoi a ta e a sannaw ni boeba hai cat laipalah ca hane a tawn, kai teh hivah vonhlam hoi ka o.
Ka thaw vaiteh apa koe ka cei han. Apa, kai ni kalvan hoi na hmaitung vah ka yon toe.
Na ca ti hanelah ka kamcu hoeh. Na san buet touh lah o hanelah na tat lawih ka ti han a ti.
Hatdawkvah, a na pa koe ban hanelah a kamthaw. Lam ahlapoungnae koe a tho e a na pa ni a hmu navah a pahren dawk a yawng sin teh a takawi teh a paco.
A capa ni vah a Pa kalvan koe thoseh, na hmaitung thoseh, ka yon toe. Na ca ti han ka kamcu hoeh toe telah a ti.
A na pa ni vah aphu kaawm poung e angki lat nateh kho sak awh, a kut dawk kuthrawt buen sak awh.
Khokkhawm hai khawm sak awh, hahoi Maito ca kathâwpoung e lat nateh thet awh, kanawm poung lah pawi sak awh sei.
Bangkongtetpawiteh ka capa teh a due toe, hatei atu bout a hring. A kahma, hateiteh atu bout ka hmu toe ati. Hottelah hoi pawi teh a kamtawng awh.
A capa kacue ni law hoi a ban teh im teng a pha navah ratoung tamawi lawk hoi lamtu e a thai.
A san buet touh a kaw teh bangmaw na sak awh, telah a pacei.
A san ni vah na nawngha ka dam lahoi im bout a tho dawkvah, na pa ni maito ca kathâw e a thei pouh telah atipouh. A capa kacue e teh a lungphuen teh im dawkvah kâen laipalah ao.
A na pa ni capa kacue koe a cei teh kâen leih telah a pasawt.
A capa kacue ni hai kai ni atueng moi kasawlah apa, nange san patetlah thaw ka tawk, vai touh boehai nange kâpoelawk ka tapoe hoeh. Hateiteh kai ni ka huinaw hoi cungtalah nawmnae sak hanelah hmae boehai na poe hoeh.
Ka kâyawt e napuinaw hoi kaawm ni teh na hnopai kaseikasak e na ca cahnoung, im bout a pha torei teh maito ca kathâw kathâw na thei pouh telah a ti.
A na pa ni, ka ca nang teh ka im vah yungyoe na o teh ka tawn e hnopueng nange hno lah ao.
Hatei na nawngha teh a due eiteh, atu bout a hring. A kahma eiteh atu bout hmu toe. Hatdawkvah lunghawi khai hane roeroe lah ao telah a na pa ni atipouh.
Jisuh ni a hnukkâbangnaw koe bout a dei pouh e teh, hnopai ka tawnta poung e bawi buet touh ao. Hote bawi ni hnopai ka kuem hane tami buet touh a tawn. Hote hnopai ka kuem e ni hnopai a kaseikasak telah bawi koe ka dei pouh e tami ao dawkvah,
bawi ni ahni hah a kaw teh nange kong ka thai e heh bangtelah na maw. Ka hnopainaw na hno e cayin ka kuep lah na poe haw. Bangkongtetpawiteh ka hno ka khen e tami lah na awm thai hoeh toe telah atipouh.
Hatnavah Bawipa ni kai teh thaw dawk hoi na tâco sak toe, bangmaw ka tawk han. Laikawk tawk hane hai ka tawk thai hoeh, ayâ koe kutdaw hane hai kayayeirai ati.
Atuvah bangmaw ka sak han tie ka panue toe, hottelah ka sak pawiteh ka thaw a baw torei im dawkvah o sak han ka ngai e tami ka hui ka tawn han telah a pouk.
Bawipa koe laiba ka tawn e taminaw pueng a kaw teh apasuek e tami koe ka Bawipa koe patho hane laiba na yit touh maw na ba titeh a pacei.
Hote tami ni satui nuenae 1,000 touh poe han ao telah a dei. Hnopai ka khen e tami ni vah hete na cayin lat nateh nuenae 500 touh thut telah atipouh.
Hathnukkhu alouke tami a kaw teh nang te laiba na yit touh maw na ba telah a pacei. Catun phei 1,000 touh poe han ao telah ati. Cayin lat nateh phei 800 touh thut telah atipouh.
Hote hnopai ka khen ni teh tami ka dumyen e ni hot patetlah huenghai hoi hno a sak dawkvah a bawipa ni a oup. Bangkongtetpawiteh hete talaivan capanaw ni a thaw tawk e dawkvah angnae capanaw hlak vah a lunganghnawn telah ati.
Bout ka dei e teh, na due torei a yungyoe kangning e lukkareiim dawk hui na tawn thai awh nahanelah, kangning hoeh e talai hno hno awh.
Hno kathoengca dawk yuemkamcu e tami teh hno kalen dawk hai yuemkamcu, hno kathoengca dawk yuemkamcuhoeh e tami teh hno kalen dawk hai yuemkamcuhoeh.
Hottelah ao dawkvah ka kangning hoeh e talai hno hno navah, yuemkamcu lah na awm hoehpawiteh bangtelamaw bawitangrengnae katang poe lah ao han vaw.
Hatdawkvah tami alouke hno dawkvah yuemkamcu hoeh lah na awm pawiteh apinimaw namamouh han lah hno na poe han maw.
San buet touh ni vah bawi kahni touh e san lah awm thai hoeh, buet touh pahnawt vaiteh buet touh a lungpataw han. Buet touh koe yuemkamcu lah ao vaiteh buet touh e teh banglahai noutna mahoeh. Cathut hoi tangka e thaw mekkem thai mahoeh telah atipouh.
Farasinaw ni a dei e naw pueng a thai navah, ahnimouh teh tangka ka ngai e tami lah ao dawkvah Bawipa a panuikhai awh.
Jisuh ni hai Farasinaw, nangmouh teh tami hmalah tamikalan lah na kâsak awh. Hatei Cathut ni nangmae lungthin a panue. Bangkongtetpawiteh, tami ni aphu kaawm poung lah a pouk eiteh Cathut hmalah panuetthopounge doeh.
Mosi e kâlawk hoi profetnaw ni a thut e naw teh Baptisma ka poe e Jawhan e atueng totouh hane doeh. Hathnukkhu Cathut uknaeram kamthang teh taminaw pueng koe dei lah ao vaiteh taminaw ni ram dawk a kâen awh han.
Hatei kâlawk dawk e lawklung kathoengpounge buet touh a rawk hlak vah kalvan hoi talai a rawk e a yawi hnawn.
Nang ni na yu hoi na kampek teh alouke napui hoi na o, hote tami teh a uicuk toe. Hahoi a vâ ka mat e napui hoi kaawm e tami hai a uicuk van telah atipouh.
Vai touh teh ka tangreng poung e tami buet touh ao teh khohna phu kaawm poung hoi a kamthoup teh hnintangkuem kanawm poung lah kho a sak.
Ka roedeng buet touh, âhlut hoi kakawi e, a min Lazarus tie teh, buramei ca hane pouknae lungthin hoi,
tangreng bawi im longkha teng sut a tahung. Uinaw ni a tho teh a hmânaw a palem pouh.
Hnin touh hnin vah ka roedeng e tami a due teh kalvantaminaw ni kalvan Abraham e a lungtabue dawkvah a thak awh. Tangreng bawi hai a due teh a pakawp awh.
Tangreng bawi teh hell dawk a bo teh puenghoi ka patawpoung lah khang laihoi ao. A moung teh a khet navah, Abraham hoi a lungtabue dawk kaawm e Lazarus hah ahlanae koehoi a hmu.
Hattoteh, apa Abraham, na pahren haw. Kai teh hete hmaipalai dawk patawnae puenghoi ka khang dawkvah, Lazarus hah a kutdawn tui dawk ranup sak nateh ka lai pâding sak hanlah patoun haw telah hramki laihoi a dei.
Hatei Abraham ni, ka capa, na hring na thungvah hnopai phunkuep poe lah na o. Lazarus teh roedeng lah ao e hah pahnim hanh. Hatei atuvah ahni teh kanawm poung lah ao, nang teh rei thai hoi na o.
Hothloilah maimouh rahak vah kadung poung e ravo pui ni na rakhan. Hatdawkvah hi lahoi nangmouh koe lah raka han ka ngai e tami ni raka thai hoeh. Hot patetlah nangmouh koe lahoi kaimouh koe lah raka han ka ngai e ni raka thai hoeh telah atipouh.
Tangreng bawi ni pawiteh, Oe! apa, Lazarus hah kai na pa im vah na patoun pouh haw
Hawvah ka hmaunawngha panga touh ao rah. Ahnimouh ni hete puenghoi patawnae hmuen koe a pha awh hoeh nahanelah lawkpanuesaknae poe sak hanelah ka ngai telah atipouh.
Abraham ni, na hmaunawnghanaw ni Mosi hoi profetnaw ni dei e hah tarawi awh naseh, telah atipouh.
Tangreng bawi ni, a pa, Abraham, hottelah nahoeh, duenae koehoi buetbuet touh ni, ahnimanaw koe cet pawiteh a hringnae pan a kângai han doeh telah ati.
Hatei Abraham ni, ahnimanaw ni Mosi hoi profetnaw e lawk ngâi awh hoehpawiteh, tami buetbuet touh ni duenae koehoi ka thaw nakunghai yuem mahoeh, telah atipouh.
Jisuh ni a hnukkâbangnaw koe bout a dei pouh e teh, payonnae teh kaawm han. Hatei payonnae kaawm sak e tami teh a yawthoe.
Hete camo buet buet touh payon sak e hlak cakang phawmnae talungsum lahuen dawk awi laihoi talî dawk tâtawt pawiteh ahawihnawn.
Kâhruetcuet awh, hmaunawngha ni yon pawiteh toun awh, pankângai pawiteh a yonnae ngaithoum awh.
Hnin touh dawk nang koe vai sari touh a payon teh vai sari touh nang koe pankângai toe telah dei pawiteh a yonnae na ngaithoum han telah atipouh.
Gunceinaw ni Bawipa ka yuemnae hoe len sak haw telah ati awh.
Bawipa ni a dei e teh nangmouh ni antam mu tit touh yuemnae na tawn pawiteh hete thailahei kung heh tangpha khuehoi kâphawng nateh talî dawk kâung telah na ti navah na lawk a ngâi han telah ati.
“Bangnuenae lah san buet touh a tawn teh, hote san ni laikawk thaw a tawknae koehoi a tho navah, nahoeh pawiteh, tu hoi maito a khoumnae koehoi im a pha navah karang tho nateh, tahung nateh cat leih ka tet e tami ao han na ou.
Hottelah tet laipalah, kai hanlah rawca hmaloe pâtoum nateh, kai ka ca lahun nah na taisawm kâyeng nateh, khenyawn ei, hahoi torei cat lah a na ti awh han vai yaw.
Hote san ni sak hanlah kâ poe e a sak dawkvah a bawipa ni ahni koe a lunghawi han na ou.
Hot patetvanlah, nangmouh hai kâ poe e hah be na tawk awh torei teh, maimouh teh hawinae kaawm hoeh e sannaw doeh, tawk hane kawi doeh tawk awh telah tet awh, telah atipouh.
Jisuh ni Jerusalem kho lah a cei nah Samaria hoi Galilee e rahak hoi a cei.
Kho buet touh dawk a kâen teh haw vah ka hrikbei e tami hra touh ao teh ahnimouh ni a dawn awh. Lam ahla poung koe a kangdue awh teh,
Jisuh, Bawipa, kaimouh na pahren awh haw, telah a hram awh.
Jisuh ni a hmu teh vaihmanaw koe cet awh nateh namamouh hoi namamouh kâpâtue awh, telah atipouh. Ahnimouh ni a cei awh teh lam vah thoungnae dawk a pha awh.
Ahnimouh thung dawk hoi tami buet touh teh ka dam toe tie a kâpanue navah a ban teh Cathut hah kacaipounge lawk hoi a pholen.
Jisuh e khok rahim a tabo teh, Bawipa ka lunghawi telah ati. Hote tami teh samaria tami doeh.
Jisuh ni, “hra touh hoi koung dam awh hoeh maw. Tako touh e teh na maw ao awh.
Ahnimanaw hai ban vaiteh Cathut pholen thai hoeh maw. Hete miphun alouke tami hloilah buet touh boehai awm hoeh maw telah ati.
Hatnavah Jisuh ni ahni teh, “thaw nateh cet leih, na yuemnae ni na dam sak toe, ” telah atipouh.
Farasinaw a tangawn ni Jisuh teh, nâtuek maw Cathut uknaeram teh a pha han telah a pacei awh. Jisuh ni Cathut uknaeram teh mit hoi hmu e dawk kaawm e na hoeh.
Apinihai khenhaw! hi doeh ao, haw doeh ao tet thai hoeh. Bangkongtetpawiteh Cathut uknaeram teh nangmae thung doeh ao telah atipouh.
A hnukkâbangnaw koe bout a dei pouh e teh, “nangmouh ni tami Capa e hnin hnin touh hmu han ka ngai, na tinae tueng ka phat han. Hateiteh na hmu thaihoehnae tueng ka phat han.
Hi lah khenhaw! haw lah khen a haw telah ka dei e tami kaawm han. Hateiteh hote khet hanelah tâcawt awh hanh.
Sumpa teh kalvan avanglah hoi avanglah a palik teh pheng a ang e patetlah tami Capa teh amae hnin dawk hot patetlah ao han.
Hottelah ao hoehnahlan a rucatnae moi a khang hane thoseh, atu miphunnaw e pahnawtnae hai thoseh, a khang han.
Noah e tueng navah kaawm e patetlah tami Capa e tueng nahai kaawm han.
Noah ni long thung a kâen hnin totouh, taminaw ni a canei awh, a kâpaluen awh, a kâhâ awh teh ahnimouh pueng teh koung raphoe e lah ao awh.
Hot patetvanlah Lot e tueng nahaiyah, taminaw ni a canei awh, a yoran awh, a patue awh, imlaw a sak laihoi ao awh.
Hatei, Lot teh Sodom hoi a tâco hnin vah kalvan hoi ganhmai kho lah a rak teh ahnimouh pueng teh koung raphoe e lah ao awh.
Hottelah tami Capa a kamnue hnin dawkvah kaawm han.
Hote hnin dawkvah lemphu kaawm e tami teh imthung kaawm e hno la hanelah kum hanh naseh, hot patetvanlah law kaawm e tami teh im lah ban hanh naseh.
Lot e a yu hah pahnim awh hanh.
Ma e hringnae ka vum e tami teh hringnae a sung han, hringnae ka sung e tami teh a hringnae hah a rungngang han.
Na dei pouh awh. Hot hnin tangmin vah tami kahni touh ikhun buet touh dawk ka ip e kaawm han, buet touh teh la lah ao vaiteh buet touh teh ceitakhai lah kaawm han.
Napui cakang ka phawm e tami kahni touh dawkvah buet touh la lah ao vaiteh buet touh ceitakhai lah kaawm han.
Tami kahni touh law vah thaw ka tawk e kaawm han, buet touh la lah ao vaiteh buet touh ceitakhai lah kaawm han telah atipouh.
A hnukkâbangnaw ni Bawipa, nâ e hmuen koe maw telah ao han telah a pacei awh navah ro onae koe langtanaw teh a kamkhueng awh han telah atipouh.
Lungpout laipalah ratoum yungyoe awh, tie cangkhainae dawkvah Jisuh ni bangnuenae a dei.
Khopui buet touh dawkvah Cathut hai ka taket hoeh ni teh tami hai barilawa ti ka tawn hoeh e lawkcengkung bawi buet touh ao.
Hote kho dawkvah lahmainu buet touh ao teh kai koe lah lawk na ceng pouh leih, telah atuhoitu pou a tho sin.
Lawkcengkung bawi ni atueng moi ka saw lah a kangek.
Hateiteh, lawkcengkung bawi ni kai teh Cathut hai ka taket hoeh, tami barilawanae hai ka tawn hoeh e lah ka o ei, hete lahmainu ni pou na tarawk dawkvah, lawkceng pouh hoeh pawiteh boutbout tho vaiteh ka lungrei na thaisak han doeh. Hatdawkvah ahni koe lah lawk ka ceng pouh han toe telah a ti.
Hathnukkhu Bawipa ni, hote lawkcengkung bawi ni a dei e teh na thai awh toe.
Cathut ni a rawi tangcoung e taminaw ni amom tangmin lah a hram laihoi het pawiteh lawkceng pouh laipalah ao han maw.
Kai ni ka dei e teh, ahnimouh koe lah karanglah lawk a ceng han. Hatei tami Capa a tho torei teh talai van vah yuemnae a hmu han nama aw, telah atipouh.
Mahoima tamikalan lah kâpouk ni teh ayânaw hah banglahai ka noutna hoeh e tami koevah Jisuh ni bangnuenae lawk a dei.
Tami kahni touh teh bawkim dawk ratoum hanelah a cei roi. Buet touh teh Farasi lah ao teh, alouke teh tamuk ka cawng e lah ao.
Farasi ni a kangdue teh hettelah a ratoum. Oe Cathut, kai teh ayânaw patetlah ngainae kalen e, laithoe ka dei e, napui tongpa yonnae ka sak e tami lah ka o hoeh dawkvah nang koe ka lunghawi, hahoi hete tamuk ka cawng e tami patetlah hai ka o hoeh dawkvah ka lunghawi.
Yat touh dawkvah hnin hni touh rawca pou ka hai teh hnopai ka tawn e pueng pung hra pung touh ka poe telah a ti.
Hatei tamuk ka cawng e tami teh ahla poungnae koe a kangdue teh, kalvan lah khen ngam laipalah a tabut teh, oe Cathut, kai tamikayon na pahren haw telah a ti.
Kai ni ka dei e teh, Farasi laipalah hete tami heh yon ngaithoum lah ao teh im vah a ban. Bangkongtetpawiteh amahoima kârasang e tami teh rahnoum lah ao vaiteh amahoima kârahnoum e tami teh tawm lah ao han telah atipouh.
Hatnavah camonaw kut hoi tek hanelah Jisuh koe a thokhai awh. Hatei a hnukkâbangnaw ni a hmu navah a yue awh.
Hatei, Jisuh ni camonaw a kaw teh, camonaw kai koe tho sak awh. Ahnimouh hah cakâ awh hanh. Bangkongtetpawiteh Cathut uknaeram teh het patet e taminaw hanelah nahoehmaw ao.
Lawkkatang ka dei. Cathut uknaeram teh hete camo patetlah ka dâw hoeh e teh, hote ram dawkvah nâtuek hai kâen thai mahoeh telah atipouh.
Hahoi, bawi buet touh ni Bawipa hanelah, kahawipoung e saya, a yungyoe hringnae râw ka coe thai nahanelah bangmaw ka sak han telah atipouh.
Jisuh ni, bangkongmaw kahawi e saya telah na ti pouh, telah a pacei teh, Cathut laipalah apihai tami kahawi awm hoeh.
Kâpoelawknaw hah na panue han doeh, uicuk hanh, tami thet hanh, parawt hanh, laithoe kampangkhai hanh, na manu hoi na pa barih telah atipouh.
Ahni ni, hete kâlawknaw pueng ka nawca hoi koung ka tarawi toe telah ati. Hete lawk Jisuh ni a thai navah buet touh na panki rah atipouh.
Na tawn e hno pueng yawt nateh mathoenaw poeh, hottelah na sak pawiteh, kalvan kho vah hno na tawn han, hathnukkhu tho nateh ka hnuk kâbang telah atipouh.
Ahni teh ka bawi poung e lah ao dawkvah, hete lawk a thai navah a lung thouk a mathoe.
Jisuh ni a lungmathoe e hah a hmu navah, ka tangrengnaw ni Cathut uknaeram dawk a kâen hane a ru poung bovaw.
Ka tangrengnaw ni Cathut uknaeram dawk a kâen hlak teh kalauk ni phuengvang kâkhu dawk a kâen e a yawihnawn atipouh.
A lawk ka thai e taminaw ni, pawiteh apimaw rungngang lah kaawm han toung vaw, telah a pacei awh.
Jisuh ni a dei pouh e teh, taminaw hanelah ka coung thai hoeh e naw hah Cathut hanelah teh a coung thai telah atipouh.
Hatnavah Piter ni, khenhaw! kaimouh ni na hnukkâbang hanelah ka tawn e naw pueng ka ceitakhai teh na hnukkâbang awh toe, telah a ti.
Jisuh ni a dei e teh, Oe, na dei e atang, het heh ka dei. Cathut uknaeram kecu dawkvah im thoseh, na yu thoseh, hmaunawngha thoseh, manu hoi na pa thoseh, canaw thoseh buetbuet touh ka cettakhai e tami niteh,
atu e tueng dawkvah alet moikapap lah hawinae a coe vaiteh hmalae tueng dawkvah yungyoe hringnae a pang han, telah atipouh.
Jisuh ni a hnukkâbang hlaikahni touh a kaw teh, thai awh haw, Jerusalem lah ka cei awh vaiteh hawvah profetnaw ni tami Capa e a kong a thut awh e pueng koung ka kuep han.
Jentelnaw e kut dawkvah poe lah ao vaiteh ahnimouh ni a panuikhai han, a dudam awh han, tamtui hoi a tamthawi awh han.
Bongpai hoi na hem awh vaiteh na thei a han, hatei apâthum hnin vah bout ka thaw han telah atipouh.
A hnukkâbangnaw niyah hete kongnaw heh thai panuek awh hoeh, lawk dei ngainae a hro kecu dawkvah Jisuh ni a dei ngainae hah thai panuek awh hoeh.
Jisuh teh Jeriko kho teng a pha navah mitdawn buet touh teh lam teng vah a tahung teh hnopai a hei.
Taminaw a cei e a thai navah bang nama aw, telah a pacei.
Ahnimouh ni, Nazareth tami Jisuh a tho lahun telah a dei pouh.
Hahoi a hram teh, Jisuh, Devit e capa na pahren haw, telah a ti.
Hmalah kaawm e taminaw ni lawkkamuem awmh telah kâhruetcuetnae a poe. Hatei hoe kacailah a hram teh, Devit capa, na pahren haw telah a ti.
Hatdawkvah, Jisuh ni a kangdue teh mit ka dawn e tami kai koe thokhai awh, telah kâ a poe. Ateng a pha navah Jisuh ni a thaw teh, bangmaw sak seh ti na ngai, telah a pacei.
Bawipa, mit ang han ka ngai, telah a dei pouh.
Jisuh ni, na mit ang naseh, na yuemnae ni na dam sak toe, telah atipouh.
Hat nah tahma vah a mit bout a ang. Cathut a pholen teh a hnuk a kâbang. Ka hmawt e taminaw pueng ni hai Cathut teh a pholen awh.
Jisuh ni Jeriko kho dawk a kâen teh khothung vah a kâhlai.
Hatnavah tamuk ka cawng e kacuepoung e tami buet touh a min Zakkheas tie teh ao. Ahni teh ka bawi poung e tami lah ao.
Jisuh teh bangpatet e tami maw tie panue han a ngai dawkvah hmu hane a panki. Hatei ahni teh a rahnoum, taminaw ni a ngue dawkvah hmawt thai awh hoeh.
Hatdawkvah Bawipa a hmu thai nahanelah hmalah sut a yawng teh thailahei kung buet touh dawkvah a luen. Bangkongtetpawiteh Bawipa teh haw lahoi a tho hanela ao.
Hote hmuen koe a pha navah Jisuh ni moung laihoi a khet teh Zakkheas hanelah, karang kum leih, nang im vah ka luen han, telah atipouh.
Zakkheas ni karang poung lah a kum teh lunghawicalah hoi a im vah a luen sak.
Ka hmawt e pueng ni a pathoe awh teh, hete tami ni tamikayon im luen hanelah a cei, telah yon a pen awh.
Zakkheas ni a kangdue teh Bawipa hanelah, Bawipa, thai haw, tami ka roedeng hanelah ka tawn e hno tangawn ka poe han, hahoi kai ni ka dum e awm pawiteh let pali touh hoi ka patho han, telah atipouh.
Jisuh ni a thaw teh, sahnin vah hete im dawk rungngangnae a pha toe, hete tami hai Abraham ca sak lah ao.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, tami Capa teh kahmat e tami tawng hane hoi rungngang hanelah doeh a tho telah atipouh.
Hete lawk ka thai e taminaw koevah hete bangnuenae lawk a dei. Jerusalem kho vah a pha tawmlei toung dawkvah Cathut uknaeram teh tang a kamnue han telah a pouk awh.
Hatdawkvah, bawi buet touh teh ram uknae kâ a tawn hnukkhu bout tho hanelah kahlatpoung e kho dawk a cei.
A cei hoehnahlan vah a san hra touh a kaw teh tangka mina buet touh rip a poe. Hahoi teh, ka yinhnuk na thung vah hno yoran awh, telah atipouh.
Khoram thung e taminaw ni ahni teh a hmuhma awh dawkvah, hete tami heh Siangpahrang lah ao hane ka ngai awh hoeh telah a hnuk lahoi laicei a patoun awh.
Hote Bawi teh ukkung lah ao hnukkhu hoi bout a ban torei teh, mina a poe e sannaw hah tang a kaw teh nâ yit touh maw na hmu awh telah kâ a poe.
Ahmaloe e tami a tho teh, Bawipa nang ni na poe e tangka mina buet touh hoi alouke hra touh ka hmu, atipouh.
Bawipa ni, ahawi, nang teh san kahawi doeh. Titca e thaw dawk yuem na kamcu dawkvah kho hra touh uk lawih atipouh.
Apâhni e san a tho teh, Bawipa, nang ni na poe e tangka mina buet touh hoi alouke panga touh ka hmu, atipouh.
Bawipa ni, kho panga touh uk lawih atipouh.
Hatnavah alouke san buet touh a tho teh, Bawipa, nang ni na poe e tangka mina buet touh paroup ao, hnica hoi ka tangoung teh ka kuem.
Nang teh tami pacipali lah na o dawkvah na taki, na hmoukhoehnae koehoi na la teh, na patûe hoeh e hmuen koe na ka a e lah na o, atipouh.
Bawipa ni, san kathout nama e lawk patetlah lawk na ceng han. Kai teh ka hmoukhoehnae hmuen koehoi ka la teh, ka patuehoehnae hmuen koe ka a e, pacipali lah ka o e hah na panuek katang pawiteh,
bangkongmaw kaie tangka mina hah tangka ka pung sak thai koe na hruek hoeh vaw. Hottelah na hrueng pawiteh kai ka tho toteh a pung khuehoi ka dâw hane hah vaw atipouh.
Ateng ka kangdout e taminaw koevah, ahni koe e tangka lawm awh, hra touh ka tawn e tami poe awh, telah atipouh.
Ahnimouh ni, Bawipa, ahni teh hra touh a tawn toe, telah ati awh.
Ahnimouh koe a dei pouh e teh, ka tawn e tami teh bout poe sin han rah. Ka tawn hoeh tami teh a tawn e patenghai la pouh lah ao han.
Hothloilah, kaie uknae ka ngai hoeh e ka tarannaw hah ka hmalah thet awh, telah atipouh, telah ati.
Jisuh ni hete lawk a dei hnukkhu hmalah Jerusalem kho patuen a cei.
Olive mon dawk kaawm e Bethphage kho hoi Bethani kho a pha tawmlei nah a hnukkâbang kahni touh a patoun teh,
hmalae kho dawk cet roi nateh na kâen tahma vah kâcui boihoeh rae laca pâkhi lah ao e hah na hmu roi han. Hote hah a rui rasu roi nateh hivah thokhai roi haw.
Tami buetbuet touh ni, bangdawkmaw a rui na rasu tet pawiteh, Bawipa ni a panki tet pouh roi, telah atipouh.
A cei roi teh Jisuh ni a dei e patetlah bangpuengpa a hmu roi.
Laca teh a rasu roi lahun navah katawnkung ni, bangkongmaw na rasu, telah atipouh.
Ahnimouh roi ni, Bawipa ni a panki, telah a dei pouh.
Laca teh Jisuh koe a thokhai roi. Hote la dawkvah hni a padoun awh teh Jisuh a kâcui sak awh.
A ceinae koe lam dawk hni a phai pouh awh.
Olive mon koe hoi bungling lah kumnae koe a pha toteh, a hnukkâbang tamimaya ni a hmu awh e thao hnosaknae kecu dawkvah, a konawm khai awh teh a lawk kacaipoung lahoi Cathut a pholen awh.
Bawipa min lahoi ka tho e Siangpahrang teh Cathut ni yawhawinae poe lawiseh. Kalvan vah roumnae awmseh. Kalvan a rasang poungnae koe bawilennae awmseh, telah a hram awh.
Hahoi vah taminaw pueng thung dawk hoi Farasi tangawn ni Jisuh teh, saya na hnukkâbangnaw yue haw, atipouh.
Jisuh ni a dei e teh, hetnaw heh lawkkamuem awm pawiteh talungnaw ni tang a hram awh han, telah atipouh.
Jerusalem kho hoehoe a hnai teh a hmu navah, a ka khai.
Sahnin vah roum nahanelah bangmaw a panki tie na panuek haw boipawiteh, hatei hothateh na hmawt ka lawn awh hoeh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh na tarannaw ni tarantuknae puengcang hoi na kalup awh teh avoivang lahoi na kâen sin nahane tueng ka phat han.
Hottelah nama hoi na canaw hah talai hoi sue touh lah a palat awh vaiteh, nang thungvah talung buet touh boehai alouke talung van a ohoehnae tueng ka phat han. Bangkongtetpawiteh nang koe khetyawt hanelah tho nahane tueng teh nang ni na panue hoeh dawkvah telah atipouh.
Jisuh ni bawkim thung a kâen teh hnopai kayawtnaw pueng a pâlei.
Cakathoung dawkvah, Cathut ni ka im teh ratoumnae im lah ao han, telah a thut. Hatei nangmouh ni teh tamrunaw kâhronae im lah na sak awh, atipouh.
Jisuh ni bawkim vah hnintangkuem a cangkhai. Vaihma bawinaw, cakathutkungnaw hoi tamimaya kahrawikungnaw ni thei han a ngai awh.
Hatei, taminaw pueng ni a lawk atang awh teh buet touh hai pahlout hane a ngai awh hoeh dawkvah ahnimouh ni thei nahane lamthung hmawt thai awh hoeh.
Hahoi, hnin touh hnin teh Jisuh ni bawkim vah tami moikapap a cangkhai teh kamthang kahawi a dei lahun nah vaihma bawinaw, cakathutkungnaw hoi kacuenaw a tho awh teh,
hete hnosakthai nahanelah bangpatet e kâtawnnae maw na tawn. Apini maw kâtawnnae na poe dei haw, telah a ti awh.
Jisuh ni a dei pouh e teh, lawk buet touh na pacei awh vai, nangmouh ni dei awh haw.
Jawhan ni baptisma poe thainae kâ a tawn e hah kalvan hoi e maw, tami koehoi e maw, dei awh haw, telah a pacei.
Ahnimouh ni buet touh hoi buet touh a kâpan awh teh, bangtelamaw ti han. Kalvan hoi e tetpawiteh, hat boipawiteh bangkongmaw Jawhan na yuem awh hoeh telah a dei han. Tami koehoi e doeh telah tet pawiteh,
hivah kaawm e taminaw pueng ni Jawhan teh profet roeroe doeh telah a yuem awh dawkvah, ahnimouh ni maimanaw teh talung hoi na dêi awh han, telah ati awh.
Hatdawkvah ahnimanaw ni, nâ hoi e maw tie ka panuek awh hoeh, telah a dei awh.
Hahoi Jisuh ni, hat pawiteh kai ni hai bangpatetlae kâtawnnae hoi maw hete hno heh ka sak tie hah ka dei van mahoeh, telah atipouh.
Hatnavah Jisuh ni taminaw koe bangnuenae lawk a dei pouh. Tami buet touh ni misur takha buet touh a tawn. Takhakatawkkungnaw koe a hlai sak teh, kahlong lah atueng moikasawlah a cei.
Misur paw khi tue a pha toteh, a hlai sak e naw koehoi misurpaw la hanelah, takhakatawkkungnaw koe a san buet touh a patoun. Hatei takhakatawkkungnaw ni a san hah a hem awh teh, kuthrawng lah a pâban awh.
Hahoi alouke a san buet touh bout a patoun navah, a hem awh teh, yeiraipo sak awh teh, kuthrawng lah bout a pâban awh.
Alouke a san hah bout a patoun navah, ka patawpoung lah a hem awh teh a pâlei awh.
Hatnavah takha katawnkung ni, bangtelamaw ka sak han. Ka pahren poung e ka capa ka patoun han, ahni teh a bari awh han doeh, telah a ti.
Hatei, takhakatawkkungnaw niyah, a capa a hmu navah ahni teh râw ka coe hane nahoehmaw, tho awh, thet awh sei. Hat pawiteh doeh ahnie râw hah maimouh ni coe awh ti ati awh.
Hatdawkvah takha katawnkung e capa hah a man awh, takha alawilah a pâlei awh teh a thei awh. Hottelah pawiteh, takha katawnkung ni bangtelamaw ati han.
Takhakatawnkung hah koung thet vaiteh, hote takha hah alouke takhakatawkkungnaw koe a poe han telah atipouh. Hote hah taminaw ni a thai navah, hottelah awm hanh naseh, ati awh.
Jisuh ni ahnimanaw a khet teh, im kasakkung ni, a pahnawt e talung hah a takinlung lah bout ao tie Cakathoung dawk kaawm e lawk hah bangmaw a dei ngai, telah a pacei awh.
Hote talung dawk ka bawt e pueng teh rekrek a kâbawng vaiteh hote talung ni a bosin e pueng teh vitpatit lah ao han, telah atipouh.
Hahoi teh vaihma bawinaw, cakathutkungnaw ni hote bangnuenae teh maimouh doeh na dei ngai nah tie a panue awh toteh, Jisuh man nahanelah kho a pouk awh. Hatei kamkhueng e tamihupui hah a taki awh.
Hatnavah Farasinaw ni Jisuh e lawk man pouh hanelah a tawng teh kho kaukkung kâtawnnae katawnnaw e kut dawk poe thai nahanelah, tamikalan lah kâsak e katuetnaw a patoun awh.
Hahoi, Jisuh hanlah, saya, atangcalah na cangkhai teh na dei tie ka panue awh. Hahoi apie minhmai hai na khen hoeh, hatei Cathut e lamthung lawkkatang hah na cangkhai toe.
Hatdawkvah na dei pouh haw, Sizar koe tamuk poe e hah kaimae phung hoi a kâtaran ou, kâtaran hoeh ou telah a pacei awh.
Jisuh ni ahnimae huenghaionae hah a panue dawkvah nangmouh ni bangkongmaw kai na tanouk awh.
Phoisa phek touh na patue haw, apie mei hoi min maw ka kamnuek telah a pacei navah, ahnimouh ni Rom siangpahrang e mei hoi min doeh atipouh awh.
Jisuh ni Rom siangpahrang e hno teh Rom siangpahrang poe awh. Cathut e hno teh Cathut poe awh, telah atipouh.
Hottelah ahnimouh ni taminaw e hma lah a lawk yon a hmu thai awh hoeh dawkvah, kângairu lahoi lawkkamuem lah ao awh.
Duenae koehoi boutthawnae awm hoeh ka tet e Sadusinaw ni Jisuh koe a tho awh teh,
Bawipa, tami buetbuet touh niyah ca tawn laipalah, a yu dout takhai pawiteh, a tami a thup hoeh nahanelah, a nawngha ni let awmkhai seh titeh Mosi ni a thut.
A hmaunawngha sari touh ao awh. A camin ni hmaloe a yu lah a la teh, Ca sak laipalah a due takhai.
A nawngha ni patuen a okhai teh ca sak laipalah bout a due takhai.
Hottelah, buet touh hnukkhu buet touh a due takhai awh teh, hmaunawngha sari touh ni ca sak awh laipalah, hote napui hah be a due takhai awh.
A hnukteng vah hote napui hai a due van.
Hatdawkvah, boutthawnae tue a pha toteh, hote napui hah apie yu lah maw ao han. Hmaunawngha sari touh ni hote napui hah a yu lah a okhai awh toe telah a ti.
Jisuh ni a dei e teh, atu tueng e taminaw teh a kâpaluen awh, a kâha awh.
Hatei, a yungyoe e pang hane hoi duenae koehoi bout thawnae dawk kamcu e taminaw teh kâpaluen awh hoeh, kâhâ awh hoeh toe.
Ahnimouh teh kalvantaminaw patetlah ao awh teh dout thai awh hoeh toe. Ahnimouh teh duenae koehoi bout thaw lah ao toung dawkvah Cathut e ca lah ao awh.
Hothloilah Mosi ni kadout tangcoung e taminaw hringnae dawk bout a thaw awh tie kacaicalah a dei. Hmai ka kang e buruk kong a dei nah Bawipa teh Abraham Cathut, Isak Cathut, Jakop Cathut lah ao a ti.
Cathut teh kadoutnaw e Cathut na hoeh. Kahringnaw e Cathut doeh. Hote taminaw pueng ni Cathut dawk kahring awh telah atipouh.
Cakathutkungnaw tami tangawn ni, Bawipa, nange na dei e lawk teh atang doeh telah a ti.
Hahoi ahni teh lawk bout pacei ngam awh hoeh.
Jisuh ni a thaw teh, bangtelamaw Messiah teh Devit capa lah ao han, telah na ti awh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh Devit roeroe ni Cathut ni ka Bawipa teh, Na tarannaw hah na khok toungnae lah ka ta hoehroukrak kaie aranglah tahung telah,
ka Bawipa ni Sam cauk dawkvah ati na nahoehmaw.
Hottelah Devit ni Khrih hah Bawipa telah kaw pawiteh bangtelamaw Khrih teh ahnie a capa lah ao thai han, telah a pacei awh.
Rangpui ni a thai navah Bawipa ni a hnukkâbangnaw koe bout a dei pouh e teh,
Cakathutkungnaw heh roun awh. Ahnimouh teh angkidung kho hoi kâhlai hane a ngai awh. Hnopai yonae hmuen koe tami pueng ni bari e hah a ngai awh. Sinakok dawk tahungnae a rasangnae hah a lungpataw awh teh, pawitonae koevah bari kaawm e hmuen kahawi a ngai awh.
Lahmainunaw e im hah a lawp awh teh, a yon kamnuek vaih titeh, kasawpoung lah a ratoum awh. Ahnimouh teh hoe kalen e yonphukhangnae a kâhmo awh han atipouh.
Hahoi, Jisuh ni a khet teh, katawntanaw ni amamae poehnonaw hah tangkabom dawk a pâseng awh hah e a hmu.
Ka roedeng e lahmainu buet touh ni hai rahum tangka kahni touh a pâseng van e hah a hmu.
Hahoi, Jisuh ni atangcalah na dei pouh awh, hote lahmainu ni alouknaw pueng hlak kapap lah a pâseng toe, atipouh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, alouke pueng ni teh a tawn awh e thung dawk hoi poehno a pâseng awh. Hatei, hote lahmainu ni teh a mathoe ei, a kâkawk nahane a tawn e pueng hah a pasoung toe atipouh.
Tami tangawn a tho awh teh bawkim teh lungphen kahawinaw hoi poehnonaw kahawi hoi a pathoup awh, telah a dei pouh.
Jisuh ni hete hnonaw nangmouh ni na hmu awh. Talung buet touh van buet touh, a ohoehnae tueng ka phat han telah atipouh.
Bawipa, hete heh nâtuek han maw, hete hno pueng a tho nahan a hnai toe tie panue nahanelah, mitnoutnaw teh bangmaw kaawm han, telah a pacei awh.
Jisuh ni nangmanaw na ka dum e koe na bawk hoeh nahanelah kâhruetcuet awh. Tami kapap ni ka min kâmahrawk laihoi tho awh vaiteh, kai doeh Khrih toe tet awh vaiteh, atueng a pha toe ati awh han, hatei kâbang awh hanh.
Nangmanaw ni tarankâtuk e kamthang, tarankâtuk hane kamthang na thai awh navah na lungpuen awh hanh. Hote hno teh hmaloe kaawm han, hatei, a poutnae phat hoeh rah.
Hothloilah miphun buet touh hoi buet touh, uknaeram buet touh hoi buet touh, a kâtaran awh han.
Khoram tangkuem tâlî a no han. Takang a tho han. Patawnae kaawm han. Takikathopounge hno hoi kalenpounge mitnoutnaw teh kalvan hoi a kamnue han.
Hote hnonaw ao hoehnahlan taminaw ni ka min kecu dawk sinakok vah nangmanaw na man awh vaiteh na pacekpahlek awh han. Thongim hai na pabo awh han.
Hot hateh nangmouh hanelah lawkpanuesaknae deinae tueng lah kaawm han.
Hatdawkvah nangmouh ni bangtelamaw ka pathung han aw tie sut na pouk awh hoeh nahanelah kâhruetcuet awh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh tarannaw pueng ni na tâ thai hoeh nahan, na oun thai hoeh nahanelah lawk hoi thoumthainae na poe awh han.
Na manu hoi napa, hmaunawngha rei ka tâcawt e na huikonaw ni nangmanaw teh na pahnawt awh han. Atangawn teh a thei awh han.
Tami pueng ni kaie ka min kecu dawk nangmanaw hah na hmuhma awh han.
Hatei, na lû dawk e sam buet touh boehai kahmat mahoeh.
Nangmouh teh na panguepnae lahoi namamae hringnae teh na tawn awh han.
Hatnavah Jisuh ni, nangmanaw ni Jerusalem kho hah ransanaw ni a kalup e na hmu navah hote kho teh a rawk han toe tie panuek awh.
Hatnavah Judah ram dawk kaawm e taminaw mon lah yawng awh naseh. Kho thung kaawm e taminaw teh alawilah tâcawt awh naseh. Khote lah kaawm e taminaw teh kho thung vah kâen hanh naseh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh het hateh, reknae hnin telah tie lah ao teh Cakathoung dawk a dei e naw pueng a kuep nahanelah kaawm e doeh.
Hat hnin toteh, camo kaneng e napuinaw hoi camo nene ka pânei e napuinaw teh a temdeng awh han. Bangkongtetpawiteh Judah ram dawk pueng hai rucatnae kaawm han, Judah taminaw lathueng lungkhueknae ka phat han.
Ahnimouh teh sarusarai hoi thei lah awm vaiteh kho tangkuem vah san lah a hrawi awh han. Jentelnaw ni Jerusalem kho a coungroe awh vaiteh, atueng a kuep hoeh roukrak a khok rahim a hruek awh han.
Hatnavah kanî, thapa hoi âsinaw dawkvah mitnoutnae kamnuek han. Talai van dawkvah tuicapa a thaw vaiteh taminaw pueng lungpuen lahoi ao awh han.
Talai van abuemlah dawkvah ka phat hane hno pouk navah taminaw teh takinae hoi a pâyaw han, bangkongtetpawiteh kalvannaw e bahunaw teh a kâhuet han.
Hatnavah tami Capa ni ka talue poung e bawilennae hoi tâmai kâcui vaiteh a tho e hah na hmu awh han.
Hote hnonaw pueng teh a kamtawng navah kangdout nateh kahlun lah khenhaw! Bangkongtetpawiteh na ratang nahane tueng teh a hnai toe, telah atipouh.
Hahoi, Jisuh ni bangnuenae lawk a dei teh, thaibunglung hoi alouke thingkungnaw hah khen awh
Thaibunglung kung teh a dawn a cawn, a hna a naw toteh, kawmpoi tue a hnai toe tie na panue awh.
Hot patetlah hote hnonaw a tâco toe tie na hmu awh toteh, Cathut uknaeram teh a pha han a hnai toe tie panuek awh.
Atangcalah na dei pouh awh. Atu e taminaw be a due awh hoehnahlan, hete hno pueng teh ka tâcawt han.
Kalvan hoi talai ka rawk nakunghai, ka lawk teh a kangning han.
Nangmouh ni kâhruetcuet awh. Caneinawmnae, yamuhrinae, talai hnopai dawk lungpuen tâsue hoi o navah, hote hnin teh pouk laipalah na kâhmo awh han.
Hote hnin teh tamlawk patetlah talai van kaawm e taminaw pueng koung a ramuk han.
Hatdawkvah nangmanaw ni ka tho hane hno dawk hoi na hlout vaiteh tami Capa koe pha hane kamcu e tami lah na o tie panue thai nahanelah ratoum hoi ring awh, telah atipouh.
Hottelah Jisuh ni hnintangkuem bawkim dawk a cangkhai teh tangmin lah a pha toteh Olive mon dawkvah tangmin a loum sak.
Taminaw pueng ni a lawk thai hanelah bawkim dawkvah amom a cei awh.
Ceitakhai pawi tie tonphuenhoehe vaiyei pawi a hnai toe.
Vaihma bawinaw hoi cakathutkungnaw niyah tamihu a taki dawkvah Jisuh hah bangtelah hoi maw thei han tie lamthung a tawng awh.
Hatnavah a hnukkâbang hlaikahni touh thung dawk e Judah Isakarot thungvah Setan a kâen.
Hatdawkvah ahni ni vaihma bawinaw hoi im karingkungnaw koe a cei teh Jisuh hah bangtelah hoi maw ahnimae kut dawk pahnawt thai han telah a kâdei awh.
Hote taminaw ni a lunghawi awh teh tangka na poe han atipouh.
Hottelah Judah Isakarot ni hai a hnâbo teh taminaw ni a panue hoeh navah bangtelah hoi maw Jisuh hah ahnimouh koe ka poe thai han tie atueng kahawi a pawp.
Tonphuenhoehe vaiyei canae pawi dawkvah ceitakhai pawi tuca theinae hnin a pha.
Ahni ni Piter hoi Jawhan koe cet roi nateh ceitakhai pawi ca nahanelah rakueng roi, telah atipouh teh a patoun.
Ahnimouh roi nihai, nâ e hmuen koe maw rakueng han na ngai, telah a pacei.
Jisuh ni kho thung na kâen navah tuium ka sin e tami na hmu han. Ahnie a hnukkâbang roi nateh a kâennae im dawk kâen roi nateh,
saya ni, ka hnukkâbangnaw hoi cungtalah ceitakhai pawi tangmin bu ca nahane hmuen teh na maw ao telah saya ni na pacei sak, tet pouh roi lah a.
Ahni ni imvan rakueng tangcoung e hmuen pui hah na patue han. Hawvah coungkacoe rakueng awh, telah atipouh.
A hnukkâbang roi ni a cei teh lawk a thui e patetlah a hmu teh haw vah ceitakhai pawiteh a rakueng roi.
Atueng a pha toteh Jisuh ni gunceinaw hlaikahni touh hoi cungtalah caboi a ven awh.
Kai ka due hoehnahlan hete ceitakhai pawi nangmouh hoi cungtalah ca hane ka ngainae lah ao.
Bangkongtetpawiteh Cathut uknaeram dawk hete ceitakhai pawi a kuep hoehroukrak atu hoi bout ka cat mahoeh telah atipouh.
Hahoi, Jisuh ni manang a la teh Cathut koe lunghawi lawk a dei hnukkhu, het heh lat awh nateh cungtalah rei hmawng awh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh Cathut uknaeram a pha hoehnahlan atu hoi misur heh bout ka net mahoeh, telah a ti.
Hahoi vaiyei a la teh Cathut koe lunghawi lawk a dei hnukkhu vaiyei a raen teh ahnimouh a rei teh hetheh ka tak doeh, nangmouh hanlah ka pasoung e ka tak doeh. Kai na pahnim awh hoeh nahanlah sak awh, telah atipouh.
Hot patetlah tangmin bu a ca hnukkhu manang hai a la teh, hete manang heh nangmouh hane ka palawng e ka thi hoi caksak e lawkkam katha doeh.
Hatei, kai na ka pahnawtkung e a kut teh hete caboi koe ka kut hoi rei ao.
Cathut ni a hmoun tangcoung e patetlah tami Capa teh a due han, hatei na ka pahnawt e tami teh a yawthoe telah a ti.
Hahoi amamouh hoi amamouh teh apinimaw het heh a sak han telah buet touh hoi buet touh a kâ pacei awh.
Hothloilah a hnukkâbangnaw ni maimouh dawkvah apimaw hoe ka talue telah buet touh hoi buet touh a kâoun awh.
Jisuh ni yah Jentel siangpahrangnaw ni teh a uk awh. Kâtawnnae katawnnaw hah ram hanlah hnokahawi kasakkung telah ati awh.
Hatei nangmouh teh hottelah sak awh hanh. Nangmouh thung dawk e ka talue e ni camo patetlah awm seh, kahrawikung ni san patetlah awm seh.
Apimaw bet ka talue. Bu ca hanelah ka tahung e maw, bu kapoekung maw. Dei ngai laipalah ka tahung e a taluehnawn. Hatei, kai teh nangmouh thung dawkvah bu kapoekung lah ka o.
Tanouknae ka khang navah nangmouh ni na okhai awh.
Hahoi a Pa ni uknaeram kai na poe e patetlah kai ni hai nangmouh na poe.
Kaie uknaeram thung, kaie caboi dawk na canei awh vaiteh Isarel miphun hlaikahni touh lawkceng hanelah bawitungkhung dawk na tahung awh han, telah atipouh.
Simon, Simon, thai haw. Cai karue e patetlah nangmouh karue hanelah Setan ni a kâhei toe.
Hatei Simon, na yuemnae a rawk hoeh nahan, nang hanelah ka ratoum toe. Hahoi kai koe lah bout na ban nah na hmaunawnghanaw hah tha na poe han, telah atipouh.
Piter ni, Bawipa, nang hoi thongim dawk bo hane hoi due hanelah coungkacoe lah ka o toe telah atipouh.
Jisuh ni, Piter, sahnin ahlui a khawng hoehnahlan nang ni ka panuek hoeh telah vai thum touh na pahnawt han, atipouh.
Jisuh ni bout a dei e teh, tangkabom, yawngya, khokkhawm sin laipalah cet awh, telah na patoun awh navah buet buet touh a panki maw telah a pacei. Ahnimouh ni panki hoeh, atipouh awh.
Hahoi Jisuh ni, hatei atuteh, tangkabom ka tawn e ni sin naseh, hot patetvanlah yawngya hai sin naseh. Tahloi ka tawn hoeh e ni amae khohna a yo vaiteh tahloi ran naseh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, Cakathoung ni, ama teh tamikayonnaw hoi mektouk sin lah ao, telah ati e hah kaie kong dawkvah atu akuep han. Kaie kong a thut e naw pueng teh a kuep toe, telah a ti.
Ahnimouh ni, Bawipa, khenhaw! hi vah tahloi kahni touh ao, telah ati awh teh, a khout toe atipouh.
Hathnukkhu Jisuh a tâco teh amae phung patetlah, Olive mon dawk a cei teh a hnukkâbangnaw ni a hnuk a kâbang awh.
Hote hmuen koe a pha navah nangmouh teh tacueknae dawk na kâen awh hoeh nahanlah ratoum awh, telah atipouh.
Hathnukkhu, talung tâkhawng e sittouh a cei teh a khokcuengkhuem teh a ratoum.
A Pa, na ngainae awm pawiteh, hete manang dawk hoi na hlout na hlout sak haw. Hatei, kai ka ngainae patetlah tho hanh naseh. Nama na ngainae patetlah thoseh, telah a ratoum.
Hatnavah ahni koe kalvan hoi kalvantami a kamnue teh ahni hah tha a poe.
Lungthin meimei ka tangpawk lah a ratoum teh lahun tui talai dawkvah thi patetlah a bo.
A ratoumnae koehoi a thaw teh a hnukkâbangnaw koe a bout a cei navah, ahnimouh teh lungreirhai hoi ao awh teh a i awh e hah a hmu.
Ahnimouh koe bangkong na i awh, tacueknae dawk na kâen awh hoeh nahanelah thaw awh nateh ratoum awh, atipouh.
Hottelah a dei lahun nah, a hnukkâbang hlaikahni touh thung dawk e Judah Isakarot ni tamimaya hmalah a cei teh Jisuh paco hanlah rek a hnai.
Jisuh ni ahni koe, Judah, tami Capa heh paco laihoi maw na pahnawt vaw, atipouh.
Jisuh hoi rei kaawm e naw ni kaawm hane hno hah a hmu navah, Bawipa tahloi hoi ka bouk awh han maw atipouh awh.
Ahnimouh thung dawk e tami buet touh ni vaihma kacue e a san buet touh e a hnâ aranglae a bouk pouh.
Jisuh ni malawi seh, atipouh. Ahnie a hnâ a tek pouh teh ahawi sak.
Jisuh koe ka tho e vaihma bawinaw, bawkim karingkungnaw, kacuenaw ni tamru man hane patetlah tahloi hoi bongpai hoi na tho awh maw.
Nangmouh hoi bawkim dawkvah hnintangkuem ka o navah, nangmouh ni kai na man awh hoeh. Hatei atuteh nangmae tueng doeh, khohmo bahu lah hai ao telah atipouh.
Hahoi, Jisuh a man awh teh a hrawi awh. Vaihma kacue im dawk a ceikhai awh. Hatnavah Piter teh ahlanae koehoi a kâbang van.
Toeim thongma lungui hmai a patawi awh teh cungtalah a tahung awh. Piter hai ahnimouh koe a tahung van.
Piter ni hmai teng a tahung nah sannu buet touh ni khei a khet teh hete tami heh Jisuh hoi rei kaawm e tami doeh telah a ti.
Piter ni a oun, napui nang ahni teh ka panuek hoeh.
Hathnukkhu dongdeng ao hoi tami alouke buet touh ni a hmu teh nang haiyah ahnimouh koe na o doeh atipouh, Piter ni tongpa nang kai nahoeh atipouh.
Hahoi suimilam buet touh a ro hnukkhu tami alouke buet touh ni hete tami hai Jisuh hoi rei ao katang, ahni heh Galilee tami doeh atipouh.
Hatnavah Piter ni tongpa nang na dei e ka panuek hoeh atipouh. Dongdeng ca lawk a dei lahun nah ahlui a khawng.
Hatnavah Bawipa ni a kamlang teh Piter hah a khet. Hatnavah Piter ni Bawipa e lawk teh hlawt a pouk, ahlui a khawng hoehnahlan vai thum touh na pahnawt han telah a dei pouh e lawk hah hlawt a pouk.
Piter ni alawilah a tâco teh puenghoi a khawngsauek teh a kâ.
Jisuh ka man e naw ni ama teh pacekpahlek awh teh a hem awh.
A mit a huem pouh teh, a hem awh, nang apinimaw na hem telah atipouh.
Alouke lawknaw hoi lawkthoe hoi a pathoe awh.
Khodai navah Judah kacuenaw hoi vaihma bawinaw hoi cakathutkungnaw cungtalah a tho awh teh lawk deinae hmuen koe a ceikhai awh.
Nang teh Khrih maw, dei haw atipouh awh, Jisuh ni ka dei nakunghai na tang awh ma hoeh.
Kai ni na pacei nakunghai na dei awh mahoeh.
Atu hoiyah tami Capa heh Cathut hnosakthainae aranglah a tahung han atipouh.
Hatnavah ahnimouh pueng ni nang heh Cathut capa na maw atipouh awh. Ahni ni na dei e patetlah bokheiyah atipouh.
Ahnimouh ni bangpatet e kapanuekkhaikung maw a ngai rah, amae lawk roeroe na thai awh toe ati awh.
Hahoi ahnimouh teh karik a thaw awh teh, Jisuh hah Pailat koe a ceikhai awh.
Hete tami ni ka taminaw a dumyen, Sizar siangpahrang koe tamuk na poe mahoeh, ati teh, kai doeh Khrih, siangpahrang toe a ti, ti teh ahni hah yonpen awh.
Pailat bawi ni, nang teh Judah siangpahrang katang maw telah a pacei nah, Jisuh ni na pacei e patetlah bokheiyah, atipouh.
Hatnavah Pailat ni vaihma bawinaw hoi taminaw koe, hete tami heh a yonnae banghai ka hmawt hoeh atipouh.
Hatei hoe ka cai lah a hram awh teh, hete tami ni cangkhai e lahoi tami moikapap thung dawkvah runae a tâcokhai. Galilee ram hoi Judah ram pueng koung a katin, atuteh hi vah a pha toe ati awh.
Hote Pailat ni a thai navah, hete tami heh Galilee tami maw telah a pacei.
Jisuh teh Herod ni a uknaeram dawkvah ao tie a panue navah ama teh Herod koe a ceisak awh. Hatnavah Herod hai Jerusalem kho ao.
Herod ni Jisuh a hmu navah a lunghawi poung, bangkongtetpawiteh ahnie kong hah pou a thai e lah ao teh kâhmo han a ngainae moi a ro toe. Hahoi Jisuh ni kângairuhno buetbuet touh a sak e hmu hanelah a ngai awh.
Hatnavah Herod ni Jisuh teh lawk moikapap a pacei. Hatei Jisuh ni lawk kam touh boehai pathung hoeh.
Vaihma bawinaw hoi cakathutkungnaw ni a kangdue awh teh, puenghoi yon a pen awh.
Herod hoi a ransanaw ni Jisuh teh a pacekpahlek teh banglahai noutna awh hoeh. Angki kahawi a kho sak awh teh Pailat koe bout a thak awh.
Hote hnin dawkvah Pailat hoi Herod teh huiko lah a o, hat hoehnahlan teh a kâtaran roi.
Pailat ni vaihma bawinaw hoi kahrawikungnaw hoi tami moikapap a kaw teh,
hete tami heh kai koevah na thokhai teh tami moikapap hah runae koe a hrawi na ti awh. Atuteh ama hah na hmalah tâcokhai teh hno kahawihoeh a sak telah yon na pen e naw pueng hah buet touh boehai a sak telah ka hmawt hoeh.
Herod ni hai a yonnae hmawt van hoeh, hatdawkvah kai koevah bout a thak. Hete tami ni vah thei khai han kamcu lah hno a sak e buet touh hai awm hoeh.
Hatdawkvah ka yue vaiteh ka tha han, telah a ti.
Ceitakhai pawi ao nah tangkuem vah Pailat ni thongim ka bawt e buetbuet touh ouk a tha e lah ao.
Taminaw pueng ni a hram awh teh, ahni teh thet awh. Barabas hah tha awh telah a ti.
Barabas teh kho thungvah kamcannae hoi tami ka dumyen e, tami a thei kecu dawkvah thongim ka bawt e lah ao.
Pailat ni Jisuh tha han a ngai dawkvah taminaw pueng koe lawk bout a dei.
Hatei a hram awh teh, thingpalam dawk het sin awh, thingpalam dawk het sin awh, telah ati awh.
Pailat ni bout a dei pouh e teh, bang yonnae maw a sak. Due han kamcu lah hno a sak e buet touh hai ka hmawt hoeh. Ka yue vaiteh ka tha han, telah apâthum lah a dei.
Hatei lawk kacaipoung lahoi yah, Jisuh teh thingpalam dawk het sin awh, telah puenghoi a hram awh dawkvah ahnimae lawk ni a tâ.
Pailat ni hai ahnimouh ni a hei e patetlah lawk a tâtueng pouh.
Ruengruengtinae hoi tamitheinae dawk hoi thongim paung lah kaawm e hah a hei awh e patetlah a tha pouh teh, Jisuh hah amamae ngainae patetlah a poe.
Jisuh teh ransanaw ni a ceikhai awh navah, Sairen kho e Simon ka tho lahun e hah a hmu awh teh a man awh, hateh thingpalam a hrawm sak awh teh Jisuh hnuk a kâbang sak awh.
Hahoi tamimaya hoi ka khuikap e napuinaw ni a kâbang sin awh.
Jisuh ni ahnimanaw hah a khet teh, Jerusalem e napuinaw, kai hanelah kap awh hanh, namamouh hoi na canaw hanelah kap awh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, cakaroe e napui teh a yawhawi. Camo kaneng boihoeh rae napui teh a yawhawi telah dei nahane hnin a pha han.
Hote tueng dawkvah taminaw ni monnaw kaimouh dawk bawt haw, ati awh vaiteh, monruinaw, kaimouh muen na tim sin awh haw, telah ati awh han.
Bangkongtetpawiteh thingkung a hring lahun nah hottetelah sak pawiteh, ka ke e koe teh bangtelamaw ao han, telah atipouh.
Alouke tami kahni touh tamikayon reira, Jisuh hoi rei thei hanelah a ceikhai van awh.
Hatnavah, Luhru tie hmuen koe a pha awh navah Jisuh teh thingpalam dawk a pathout awh teh tamikayon kahni touh hai aranglah buet touh, avoilah buet touh a pathout van awh.
Jisuh ni, a Pa, ahnimae yon ngaithoum haw, bangmaw ka sak tie panuek awh hoeh, telah ati. Ahnimouh ni cungpam a rayu awh teh angki a kâravei awh.
Hahoi, tami moikapap ni kangdue laihoi a khet awh. Ahnimouh hoi kahrawikungnaw ni a panuikhai awh teh, tami alouknaw teh a rungngang, ama teh Cathut ni a rawi e Messiah lah awm pawiteh amahoima rungngang naseh, telah ati awh.
Ransanaw ni hai a tho teh misur tui ka thut e hah a poe teh,
Judah Siangpahrang lah na awm pawiteh na mahoima kârungngang haw titeh a dudam awh.
A lû lathueng thut lah kaawm e lawk teh, AHNI TEH JUDAH SIANGPAHRANG DOEH, telah Grik, Latin, Hebru lawk lahoi a vo awh.
Hahoi vo lah kaawm e tamikayon buet touh ni, Jisuh a dudam teh, Messiah lah na awm hoeh maw. Namahoima rungngang nateh kaimouh hai na rungngang haw telah atipouh.
Hatei, alouke buet touh ni ahni hah a yue teh, Cathut na taket hoeh maw. Nang hai ahni hoi reikâvan lah yonphukhangnae hah pouk haw atipouh.
Maimouh roi teh tawkphu doeh khang roi. Hatei hete tami ni teh banghai payonnae sak hoeh atipouh.
Hahoi Jisuh koe a dei pouh e teh, Bawipa, na uknaeram dawk na tho torei teh, kai na pahnim hanh lah a, telah atipouh.
Jisuh ni atangcalah na dei pouh, sahnin paradis vah kai hoi rei na o han, atipouh.
Hote tueng teh kanîtuengtalueng a thun hoi tangminlasa suimilam kathum totouh, suimilam kathum touh thung talai van abuemlah kho king a hmo.
Hahoi bawkim thung yap e lukkarei kahni touh lah a kâphi.
Jisuh ni kacaipounglah a hram teh, a Pa, na kut dawkvah ka muitha na poe, telah a titeh a hringnae a thouk.
Hote hah ransabawi ni a hmu navah, Cathut a pholen. Hete tami teh tamikalan tangngak doeh, telah a ti.
Hote hno khet hanelah ka tho e taminaw pueng ni hotnaw a hmu navah a lungtabue a ratup awh teh a ban awh.
Jisuh ka panuek e taminaw hoi Galilee ram hoi amae hnukkâbang e napuinaw ni, hete hno teh ahlapoungnae koehoi a khet awh.
Hatnavah Judah ram Arimathea kho dawk tami buet touh a min Joseph tie ao. Ahni teh tami kahawi hoi tamikalan lah ao teh Cathut uknaeram ka tho hane ka ngaihawi e lah ao. Ama teh Bawi dawk ka bawk e lah ao van ei teh lawk tâtueng e hoi hno a sak awh e hah a lungkuep hoeh.
Cathut uknaeram ka ngaihawi e tami kahawi, tamikalan lah ao.
Pailat koe a cei teh Jisuh e a ro hah a hei.
A ro hah a la teh lukkarei hoi a kayo teh tami buet touh boehai pakawp boihoeh rae talung tangkom thungvah a pakawp.
Atangtho teh sabbath hnin a hnai toe,
Galilee ram hoi Jisuh e a hnukkâbang e napuinaw hah Joseph koe a cei awh teh tangkom hoi tangkom thungvah bangtelamaw Jisuh e a ro hah a ta tie khet hanelah a cei awh.
Hahoi im lah a ban awh teh hmuitui hoi satui hah a rakueng awh. Sabbath hnin teh kâpoelawk patetlah a kâhat awh.
Hatei a yat dawk e apasuek hnin, amom vah hote napuinaw ni alouke napuinaw hoi cungtalah, hluk hanelah hmuitui a sin awh teh tangkom koe a cei awh.
Hahoi tangkom tengnae lungphen a kâtahruet e hah a hmu awh.
Hahoi a thung a kâen awh boteh Jisuh e ro hmawt awh hoeh.
Hatnavah bangmaw sak han ti panuek laipalah a kangdue awh lahun navah, lukkarei loukloukkaang e ka khohnat e tami kahni touh hmatara a kangdue roi.
Hote napuinaw ni a taki awh teh a saling awh navah, ahnimouh roi ni, bangkongmaw kahring e tami hah kadout um na tawng awh.
Hivah awm hoeh, bout a thaw toe. Tami Capa teh tamikayonnaw e kut dawk poe lah awm vaiteh thingpalam dawk a pathout awh han.
Apâthum hnin bout a thaw han, telah Galilee ram ao navah a dei e naw hah pahnim awh hanh, telah atipouh roi.
Hahoi ahnimouh ni a lawk hah bout a panue awh,
hahoi tangkom koehoi a ban awh teh hote hnonaw hah a hnukkâbangnaw hlaibun touh hoi alouknaw pueng koe a dei pouh awh.
Hote napuinaw teh Meri Magdalin, Joanna hoi Jem e a manu Meri hoi alouke napuinaw doeh. Amamouh hoi ahnimouh koe ka cet van e tami a alouknaw ni vah hete kong teh gunceinaw koe a dei pouh awh.
Hatei a hnukkâbangnaw ni vah napui ni a dei e teh rumram lah a pouk teh yuem awh hoeh.
Hatei Piter teh a thaw teh tangkom koe a yawng, a khet navah, ro kayonae lukkarei hah a hmu. Hahoi hote hno kaawm e dawk a kângai lah a ru teh, ama im lah a ban.
Hahoi hote hnin dawkvah ahnimouh thung dawk e kahni touh teh Jerusalem kho hoi meng sari touh hlai ahlanae Emmaus kho lah a cei roi.
Kaawm tangcoung e a konglamnaw pueng buet touh hoi buet touh a kâpankhai roi.
Hottelah a kâpankhai navah Jisuh ni ahnimouh roi koe a hnai teh ahnimouh hoi cungtalah rei a cei awh.
A hmu roi ngoun, hatei panuek roi hoeh.
Hahoi Jisuh ni, na cei roi nah buet touh hoi buet touh na kâpankhai roi e lawk teh bangpatet e lawk maw. Bangkongmaw na minhmai a mathoe roi, telah a pacei.
Hahoi ahnimouh roi thung dawk e tami buet touh, a min Kleopas tie ni, Jerusalem vah imyin lah na o nahlangva hote kho dawk e a konglamnaw hah na panuek hoeh maw telah atipouh.
Jisuh ni bangpatet e hno maw telah a pacei navah Nazareth kho e Jisuh doeh. Hote tami ni Cathut hmalah thoseh, dei thainae, sak thainae hoi kakuep e profet athakaawm katang e doeh.
Vaihma bawinaw hoi na kaukkungnaw ni thei hanelah a poe awh teh thingpalam dawk a hetsin awh.
Kaimouh ni ama teh Isarel taminaw ka hlout sak hane mue telah ka pouk awh. Hothloilah, hote hno aonae hah atuteh apâthum hnin a pha toe.
Kaimouh thung dawk kaawm e napui tangawn ni kângai na ru sak awh. Amom tangkom koe a cei awh,
hatei, a ro teh hmawt awh hoeh. A ban awh teh kalvantaminaw ni, ahni teh a hring telah a dei awh e kamnuenae hah a hmu awh.
Hatnavah kaimouh dawk kaawm e tami tangawn ni tangkom koe a cei awh teh napuinaw ni a dei e patetlah a hmu awh. Hatei a ma teh hmawt awh hoeh, telah a ti.
Jisuh ni, na pathu awh maw! profetnaw ni a dei e yuem hanelah na ru sak poung awh.
Messiah ni hete hnonaw hah a bawilennae thung a pha hoehnahlan a khang hane nahoehmaw telah a ti.
Hatnavah Jisuh ni Cakathoung dawkvah Mosi e cauk hoi profetnaw ni a thut e cauk totouh, amae kong a thut e naw pueng hah kacaicalah a dei.
A ceinae kho a pha tawmlei navah Jisuh ni hmalah pou cei hloi hane patetlah ao pouh.
Hote tami roi ni kaimouh hoi cungtalah rei luen leih, tangmin lah a pha toe kho hai meimei a hmo toe atipouh roi. Hatdawkvah ahnimouh koe cungtalah a luen.
Ahnimouh hoi cungtalah caboi a ven awh navah vaiyei a la teh lunghawilawk a dei hnukkhu vaiyei a raen teh a rei.
Ahnimouh roi ni a mit a ang roi teh Jisuh doeh tie a panue roi. Hatei ahnimouh roi e mithmu vah yout a kahma pouh.
Ahnimouh roi ni, lam vah lawk kâpankhai e hoi Cakathoung e a dungkawnae a dei navah ka lungthin thungvah hmai ka kang e patetlah a o, telah buet touh hoi buet touh a kâpankhai roi.
A hnukkâbang roi teh tang a thaw roi teh, Jerusalem lah let a ban roi. A hnukkâbangnaw hlaibun touh hoi alouknaw a kamkhueng awh e hah a hmu roi.
Bawipa teh a thaw katang doeh. Simon koe a kamnue pouh toe tie a kâdei awh.
Hahoi a hnukkâbang kahni touh ni lam vah hno kaawm e hoi Bawipa ni vaiyei a raen navah a panue roi e kong hah a dei pouh roi.
Hahoi hottelah buet touh hoi buet touh a kâdei awh navah, Jisuh ni ahnimae alungui vah a kangdue teh, nangmouh koe roumnae awm lawih seh, telah atipouh.
Hatei, ahnimouh teh lungpuen, hoi a taki awh teh kahrai doeh ka hmu telah a pouk awh.
Bawipa ni, bangkongmaw na lungpuen awh. Bangkongmaw na lungthung oupvoutnae na tawn awh.
Ka kut hoi ka khok khenhaw! Kama roeroe doeh. Na tek awh haw na panue awh han, kahrai teh a hru hoi a tak tawn hoeh, kai teh ka tawn tie hah na hmu awh, telah atipouh.
Hote lawk a dei e abaw hoi a kut hoi a khok a pâtue.
Hahoi a lunghawi awh lawi, a yuem thai awh hoeh rah dawkvah, nangmouh koe cakawi ao maw telah a pacei.
Hahoi ahnimouh ni tanga pâeng e a kawvang hoi a poe awh.
Jisuh ni a la teh ahnimae hmalah a ca pouh.
Bawipa ni, nangmouh hoi cungtalah ka o nah bout ka dei e teh, Mosi e kâlaw cauk, profetnaw hoi Sam lanaw dawkvah kaie ka kong a thut e pueng teh koung a kuep han atipouh.
Cakathoung a panue awh nahanelah ahnimae panuenae lungthin a paawng pouh hnukkhu,
ahnimouh koe a dei pouh e teh, Cakathoung dawk a thut e teh, Khrih teh a due vaiteh apâthum hnin duenae koehoi bout a thaw han.
Hahoi a mae min lahoi yon pankângainae hoi yon ngaithoumnae kong hah Jerusalem kho hoi a kamtawng vaiteh taminaw pueng koe dei lah ao han telah a dei.
Hete hnonaw pueng dawk nangmouh teh kapanuekkhaikung lah na o awh.
Hahoi a Pa ni lawk a kam e patetlah nangmouh koe na poe han. Hateiteh lathueng lahoi hnosakthainae khohna awh hoehroukrak Jerusalem kho vah ring awh, atipouh.
Hahoi Bethani kho lah ahnimouh a ceikhai teh a kut a dâw teh ahnimanaw yawhawi a poe.
Yawhawi a poe lahun navah ahnimouh hoi a kâkapek teh kalvan vah a luen.
Ahni a bawk awh teh lunghawi laihoi Jerusalem lah a ban awh teh,
bawkim dawk pout laipalah Cathut teh a pholen awh.
Apuengcue vah lawk teh ao, Lawk teh Cathut hoi rei ao, Lawk teh Cathut doeh.
Ahni teh apuengcue vah Cathut hoi rei ao.
Hnocawngca pueng ahni pawlawk dawk sak lah ao teh, ahni laipalah sak hoeh e banghai awm hoeh.
Ahni dawk hringnae ao, hahoi hote hringnae teh taminaw e angnae lah ao.
Hote angnae teh a hmonae koe a ang teh, hmonae ni ramuk thai hoeh.
Cathut ni Jawhan tie a tami hah a patoun.
Jawhan ni angnae kong hah a kampangkhai. Tami pueng ni hote akong a thai navah yuemnae a tawn thai awh nahane dei hanlah a tho.
Ahni teh angnae nahoeh, angnae kong kampangkhai hane doeh a tho.
Angnae katang teh heh talaivan a tho teh tami pueng angnae ka poe e lah ao.
Ahni teh het talaivan vah ao teh, hete talai hai a sak toe. Hatei, talai ni ahni teh panuek hoeh.
Ahni teh a taminaw koe a tho ei a taminaw ni a hnamthun takhai awh.
Capa ka yuem e taminaw pueng teh Cathut ca lah coungnae kâ a poe.
Cathut ca lah coungnae teh tami phunglam lahoi khe e lah tho hoeh. Thi moi hoi khe e na hoeh. Tami ni khe e hai nahoeh. Cathut ama ni khe e ca lah ao.
Lawk hah tami lah a coung teh, lungmanae hoi lawkkatang hoi akawi. Maimouh koe ao teh Cathut ni a Capa tawn dueng a poe e a bawilennae patetlah maimouh ni bawilennae hmu awh.
Jawhan ni ahnie kong hah a kampangkhai teh, kaie hnuk lah ka tho hane teh, ka o hoehnahlan kaawm toung niteh, kai hlak kalen e lah ao ka ti navah ahni doeh telah a hramkhai.
Ahnie kuepnae koehoi lungmanae van lungmanae teh coe awh.
Cathut ni kâlawk teh Mosi koehoi na poe awh, lungmanae hoi lawkkatang teh Jisuh Khrih koehoi doeh a tho.
Apinihai Cathut teh hmawt boihoeh eiteh, Cathut lungtabue dawk kaawm e a Capa buet touh dueng ni Cathut teh a kamnue sak.
Judahnaw ni vaihmanaw hoi Levihnaw hah Jerusalem lah Jawhan koe a patoun awh teh, nang hah apimaw telah a pacei sak awh.
Jawhan ni kai teh Messiah na hoeh telah kamcengcalah a dei pouh.
Ahnimouh nihai, pawiteh nang apimaw, Elijah maw telah a pacei awh. Jawhan ni, kai teh Elijah nahoeh telah atipouh. Hoeh pawiteh profet maw atipouh awh, nahoeh bo bout atipouh.
Ahnimouh ni, nang teh apimaw. Kaimouh kapatounnaw koe bout ka dei awh nahanlah namahoima bangtelamaw na kâdei telah a pacei awh.
Jawhan nihai, kai teh profet Isaiah ni a dei e patetlah Cathut e lamthung lan sak awh telah kahrawngum ka hramkhai e lawk doeh atipouh.
A patoun awh e naw teh Farasinaw doeh.
Ahnimouh ni, nang teh Messiah hai na hoeh, Elijah na hoeh, profet hai na hoehpawiteh, bangkongmaw tui baptisma na poe vaw atipouh awh.
Jawhan ni, Kai ni vah tui dawk baptisma na poe awh, hatei, nangmouh ni na panue hoe e, ka hnuklah ka tho hane ao.
Kai ni vah khokkhawmrui boehai rasu pouh han ka kamcu hoeh atipouh.
Hettelah lawk a kâ paceinae hmuen teh Jordan palang teng Bethani kho, Jawhan ni tui baptisma a poenae hmuen koe doeh.
Atangtho Jawhan ni Jisuh a tho e a hmu navah khen a haw Cathut e tuca talaivan e yon ka cetkhai e ho!
Ahni teh kai ka o hoehnahlan hoi kaawm tangcoung e ni teh kai hlak kalen ni teh kaie ka hnuklah a tho han ka tie hah doeh.
Ahmaloe vah ahni teh ka panuek hoeh. Hatei, Isarelnaw ni ama a panue thai awh na hanelah kai ni tui baptisma na poe awh e doeh atipouh.
Hahoi Jawhan ni, kalvan hoi Muitha teh Âbakhu patetlah a kum teh avan vah a cu e ka hmu telah a kampangkhai teh a dei.
Ahmaloe vah ahni ka panuek hoeh, hatei, teh tui baptisma na kapoesakkung ni, tami buet touh van vah Muitha a kum teh a cu e hah na hmu navah, ahni teh Kathoung Muitha hoi tui baptisma ka poe hane doeh tie na panue han ati e patetlah,
khei ka hmu teh ahni teh Cathut Capa doeh telah nangmouh koe ka kampangkhai telah Jawhan ni a dei.
Atangtho vah Jawhan hoi a hnukkâbang kahni touh ni Jisuh a tho e a hmu awh navah,
Jawhan ni a khet teh, Cathut e tuca hah khenhaw ati.
Avaica roi ni a thai navah Jisuh hnuk a kâbang roi.
Jisuh ni a kamlang teh a hnuklah a kâbang roi e a hmu navah, bangmaw na ngai roi telah a pacei. Ahnimouh roi ni, Rabbi, Bawipa nang teh namaw na o telah atipouh. Rabbi ti ngainae teh kacangkhaikung tinae doeh.
Jisuh ni tho nateh khenhaw! atipouh. Ahnimouh ni a cei awh teh a onae teh a hmu awh, atueng teh tangmin lahsa suimilam pali a pha toe. Kho hmo totouh ama koe ao awh.
Jawhan e lawk a thai hoi Jisuh hnukkâbang roi e thung dawk buet touh teh Simon Piter e a nawngha Andru doeh.
Andru ni apasuekpoung lah Simon koe a cei teh, Messiah teh ka hmu awh toe atipouh. Messiah tie teh Khrih tinae doeh.
Andru ni Simon hah Jisuh koe a ceikhai. Jisuh ni nang teh Jawhan capa Simon doeh. Cephas tie min katha phung lah na o han atipouh. Cephas tinae teh Piter tie hoi kâvan e talung ti ngainae doeh.
Atangtho vah Jisuh teh Galilee lah cei han a kâcai. Filip hah a hmu nah ka hnukkâbang atipouh.
Filip teh Andru hoi Piter a onae Bethsaida kho hoi ka tho e tami doeh.
Filip ni Nathanael a hmu nah, phunglawk cauk dawk e Mosi ni a thut e, profetnaw ni akong a thut e Nazareth tami Joseph capa Jisuh hah ka hmu toe atipouh.
Nathanael ni, Nazareth kho hoi hnokahawi a tâco boimaw atipouh navah Filip ni vah tho nateh khenhaw! atipouh.
Jisuh ni Nathanael ama koe a tho e hah a hmu teh, Isarel tami katang hi ao e hah khen awh, dumyennae lungthin khoeroe tawn hoeh, atipouh.
Nathanael ni hai Bawipa nang ni bangtelamaw kai heh na panue atipouh. Jisuh ni Filip ni na kaw hoehnahlan vah thaibunglung rahim na o nah na hmu toe atipouh.
Nathanael ni, Bawipa nang teh Cathut Capa doeh Isarelnaw e Siangpahrang doeh, atipouh.
Jisuh ni thaibunglung rahim na o e ka hmu ka ti dawk maw na tang. Hot hlak kalen e hno hah bout na hmu han atipouh.
Atangcalah na dei pouh awh, kalvan kamawng vaiteh tami Capa e a van vah Cathut e kalvantaminaw ka kum ka luen e na hmu a han atipouh.
Apâthum hnin Galilee ram Kanâ khovah yuvâ kâ paluennae pawi koe Jisuh e manu hai ao van.
Jisuh hoi a hnukkâbangnaw hai hote pawi koe a coun awh.
Misurtui abaw navah Jisuh koe a manu ni Misurtui abaw toe atipouh.
Jisuh ni, napui nang, bangmaw duem na o hoeh, ka tueng kuep hoe rah, atipouh.
A manu ni, ahni ni a dei e patetlah sak awh, atipouh.
Judah phung lah kut kamsin nahanelah maroi taruk touh ouk a hruek awh.
Jisuh ni maroi dawk tui koung pakawi awh, telah thaw katawknaw a patoun teh seisei ka poum lah a hlun awh.
Duek nateh pawi thungvah rei haw atipouh e patetlah a rei awh.
Pawi thung kaawm naw ni hote misurtui teh nâ e maw tie panuek awh hoeh ei, haw e thaw katawknaw ni teh a panue awh. Hatnavah yupaluenkung hah a oup awh.
Ayânaw teh misur yamu ahruem hah apasuek poung lah a pânei awh, hahoi teh a radu a pânei awh, nang teh atu sittouh ahruem na tawn rah atipouh awh.
Hottelah Jisuh ni apasuekpoung e kângairunae Galilee ram Kanâ khovah a sak teh, amae bawilennae a kamnue sak. A hnukkâbangnaw ni hai hoe a tang awh.
Hahoi, Jisuh teh a manu, a nawnghanaw hoi a hnukkâbangnaw hoi Kapernuam lah a cei awh teh hawvah hnin dongdeng a cam awh.
Judahnaw e ceitakhai pawi a hnai toung dawkvah Jisuh teh Jerusalem lah a cei.
Bawkim dawk maito, tu hoi bakhu ka yawt e naw hoi pawi koe tangka ka thung e naw a hmu navah,
hem nahan bongpai a la teh haw e taminaw, tu hoi maitonaw hai bawkim thung hoi a pâlei teh hnopai yonae caboinaw hai koung a tanawt pouh.
Bakhu kayawtnaw han hai na hnonaw lat awh. A Pa e im hah hnopai yonae lah sak a hanh awh.
Cakathoung ni a dei e patetlah, Aw, Bawipa na im ka lungpatawnae ni ka lung a tangpo sak tie hah a hnukkâbangnaw ni hlot a pouk awh.
Judahnaw ni nang ni hettelah hno na sak pawiteh, bang patet e mitnout hno maw kaimouh na patue han, atipouh awh.
Jisuh ni, hete bawkim heh, raphoe awh haw hnin thum touh hoi ka sak han telah atipouh.
Judahnaw ni a kum 46 touh thung hete bawkim ka sak awh e nang ni teh hnin thum touh hoi ka cum han na ti, atipouh awh.
Hottelah a dei ngainae teh, amae a tak bawkim a dei ngainae doeh.
Duenae koehoi bout a thaw hnukkhu vah, a hnukkâbangnaw ni hote lawk hah hlot a pouk awh teh, Cakathoung hoi Jisuh lawk teh a yuem awh.
