Ahnimae thung vah kai ka o teh kaie ka thung vah nang na o. Ahnimouh teh buet touh lah ao teh a kuep thai awh nahan nang ni kai na patoun teh lung na pataw e patetlah ahnimouh hai lung na pataw tie talaivan ni a panue han.
Oe a Pa talaivan ao hoehnahlan hoi kai lung na pataw teh kai na poe e kaie bawilennae hah kai koe na poe e taminaw ni a hmu awh nahanelah, ahnimanaw hah kai ka onae koe kai hoi rei o sak hanelah ka ngai.
Kalan e a Pa talaivan ni nang na panuek hoeh ei, kai ni teh nang na panue. Nang ni kai na patoun tie ahnimouh ni a panue awh toe.
Kai na lungpatawnae ahnimae thung vah ao teh, kai hai ahnimae thung ka o nahan, Bawipa nange min teh ahnimouh ka panue sak toe, pou ka panue sak han rah telah atipouh.
Jisuh ni hettelah a ratoum hnukkhu hoi, a hnukkâbangnaw hoi Kidron palang a raka awh teh, haw e takha thung vah a kâen awh.
Hote hmuen koe Jisuh hoi a hnukkâbangnaw ouk a ceinae hah Bawipa kapahnawtkung Judah Isakarot ni a panue.
Hawvah Judah ni ransahu buet touh hoi Farasinaw hoi vaihma bawinaw ni a patoun e karingkungnaw a kaw teh hmaiim hmaito, sarusarai hoi a thokhai.
Jisuh ni ama koe ka tho hane kawi teh be a panue dawkvah ahnimouh koe a cei teh apimaw na tawng awh telah a pacei.
Ahnimouh ni Nazareth tami Jisuh atipouh awh. Jisuh ni, kai teh ahni doeh atipouh. Bawipa kapahnawtkung Judah Isakarot hai ahnimouh hoi cungtalah a kangdue.
Kai teh ahni doeh ati navah ahnimouh teh hnuklah talai dawk koung a rawp awh.
Apimaw na tawng awh telah bout a pacei teh, Nazareth tami Jisuh ka tawng awh telah ati awh.
Jisuh ni kai doeh toe ka ti toung nahoehmaw, hatdawkvah kai hah na tawng awh pawiteh, ahnimanaw teh cet awh lawi naseh bout atipouh.
Hettelah a deinae teh, Bawipa nang ni na poe e taminaw buet touh hai kahmat sak mahoeh, ati e lawk a kuep nahane doeh.
Hatnavah Simon Piter ni a sin e tahloi a rasa teh vaihma kacue e avaica e aranglae hnâ pak a tâsek pouh. Ahnie min teh Makhas doeh.
Jisuh ni tahloi hah amae tabu dawk pâseng leih. Pa ni na poe e manang ka net mahoeh maw. telah, Piter hanlah atipouh.
Hahoi ransa bawi, ransanaw hoi Judahnaw e karingkungnaw ni Jisuh teh a man awh teh a katek awh.
Annas koe hmaloe a ceikhai awh. Annas teh hatnae kum dawk vaihma kacue Kaiaphas e a masei lah ao.
Kaiaphas teh Judahnaw koe, tami moikapap yueng tami buet touh a due e hoe ahawi, telah pouknae kapoekung doeh.
Simon Piter hoi alouke a hnukkâbang buet touh teh Jisuh hnuk a kâbang roi. Hote a hnukkâbang e teh vaihma kacue hoi a kâpanue dawk Jisuh hoi cungtalah vaihma kacue e toeim thung totouh a kâen thai.
Hatnavah Piter teh takhang e alawilah a kangdue. Hatdawkvah vaihma kacue hoi kâpanuek e tami ni takhang ka ring e napui koe a dei pouh teh Piter hah a thung lah a kâen sak.
Takhang ka ring e napui ni Piter han, nang hai hote tami e a hnukkâbang e nahoehmaw atipouh nah, Piter ni, na hoeh bo atipouh teh a kâpapha.
Hatnae tueng nah hroung a pâding dawkvah sannaw hoi karingkungnaw ni hmai a patawi awh teh hmai a kamben awh. Piter hai ahnimouh hoi cungtalah hmai a kamben van.
Hatnavah vaihma kacue ni Jisuh hnukkâbangnaw kong hoi a cangkhainae a konglamnaw a kung a khei.
Jisuh ni, kai ni talaivan taminaw koe kamcengcalah ka dei toe, Judahnaw a kamkhuengnae sinakoknaw hoi bawkim dawkvah pou ka cangkhai. A ru lahoi banghai ka sak hoeh.
Bangkongmaw kai na pacei awh vaw. Kai ni bangtelamaw ka cangkhai tie hah, ka thai e naw koe pacei a khe. Kai ni ka cangkhai e hai ahnimouh ni a panue atipouh.
Hottelah a dei navah, ateng ka kangdout e karingkung buet touh ni Jisuh a tambei teh, nang ni vaihma kacue hah telah na dei kawi maw, atipouh.
Jisuh ni hai kaie ka lawk ka payonnae awm pawiteh na payon tie kampangkhai haw, ka payon hoehpawiteh bangdawkmaw na tambei, atipouh.
Annas ni Bawipa teh kateknae ratham pouh laipalah vaihma kacue Kaiaphas koe a thak awh.
Simon Piter teh kangdue laihoi hmai a kamben na koevah tami bangpatetnaw ni vah, nang hai ahnie a hnukkâbang van e nahoehmaw telah atipouh navah, kai na hoeh bo atipouh teh a kâpapha.
Piter ni a hnâ pak a tâsek pouh e a hui vaihma kacue e avaica ni, nang heh takha thung Jisuh hoi rei na o e na hmu atipouh.
Piter ni bout a kâpapha, hat nah tahma vah ahlui teh a khawng.
Amom vah Jisuh teh Kaiaphas im hoi a ceikhai awh teh lawkcengnae im lah a hrawi awh. Ahnimouh ni ceitakhai pawi e bu a ca thai nahan amamae a bawknae phunglam patetlah thoungnae a ngai dawkvah ukkung bawi e imthung lah kâen awh hoeh.
Hatdawkvah, Pailat bawi ni ahnimouh aonae koe a tâco teh, hat e tami ni bangmaw a yonnae a tawn teh na thokhai awh atipouh.
Ahnimouh ni, hete tami heh yon hoehpawiteh nang koe ka thokhai awh mahoeh mue telah bout atipouh awh.
Pailat ni vah, Bawipa teh, namamae phung lawk patetlah lawkceng awh atipouh. Ahnimouh ni, kaimanaw ni apihai thei thainae kâ ka tawn awh hoeh atipouh awh.
Jisuh ni amahoima bangtelamaw a due han tie a dei e kuep nahanelah doeh hettelah ao.
Pailat teh imthungkhu bout a kâen teh Jisuh, nang heh Judah siangpahrang katang maw atipouh.
Jisuh ni, hete lawk heh na mahmawk maw na pacei. hoehpawiteh ayâ ni maw nang koe a dei, ati teh a pacei.
Pailat bawi ni, kai hah Judah tami lah maw na pouk. Kai kut dawk nang na kapoekung teh nama e miphun Judahnaw hoi vaihma bawinaw nahoehmaw, na sakpayon e hno ao maw. atipouh.
Jisuh ni, kaie uknaeram teh het talaivan hoi kâkuen hoeh. Kaie uknaeram teh talaivan hoi kâkuen pawiteh kai teh Judahnaw e kut dawk ka pha hoeh na han, ka taminaw ni a tuk awh han toe. Hatei, kaie ram teh het talai hoi kâkuen hoeh, atipouh
Pailat bawi nihai, pawiteh, nang heh siangpahrang maw telah a pacei. Jisuh ni, nang ni na pacei e patetlah kai teh siangpahrang doeh. Kai teh lawkkatang kampangkhai hanlah ka khe e doeh. Hot hanelah doeh het talaivan ka tho toe. Lawkkatang hoi kâkuen e pueng ni ka lawk a ngâi awh atipouh.
Pailat nihai, lawkkatang teh bangmaw titeh a pacei hnukkhu Judahnaw aonae koe a tâco teh, hete tami dawk a yonnae khoeroe kahmawt hoeh.
Ceitakhai pawi nah namamae phung patetlah tami buetbuet touh ouk hlout sak. Nangmouh ni Judah siangpahrang hlout sak hanelah na ngai a maw telah a pacei.
Ahnimouh ni bout a hram awh teh, ahni heh thei han, Barabas heh tha awh telah hram laihoi ati awh. Barabas teh dingca doeh.
Hathnukkhu Pailat ni Jisuh hah a la teh a hem sak.
Ransanaw ni pâkhinglukhung a sak awh teh a lû dawk a kâmuk sak awh teh hni paling a khu awh.
Judah siangpahrang na hringyung vang na seh ati awh teh a tambei awh.
Pailat nihai, Hete tami dawk a yonnae khoeroe kahmawt hoeh tie na panue awh nahoehmaw, atu nangmouh na onae koe ka thokhai, telah ahnimouh koe atipouh.
Hahoi Jisuh teh pâkhinglukhung a kâmuk sak awh teh hni paling kâkhu hoi alawilah a tâco. Pailat ni hai ahni teh khen awh atipouh awh.
Vaihma bawinaw hoi karingkungnaw ni a hmu awh teh, thingpalam dawk thet, thingpalam dawk thet atipouh awh. Pailat ni, ‘nangmouh ni hrawi a nateh thingpalam dawk thet awh. Kai ni teh a yonnae ka hmawt hoeh, atipouh.
Judahnaw ni, ahni ni Cathut e a Capa telah a kâti dawkvah kaimae phung lawk dawk a dei e patetlah a due hanlah o telah atipouh awh.
Hettelah a dei awh e Pailat ni a thai navah hoe a taki.
Imthung khu lah bout a kâen teh Jisuh koe, nang heh nâ lahoi maw na tho atipouh. Hatei, Jisuh ni a lawk kam touh boehai pathung hoeh.
Pailat ni, kai na pato ngai hoeh maw. Kai ni nang thingpalam dawk thei hane hoi thei hoeh nahane kâ ka tawn e na panuek hoeh na maw atipouh.
Jisuh ni, lathueng lae kâ na poe hoehpawiteh nang ni kai dawk banghai na sak thai mahoeh. Hatdawkvah kai heh nang koe na ka poe e tami koe a yonnae hoe a len atipouh.
Hahoi teh Pailat ni Bawipa a hlout thai na hane kho a pouk. Hatei, Judahnaw ni hat e tami na tha pawiteh, nang teh Sizar siangpahrang e a hui na hoeh. Apihai amahoima siangpahrang lah ka kâ sak e teh Sizar siangpahrang e taran lah a o, atipouh awh.
Hete lawk a thai navah Pailat bawi ni Jisuh teh alawilah a hrawi teh Hebru lahoi, Gabbatha ati e lawkcengnae tungkhung, lungphen phai tie tungkhung van a tahung.
Hat hnin teh ceitakhai pawi apâthum hnin kanîthun suimilam hlaikahni touh han navah, Pailat bawi ni, nangmae siangpahrang hah khenhaw telah Judahnaw koe atipouh.
Ahnimouh ni a hram awh teh, ahni teh thet, thet thingpalam dawkvah thet atipouh awh. Pailat ni nangmae siangpahrang teh thingpalam dawk thei han maw, telah a pacei. Vaihma bawinaw ni kaimae Sizar siangpahrang hloilah api siangpahrang awmhoeh, atipouh awh.
Hatnavah Pailat bawi ni Bawipa Jisuh teh thingpalam dawk thei hanelah ahnimae kut dawk a poe teh ahnimouh ni Bawipa teh a ceikhai awh.
Bawipa teh amae thingpalam a hrawm laihoi a cei teh luhru hmuen tie koe a pha. Hote a hmuen teh Hebru lahoi, Golgotha ati awh.
Hote hmuen koe Bawipa teh alouke tami kahni touh hoi cungtalah thingpalam dawk a het awh. Ahnimouh roi e a rahak vah Jisuh a pathout awh.
Pailat bawi ni noutnae min a thut teh thingpalam dawk a bet, NAZARETH TAMI JISUH, JUDAH SIANGPAHRANG telah a thut.
Jisuh thingpalam dawk pathoutnae hmuen teh khothung hoi a hnai dawkvah, Hebru, Latin, Rom lawk lahoi a thut e ca hah Judahnaw moikapap ni a touk awh.
Hatdawkvah Judah vaihma bawinaw ni Pailat koe a cei awh teh, Judah siangpahrang telah thut hanh. Kai teh Judah siangpahrang a kâ tie hah thut loe atipouh awh.
Pailat bawi ni hai kai ni kathut tangcoung e teh thut lah o toe, atipouh.
Ransanaw ni Jisuh teh thingpalam dawk a pathout awh teh a khohna hah pali touh lah a phi awh teh buetbuet touh hoi a kârei awh. Athung e angkidung teh pou kamtawm lah kawng e angkidung lah ao dawkvah,
Angki phi laipalah apinimaw a coe han ati awh teh cungpam khoe e a rayu awh telah Cakathoung ni ati e hah a kuep na han ransanaw ni a sak awh.
Jisuh e thingpalam teng vah a manu hoi a manu e a nawngha Klopas e a yu Meri hoi Madalin Meri tinaw a kangdue awh.
Jisuh ni a manu hoi a lungpataw e a hnukkâbangnaw ateng a kangdue e a hmu navah, a manu hanlah nange napui na capa hah khenhaw! atipouh.
A hnukkâbangnaw koe, hei! na manu teh kahawicalah khenyawn awh atipouh. Hahoi teh a hnukkâbangnaw ni a manu teh im lah a ceikhai awh.
Hahoi Jisuh ni, bangpuengpa a kuep toe tie a panue dawkvah Cakathoung dawk a dei e a kuep nahanelah, tui kahran telah a ti.
Hote hmuen koe misurtui ka thut hoi yikkawi e hlaam buet touh ao. Ahnimouh ni napon hoi hote atui hah a nep awh teh cakui dawk hoiyah Jisuh e a pahni koe a panep pouh awh.
Jisuh ni hote tui a nei teh, ka cum toe a titeh a lûsaling teh a hringnae a thouk.
Judahnaw ni hote hnin teh kârakuengnae hnin lah ao. A tangtho teh sabbath hnin lah ao dawkvah thingpalam dawk ro ao hoeh nahan, Pailat bawi koe a cei awh teh a khok khoe vaiteh ronaw la hanelah a hei awh.
Hatnavah ransanaw ni a cei awh teh Jisuh hoi cungtalah thingpalam dawk a vo awh e a khoknaw hah a khoe pouh.
Jisuh koe a pha awh navah yo a due toe tie a hmu teh a khok khoe pouh hoeh toe.
Ransa buet touh ni a na dawk tahroe hoi a cawk navah thi hoi tui a tâco.
Hote hno kahmawtnaw ni kampangkhainae teh a yuem awh. Ahni ni a dei e teh atang katang doeh ati awh. Nangmouh ni na yuem awh nahanelah ahni e a dei e lawkkatang teh ahni ni a panue.
Cakathoung ni, ahni e a hru teh khoe mahoeh tie a kuep nahane doeh.
Cakathoung ni bout a dei e teh, amamouh ni a cawk awh e hah a hmu a han bout a ti.
Hahoi, Arimathea tami Joseph, Jisuh hnukkâbang van e Judahnaw a taki dawk a ru lah kaawm e ni Pailat bawi koe a cei teh Jisuh e ro la hanelah a hei. Pailat bawi ni kâ a poe teh ahni ni Jisuh e a ro teh a la.
Yampa karum Jisuh koe ka tho e Nikodemus ni Joseph hoi a cei roi teh murah hoi ka lawt tangcoung e hmuitui a sin roi.
Ahnimouh roi ni Jisuh e a ro a kâkayawt roi teh Judahnaw e ro kuem e patetlah hmuituinaw hoi, hnica hoi a ro teh a kayo roi.
Thingpalam dawk a theinae teng vah takha ao. Hote hmuen koe apihai pakawp hoeh rae tangkom katha teh ao.
Atangtho teh Judahnaw Sabbath ya na hnin lah ao dawkvah a hnainae koe kaawm e hote tangkom dawk Jisuh teh a pakawp awh.
A yat e apasuek hnin amom khodai hoehnahlan vah, Meri Magdalin teh phuen koe a cei teh phuen tengnae talung a kamawng e hah a hmu.
Ahni ni Simon Piter hoi Jisuh ni a lungpataw e a hnukkâbang alouknaw koe a yawng teh, tangkom thung e Bawipa teh a la awh toe, na vaimoe a ta vaiyoe, ka panuek hoeh, ati pouh.
Hatnavah, Piter hoi alouke a hnukkâbang e teh phuen koe lah a cei roi.
Ahnimouh roi teh a yawng roi eiteh, alouke a hnukkâbang e ni Piter hah a yawngtahrei teh phuen koe hmaloe a pha.
Ahni ni a khet navah, kayonae hni dueng a hmu teh athung kâen hoeh.
Simon Piter hai a pha van toteh tangkom thung a kâen teh ro kayonae a hmu.
A lû dawk yeng e hnica hai hni hoi rei awm laipalah ao e hah a hmu.
Hathnukkhu phuen koe hmaloe ka phat e a hnukkâbang e hai a thung a kâen teh a yuem van.
Cakathoung ni, Bawipa ni duenae koehoi bout a thaw han tie hah thai panuek awh hoeh rah.
Hahoi, a hnukkâbang roi teh im lah a ban roi.
Meri ni tangkom teng a kangdue teh a kâ. Ahni ni a kâ laihoi a tabut teh tangkom thung a khet navah,
Hni pangaw kâkhu e kalvantami kahni touh teh Jisuh ro payannae a lû koe lah buet touh, a khok koe lah buet touh a tahung e hah a hmu.
Ahnimouh roi ni, napui nang, bangkongmaw na ka telah a pacei. Ahni ni ka Bawipa teh yo a la awh toe, na maw a ta awh tie ka panuek hoeh, atipouh.
Hottelah a dei hoi, a hnuklah a kamlang teh, Jisuh a kangdue e a hmu ei teh Jisuh lah nout hoeh.
Jisuh nihai, napui nang bangkongmaw na ka, apimaw na tawng, atipouh. Nang ni ahni hah na lat pawiteh na maw na hruek tie dei haw, ka la han telah takha ka ring e mue telah a pouk.
Jisuh ni, Meri telah a kaw nah Meri ni a kamlang teh, rabboni (rabboni tie teh ka Bawipa ati ngainae) atipouh.
Jisuh ni hai na tapam han ei, kai teh Pa koe ka luen hoeh rah. Ka hmaunawnghanaw koe cet nateh, kaie a Pa lah kaawm e nangmae na Pa, kaie Cathut lah kaawm e nangmae Cathut koe ka luen hane hah dei pouh awh, atipouh.
Magdalin kho e napui Meri ni a cei teh, Bawipa ka hmu toe telah a hnukkâbangnaw koe a dei pouh teh, ahni koe lawk a thui e naw hah a dei pouh.
Yat touh thung dawk apasueke hnin tangmin lah a hnukkâbangnaw teh Judahnaw a taki awh dawkvah takhang khik a khan awh. Hawvah Jisuh a tho teh, ahnimouh lungui vah a kangdue teh nangmouh koe roumnae awmseh, atipouh.
Hottelah a dei hnukkhu, a kut hoi ana hah ahnimouh a patue. A hnukkâbangnaw ni Bawipa a hmu awh navah a lunghawi awh.
Jisuh ni, nangmouh koe roumnae awmseh, Pa ni kai na patoun e patetlah nangmouh hai kai ni na patoun awh, bout atipouh.
Telah a dei hoi, ahnimouh koe pho a hmu teh, Kathoung Muitha coe awh.
Ayâ e yonnae na ngaithoum pawiteh ahni teh yon ngaithoum lah ao han. Ahnimae a yonnae na ngaithoum awh hoehpawiteh ngai thoum lah awm mahoeh, atipouh.
Jisuh a tho navah a hnukkâbang hlaikahni thung dawk e buet touh, ca samphei tie Thomas teh awmhoeh.
A hnukkâbangnaw ni, kaimouh Bawipa ka hmu awh, atipouh. Hatnavah, Thomas ni a kut dawk e sum hetnae a hmâ ka hmawt hoeh, ka tek hoehpawiteh, a thutnae a na koe e a hmâ ka tek hoehpawiteh nâtuek hai ka yuem mahoeh atipouh.
Yat touh o hnukkhu hoi apasueke hnin nah a hnukkâbangnaw hoi Thomas hai ao van. Takhang hai khik a ka khan awh, hatnavah Jisuh a tho teh ahnimanaw e alungui a kangdue, nangmouh koe lungmawngnae awmseh, atipouh.
Hahoi Thomas hanlah, na kut kâyap nateh tek haw, kaie ka kut hah khen haw, na kut dâw nateh kanâ hah tek haw, yuem laipalah awm hanh, yuem haw atipouh.
Thomas nihai, ka Bawipa hoi ka Cathut, atipouh.
Jisuh nihai, Thomas, nang ni kai na hmu dawk doeh na yuem, hmawt laipalah kayuemnaw ni yawhawinae a hmu, atipouh.
Hete Cakathoung dawk a thut hoeh e, Jisuh ni a hnukkâbangnaw e hmaitung vah kângairunae moi a sak.
Hatei, Jisuh teh Messiah, Cathut Capa doeh tie na yuem awh thai nahan, na yuemnae lahoi a min dawk hringnae tawn thai nahan hetnaw heh ka thut.
Hahoi vah Jisuh teh Tiberia talî pui teng vah a hnukkâbangnaw koe amahoima bout a kamnue. A kamnuenae teh hettelah doeh.
Simon Piter casamphei tie Thomas, Kanâ tami Nathanael, Zebedee e capa roi hoi alouke a hnukkâbang kahni touh teh cungtalah ao awh.
Simon Piter ni ahnimouh koe tanga heng hanlah ka cei han, atipouh. Ahnimouh nihai, ka kâbang awh van han ati awh teh a cei awh. Long dawk a cei awh teh karum tuettuet a heng awh ei buet touh boehai man awh hoeh.
Amom a pha navah Jisuh teh tui teng vah a kangdue. Hatei, a hnukkâbangnaw ni Jisuh hah nout awh hoeh.
Hahoi Jisuh ni ka canaw cakawi ao maw atipouh. Ahnimouh ni awm hoeh atipouh awh.
Hahoi Jisuh ni, lawng e aranglah tamlawk heng haw, na heng pawiteh na man awh han, atipouh. Hottelah a heng awh navah, tanga moi a kâman dawk tamlawk sawn thai awh hoeh.
Hatnavah Jisuh ni a lungpataw e a hnukkâbang e ni Piter koe, Bawipa doeh, atipouh. Bawipa doeh tie Piter ni a thai navah hni kâkhu laipalah angkidung a kho teh tui dawk a kum.
Alouke a hnukkâbangnaw teh tanga hoi tamlawk hah tuiteng lah a sawn awh teh lawng hoi a tho awh. Tuirai koehoi ek hlat hoeh lam 50 touh bang doeh ahla.
A kongteng lah a pha awh navah, hmaisaan dawk tanga pâeng tangcoung e hoi vaiyei hai a hmu awh.
Hahoi Jisuh ni, tanga na man awh e youn touh hi sin awh, atipouh.
Simon Piter ni lawng dawk a luen teh tam lawk hah a kongteng lah a sawn navah, tanga kalen 153 touh a kâman. Telah tanga moi apap eiteh tamlawk ti ca hai vek hoeh.
Jisuh ni ahnimouh hanlah, tho awh amom bu cat awh, atipouh. A hnukkâbangnaw ni Jisuh tie a panue awh dawkvah, apinihai nang apimaw, telah pacei ngam awh hoeh.
Jisuh a tho teh, vaiyei hoi tanga a la teh ahnimouh a poe.
Hetteh Jisuh ni duenae koehoi bout a thaw hnukkhu a hnukkâbangnaw koe apâthum nah a kamnuenae doeh.
Amom bu a ca awh hoi, Jisuh ni Simon Piter koe, Jawhan capa Simon, ahnimanaw hlak kai lungpataw ou, telah a pacei. Oe, Bawipa, kai ni lung na pataw e, nama ni na panue doeh atipouh. Jisuh ni, ka tucanaw kahawicalah paca atipouh.
Jisuh ni, Jawhan capa Simon, kai na lungpataw ou, telah apâhni bout a pacei teh, Oe, Bawipa, kai ni lung na pataw e na panue atipouh. Jisuh ni ka tunaw kahawicalah khoum atipouh.
Jisuh ni Jawhan capa Simon, kai na lungpataw ou, telah apâthum lah bout a pacei dawkvah Piter teh a lungmathoe teh, Bawipa nang ni bangpueng koung na panue, kai ni na lungpataw e hai na panue, atipouh. Ka tunaw hah paca atipouh.
Atangcalah ka dei, na thoundoun nah namahoima taisawm na kâyeng teh na ngainae koe na cei. Nang ni na matawng torei teh na kut roi na dâw vaiteh, ayâ ni na pakhit vaiteh, na ngaihoeh e hmuen koe na hrawi awh han, atipouh.
Hottelah a deinae teh, Piter ni bangtelae duenae lahoi maw a due vaiteh, Cathut bawilennae a kamnue sak han tie hah sut a panue saknae doeh. Hottelah a dei hnukkhu, ka hnuk kâbang, telah Piter hanlah bout atipouh.
Tangmin bu a ven awh navah, Jisuh ni a lungpataw e ni a lungtabue dawk a kamngawi teh, Bawipa apini maw nang na pahnawt han telah ka pacei e a hnukkâbang e hai hnuklah a kâbang e hah Piter ni a hmu.
Piter ni Bawipa ahni teh bangtelamaw ao han telah a pacei.
Jisuh ni, kai ka tho hnin totouh ahni o sak hanlah ka ngainae awm pawiteh, nang ni bangmaw na ti thai. Nang teh ka hnukkâbang loe, atipouh.
Hottelah a dei e hah hmaunawnghanaw koe hote a hnukkâbang dout mahoeh telah a kamthang. Jisuh ni ahni teh dout mahoeh ati e na hoeh. Kai ka tho hnin ditouh ahni o sak hane ka ngai pawiteh nang ni bangmaw na ti thai, ati e doeh.
Hete kongnaw kathutkung teh, a hnukkâbang e tami doeh. Ahni e kampangkhainae hai a tang doeh.
Jisuh ni a sak e hno alouknaw moi ao rah. Hotnaw pueng koung thun pawiteh talaivan ni hai cawng mahoeh, telah ka pouk.
Theophilus, ka lungpataw e, Jisuh ni a thaw tawknae hoi a cangkhai e naw pueng a kamtawngnae koehoi a rawi e gunceinaw Kathoung Muitha lahoi kâpoelawknaw a poe hnukkhu,
Lathueng lah tawm lah ao hnin totouh e akong pueng hah ka thut.
A due hnukkhu hoi ama teh kahring e lah ka o tie hah hote gunceinaw koe avai moikapap a kamnue pouh teh, hnin 40 touh thung ahnimouh koe a kamnue pouh. Cathut uknaeram kong hah a pâpho.
Hathnukkhu hoi cungtalah a kamkhueng awh navah Jisuh ni, Jerusalem kho dawk hoi tâcawt laipalah apa koe e lawkkam ring awh.
Lawkkam poe e teh, Jawhan ni tui dawk Baptisma na poe awh, hatei nâsittouh o hoehnahlan Kathoung Muitha dawk Baptisma na hmu awh han telah atipouh.
Jisuh hoi cungtalah kamkhueng awhnae koe vah gunceinaw ni, Bawipa a tu maw Isarel miphunnaw hah, uknaeram bout na poe han toung telah a pacei awh.
Jisuh ni Pa e kâtawnnae hninthanaw hoi a tuengnaw hah nangmouh ni panue han ngai hoeh.
Hateiteh, nangmae lathueng vah Kathoung Muitha a tho toteh nangmouh teh bahu hoi na kawi awh vaiteh Jerusalem hoi na kamtawng awh vaiteh Judah ram, Samaria ram, talai a pout ditouh kai kapanuekkhaikung lah na o a han atipouh.
Hote lawk a dei hnukkhu hoi ahnimae a mithmu vah Bawipa teh kahlun tawm lah a o, tâmai ni a kayo teh ahnimouh ni hmawt awh hoeh toe.
Hottelah, gunceinaw ni Bawipa kalvan a luen e a khet awh lahun nah ahnimae a teng hnipangaw kâkhu e tami kahni touh a kangdue.
Ahnimouh roi ni, Galilee taminaw kalvan lah na khet awh teh bangkongmaw sut na kangdue awh vaw. Nangmouh koehoi kalvan lah tawm e Jisuh hah kalvan lah a luen e na hmu awh e patetlah let bout a kum e na hmu awh han, atipouh.
Hathnukkhu hoi ahnimouh teh Olive Mon hoi Jerusalem lah a ban awh. Hote mon teh Jerusalem hoi sabbath hnin hnin touh lamcei ahla.
Ahnimouh teh khothung a kâen awh teh a luennae imvan a luen awh. Ahnimanaw teh; Piter, Jawhan, Jem, Andru, Filip, Thomas, Bartholomew, Mathai, Alfe capa Jem, miphun kampangkhai Simon hoi Jem capa Judah tinaw doeh.
Ahnimouh ni, Jisuh e a manu Meri, napuinaw hoi a nawnghanaw hoi cungtalah lungkânging lahoi thouk a ratoum awh.
Hatnavah tami 120 touh e hmaunawnghanaw teh cungtalah a kamkhueng awh navah, Piter ni a kangdue teh,
Hmaunawnghanaw Jisuh man hanelah lam kapâtuekung Judah Isakarot e kong hoi Kathoung Muitha ni Devit koe sut a dei e lawk Cakathoung dawk a thut e patetlah kuep laipalah awm mahoeh.
Judah teh maimouh hoi cungtalah rawi e lah ao teh hete thaw dawk na kambawngkhai van.
Ahni teh kathounghoehe kutphu hoi lawhmuen buet touh a ran ei hawvah bungling lah a boteh a von a tangpo dawk a ruennaw hai koung a tâco.
Hete hah Jerusalem kaawm e naw pueng ni a panue awh teh hote talai hah Akeldama telah a phung awh. A deingainae teh thi talai tinae doeh.
Sam cauk dawkvah aonae hmuen teh tami kingdi lah awm naseh, im thung pihai awm hanh naseh. Ahnie thaw a ya ni lawm naseh telah a kâthut.
Jawhan ni Baptisma a poenae koehoi, kamtawng teh, Bawipa Jisuh maimouh hoi kamphei teh kahlun lah tawm e hnin totouh a hnukkâbangnaw hoi rei ceionae pueng dawk, maimouh koe kambawng e tami buet buet touh ni Bawipa thawnae kong a pâpho teh kaimouh hoi cungtalah kapanuekkhaikung lah ao han telah Piter ni a pâpho.
Hatnavah Barsabbas telah a kaw awh teh Justus telah a awitawm awh e Joseph hoi Matthias a rawi awh.
Hahoi a ratoum awh teh, Bawipa nang ni tami lungthin koung na panue.
Taminaw pueng e lungthin ka panuek e Cathut, Judah teh ama onae hmuen koe cei hanelah kacangkhaikung thaw, guncei thaw dawk hoi a kâtakhoe teh ahnie yueng lah bout ka tawk hane tami kahni touh thung dawkvah na rawi tangcoung e tami na patue haw telah a ratoum awh.
Hahoi ahnimouh roi hanlah cungpam a rayu sak awh teh Matthias ni a hmu dawkvah ahni teh guncei hlaibun touh hoi mek touksin lah ao toe.
Pentikos hnin a pha toteh ahnimanaw teh hmuen buet touh koe king a kamkhueng awh.
Hatnavah kahlî katangpounge pawlawk patetlah kalvan lahoi yah hmatara a tho teh ahnimouh onae im dawk muen akawi pouh.
Hahoi teh, hmai patetlah e lainaw kampek e a kamnue teh ahnimouh rip koe ao.
Hahoi teh ahnimouh abuemlah ni Kathoung Muitha hoi akawi awh teh, Muitha ni dei thainae kâ a poe e patetlah alouklouk e lawk lahoi a dei awh.
Hatnae tueng nah kalvan rahim e ram tangkuem hoi ka tho ni teh Cathut ka bari e Judah miphunnaw teh Jerusalem kho a roe awh.
Hote pawlawk a thai awh torei teh tami moi a kamkhueng awh teh gunceinaw ni a dei awh e lawk a thai awh navah a kângairu awh.
Ahnimanaw ni a kângairu awh teh atu hete taminaw pueng heh Galilee taminaw nahoehmaw.
Hottelah pawiteh maimouh ni mama lawk lahoi lengkaleng thai e heh bangtelane.
Maimanaw teh Parthian ram, Medes hoi Elam ram, Mesopotamia ram, Judea ram, Kappadosia, Pontus ram, Asia ram,
Frigia ram, Pamfilia ram, Izip ram hoi Lubim ram, Rom kho hoi ka tho e imyinnaw, Sairen hoi e naw nahoehmaw.
Maimouh Judah koe kahmawng e Jentel thoseh, hahoi a tangawn teh Krete tuilum hoi Arabia ram hoi ka tho e lah ao awh. Hateiteh Cathut ni kângairu hnonaw a sak e a dei awh e hah amamae lawk lahoi lengkaleng a thai awh telah a kâpankhai awh.
Taminaw pueng ni kângairu lungkâoun awh teh, hete hno bangtelamaw telah buet touh hoi buet touh a kâ pacei awh.
Tami tangawn ni teh a dudam awh teh, hetnaw heh misurtui a parui awh atipouh awh.
Hatnavah Piter ni guncei hlaibun touh hoi rei a kangdue teh kacaipounglah a dei e teh, Judah miphunnaw hoi Jerusalem kho na kaawm e naw hete hnonaw na panue sak hanelah ka ngai. Ka lawk kahawicalah na thai pouh awh.
Atu e tueng heh amom Suimilam tako doeh. Hetnaw teh na pouk awh e patetlah parui awh hoeh.
Het hateh profet Joel ni a dei tangcoung e doeh toe.
A dei e lawk teh, Cathut ni a poe e lawk hah hmalah torei teh tami pueng e a lathueng vah ka Muitha ka awi han. Hat torei teh, nangmae na canu capanaw ni profet lawk lahoi a dei awh han. Nangmouh thung dawkvah thoundoun tanglanaw ni kamnuenae a hmu awh han. Matawngnaw ni mang a sak awh han.
Hote hninnaw dawkvah Ka sannu sanpanaw koe ka Muitha ka awi vaiteh profet lawk lahoi a dei awh han.
Kalvan lah kângairu hnonaw hoi talai van hai thi, hmai hoi hmaikhu tie mitnoutnaw na patue han.
Cathut e kalenpounge hninpui a pha hoehnahlan vah kanî a hmo vaiteh thapa thi patetlah kaawm han.
Hatnavah Cathut min ka kaw pueng ni rungngang lah ao han telah a ti.
Isarelnaw ka lawk thai awh haw na panue awh e patetlah Nazareth tami Jisuh ni kângairuhnonaw, kângairunaenaw, hoi mitnoutnaw a sak toe. Hete hno sak e naw lahoi Cathut ni Jisuh teh a kampangkhai toe.
Cathut ni Jisuh teh nangmouh hanlah a hmoun tangcoung e hoi a panue tangcoung e patetlah, kâlawklaipa taminaw kut dawk hoi thingpalam dawk a pathout awh teh a thei awh.
Hat nakunghai Cathut ni ahni teh due reithainae thung hoi a thaw sak teh a hlout sak.
Devit ni hote Bawipa hoi kâkuen lah a dei e teh, kai teh a yungyoe kahring e Cathut doeh kahma lah pou ka hmu. Bangkongtetpawiteh, Bawipa teh kaie aranglah ao dawkvah kai teh takinae ka tawn hoeh.
Hatdawkvah, ka lung a konawm teh ka lai hai a lunghawi. Hothloilah ka takthai ni hai ngaihawinae tawn laihoi a due han.
Bangkongtetpawiteh Bawipa ni ka muitha hah phuen dawk na cettakhai mahoeh. Bawipa e a Tami Kathoung teh pawk sak mahoeh.
Bawipa ni hringnae lam na panue sak teh na hmalah lunghawinae hoi na kawi sak han telah a dei.
Hmaunawnghanaw mintoe Devit teh a due hoi pakawp lah ao teh tangkom hai sahnin ditouh ao rah.
Ahni teh profet buet touh lah ao dawk a catounnaw thung dawk buet touh teh amae bawitungkhung dawk tahung sak lah ao han telah Cathut ni a kam pouh e hah kamcengcalah a panue.
Devit ni kamceng lah a panue dawkvah Khrih e boutthawnae kong hah hettelah a dei. Bawipa teh phuen dawk cettakhai mahoeh. A tak hai pawknae hoi kâhmo sak mahoeh a ti.
Cathut ni hote Jisuh hah a thaw sak toe. Maimanaw hai kapanuekkung lah o awh.
Hottelah Jisuh teh Cathut e aranglah tahungnae poe lah ao hnukkhu, lawkkam lah kaawm e Kathoung Muitha hah Pa koehoi poe lah ao. Nangmouh ni na thai teh na panue awh e patetlah hote Muitha hah na rabawk sin toe.
Devit teh kalvannaw koe luen hoeh rah, hatei, ahni ni hettelah a dei, Bawipa ni ka Bawipa koe,
Na tarannaw na khok toungnae lah ka hruek hoehroukrak kaie aranglah tahung haw atipouh.
Hatdawkvah, thingpalam dawk pathout awh e Jisuh hah Cathut ni Bawipa hoi, Khrih lah a khoe toe tie hah Isarelnaw pueng ni kamcengcalah panuek awh naseh telah a ti.
Taminaw ni hote lawk hah a thai awh navah, a lungpuen awh teh Piter hoi alouke gunceinaw hanlah hmaunawnghanaw bangtelamaw ti awh han toung telah a pacei awh.
Piter ni nangmae na yonnae ngaithoum lah ao nahanlah pankângai awh nateh Jisuh Khrih min dawk baptisma rip coe awh. Hattoteh Kathoung Muitha poehno na coe awh han.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, hete lawkkamnae teh nangmouh hoi, nangmae na catounnaw hane hoi, ahlanae koe kaawm e Cathut ni a kaw e naw pueng hane doeh a ti.
Piter ni alouklouk e lawk lahoi a pâpho teh hete tamikathoutnaw thung hoi hlout nahanlah kârungngang awh haw telah ahnimanaw hah a hroecoe.
Hattoteh Piter e lawk ka dâw e naw ni baptisma a coe awh teh, hat hnin vah tami thong thum tabang a kâthap awh.
Ahnimouh teh gunceinaw e cangkhainae, vaiyei kâraennae, kâhuikonae hoi ratoumnae pou a tawn awh.
Tami pueng ni a taki awh teh, gunceinaw teh kângairu hnonaw hoi mitnout hnonaw moi a sak awh.
Ka yuem e pueng teh cungtalah a kamkhueng awh teh, a tawn awh e pueng hai reirei a hmawng awh.
A tawn awh e hnopai pueng hai a yo awh teh, a pankinae patetlah a kârei awh.
Ahnimouh teh hnintangkuem Bawkim vah a kamkhueng awh teh, im touh hnukkhu im touh vaiyei a raen awh teh, lungthoung lunghawi nalaihoi rawca a canei awh.
Cathut a pholen awh teh taminaw e hmalah minhmai kahawi a hmu awh. Hnintangkuem rungngang lah kaawm e taminaw hah Bawipa ni kawhmoun thung a thap sin.
Vai touh teh, tangmin lah suimilam kathum nah e ratoumnae tue nah Piter hoi Jawhan teh Bawkim lah a cei roi.
A manu von thung hoi kamkhuen e buet touh a hrawm awh teh a thokhai awh. Bawkim kacetnaw ni poe e a coe thai nahan kahawipoung e takhang koe ahni teh ouk ao sak awh.
Piter hoi Jawhan tinaw Bawkim koe lah a tho e a hmu nah na poe haw titeh a hei.
Hatnavah Piter hoi Jawhan ni ahni hah kheikhei a khet teh kaimouh na khenhaw! atipouh.
Ahni ni buetbuet touh ka hmu han telah a pouk teh a ngaihawi nalaihoi a khet.
Piter ni sui ngun ka tawn hoeh, ka tawn e hno na poe han, Nazareth tami Jisuh Khrih min lahoi thaw nateh cet atipouh.
Aranglae a kut dawk hoi a pathaw tahmaca vah khok roi hoi a khoksaluemnaw a thao.
A thaw teh lam a cei. Lamtu laihoi Cathut a pholen teh gunceinaw hoi bawkim thung a kâen.
Hottelah lamcei laihoi Cathut a pholen e hah taminaw ni a hmu navah,
hote tami teh Bawkim meihawi longkha koe kut ka dâw e tami doeh tie a panue awh dawkvah, ahni koe ka kamnuek e hnonaw dawk puenghoi a kângairu awh.
Hote tami ni Piter hoi Jawhan tinaw pou a kuet lahun nah, tami pueng a kângairu awh teh, Solomon e vaikhap koe lah a yawng awh teh a kamkhueng awh.
Piter ni a hmu nah, Isarel taminaw bangkong hete hno dawk na kângairu a vaw. Hete tami a cei thainae heh kaimouh ni kamamae bahu hoi kamamae hawinae lahoi ka poe thai e patetlah bangkongmaw kaimouh kheikhei na khet a vaw.
Abraham, Isak, Jakop, ahnimae Cathut, maimae mintoenaw e Cathut ni a Capa e a Bawilennae a kamnue sak toe. Hote Bawipa teh nangmouh ni Pailat siangpahrang e kut dawk na poe awh teh ahni ni hlout sak han pouknae a tawn eiteh nangmouh ni hote Bawipa hah na pahnawt awh.
Kathoung kalan e Bawipa hah na pahnawt awh teh namamouh hanelah tami ka thet e hah hlout sak hanelah na hei awh.
Hringnae na kapoethaikung Bawipa teh na thei awh toe. Hatei Cathut ni ahni hah duenae koehoi bout a thaw sak toe. Kaimouh teh hete konglamnaw kapanuekkhaikung lah ka o awh.
Hote ahni e min yuemnae lahoi hote ahni e min teh nangmouh ni na hmu awh e hete tami hah a tha ao sak toe. Hote Bawipa kecu dawk coe e yuemnae ni nangmae mithmu vah hete tami hah kuepcingnae a poe toe.
Hmaunawnghanaw nangmouh koehoi kamtawng teh khobawinaw panuek laipalah hottelah na sak awh tie hah kai ni ka panue.
Khrih teh a rucat patang a khang han tie hah Cathut e profetnaw ni a dei tangcoung e patetlah a kuep sak toe.
Hatdawkvah na yonnae ngaithoum lah ao nahan pankângai awh nateh na lungkâthung awh.
Het hateh Cathut koehoi lungpahawinae tueng a pha vaiteh, nangmouh hanlah rawi tangcoung e Khrih tie a patoun nahane doeh.
Cathut ni talai kamtawng hoi kathounge profetnaw koehoi a la dei awh e patetlah bangpueng a katha lah sak kathanae tueng a pha hoehroukrak kalvan vah Bawipa teh ao han.
Mosi ni hai nangmae BAWIPA hah nangmae hmaunawngha thung dawk hoi kai hoi kâvan e profet buet touh hah nangmouh hanelah a tho sak han. Ahni ni a dei e naw pueng nangmouh ni na tarawi awh han.
Hote profet e lawk hah ka tarawi hoeh e pueng miphun dawk hoi takhoe vaiteh raphoe lah ao han.
Samuel koehoi kamtawng teh a hnukkhu lah ka tho e profetnaw pueng ni hai hete hnintha kong hah a pathang awh.
Nangmouh teh profetnaw e catoun lah na o awh. Cathut ni Abraham koe nange catoun dawk hoi talai van e miphun pueng ni yawhawinae a coe awh han telah a pâpho. Nangmouh teh lawkkam e catoun lahai na o awh.
Cathut ni nangmouh buet touh rip e hawihoehnae a raphoe vaiteh nangmouh yawhawi na poe nahanlah amae Capa Jisuh hah a thaw sak hnukkhu nangmouh koe hmaloe a patoun telah taminaw koe Piter ni a dei.
Piter hoi Jawhan tinaw ni tami moikapap koe lawk a dei awh navah, vaihmanaw, bawkim kaukkung hoi sadusinaw teh ahnimouh koe a tho awh.
gunceinaw ni duenae koehoi Jisuh boutthawnae kong hah tami pueng koe a dei awh dawkvah, ahnimouh teh a lungphuen awh.
Hatdawkvah, Piter hoi Jawhan a man awh teh, khohmo toung dawkvah, thongim thung rum touh a paung awh.
Hateiteh, Cathut lawkkatang ka thai ni teh ka yuem e tami tongpa dueng 5,000 touh a pha awh.
Atangtho vah khobawinaw, kacuenaw, cakathutkungnaw teh Jerusalem vah a kamkhueng awh.
Vaihma kacue Annas, Kaiaphas, Jawhan, Alexander hoi vaihma kacuenaw pueng hai a kamkhueng awh.
Ahnimouh ni Piter hoi Jawhan teh tamimaya hmalah a kangdue sak awh teh api kâ lahoi maw, api min lahoi maw hete hno heh na sak awh vaw telah a pacei awh.
Hatnavah Piter teh Kathoung Muitha hoi akawi teh khobawinaw hoi kacuenaw,
sahnin vah kaimouh ni a tha kayoun e tami buet touh kabawp awh e hah lawk na ceng awh dawkvah,
nangmouh abuemlahoi Isarelnaw abuemlah panue sak hanlah ka ngai e teh, thingpalam dawk na pathout awh ei, duenae koehoi Cathut ni a thaw sak e Nazareth tami Jisuh Khrih min lahoi hete tami ni a dam teh nangmae hmalah a kangdue e doeh.
Hote Bawipa teh im kasakkungnaw ni na pahnawt awh e talung, patopatang poung e takinlung lah ao.
Hote Bawipa min hloilah kalvan rahim taminaw koevah ka rungngang thai e rungngangnae min alouke awmhoeh telah Piter ni a pâpho.
Lawkcengkungnaw ni Piter hoi Jawhan e taran ahawi roinae hah a hmu awh navah, a kângairu awh. Hatnavah, ahnimouh roi teh Jisuh hoi reirei kaawm e tie hah a panue awh.
Hahoi, ahnimouh koe damnae kahmawt e tami hai ahnimouh koe a kangdue e a hmu awh navah banghai oun hane tawn hoeh.
Hatnavah, ahnimouh ni gunceinaw sanhedrin lawkcengnae imthung hoi a tâco hanelah kâ a poe awh teh bangtelamaw ti awh han telah amamouh dueng a kâpan awh.
Ahnimanaw heh bangtelamaw ti awh han. Bangkongtetpawiteh ahnimouh koehoi kângairuhno kamnuek e teh Jerusalem kho kaawm e tami pueng ni a panue awh toung dawkvah maimouh ni oun thai awh hoeh toe.
Hete kamthang teh tami pueng koe a kampai hoeh nahanlah Jisuh e min kâuep laihoi hmalah apipatet koehai bout a dei hoeh nahanlah pakhi awh sei ati awh.
Hathnukkhu gunceinaw hah a kaw awh teh, Jisuh min lahoi khoeroe pâpho awh hanh, cangkhai awh hanh telah a cakâ awh.
Piter hoi Jawhan ni, Cathut e lawk hlak nangmae lawk ka tarawi awh pawiteh, Cathut hmalah a kamcu hoi a kamcu hoeh e hah pouk awh haw.
Kaimouh teh ka thai awh, ka hmu awh e hah pâpho laipalah kaawm thai awh hoeh ‘ atipouh awh.
Hote kamthang dawkvah tami pueng ni Cathut a pholen awh teh, gunceinaw hah bangtelah hoi ne runae poe han tie a lamthung a hmu awh hoeh dawkvah, ahnimouh ni gunceinaw hah bout a pakhi awh teh bout a tha awh.
Hete kângairuhno lahoi ahmaloe e patetlah ka dam e tami teh a kum 40 hlai a pha toe.
Gunceinaw teh bout a tha awh navah amamae a huinaw koe bout a ban awh navah vaihma bawinaw hoi kacuenaw ni a dei pouh e hah a dei awh.
Ahnimouh ni be a thai awh hnukkhu, Cathut koe lungkânging lahoi a ratoum awh e teh, Bawipa nang teh kalvan hoi talai rahak e hnopueng hoi tuipui thung e hnopueng hai na sak, telah ati awh.
Bawipa ni Kathoung Muitha lahoi kaimae mintoe lah kaawm ni teh na patoun e Devit koehoi bangkongmaw khoramnaw kâpo awh hoeh, taminaw hai bangkongmaw ayawmyin lae hnonaw sak hanelah a kâcai awh.
Talai e siangpahrangnaw pueng a kamkhueng awh teh, BAWIPA hoi Bawipa Jisuh hah tuk han telah ati awh.
Herod hoi Pontius Pailat bawi teh Isarelnaw hoi Jentelnaw a hroecoe teh, Bawipa nang ni satui na awi tangcoung e, Capa Jisuh hah a taran awh teh hete kho dawk a kamkhueng awh toe.
Na pouk tangcoung e lahoi ka tho hane kawinaw hah a kuep sak awh toe.
Bawipa atuvah ahnimouh ni pakhinae dawk hoi taran kahawicalah lawk ka pâpho thai nahanlah lungtangnae na poe awh haw.
Patawnae pueng a roum nahanlah Bawipa na kut dâw haw. Kathounge na San Jisuh min lahoi kângairu mitnoutnaw sak thai nahanlah na poe haw telah a ratoum awh.
Hottelah be a ratoum awh hnukkhu a kamkhuengnae hmuen a kahuet teh ahnimanaw pueng teh, Kathoung Muitha hoi akawi awh dawkvah Cathut e lawk hah lungtang laihoi a pâpho awh.
Kayuemnaw e kamkhuengnae teh lung suetalah ao dawkvah apipatet ni hai mae hnonaw heh, kama e hno doeh tet awh laipalah, kaawm e hno pueng teh cungtalah hno hanlah a hmoun awh.
Gunceinaw ni Bawipa e boutthawnae kong hah kalenpounge bahu hoi a kampangkhai awh dawkvah, kalenpounge lungmanae teh ahnimae lathueng vah a pha.
Ahnimouh thungvah ka roedeng e tami buet touh hai awm hoeh. Bangkongtetpawiteh laikawk, im a tawn awh e pueng hah a yo awh teh, a hmu awh e tangkanaw pueng a sin awh teh,
Gunceinaw e khok koevah a tâ awh teh lengkaleng a panki e patetlah a rei awh.
Lungpahawinae capa tinae lah kaawm e, gunceinaw ni Barnabas telah a kaw awh e, Saipras tuilum tami, Levih catoun, Joseph teh,
a tawn e laikawk a yo e phu, tangka hah a sin teh gunceinaw e khok koe a ta.
Hatei Ananias tie tami hoi a yu Sapphira ni a tawn roi e hnopai a yo roi.
A yu hoi lung a kânging roi teh aphu tangawn e a la roi, a tangawn dueng hah gunceinaw e khok koevah a thokhai roi.
Hatnavah, Piter ni Ananias bangkongmaw nang ni Setan hah na lungthin dawk uk hanlah hmuen na poe teh Kathoung Muitha hah na dumyen teh talai phu a tangawn na kapek.
Na talai teh na yo hoeh na hai nama e nahoehmaw, na yo hnukkhu hoi hai aphu teh nama e kâ lah awmhoeh na maw. Bangkongmaw hottelah sak hane lungthin thung na kâcai, tami koe laithout laipalah Cathut koe na laithoe atipouh.
Hote lawk Ananias ni a thai nah a rawp teh a due, hote kong ka thai pueng ni puenghoi a taki awh.
Hahoi nawsainaw a kâen awh teh a ro hah hni hoi a kayo hnukkhu a kâkayawt awh teh a pakawp awh.
Suimilam kathum touh ao hnukkhu a yu ni bang hno maw ka tâcawt tie panuek laipalah a kâen.
Hatnavah Piter ni ahni koe nangmouh roi ni talai nâ yit touh maw na yo ka tang tie a pacei nah, ahni ni oe het yit touh doeh ka yo telah a ti.
Piter ni hai nangmouh roi ni bangkong lungkânging laihoi Cathut e Muitha hah na tanouk roi. Khenhaw! na vâ ro kapakawmnaw teh takhang koe a pha toe. Ahnimanaw ni nang hai na hrawm awh han atipouh.
Hatnavah vai touh lahoi Piter e khok koe a rawp teh a due. Nawsainaw a kâen teh a ro a hrawm awh teh a vâ teng a pakawp awh.
Kawhmoun abuemlahoi hote lawk kathainaw pueng ni puenghoi a taki awh teh a pâyaw awh.
Gunceinaw ni taminaw e hmalah mitnoutnaw hoi kângairunae a sak awh. Ahnimouh abuemlah Solomon e vaikhap dawk lungkânging lahoi ouk kamkhueng awh.
Alouke taminaw ni ahnimouh teh a ouphlawp a eiteh ahnimouh koe bawk hanelah ngam awh hoeh.
Cathut ka yuem e napui, tongpanaw teh ahnimouh koe a kâthap awh.
Taminaw ni ka dam hoe e taminaw a hrawm awh teh ikhun, phaileinaw khuehoi lam dawk a ta awh. Piter a tho torei teh, ahnie a tâhlip hah tami kapatawnaw e atak dawk a pha hanelah a kâyawm awh.
Jerusalem tengpam e khopuinaw koehoi tami moikapap naw ni ka dam hoeh e naw hoi kakhine muithanaw ni a man e naw hah a hrawi awh, ahnimanaw pueng ni damnae a hmu awh.
Hatnavah vaihma kacue hoi ahnimouh koe kaawm e Sadusinaw pueng a thaw awh teh puenghoi a lungkhuek awh.
Gunceinaw hah a man awh teh thongim a pabo awh.
Hateiteh tangmin vah Bawipa e kalvantami ni thongim takhangnaw a paawng pouh teh gunceinaw hah a tâco sak hnukkhu,
cet awh nateh bawkim thungvah kangdout nateh hete hringnae lawknaw pueng heh taminaw koe dei awh telah atipouh.
Gunceinaw ni hote lawk a thai awh teh, amom vah bawkim thung a kâen awh teh taminaw a cangkhai awh. Hatnavah vaihma kacue hoi ahnimouh koe kaawm e naw teh a tho awh. Sanhedrin lawkcengkungnaw hoi Isarel kacuenaw pueng a kamkhueng sak awh teh gunceinaw hah kaw hanlah thongim karingkungnaw hah thongim a patoun awh.
Hahoi thongim a pha awh navah ahnimouh karingkungnaw ni gunceinaw teh hmawt awh hoeh, bout a ban awh teh sanhedrin lawkcengkungnaw koe,
thongim takhang hai kahawicalah a kâkhan teh karingkungnaw hai thongim hmalah a kangdue e kaimouh ni ka hmu awh. Hatei ka paawng awh navah, a thungvah tami buet touh hai awmhoeh telah a dei pouh awh.
Bawkim kaukkung hoi vaihma bawinaw ni hote lawk a thai teh bang hno maw ka tâcawt telah kângairu hoi ao awh.
Hatnavah tami buet touh a tho teh nangmouh ni thongim na pabo awh e naw ni bawkim thung a kangdue teh taminaw hah a cangkhai awh telah a dei pouh.
Hatnavah im karingkung ransabawi hoi karingkungnaw ni a cei awh teh, gunceinaw hah a hrawi awh. Taminaw ni talung hoi dei awh langvaih tie a taki awh dawkvah thama lah hrawi awh hoeh.
Hahoi gunceinaw teh a hrawi awh teh Sanhedrin hmalah a kangdue sak teh vaihma kacue ni, hote Jisuh e min lahoi cangkhai hoeh nahan nangmanaw teh kâ na poe awh nahoehmaw.
Hatei nangmouh ni Jerusalem khopui dawk na cangkhainae a kâkahei teh ahnie thi teh kaimae lathueng vah a pha hanelah na noe awh bo ma telah a pacei awh.
Hahoi Piter hoi guncei alouknaw ni taminaw e lawk ngâi hlak Cathut lawk ngâi hanlah ao atipouh.
Nangmouh ni thingpalam dawk na pathout awh teh na thei awh e Jisuh teh maimae mintoenaw e Cathut ni a thaw sak toe.
Cathut ni Isarel miphunnaw yon pankângainae hoi yonthanae poe hanelah Bawi Jisuh teh Bawi hoi Rungngangkung hanlah amae aranglah a tawm teh a tahung sak toe.
Kaimouh teh hote kongnaw kapanuekkhaikung lah ka o awh. Cathut ni amae lawk kangâinaw koe poe lah kaawm e Kathoung Muitha hai kapanuekkhaikung lah ao telah bout a dei pouh awh.
Ahnimanaw ni hote lawk a thai navah a lungkhuek awh teh gunceinaw thei hanelah a kâcai awh.
Hatei sanhedrin dawk kâpa e Farasi tami Gamaliel, teh kâlawk kacangkhaikung ahni teh tami pueng ni bari e lah a o. Sanhedrin koehoi kacangkhaikung buet touh a kangdue teh gunceinaw hah dongdengca alawilah tâco sak hanlah kâ a poe.
Isarel miphunnaw ahnimae a lathueng vah bangpatet e hno maw ka sak han tie kâhruetcuet awh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, vai touh teh Theudas tie tami a tâco. Amahoima tami ka lentoe lah a kâdei teh a hnuk vah tami cumpali touh a kâbang. Hatei ahni teh tami alouknaw ni a thei awh teh ama kayuemnaw pueng a kâkapek teh a kahma awh.
Hathnukkhu vah milu parei navah Galilee tami Judah a tâco teh amae hnukkâbang hanelah Judahnaw hah a coun. Ahni ni hai a due takhai teh ahnie a hnukkâbang e naw hai alouklah koung a kampek awh.
Hatdawkvah nangmouh teh ahnimanaw kâbet awh hanh. Tami koe lahoi e pawiteh karawk hane doeh.
Hatei Cathut koe lahoi e lah awm pawiteh nangmouh ni na raphoe thai mahoeh. Cathut na ka taran e lah doeh na awm ati. Hattoteh ahnie lawk hah ahnimouh ni a lungkuep awh.
Hote lawk a thai awh hnukkhu vah gunceinaw hah a kaw awh teh, a hem awh hnukkhu a tu hoi teh Jisuh min lahoi cangkhainae sak awh hanh lawih telah kâ a poe awh teh a cei sak awh.
Gunceinaw ni Jisuh min lahoi khang hane a kamcu tie a pouk awh dawk sanhedrin lawkcengnae koehoi lunghawicalah hoi a tâco awh.
Bawkim dawk hai thoseh, im dawk hai thoseh, hnintangkuem a cangkhai awh teh Jisuh teh Khrih doeh telah pout laipalah a pâpho awh.
Hatnae tueng dawkvah a hnukkâbangnaw moi apap awh toe. A hnintangkuem a paca awh navah, Grik lawk kapan e Hellenist lahmai napuinaw ni kaimouh teh na paca awh hoeh telah Hebru lawk kapannaw phuenangnae a tawn awh.
Hatnavah gunceinaw hlaikahni touh ni a hnukkâbangnaw pueng a kaw awh teh maimouh teh Cathut e a lawk paktoung awh vaiteh canei koelae thaw tawk hane kawi nahoeh.
Hatdawkvah hmaunawnghanaw muitha hoi, lungangnae hoi, kaawm e tami sari touh nangmouh thung tawng awh. Hete thaw tawk sak hanelah ahnimouh hah kaimouh ni ka rawi awh han.
Maimouh teh ratoumnae hoi lawk pâphonae thaw maha pou tawk awh sei telah a dei awh.
Hote lawk teh kamkhueng e tami pueng ni a hnâbo awh teh, yuemnae lahoi thoseh, Kathoung Muitha hoi thoseh, kakawi e Stiven, Filip, Prokhoras, Nikhanaw, Timon, Parmenas, hoi Judah phung lah ka kâen e Antiok tami Nikolas tinaw a rawi awh.
Ahnimouh teh gunceinaw hmalah a kangdue sak awh teh gunceinaw ni ratoum laihoi ahnimae lathueng kut a toung sin awh.
Hettelah hoiyah Cathut e lawk a kampung teh Jerusalem kho thung a hnukkâbangnaw hoehoe apap. Vaihmanaw pueng ni hai yuemnae lawk a thai awh.
Stiven teh lungmanae a bahu hoi akawi teh puenghoi kângairunae mitnoutnaw hah taminaw hmalah a sak.
Hah navah sanhlout tie sinakok dawk kamkhuengnaw koehoi kamtawng teh Sairen, Alexandria, Silisia ram, Asia ram hoi ka tho e taminaw ni Stiven teh a oun awh.
Hatei muitha lungangnae hoi Stiven ni a dei e hah ahnimanaw ni oun thai awh hoeh.
Hatnavah rangpuinaw hah arulah a uen awh teh hete tami ni Mosi hoi Cathut e lawk ka tapuet lah a dei awh e hah ka thai ati awh.
Rangpui, kacuenaw hoi cakathutkungnaw ni ahni hah a man awh teh sanhedrin lawkcengnae hmuen koe a hrawi awh.
Laithoe e kapanuekkhaikungnaw a kaw awh teh ahnimouh ni, ahni teh kathounge a hmuen hoi kâlawknaw a tapuet telah kâhat laipalah a dei awh.
Hote Nazareth tami Jisuh ni hete hmuen a raphoe vaiteh kaimouh koe Mosi ni na poe e kâlawknaw kâthung sak han ati awh e kaimouh ni ka thai awh toe telah a dei awh.
Sanhedrin lawkcengnae koe ka tahungnaw ni Stiven hah kheikhei a khet awh teh ahnie minhmai teh kalvantami e minhmai patetlah ao e hah a hmu awh.
Vaihma kacue ni Stiven koe, ahnimouh ni a dei awh e heh atang maw, telah a pacei.
Stiven ni, hmaunawnghanaw hoi apanaw thai awh haw. Maimae na pa Abraham teh Haran kho a cei hoehnahlan, Mesopotamia ram ao nah ka lentoe e Cathut ni a kamnue pouh teh,
na ram hoi na imthungkhu cettakhai nateh kai ni na patue e ram dawk cet haw, atipouh.
Hatdawkvah ahni ni Khaldean ram a ceitakhai teh Haran khovah ao. A na pa a due hnukkhu hoi Cathut ni atu maimouh onae ram dawk a kampuen sak.
Hatei, hote ram dawk e râw pang hanlah bang tica hai poe hoeh. Abraham ni a ca a cun hoehnahlan Cathut ni ahni hoi catounnaw hanlah hote ram teh râw lah poe hane lawk a kam toe.
Cathut ni ahnie catounnaw teh ayânaw e ram dawkvah imyin lah ao awh han tie hoi hote ram dawk a kum cumpali touh thung san lah ao a vaiteh rektapnae a khang awh han telah a ti.
Cathut ni ahnimouh san lah ka hno e naw lawk ka ceng han ati. Hahoi ahnimanaw ni hote ram dawk hoi a tâco awh vaiteh hete a hmuen koehoi kai na bawk awh han, telah a ti.
Cathut ni vuensomanae hoi kâkuen e lawkkamnae hah Abraham koe a poe teh, a ca Isak a sak hoi hnin taroe navah vuensomanae a sak pouh. Isak ni a capa Jakop a sak teh mintoe hlaikahni touh e na pa lah ao.
Mintoenaw ni Joseph hah a ut awh dawkvah Izip ram lah a yo awh. Hateiteh Cathut ni Joseph teh a okhai.
Ahnie a rucatnae koehoi a hlout sak. Lungangnae hah a poe teh Izip siangpahrang ni Izip ram hoi Faro siangpahrang e a imthungnaw a uk sak.
Hahoi, Izip ram hoi Kanaan ram pueng dawk takang a tho teh rucatnae puenghoi a kâhmo awh dawkvah maimae mintoenaw teh a ca hane tawn awh hoeh.
Hatei Jakop ni Izip ram vah rawca ao e a thai navah maimae mintoenaw apasuek lah a patoun.
Apâhni lah a cei awh navah Joseph ni a hmaunaw koe amahoima a kâpâpho teh Joseph miphunnaw hah Faro siangpahrang ni a panue.
Hahoi, Joseph ni tami a patoun teh a na pa Jakop hoi a miphunnaw tami 75 touh e hah koung a kaw.
Hottelah Jakop ni Izip ram lah a cei teh, ahni hoi maimae mintoenaw teh hote ram dawkvah a due awh toe.
Ahnimae ronaw teh Shekhem kho lah a kâkayawt awh teh hote kho dawk hoi Abraham ni Hamor canaw koe tangka hoi a ran e phuen dawkvah a pakawp awh.
Cathut ni Abraham koe lawkkam e atueng akuep e patetlah Izip ram kaawm e taminaw puenghoi a kamphung,
A hnukkhu teh Joseph ka panuek hoeh e Siangpahrang alouke ni Izip ram a uk.
Hote siangpahrang ni maimae miphun a dum teh, camonaw hah tâkhawng vaiteh hring sak hoeh hanelah a ngai dawkvah maimae mintoenaw a rektap awh.
Hote tueng navah, Mosi a khe. Ahni teh Cathut hmalah a mei kahawipoung e camo lah ao teh, a na pa e im dawk thapa yung thum touh thung khetyawt e lah ao.
Im dawk hoi a tâcokhai hnukkhu Faro canu ni a ca lah a kawk.
Mosi teh Izipnaw e thoumthainae pueng hah a cang teh, lawk dei koe lahai, tawksak koe lahai a thakaawme lah ao.
Mosi teh kum 40 touh a pha navah a miphun Isarelnaw khetyawt hane lungpouk a tawn.
Tami buet touh teh Izip tami tongpa ni a rektap lahun navah a hmu teh amae miphun kampangkhai teh Izip tami hah a thei.
Mosi ni a kut hoi amae hmaunawnghanaw hlout nahanlah Cathut ni kâ na poenae kong hah ahnimouh ni a panue han doeh toe telah a pouk ei ahnimouh ni panuek thai awh hoeh.
A tangtho vah, Mosi ni Isarel miphunnaw amamouh hoi mamouh lawkpungnae a sak awh e hah a hmu navah, bangkongmaw hettelah na o awh, atipouh hnukkhu a rahak dawk kâponae a sak.
Hateiteh ka yon e ni Mosi a tanawt teh, apinimaw nang hah kaie lathueng vah lawkcengkung lah na ta vaw.
Nang teh paduem e Izip tami na thei e patetlah kai hai thei hanelah na noe maw atipouh.
Hote lawk hah Mosi ni a thai toteh Midian ram lah a yawng teh, hawvah imyin lahoi capa kahni touh a sak.
A kum 40 touh a kuep hnukkhu Sinai mon dawk e thingyei yon dawkvah, kalvantami teh Mosi koe buruk dawk hmai ka kang e lahoi a kamnue.
Mosi ni a hmu e hah a kângairu dawkvah kahnai lahoi khet hanelah buruk koe lah a cei navah Bawipa e lawk a thai teh,
Kai teh na mintoenaw e Cathut, Abraham, Isak, hoi Jakop e Cathut lah ka o ati. Mosi teh a taki lawi vah a pâyaw teh khen pateng khen ngam hoeh.
Bawipa ni Mosi hanlah, na khokkhawm hah rading, bangkongtetpawiteh, na kangduenae hmuen teh kathounge hmuen doeh.
Izip ram thung kaie taminaw ni a khang e hah ka hmu. A hramki awh e ka thai teh ahnimanaw rungngang hanelah ka kum toe. Atu cet leih! Nang teh Izip ram lah na patoun han atipouh.
Mosi heh Isarelnaw ni a pahnawt e doeh. Maimae lathueng vah apinimaw lawkceng han e, hoi na ka uk hanlah a ta, ati awh. Hateiteh, ahni teh buruk thung kamnuek e kalvantami ni ukkung hoi kahloutkhaikung lah a patoun.
A taminaw hah Izip ram hoi a tâcokhai teh, Izip ram, tuipui paling, hoi thingyei yon dawkvah kum 40 touh thung kângairunae hoi, mitnoutnae hnonaw a sak.
Hote Mosi teh Isarelnaw koe, Cathut ni nangmae hmaunawnghanaw thung dawk kai hoi kâvan e profet buet touh nangmouh hanlah ka tâco sak han, telah dei e hah doeh.
Ahni teh Sinai mon vah, ahni koe lawk ka dei e kalvantami hoi, maimae mintoenaw cungtalah kahrawngum vah kaawm e taminaw koe ao teh maimouh na poe hane kahring e lawk maimouh koe ka phatsakkung lah ao.
Hatei, maimae mintoenaw ni a lawk ngâi awh hoeh, ahni hah a hnoun awh teh ahnimae a lungthung vah Izip ram dueng a doun awh.
Hatdawkvah Aron koe maimouh Izip ram hoi na katâcawtkhaikung hote Mosi teh bangtelamaw ao tie maimouh ni panue hoeh toung dawkvah maimouh hmalah kahrawikung hane cathutnaw hah kaimouh han lah sak awh leih telah a hei awh.
Hottelah hoiyah ahnimouh ni hatnae atueng dawk maitoca meikaphawk a sak awh teh, hote meikaphawk koe thueng hanelah a sin awh teh, amamae kut hoi sak e dawk a konawm awh.
Hatnavah Cathut ni ahnimouh a hnamthun takhai teh ahnimouh han kalvan âsi, thapanaw a bawk sak. Profetnaw e cauk dawkvah, Isarelnaw nangmouh ni kahrawngum vah kum 40 touh thung thueng hanelah saringnaw hoi thueng e naw teh kai koe ouk na sin a maw.
Nangmouh ni Molek e rim hoi namamae âsi cathut Rephan hah na sin awh. Hotnaw teh nangmouh ni bawk han kawi lah na sak awh e meikaphawknaw doeh. Hatdawkvah kai ni nangmouh teh Babilon ram hloilah ditouh na hrek awh han telah a thut.
Mosi ni a hmu e hoi kâvan lah lawkpanuesaknae sak hanelah, kâ ka poe e ni a lawk poe e patetlah hote lukkareiim teh kahrawngum maimae mintoenaw koe ao.
Maimae mintoenaw ni hote rim hah a pang awh teh maimae mintoenaw e hmalah Cathut ni pâlei e Jentelnaw e ram a la awh toteh Joshua hoi hote rim hah a sin awh teh Devit se totouh ao.
Devit ni Cathut e a lungmanae a coe teh Jakop e Cathut ao, nahane hmuen sak hanlah a ratoum,
Hateiteh, Cathut hanelah im kasakkung teh Solomon doeh.
Hatei, Lathueng Poung ni tami kut hoi sak e bawkim dawk awm hoeh.
Hete kong dawkvah Bawipa ni, kalvan teh kaie bawitungkhung doeh, talai teh khok ka toungnae doeh. Nangmouh ni bangpatet e im maw kai han na sak awh han. Bang patet e hmuen dawk maw kai ni ka o han.
Hete hno pueng teh kama e kut sak nahoehmaw. , telah Cathut ni ati e profetnaw ni a dei e patetlah khoup ao.
Na lung a len teh, hnâ hoi lungthin dawkvah vuensoma lah kaawm hoeh e nangmanaw haiyah na mintoenaw patetlah Kathoung Muitha na taran awh.
Nangmae na mintoenaw ni a rektap boihoeh e profetnaw ao maw, ahnimouh teh kathounge bawi a tho han tie sut ka dei e naw a thei awh. Atuvah nangmouh teh hote Tami Kalan hah ka pahnawtkungnaw hoi kathetkungnaw lah na o awh.
Nangmouh teh kalvantaminaw koehoi poe e Cathut e phung lawk hah na hmu awh ei, sak han na ngai awh hoeh atipouh.
Ahnimouh teh hete konglam a thai awh navah a lungthung hoi Stiven koe puenghoi a lungkhuek awh teh hâ a katâ awh.
Hatnavah Stiven teh Kathoung Muitha hoi akawi teh kalvan lah a moung navah Cathut e bawilennae hoi Jisuh teh Cathut e aranglah a kangdue e hah a hmu.
Khen haw kalvannaw a kamawng teh tami Capa ni Cathut e aranglah a kangdue e ka hmu telah a dei.
Hatnavah ahnimouh teh puenghoi hram laihoi a hnâ a tabuem awh teh Stiven koe a yawng awh.
Ahni hah kho alawilah a sawn awh teh talung hoi a dei awh. Kapanuekkhaikungnaw ni hai amamae angkinaw Sawl tie thoundoun e a khok koe a ta awh.
Stiven ni, Bawipa Jisuh ka muitha hah dâw leih, telah talung hoi a dei awh lahun nah Cathut koe a ratoum.
Hahoi Stiven ni a khokcuengkhuem teh Bawipa hete yonnae teh ahnimae lathueng bawt sak hanh telah puenghoi a hram teh a due. Sawl ni hai Stiven a thei awh e hah a lungkuep van.
Hat hnin roeroe vah Jerusalem e kawhmoun thungvah rektapnae a tâco. Gunceinaw hoeh e pueng teh Judah ram hoi Samaria ram lah koung a kampek awh.
Cathutlae taminaw ni Stiven e a ro teh kahawicalah a kuem awh teh puenghoi a khuikakhai awh.
Sawl ni im buet touh hnukkhu buet touh a luen teh, ka yuem e napui tongpanaw hah a man teh thongim a paung teh kawhmoun hah a raphoe.
Voivang lah kâkapek e naw ni lawkkatang teh yuengyoe a pâpho awh.
Filip hai Samaria ram e kho buet touh dawk a cei teh Khrih e kong hah a pâpho van.
Tami pueng ni Filip ni a sak e kângairuhnonaw hah a hmu awh navah ahnie a pâpho e naw hah rip a thai awh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh tami moikapap koe kaawm e kakhine muithanaw teh hramki laihoi a tâco awh. Kamkhuen e hoi khokkhemnaw hai moikapap a dam awh.
Hatdawkvah, hote kho thungvah lunghawinae kalenpoung a tawn awh.
Hote kho dawk Simon tie tami buet touh ao. Ahni teh camthoum e lahoi yah. Samaria taminaw koe kângairu ka sak thai e tami doeh telah a mahoima ouk a kâdei.
Camo matawng pueng ni hete tami teh ka lentoe Cathut e bahu doeh ati awh.
Ahnimouh ni bangkongmaw a yuem awh, tetpawiteh cam thoum e lahoi kumtha moi kasawlah ahnimouh koe kângairunae a sak dawk doeh.
Hatei, Filip ni Cathut uknaeram hoi Jisuh Khrih e min hah a pâpho navah taminaw ni a yuem awh teh, tongpanaw dueng laipalah napuinaw hai tui baptisma a coe awh.
Simon ama hai a yuem dawkvah tui baptisma a coe teh Filip koe a kâbang. Mitnoutnae hoi kângairuhnonaw hah a hmu awh teh kângairu laihoi hmawn a ngam awh.
Samaria taminaw ni Cathut a yuem awh toe tie hah Jerusalem khopui kaawm e gunceinaw ni a thai awh navah, Piter hoi Jawhan teh ahnimouh koe a patoun awh.
Ahnimouh roi a pha toteh, Kathoung Muitha ahnimouh ni a coe thai awh nahanlah a ratoum pouh roi.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, ahnimouh teh Jisuh min lahoi tui baptisma dueng heh a coe awh rah dawkvah, ahnimouh thung dawk api koehai Kathoung Muitha a pha hoeh rah dawk doeh.
Hahoi, Piter hoi Jawhan ni ahnimae van kut a toung hnukkhu ahnimouh teh Kathoung Muitha a coe awh.
Gunceinaw ni kut toung sin e lahoi taminaw ni Kathoung Muitha a coe awh e heh, Simon ni a hmu navah, gunceinaw koe tangka a sin teh,
kai ni kut ka toung sin e tami pueng ni Kathoung Muitha a coe awh nahanelah, het patetlah e hnosakthainae hah kai hai na poe haw atipouh.
Hatnavah Piter ni nang ni Cathut e lungmanae hah tangka hoi ran thai telah na pouk dawkvah nama hoi na tangka teh mek kamko naseh.
Na lungthin teh Cathut hmalah a lan hoeh dawkvah hete thaw dawk nang teh na tawk thai hoeh, nange na ham hai awm hoeh.
Hatdawkvah, na pouknae kahawihoehe hah pankângai nateh Bawipa koe ratoum haw. Hottelah na tetpawiteh na pouknae kahawihoehe naw Bawipa ni doum na ngaithoum yawkaw han doeh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh nang teh utnae hoi na kawi teh yon thongkabawt e lah na o e hah ka hmu telah atipouh.
Simon ni, nangmouh ni na dei e buet touh boehai kai koe a pha hoeh nahanlah Bawipa koe na ratoum pouh awh telah bout a dei pouh.
Piter hoi Jawhan teh Bawipa e lawkkatang a kampang laihoi a pâpho roi hnukkhu, Samaria ram thung e khonaw koe kamthang kahawi a pâpho roi teh Jerusalem lah bout a ban roi.
Hahoi Cathut e kalvantami ni Filip koe thaw nateh Jerusalem hoi Gaza kho lah cathuknae lam dawk akalah cet loe atipouh. Hote lamthung teh thingyeiyawn lamthung lah ao.
Hatdawkvah, Filip ni a thaw teh a cei. Hatnavah Ethiopia siangpahrangnu Kandeis e bawi lah kaawm ni teh siangpahrangnu e kâtawnnae kalen lah kaawm e Ethiopia tami buet touh teh,
Jerusalem vah bawknae a sak hnukkhu a ban navah amae rangleng van hoi profet Isaiah e Cakathoung hah a touk.
Hatnavah Kathoung Muitha ni Filip koevah hote rangleng koe cet nateh hnai haw atipouh.
Filip ni hai rek a yawng sin. Ahni teh profet Isaiah ni a thut e heh vawtvawt a la touk. Filip ni, na touk e hah na thai panuek maw atipouh.
Hote bawi ni na ka dei pouh e awmhoeh pawiteh bangtelamaw ka thaipanuek han ati teh Filip heh ama koe reirei tahung hanelah a coun.
Ahni ni a touk e teh, ahni teh thei hanlah sut hmoun e tu patetlah a hrawi awh. Tuca ni muen ngaw navah a hram hoeh e patetlah hram laipalah ao.
A dudam awh navah, ahni kampangkhai api awm hoeh. A hringnae teh talai van hoi takhoe lah ao dawkvah a catoun hah apinimaw bout a dei thai han va tie doeh.
Hahoi bawi ni Filip hanelah na pacei haw nei, profet ni api e kong maw hettelah a dei aw. Ama e kong ma aw. Hoeh teh alouke buet buet touh e kong ma aw atipouh.
Hatteh Filip ni hote kongnaw hno lahoi Jisuh e kamthang hah a dei pouh.
Ahnimouh teh pou a cei awh navah tui koe a pha awh teh bawi ni tui baptisma ka hmu hoeh nahanelah bang ni maw kai na rakhan telah a ti.
Filip ni, na lungthin abuemlahoi na yuem pawiteh tui baptisma na hmu han, telah atipouh. Jisuh Khrih teh Cathut capa doeh tie hah ka yuem telah a ti. Hahoi, bawi ni rangleng kâhat hanelah kâ a poe hnukkhu, tui dawk a cei roi teh, Filip ni tui baptisma a poe.
Tui thung hoi bout a tâco roi toteh, Bawipa e Kathoung Muitha ni Filip teh oun a tawm teh, hote bawi ni hmawt hoeh toe. Hateiteh, lunghawi laihoi amae lamthung dawk pou a cei.
Filip teh Azotus kho a tâco teh, Kaisarea ram totouh kho tangkuem Cathut e kamthang kahawi a pâpho.
Sawl ni Bawipa a hnukkâbangnaw hah a pakhi teh thei hanlah ngainae a tawn, ahni ni vaihma kacue koe a cei teh,
Damaskas kho e sinakoknaw koe poe hanelah panue nahane ca a hei. Bangkongtetpawiteh, Bawipa lamthung ka dawn e naw tongpa hoi napui thoseh, a hmu e pueng katek vaiteh Jerusalem lah hrawi thai na hanelah doeh.
Hottelah ahni ni a cei teh Damaskas khopui teng a pha navah, kalvan lahoi angnae ni pheng a tue.
Talai dawk a rawp teh, Sawl, Sawl bangkong kai na rektap telah ahni koe dei e lawk a thai.
Bawipa nang apimaw, telah a pacei navah Bawipa ni kai teh nang ni na rektap e Jisuh doeh.
Thaw nateh kho thung kâen lah, na sak hane thaw na dei pouh han, telah atipouh.
Ahni hoi kahlawng rei kacetnaw ni lawk teh a thai awh ei apihai a hmu awh hoeh dawkvah muen a ka ngai awh teh lawkkamuem lahoi hawvah a kangdue awh.
Sawl teh hluet a thaw ei banghai a hmu thai hoeh dawkvah, taminaw ni a kut dawk hoi a hrawi teh, Damaskas khopui lah a ceikhai awh.
Ahni teh hnin thum touh thung a mit a dawn teh rawca cat laipalah ao.
Damaskas kho dawk Ananias tie a hnukkâbang buet touh ao. Kamnuenae lahoi, Bawipa ni, Ananias telah a kaw. Ahni ni, kai hivah ka o, Bawipa, telah atipouh.
Bawipa ni ahni koe, thaw nateh, lam kalan tie koevah cet nateh Judah im vah Tarshish tami, Sawl tie hah tawng haw. Bangkongtetpawiteh, ahni teh a ratoum lahun.
A kamnuenae dawk a mit kho bout a hmu thai nahanlah Ananias tie a kâen vaiteh a van vah kut a toung e a hmu, telah a ti.
Ananias ni, Bawipa, ahni ni Jerusalem kho e na tami kathoungnaw koe hno kahawihoehe moi a sak tie tami moikapap ni a dei e ka thai.
Vaihma bawinaw koehoi kâtawnnae hoi hivah a tho. Na min kakawnaw pueng man thainae kâ a tawn, telah atipouh.
Hateiteh, Bawipa ni cet haw ahni teh Jentelnaw, siangpahrangnaw hoi Isarelnaw hmalah ka min ka sin hanelah ka rawi toe.
Ahni teh ka min kecu dawk rucatnae a khang hane naw ka panue sak han, telah a ti.
Hahoi, Ananias ni a cei teh, imthungkhu vah a kâen. Sawl van vah a kut a toung teh, ka nawngha, Sawl na tho nah lam vah nang koe ka kamnuek e Bawipa Jisuh ni na mit bout ang sak teh, Kathoung Muitha hoi na kawi thai nahan kai na patoun, telah atipouh.
Hatnavah, vai touh lahoi a mit dawk hoi tanga lakep patetlah a kâkhawk teh, kho bout a hmu thai. Ahni ni a thaw teh Baptisma a coe.
Hahoi, rawca a ca hnukkhu a tha bout a sai. Sawl teh Damaskas khovah a hnukkâbangnaw koevah dongdengca ao.
Sawl ni Khrih teh Cathut e ca doeh telah sinakoknaw dawk tang a pâpho.
Hote lawk ka thai e naw abuemlah ni kângairu awh teh, hete tami teh Jerusalem kho e Bawipa min kakawnaw raphoe hanlah ka kâyawm e tami nahoehmaw, Ahnimanaw katek vaiteh vaihma bawinaw koevah hrawi hanelah hivah ka tho e nahoehmaw telah ati awh.
Hatei, Sawl teh a tha hoe ao. Jisuh teh Khrih doeh ati teh kampangkhai dawkvah Damaskas kho kaawm e Judahnaw hah a kângairu sak.
A hnin moi ao toteh, Judahnaw ni Sawl hah thei hanlah kho a khang awh.
Hatei, Sawl ni a khokhang awh e a panue. Sawl thei hanelah kho a khang awh dawkvah tangmin tangtho longkha hah a ring awh.
Hatnavah, a hnukkâbangnaw ni Sawl hah a hrawi awh teh, tangmin vah tapawm dawk hoi kho kalupnae rapan hloilah a pabo awh.
Sawl ni Jerusalem a pha navah, a hnukkâbangnaw koe huiko hanlah a panki eiteh a yuem awh hoeh dawkvah a taki awh.
Hatei Barnabas koevah bangtelamaw, Bawipa a hmu teh, Bawipa ni Sawl koe bangtelamaw lawk a dei tie naw hoi Damaskas kho dawk Jisuh min taranhawi lahoi a pâpho e kongnaw kacaicalah a dei pouh.
Sawl teh Jerusalem vah gunceinaw hoi rei a ceio navah, Bawipa min lahoi taranhawi laihoi a pâpho awh.
Sawl teh Grik lawk ka dei e Judahnaw hoi a kâoun awh teh ahnimouh ni Sawl teh thei hanlah a kâcai awh.
Hote kong hah a hmaunawnghanaw ni a thai awh navah, Kaisarea kho lah a ceikhai awh teh, Tarshish kho lah a patoun awh.
Hatnavah Judah kho, Galilee kho, Samaria kho kaawm e kawhmoun pueng ni teh karoumcalah ao awh. Ahnimanaw ni Bawipa takinae dawk thoseh, Kathoung Muitha e thapoenae dawk hai thoseh, a hring awh teh tami hoe a pung awh.
Piter ni hnintangkuem kahlawng a cei teh Lidda khovah a pha. Hote kho dawk kaawm e tami kathoungnaw koe a pai.
Hote kho dawkvah Aeneas tie tami teh kum taroe touh thung a kamkhuen teh ikhun dawk sut ayan e hah a hmu.
Hatnavah Piter ni Aeneas koe Jisuh ni nang teh na dam sak toe, thaw nateh na iphah kalawng leih, atipouh navah ahni teh hluet tang a thaw.
Lidda kho hoi Sharon kho e kaawm e naw ni ahni a hmu awh navah Cathut koe lah a lungkâthung awh.
Joppa kho kaawm e Dawka tie Tabitha teh a hnukkâbang e napui buet touh lah ao. Ahni teh hnokahawi pou ka sak ni teh poenae lahoi thaw ka tawk e lah ao.
Hatnae hnin navah ahni teh a pataw dawk a due. Taminaw ni a ro teh tui a pâhluk awh hnukkhu imvan e irakhan dawk a ta awh.
Joppa kho pui teh Lidda khopui hoi a hnai dawkvah Lidda khothung vah Piter ao tie a hnukkâbangnaw ni a thai toteh ahni koe tami kahni touh a patoun awh. Kaimanaw koevah karang tho ei telah ati pouh.
Hatdawkvah, Piter ni hluet a thaw teh ahnimouh hoi imvan e rakhan thung cungtalah a kâen. Piter a pha toteh lahmainunaw ni Piter e a teng a kangdue awh teh a kâ awh. Ahnimanaw ni Dawka a hring nah a khui e khohnanaw a pâtue awh.
Piter ni ahnimanaw alawilah a tâco sak hnukkhu, a khokcuengkhuem teh a ratoum. Hahoi a ro koe lah a kamlang teh Tabitha thaw leih atipouh navah ahni teh a mit a padai teh Piter hah a hmu toteh a thaw teh a tahung.
Hahoi Piter ni Dawka hah a kut dawk hoi a pathaw teh a kangdue sak. Tami kathoungnaw hoi lahmainunaw a kaw teh bout a hring toe telah ahnimouh koe a patue.
Hote kamthang teh Joppa kho thung pueng dawk a kamthang teh tami moikapap ni Bawipa a yuem awh.
Hot hnukkhu hoi Piter teh Joppa kho dawk phaivuen ka sak e Simon im vah hnin ka saw lah ao.
Kaisarea kho dawk Itali ransahu tie ransa cum touh kaukkung Konilias teh ao.
Ahni teh bawknae koe lah kâyawm poung e lah ao, a imthung ni Cathut ka bari e lah ao awh teh, Judah tami dawk e karoedengnaw a kabawp teh Cathut koe pou a ratoum,
Hnin touh teh tangmin lah suimilam kathum tapat navah vision kacaicalah a hmu. Hote vision a hmu e dawk, Cathut e kalvantami buet touh a kâen teh Konilias telah a pato.
Kalvantami hah lungpuen lahoi khei a khet teh bangne Bawipa telah ati. Kalvantami ni yah Cathut ni na ratoumnae hoi karoedengnaw na kabawp e poehnonaw teh pâkuem hane kawi lah Cathut hmalah a pha toe.
Hatdawkvah atu Joppa khovah tami patoun nateh a min Piter tie Simon hah kaw sak loe.
Ahni teh tuipui teng kaawm e phaivuen ka sak e Simon im a luen telah ati.
Hottelah ka dei e kalvantami a cei hnukkhu Konilias ni,
a vaica kahni touh hoi Cathut lawk dawk kaawm e ransa buet touh a kaw teh Joppa kho lah a patoun.
Atangtho teh Joppa kho a pha tawmlei suimilam kahni kalekkalak nah Piter teh ratoum hanlah lemphu van a luen.
A vonhlam teh ayânaw ni coungkacoe lah rawca a lawng lahun nah, Piter ni kamnuenae a hmu.
Kalvan kamawng teh hni hoi ka kâvan e a takin pali touh e talai dawk ama koe ka bawt e hah a hmu.
Hote tangoung thungvah tava phunkuep, kâroe e phunkuep, saring phunkuep ao. Hathnukkhu Piter thaw nateh, thet nateh cat haw tie lawk a thai navah,
Piter ni coung thai hoeh Bawipa,
kathounghoehe hno, kakhin e hnonaw kai ni vai touh hai ka cat boihoeh atipouh.
Hathnukkhu apâhni lawk bout ka tho e teh Cathut ni a thoung tie hno hah thoung hoeh telah dei hanh atipouh.
Hettelah avaithumnae a kamnue hnukkhu, Cathut ma ni hote hno teh kalvan lah bout a tawm.
Piter ni a hmu e vision hah bang ngainae vaimoe titeh kângairu lahun nah, Konilias ni a patoun e naw ni Simon im pacei laihoi a tawng awh teh longkha koehoi,
Piter telah kaw e Simon hah hete im dawk a luen maw telah a pacei awh.
Piter ni vision kong a pouk lahun nah Muitha ni tami kathum touh ni nang na tawng awh. Thaw nateh kum haw ahnimouh teh,
kai ni ka patoun e doeh. Lung kâounnae awm laipalah kâbang lawih atipouh.
Hatdawkvah Piter ni a kum teh na tawng awh e teh kai doeh. Bang panki lahoi maw na tho awh, atipouh.
Ahnimouh ni hettelah atipouh, ransabawi Kornilias ni na patoun awh e doeh. Ahni teh Cathut ka taket e hoi tami kahawi lah ao teh Judah taminaw ni a baripoung e doeh. Ahni ni na lawk a thai panuek nahan Cathut e kalvantami buet touh ni nang hah coun loe atipouh.
Piter ni taminaw teh imthungkhu kâen awh atipouh teh hote tangmin teh hawvah a roe awh. A tangtho a kârasoup awh teh ahnimouh koe a cei. Joppa kho e hmaunawngha a tangawn hai a cei van.
Tawkkahnin Kaisarea a pha awh teh hawvah Kornilias hoi avaica a huikonaw a coun e naw ni a ring awh.
Piter a kâen tahma Konilias ni a dawn teh a hmalah a tabo.
Piter ni kangdout atipouh, kai hai tami van doeh atipouh.
Piter ni Konilias pato laihoi imthungkhu a kâen nah, tami moikapap a kamkhueng e hah a hmu.
Ahnimouh koe, Judahnaw teh Jentelnaw hoi kamyawng phung nahoeh, ahnimouh koe kahlawng hai cei phung na hoeh tie nangmouh ni kacaicalah na panue awh. Hateiteh tami bang patet hai kakhin hoi kathoung hoeh lah ka pouk hoeh nahan Cathut ni na patue toe.
Hatdawkvah na kaw awh navah banghai oun han awm laipalah ka tho. Hatdawkvah bangkongmaw na kaw awh, dei a haw telah atipouh.
Konilias ni hettelah ati. Atu totouh rawca ka hai, suimilam kathum nah im vah ka ratoum. Atu hnin pali a pha toe. Hnipangaw a kâkhu teh kaie hmalah a kangdue.
Kornilias na ratoum pawlawk kai ni ka thai toe. Nange poehnonaw haiyah Cathut hmalah pahnim hoeh hanelah ao.
Hatdawkvah Joppa kho kaawm Piter tie Simon hah kaw hanlah patoun leih. Tuipui teng phaivuen thaw ka tawk e Simon im doeh a luen. Ahni a tho torei teh nang koe a dei han doeh na ti pouh.
Hatdawkvah kai ni nang koevah tami tang ka patoun. Tang na tho thai dawk ka lung hroung ahawi. Atu kaimanaw pueng ni nang koe Cathut ni a dei e thai thai hanelah na hmalah ka o awh telah Kornilias ni a dei pouh.
Hatnavah Piter ni a kâko a paawng teh, lawkkatang lah Cathut teh tami minhmai khen hoeh ati.
Alouklouk e taminaw hai Cathut taki laihoi thaw kathoungrouk lah ka tawk e tami teh minhmai kahawi a hmu tie kai ni ka panue.
Tami pueng e Cathut ni Jisuh Khrih lahoi roumnae kamthang kahawi a dei e hah, Isarel miphunnaw koe poe e lawk nangmouh ni na panue awh.
Jawhan teh baptisma kong hah a dei hnukkhu Galilee ram hoi a kamtawng teh, Judah ram hmuen tangkuem dawk kaawm e hnonaw nangmouh ni na panue awh.
Cathut ni Kathoung Muitha e bahu hoi Nazareth tami Jisuh hah satui a awi. Ahni teh Cathut e kâ lahoi hnokahawi a sak teh kahraimathout ni a rektap e naw damnae a poe.
Kaimouh haiyah, Jerusalem kho hoi kamtawng teh, Judah ram thung a sak e hnonaw hah kapanuekkhaikung lah ka o awh. Hote tami teh, thingpalam dawk a pathout awh teh a thei awh.
Apâthum hnin Cathut ni bout a thaw sak teh tak kamnuenae kâ a poe.
Tami pueng koe koung kamnuek pouh hoeh. Cathut ni a rawi tangcoung e kapanuekkhaikung kaimouh koe a kamnue, duenae koehoi bout a thaw hnukkhu, hote Bawipa hoi kaimouh teh rei ka canei awh.
Hote Bawipa ni kahringnaw hoi kadoutnaw lawkcengkung lah, Cathut ni a rawi e lah ao tie tami pueng koe dei pouh hane hoi kampangkhai hanelah kaimouh koe kâ na poe awh.
Hote Bawipa ka yuem e pueng a min lahoi lungmanae lahoi yonthanae a coe awh han telah profetnaw pueng teh hote Bawipa kapanuekkhaikung lah ka o awh telah Piter ni a dei.
Hote lawk a dei lahun navah ka thai pueng koe Kathoung Muitha teh a pha.
Jentel miphunnaw ni Kathoung Muitha e lungmanae a coe awh dawk, vuensom ka a e, Piter hoi a hnukkâbangnaw a kângairu awh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, ahnimouh ni alouklouk lae lawk lahoi Cathut a pholen awh.
Hathnukkhu Piter ni kaimouh patetlah Kathoung Muitha ka coe e hetnaw heh baptisma poe sak hoeh hanlah apipatet maw na ka ngang thai han ati hnukkhu
Jisuh Khrih e min lahoi baptisma coe sak hanlah kâ a poe. Hathnukkhu teh Piter hah ahnimanaw ni atueng ka saw hnawn lah okhai hane a kâhei awh.
Judah ram thung kaawm e gunceinaw hoi hmaunawnghanaw ni Jentelnaw ni Cathut lawk a dâw awh toe tie a thai awh.
Hahoi teh Piter ni Jerusalem kho a pha toteh vuensom ka a naw ni ahni teh a pathoe awh.
Nangmanaw vuensom ka a hoeh e naw koe na kâen awh teh na canei awh telah yon a hnei awh.
Hahoi teh Piter ni hote a konglamnaw kahawicalah buet touh hnukkhu buet touh a dei pouh.
Joppa kho ka ratoum navah vision ka hmu. Hni kalenpui buet touh a takin pali touh kaawm e kalvan lahoi kabawt e ka hmu teh ka teng vah a pha.
Athung vah kahawicalah ka khet teh talai van e a khok pali touh e moithangnaw, sarangnaw, a vawn hoi kâva e naw hoi tavanaw hah ka hmu.
Hahoi lawk buet touh ka thai. Piter thaw nateh, thet haw, hahoi teh cat loe, na ti pouh.
Hatei, kai ni coung thai mahoeh Bawipa, bangkongtetpawiteh, kathounghoehe hno teh ka kâko dawk kâen boihoeh ka ti pouh.
Hatnavah apâhni lah kalvan hoi e a lawk teh Cathut ni a thoungsak e nang ni thoung hoeh tet hanh a ti.
Hettelah vai thum touh thung ati hnukkhu hotnaw pueng teh kalvan lah bout a tawm.
Hat navah, Kaisarea kho lahoi kai koe a patoun e tami kathum touh kai ka onae im hmalah a kangdue awh.
Hatnavah Kathoung Muitha ni oupvoutnae awm laipalah ahnimouh hoi rei cet lawih telah na ti pouh. Hete hmaunawngha taruk touh hai kai hoi rei a cei awh teh kaimouh teh ahni im ka kâen awh.
Hote tami ni kalvantami ni ahnie imthungkhu a kangdue teh Joppa kho lah tami patoun nateh Piter tie Simon hah kaw loe.
Ahni ni nangmouh imthungkhu abuemlah rungngang lah na o awh nahanlah a hmu e hah na dei pouh han ti teh a hmu e hah kaimouh koe a dei.
Hahoi teh tang ka dei teh, Kathoung Muitha teh ahmaloe maimae lathueng a pha e patetlah ahnimouh lathueng hai a pha van.
Hatnavah Jawhan ni tui baptisma a poe. Nangmouh teh Kathoung Muitha dawk baptisma na hmu awh han telah Bawipa ni a dei e lawn ka pouk.
Hat torei teh, Cathut ni Bawipa Jisuh Khrih ka yuem e nangmouh na poe e poehno patetlah, ahnimouh haiyah a poe van dawkvah, bangtelah vai khuet ka rakhout thai toung va telah atipouh.
Ahnimouh teh hote lawk a thai navah sairasuepcalah ao awh. Hathnukkhu Cathut a pholen awh teh Cathut ni hringnae dawk pha sak lah kaawm e pankângainae phunglawk hah Jentelnaw koe haiyah a poe toe titeh a dei awh.
Stiven rektap kecu dawk kâkapek awh e naw teh, Phoenicia ram koehoi saipras tuilum hoi Antiok kho totouh a cei awh. Ahnimouh teh Judah miphun dei laipalah, api koehai kamthang lawk teh dei awh hoeh toe.
Hatei, Saipras hoi Grik kho e tami a tangawn ahnimouh koe a bawk teh Antiok kho a cei awh. Grik lawk ka dei e Judahnaw koe haiyah a dei pouh teh Bawipa Jisuh e kamthang kahawi teh a dei awh.
Bawipa e thaonae kut teh ahnimouh hoi rei ao dawkvah, tami moikapap ni a yuem awh teh Bawipa koe a kâthung awh.
Ahnimae kamthang teh Jerusalem kaawm e kawhmoun ni a thai navah, Barnabas hah Antiok kho cei hanlah a patoun awh.
Barnabas a pha teh, Cathut e lungmanae a hmu torei teh a lunghawi, ahnimanaw hanlah yuemnae lahoi Bawipa koe pou kâhnai hanelah tha a poe teh a hroecoe.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, ahni teh tami kahawilah ao dawkvah, Kathoung Muitha hoi thoseh, yuemnae hoi thoseh, kakawi e lah ao. Hatnavah tami moikapap Bawipa dawk a kâthung awh.
Barnabas teh Tarshish kho a cei teh, Sawl hah a tawng.
A kâhmo toteh Antiok khovah a thokhai teh kum touh thung kawhmoun hoi a kamkhueng awh teh tami moikapap a cangkhai awh. Antiok khovah ahnukkâbangnaw hah Khristennaw telah hmaloe a kaw awh.
Hatnae tueng dawkvah Jerusalem hoi Antiok khovah profetnaw a cei awh.
Ahnimouh thung dawkvah Agabus tie ni a kangdue teh, talaivan pueng dawkvah takang kalenpounge a tho han telah muitha lahoi a pâpho. Hote takang teh Kalawdias siangpahrang a tawk nah a tho.
Hatnavah a hnukkâbangnaw ni a tithai awh e patetlah kabawp hanelah lengkaleng a tâcokhai awh.
Ahnimouh ni hottelah a tâcokhai e hah Barnabas hoi Sawl koehoi patuen kacuenaw koe a patawn awh.
Hatnae tueng nah Herod siangpahrang ni kawhmoun thungvah tami tangawn rektap hanelah a man awh.
Ahni ni Jawhan e hmau Jem hah tahloi hoi a thei.
Hettelah a thei nah Judahnaw a lunghawi awh tie a hmu dawkvah Piter hai man hanlah bout a kâcai. Hatnae tueng teh tonphuenhoehe vaiyei pawi lah ao.
Herod ni Piter a man hoi thongim thung a pakhum teh ka ring hanelah ransa phu touh dawk pali touh kaawm e, phu pali touh koe a poe. Ahni ni ceitakhai pawi a baw toteh tamimaya hmalah a tâcokhai han a ngainae ao.
Hettelah hoi Piter teh thongim thung a paung awh. Hatnavah kawhmoun ni Piter hanlah Cathut koe puenghoi a ratoum pouh awh.
Herod ni tamimaya hmalah a tâcokhai nahane hnin a pha hoehnahlan tangmin vah Piter hah sumbawtarui kahni touh hoi a pakhi awh teh ransa roi e rahak a i sak awh. Ka ring e naw ni hai takhang koe king a ring awh.
Hatnavah Cathut e kalvantami a tho teh thongim thung pheng a ang. Kalvantami ni Piter e a na koe a tek pouh teh, karang thaw leih atipouh. Hat nah tahma vah sumbawtaruinaw ahni kut dawk hoi pak a ca pouh.
Kalvantami ni, taisawm kâyeng nateh khokkhawm khawm leih atipouh e patetlah Piter ni a kâroe. Hahoi, hni kâkhu nateh ka hnuk kâbang, bout atipouh.
Piter ni a thaw teh ahnie a hnuk a kâbang. Hatei kalvantami ni ati e hah kantak nahoeh mue, vision mue ka hmu a ti.
Thongim karingkungnaw ni, ringnae apasueke hoi apâhni e hmuen a tapoung teh kho thung kâennae sum longkha koe a pha roi. Hote longkha hai a mahmawk a kamawng teh hote hmuen koehoi a tâco roi. Hahoi lamthung buet touh dawk a cei navah, kalvantami ni Piter teh a ceitakhai .
Hatnavah Piter a lungcai teh, Bawipa ni a kalvantami a patoun teh, Herod bawi e kut dawk hoi Judahnaw ni a sak e naw thung hoi, kai hah na hlout sak katang e ka panue telah a dei.
Hote hno kaawm e a lungcai katang hoiyah Mark ati awh e Jawhan e a manu Meri im lah a cei. Hote im dawk taminaw a kamkhueng awh teh a ratoum awh.
Piter ni takhang tho a takhawng pouh nah Rhoda tie sannu ni tho paawng hanlah a cei.
Piter e a lawk tie a nout navah, tho paawng pouh laipalah lunghawinae lahoi im thung lah a yawng teh, tho koe Piter a kangdue, tie a dei pouh.
Ahnimouh ni, na pathu maw atipouh awh. Hatei napui ca ni a tang doeh telah makkhak a dei. Hatdawkvah ahnimouh ni yah, ahnie a kalvantami vai aw, atipouh awh.
Hatnavah Piter ni tho a takhawng. Ahnimouh ni a paawng teh a hmu navah a kângairu awh.
Sairasuep lah awm awh telah a kut hoi a kamnue sak. Bawipa ni bangtelah hoi maw thongim thung hoi na tâco sak tie a dei pouh. Hete konglamnaw hah, Jem hoi hmaunawnghanaw koehai dei pouh awh atipouh teh alouklah a ceitakhai .
Amom khodai toteh, Piter heh bangne ka tet ati awh teh ransanaw teh ruengrueng ati awh e heh kathoenge nahoeh.
Herod ni tawng awh atipouh. Hatei hmawt awh hoeh. Karingkungnaw pacei nateh thet awh telah kâ a poe. Hathnukkhu vah Herod teh Judah ram hoi Kaisarea kho lah a cei teh hawvah dawngdeng ao.
Herod teh Taire hoi Sidon taminaw koevah, puenghoi a lungphuen dawkvah, ahnimanaw ni Herod koe a tho awh teh, Herod ka ring e Blastus hah kâmaihawikhai hanelah a dei pouh awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh ahnimae ram teh siangpahrang e ram thung hoi canei ka hmawt e lah ao awh.
Ahnimouh kamkhueng hnin vah Herod teh ama Siangpahrang e a puengcang kâmahrawk teh a bawitungkhung dawkvah a tahung teh tamimaya koe lawk a dei pouh.
Kamkhueng e taminaw ni, Lawk kadeikung heh tami kahring e lawk nahoeh cathut e lawk doeh titeh a hram awh.
Herod ni Cathut hah a bari hoeh dawkvah Bawipa e kalvantami ni vai touh lahoi a hem. Ahni teh pâri ni a ca teh a due.
Cathut lawk teh a kampai teh hoe a kamphung.
Barnabas hoi Sawl ni kabawpnae thaw a cum roi hnukkhu Mark tie Jawhan hai a hrawi roi teh Jerusalem hoi bout a ban awh.
Antiok kho kaawm e kawhmoun dawkvah Barnabas, Niger telah kaw e Simeon, Sairen tami Lusius, Herod bawi e a hui Manean, Sawl tinaw, profetnaw hoi kacangkhaikungnaw teh ao awh.
Ahnimouh ni rawca hai lahoi Bawipa a bawk awh navah Kathoung Muitha ni Barnabas hoi Sawl heh kai ni ka hmoun pouh e thaw tawk hanelah na takhoe pouh awh telah a ti.
Hatnavah ahnimouh ni rawcahai ratoum hnukkhu ahnimouh roi e lathueng kut a toung awh teh a patoun awh.
Hahoi, ahnimouh teh Kathoung Muitha ni a patoun awh e patetlah Seleukia kho lavah a cei awh teh Saipras lah long hoi a cei awh.
Salamis kho a pha awh navah, Judahnaw e sinakoknaw dawkvah Cathut lawk hah a pâpho awh. Ahnimouh ni kabawmkung lah Jawhan hai a hrawi awh.
Hote tuilum pet a kâhei hnukkhu Paphos kho totouh a pha awh navah camkathoum e profet kaphawk Barjisuh a kâhmo awh.
Ahni teh, hote tuilum ka uk e bawi Sergius tie teh Pawlus e a hui lah ao. Khobawi ni Cathut lawk thai hanelah puenghoi a ngai dawkvah Barnabas hoi Sawl teh a kaw.
Hatei camkathoum e Elymas ni khobawi hah yuemnae koehoi phen sak hanelah a panki teh Barnabas hoi Sawl teh a ngang.
Hatnavah Pawl telah kaw e Sawl teh Kathoung Muitha hoi akawi dawkvah,
hote tami heh khei a khet teh, dumyennae hoi kakawi e kahraimathout capa, lannae taran lah kaawm e nang teh Cathut e lannae lamthung heh raphoe laipalah na awm thai hoeh maw.
Khenhaw! Cathut kut teh na tak dawk atu a pha toung dawkvah, na mit dawn vaiteh kho hmawt laipalah hnintha kasawlah na o han atipouh. Hat nah tahma vah, a mit amom teh kho lah a hmo pouh dawkvah ka hrawi hane tami vaivai a payam laihoi a tawng.
