Bangkongtetpawiteh, ahnimouh teh a hnâpang, a mitdawn awh teh, a lungthin kamlang awh hoeh. Hoehpawiteh, a mit hoi hmawt awh vaiteh, hnâ hoi thai awh vaiteh, a lung hoi a thaipanuek awh vaiteh, kâthung awh vaiteh, kai ni ka dam sak han a ti.
Hatdawkvah Cathut e rungngangnae teh Jentelnaw koe poe lah ao toung dawkvah, ahnimanaw ni teh a ngai awh han tie hah panuek awh telah Pawl ni a dei pouh.
Hete lawk hah Pawl ni a dei navah, Judahnaw teh thouk a kâoun awh teh a ban awh.
Kum hni touh thung Pawl teh im a hlai e dawk a o, ama koe ka tho e naw pueng a luen sak teh,
banghai tarawknae awm laipalah, Cathut uknaeram kong hah, taranhawi laihoi a pâpho teh, Bawipa Jisuh Khrih e a kongnaw hah a cangkhai.
Pawl, Silvanas hoi Timote tinaw ni Cathut hoi Bawipa Jisuh Khrih dawk kaawm e, Thesalon kho e kawhmoun, nangmouh koe ca na patawn awh. Bawipa Jisuh Khrih hoi maimae Pa Cathut koe e lungmanae hoi roumnae teh nangmouh koe awm lawiseh.
Nangmae yuemnae dawk pout laipalah Cathut ka pholen awh teh, nangmouh hanlah pou ka ratoum awh.
Nangmouh ni yuemnae lahoi thaw na tawknae, lungpatawnae lahoi na pankinae, maimae Bawipa Jisuh Khrih ngaihawinae lahoi lungcaknae hah maimae Pa lah kaawm e Cathut hmalah pout laipalah pou pouk awh.
Cathut ni lungpataw e hmaunawnghanaw nangmanaw teh rawi lah na o awh e hah ka panue awh.
Kaimouh teh nangmouh hoi rei o awh navah, nangmouh koe bangpatet e tami lah maw ka o awh tie hah na panue awh e patetlah kaimouh ni ka pâpho awh e kamthang lawk teh, nangmouh koevah lawkhrawng tho hoeh. Lentoenae hoi, Kathoung Muitha hoi panuecainae lahoi doeh a tho.
Nangmanaw teh runae na khang awh nakunghai, Kathoung Muitha koe e lunghawinae hoi lawkkatang hah na dâw awh teh, nangmouh teh kaimouh hoi Bawipa hnukkâbang e lah o awh.
Hatdawkvah, nangmouh teh Masidonia hoi Akhaia ram kaawm e kayuemnaw pueng hanelah, khetsin hane kawi lah na o awh.
Bangtelamaw tetpawiteh, Bawipa e lawk teh nangmouh koehoi, Masidonia ram, Akhaia ram pueng dawk a kamthang dueng tho laipalah, Cathut na yuemnae kong teh, khoram tangkuem a kamthang. Kaimouh ni buet touh hai toun hane awmhoeh.
Kaimouh teh nangmouh koe bangtelamaw ka kâen awh tie hah namamouh ni na dei awh. Hringnae hoi kakawi e Cathung katang e thaw tawk hanelah hai thoseh,
ka tho hane Cathut lungkhueknae dawk hoi maimouh na kahloutsakkung Bawipa Jisuh Khrih, duenae koehoi Cathut ni a thaw sak e Capa teh kalvan hoi bout a tho han tie ngaihawinae, meikaphawk hah pahnawt teh, Cathut koe na kâthungnae kongnaw hai a dei awh.
Hmaunawnghanaw, nangmouh koe ka tho awh e hah, ayawmyin lah awm hoeh tie namamouh ni na panue awh.
Nangmouh ni na panue awh e patetlah kaimanaw teh, Filippi khovah rucatnae hoi rektapnae hmaloe ka khang awh hnukkhu, Cathut kângue laihoi kâtuknae kalen kâhmo awh teh, Cathut e kamthang kahawi hah nangmouh hanlah taranhawi laihoi ka pâpho awh.
Yonnae, kamhnawngnae, dumyennae lahoi kaimouh ni nangmanaw hah tha na poe awh hoeh.
Kamthang kahawi ka phawt hanelah Cathut ni na ta dawkvah, tami lunghawi sak hane na hoeh, maimae lungthin ka tanouk e Cathut lunghawi sak nahanelah doeh, kaimouh ni ka pâpho awh.
Bangtelamaw tetpawiteh, nangmouh ni na panue awh e patetlah nangmouh pasawtpanepnae lawk buet touh boehai ka dei awh hoeh. Hounlounnae lahoi kâsaknae hai awm hoeh tie teh Cathut nihai a kampangkhai.
Hot hloilah, Khrih e guncei lah ka o teh, nangmouh hnokari na phu sak thai awh ei, tami ni poe e bawilennae hah nangmouh koe ka tawng awh hoeh, alouknaw koehai ka tawng awh hoeh.
A manu ni a ca a khetyawt e patetlah nangmouh koe lungnemnae lahoi na khetyawt awh.
Kaimouh ni nangmouh lung na pataw dawkvah, Cathut e kamthang kahawi dueng tho laipalah, kamamae hringnae totouh pasoung hanelah nangmouh koe lungthonae ka tawn awh.
Hmaunawnghanaw, patang laihoi kâyawm e hah nangmouh ni na panue awh. Cathut e kamthang kahawi nangmouh koe ka dei awh nah, nangmouh han hnokari lah ka o awh hoeh nahanelah, karum khodai thaw ka tawk awh.
Nangmouh kayuemnaw rahak ka o awh navah, thoungnae hoi lannae dawk toun hoeh e lah ka o awh e hah nangmouh hoi Cathut teh kapanuekkhaikung lah a o.
Na pa ni canaw a khetyawt e patetlah nangmouh haiyah na khetyawt awh tie na panue awh.
A ram hoi a lentoenae thungvah nangmouh na ka kaw e ni, a ngai e patetlah hring awh nahanelah, pout laipalah, kâhroecoenae lahoi lung na pahawi awh teh, tha na poe awh.
Nangmouh ni kaimouh koehoi Cathut e kamthang kahawi na dâw awh navah, tami e lawk na dâw awh hoeh, Cathut e lawk roeroe doeh na dâw awh tie hai thoseh, ka yuem tangcoungnaw hringnae dawk, Cathut lawk ni thaw a tawk tie hai thoseh, na dâw awh tie ka thai awh navah, Cathut lungmanae hah pout laipalah ka pholen awh.
Bangtelah tetpawiteh, hmaunawnghanaw, Khrih Jisuh thung kaawm niteh, Judah ram kaawm, Cathut e kawhmounnaw hah Judahnaw ni a rektap awh e patetlah nangmouh hai namamae taminaw ni rektapnae na khang awh.
Judahnaw ni Jisuh koehoi a kamtawng awh teh profetnaw a thei awh toe. Maimouh hai na rektap awh toe. Cathut e ngainae hai tarawi awh hoeh. Taminaw puenghoi hai a kâtaran awh toe.
Jentelnaw rungngangnae koe pha sak hanelah kaimouh ni pâpho e kamthang lawk hai a ngang awh teh, amamae yonnae teh pou a kuep sak awh toe. Hatdawkvah, Cathut lungkhueknae ni ahnimouh lathueng a bosin awh.
Hmaunawnghanaw kaimouh teh lungthin hoi tho laipalah, tak hoi dawngdengca kamphei awh navah, nangmae minhmai hmu hanlah, na rabui awh teh, kâhmo hanelah hoe ka panki awh.
Hatdawkvah, kaimouh teh nangmouh koe tho hanlah ka ngai awh. Kai Pawl teh nangmouh onae koe vai hni touh tho han ka kâcai ei, Setan ni na ngang.
Maimae Bawipa Jisuh Khrih bout a tho torei teh, amae hmalah kaimae ngaihawinae, lunghawinae hoi, kâoupnae, bawilukhung lah kaawm hane teh, api nahoeh, nangmouh doeh toe.
Nangmouh teh kaimae bawilennae hoi lunghawinae katang lah na o awh.
Hatdawkvah, kaimouh teh bout ka khang thai awh hoeh dawkvah, Athen kho o hane doeh kahawipoung telah ka ti awh toe.
Khrih e kamthang kahawi ka pâpho niteh, Cathut thaw reirei ka tawk e ka nawngha Timote hah nangmouh koe ka patoun awh.
Nangmouh koe ka patoun ngainae teh, kaimouh ni ka khang awh e rutcatnae kecu dawk, api nang hai hnuklah na kâhnawn awh hoeh nahanelah, na yuemnae dawk na cak awh nahanelah, hroecoe sak hanlah doeh ka patoun.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, nangmouh hoi cungtalah o awh navah, maimouh teh, rucat rektapnae khang awh han telah nangmouh koe sut ka dei e patetlah doeh, a tho toe tie hah na panue awh.
Hatdawkvah, kâdumkâyennae, taminaw ni nangmouh hah na dumyen awh teh, kaimouh ni patangpalai laihoi thaw ka tawk awh e hah, ayawmyin lah awm payon vaih tie ka puen awh teh, ka khang thai awh hoeh dawkvah, nangmae yuemnae panue han ka ngai awh dawkvah, ka patoun e doeh.
Hatei, atuvah Timote teh nangmouh koehoi bout a tho teh, nangmae yuemnae hoi lungpataw awh e, kaimouh ni nangmouh pou na pouk awh teh nangmae mei hmu han ka ngai awh e patetlah, nangmouh nihai kaimouh pou na pouk awh teh, mei hmu han na ngai awh e kamthangnaw hah kaimouh koe bout a dei.
Hatdawkvah, hmaunawnghanaw, kaimouh teh, rucatnae hoi rektapnae aphunphun ka khang awh ei nakunghai, nangmae yuemnae ni tha na poe awh.
Nangmouh ni Bawipa dawkvah kacaklah na awm awh pawiteh atu kaimouh teh ka hring awh.
Maimae Cathut hmalah, nangmouh kecu dawk kaimouh lunghawinae ka hmu awh han e khet navah, Cathut e lungmanae bangtelamaw ka patho thai awh han.
Kaimouh teh nangmouh hoi kâhmo thai awh nahan hoi, nangmae yuemnae dawk a panki e naw, pakhout thai nahanlah karum khodai thahmei laihoi ka ratoum awh.
Nangmouh na onae koe kaimouh ka tho thai nahanlah Pa Cathut hoi, maimae Bawipa Jisuh Khrih ni lam na rasoun pouh lawiseh.
Kaimouh ni nangmouh lungpataw e patetlah, nangmouh hai buet touh hoi buet touh koe thoseh, tami pueng koe thoseh, na pung awh teh, lungpatawnae dawk na roung thai awh nahan Cathut ni na pathoup awh lawiseh.
Hahoi maimae Bawipa Jisuh Khrih teh, a tami kathoungnaw puenghoi a tho awh torei teh, maimae na pa Cathut hmalah tounhoehe lah, na lungthin teh Cathut ni thoungnae lahoi caksak lawiseh. Amen.
A hnukteng lah, hmaunawnghanaw, Cathut ngainae patetlah na hring thai awh nahanelah, bangtelamaw hring han tie hah kaimouh koehai na kamtu awh teh, hoe na roung thai awh nahanlah Bawipa Jisuh min lahoi tha na poe awh.
Bawipa Jisuh lahoi bangpatete kâpoelawknaw maw na poe awh tie hah na panue awh.
Cathut e ngainae teh nangmouh ni kamsoumhoehe napui tongpa yonnae na roun awh vaiteh thoungsaknae,
nangmouh pueng ni thoungsaknae hoi barinae hoi, mahoima kâhruetcuet han tie na panue awh teh,
Cathut ka panuek hoeh e Jentelnaw patetlah talai ngainae dawk hring awh hanh.
Bangpatet dawk hai thoseh, hmaunawngha hah dumyennae lahoi yon awh hoeh nahanlah a ngainae ao. Nangmanaw hah kaimouh ni kâhruetcuetnae sut ka dei awh e patetlah, hot patetlah e yonnae ka sak e pueng hah Bawipa ni a rek han.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, Cathut ni maimouh teh khinsak hanelah na kaw awh hoeh, thoungnae thung doeh na kaw awh.
Hatdawkvah hete cangkhai e naw ka ek e tami teh, tami e lawk dueng ek e tho laipalah, Bawipa e Kathoung Muitha maimouh na kapoekung Cathut ka ek e lah ao.
Hmaunawnghanaw lungpatawnae hah ca lahoi thut vaiteh nangmouh na patawn hanlah ngaihoeh toe, Bangkongtetpawiteh, nangmouh teh buet touh hoi buet touh lungpataw nahanlah Cathut koe na kamtu e lah na o awh.
Kayuemhoehnaw e hmalah khet kamcu lah na hring awh nahan hoi apihai na vout awh hoeh nahanelah,
nangmouh teh Masidonia ram kaawm e hmaunawnghanaw koe hote lungpatawnae na sak awh toe. Hatdawkvah, hmaunawnghanaw hoe lung na kâpataw thai nahan,
kai ni kâ na poe e patetlah lungmawng ca lahoi na o awh teh, mae kut hoi thaw na tawk awh nahan, tha na poe awh.
Hmaunawnghanaw ngaihawinae katawnhoehnaw patetlah nangmouh teh lungmathoe awh hoeh nahanelah, nangmouh ni kaipnaw e kong hah panuek laipalah na o awh hane na ngaikhai awh hoeh.
Jisuh teh duenae koehoi bout a thaw toe tie hah na yuem awh pawiteh, hot patetvanlah Jisuh dawk ka ip e naw hai Bawipa hoi cungtalah Cathut ni a thaw sak han.
Bawipa e a lawk lahoi nangmouh koe ka dei awh e teh, Bawipa bout a tho toteh, kahring e maimouh ni ka ip tangcoungnaw hmâcu awh mahoeh.
Bawipa ni kacaipoung lah hram vaiteh, kalvantaminaw ukkung bawi e lawk hoi, Cathut e mongka ueng lawk hoi ama roeroe kalvan kho hoi a kum han. Khrih thung kadout tangcoungnaw teh hmaloe a thaw awh han.
Hatnavah la kahring e maimouh teh, kahlî dawk Bawipa hoi kâhmo hanelah, ahnimanaw hoi cungtalah, tâmai dawk na tawm awh vaiteh, Bawipa hoi pout laipalah o awh han.
Hatdawkvah, hete lawknaw hoi buet touh hoi buet touh lung kâpahawi awh.
Hmaunawnghanaw hninthanaw hoi tuengnaw hah thut vaiteh na patawn hanelah panki hoeh toe.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, tamru teh karum vah a tho e patetlah Bawipa e hnin teh a tho van han tie hah nangmouh ni kamcengcalah na panue awh.
Lungmawngnae ao, rucatnae ka hlout toe ati awh lahun nah camo ka vawn e napui ni camo a khe nah patawnae a khang e patetlah pouk laipalah rawknae phat vaiteh, khoeroe hlout awh mahoeh.
Hatei hmaunawnghanaw hote hnin teh tamru patetlah nangmouh koe a tho nahanlah nangmouh teh khohmo thung na awm awh hoeh.
Nangmouh pueng teh angnae hoi khodai e ca lah na o awh. Khohmo ca lah na awm awh hoeh.
Hatdawkvah alouknaw ni a i awh e patetlah maimouh teh ip laipalah, kâhruetcuet laihoi ring awh sei .
Bangkongtetpawiteh ka ip e naw teh khohmo vah a i awh, kaparuinaw hai tangmin vah a parui awh.
Khodai ca lah kaawm e maimouh teh kâhruetcuet awh sei. Yuemnae hoi lungpatawnae lah kaawm e saiphei, rungngangnae ngaihawinae sum luhuem kâmahrawk awh sei .
A lungkhueknae khang sak hanelah Cathut ni maimouh na rawi e nahoeh, Bawipa Jisuh Khrih lahoi rungngangnae coe sak hanelah doeh na rawi awh.
Maimouh teh kâhlaw awh nakunghai, i awh nakunghai Bawipa hoi cungtalah hring awh nahanelah, maimouh hanelah a due toe.
Hatdawkvah, nangmouh ni atu hai na sak awh e patetlah buet touh hoi buet touh thakâpoe laihoi kâtawmdawm awh sei .
Hothloilah, nangmouh thung dawk vah, a thaw ka tawk e, Bawipa kâ lahoi ka uk e, hroecoe ka poe e tami hah panuek awh nateh,
ahnimouh ni a tawk awh e dawkvah lungpatawnae hoi na barilawa awh nahan, buet touh hoi buet touh kâpocalah awm awh.
Hmaunawnghanaw, kamsoumhoehlah kaawm e naw hah kâhruetcuetnae poe awh. A lung kathoengnaw thapoe awh. A thakayounnaw ka bawm awh. Tami pueng koe na lungsaw sak awh.
Buet touh hoi buet touh yon kâpathung hoeh nahan kâhruetcuet awh nateh, namamouh koehai thoseh, ayânaw koehai thoseh, panki laihoi hnokahawi pou sak awh.
Pout laipalah konawm awh.
Pout laipalah ratoum awh.
Bangpueng dawk lunghawilawk dei awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh Khrih Jisuh thung nangmouh ni hottelah na sak awh nahanelah Cathut ni na ngaikhai awh.
Kathoung Muitha e a hue roum sak awh hanh.
Profet lawk hah noutna laipalah awm hanh.
Hno puengpa hah tanouk awh nateh hnokahawi e teh kacaklah kuen awh.
Kahawi hoeh e kaawm e pueng hah roun awh.
Roumnae Cathut ama ni nangmouh abuemlah pin na thoungsak lawiseh. Maimae Bawipa Jisuh Khrih a tho toteh, nangmae tak, lungthin, muitha abuemlah tounhoehe lah na o awh nahan na kabawm lawiseh.
Nangmouh na kakawkung teh yuemkamcu lah ao dawkvah hottelah a sak han doeh.
Hmaunawnghanaw kaimouh han lah na ratoum pouh awh.
hmaunawnghanaw pueng hah kathounge kâpaconae lahoi kâdawn awh.
Hete ca heh hmaunawngha tami kathoungnaw abuemlah koe na touk pouh awh nahanelah Bawipa Min lahoi lawk na thui awh.
Maimae Bawipa Jisuh Khrih e a lungmanae teh nangmouh pueng koe awm lawiseh. Amen.
Pawl, Silvanas, hoi Timote tinaw ni, maimae Pa Cathut hoi Bawipa Jisuh Khrih dawk kaawm e Thesalon kho kaawm Kawhmoun koe ca na patawn awh.
Bawipa Jisuh Khrih hoi maimae Pa Cathut koehoi e lungmanae hoi lungmawngnae teh nangmouh koe awm lawiseh.
Hmaunawnghanaw, nangmae yuemnae teh, puenghoi a roung teh, buet touh hoi buet touh lengkaleng lungpatawnae hoi na kawi awh dawkvah, kaimouh ni sak hane kawi lah ao e patetlah nangmouh kecu dawk Cathut lungmanae teh pout laipalah ka pholen awh.
Hottelah nangmouh ni rektapnae, rucat kâhmonae pueng hah na khang awh laihoi, na yuemnae ka hmu navah, Cathut e kawhmounnaw koe nangmouh na kâoupkhai awh.
Nangmouh ni, Cathut uknaeram hanelah, reithai na khang awh teh, hote ram thung kâen hanlah na kamcu toe tie hah panue sak nahan, kalan lah Cathut e lawkcengnae teh hottelah hoi a kamnue sak.
Cathut ni kalanlah a sak han. Nangmouh runae na ka poe koe runae a pha sak vaiteh,
Runae kâhmo e nangmouh hoi kaimouh koevah kâhatnae na poe awh han.
Bangtelamaw tetpawiteh, Bawipa Jisuh Khrih teh bahu kaawm e kalvantaminaw hoi kalvan kho hoi a kum toteh, Cathut kapanuekhoehnaw hoi Bawipa Jisuh Khrih e kamthang kahawi ka thai ngai hoeh e naw pueng teh, hmai hoi runae a poe han.
Bawipa Jisuh teh a tami kathoungnaw lahoi amae thao bawilennae a kamnue e hai thoseh, kaimae lawkpanuesaknae na yuem awh dawkvah,
kayuemnaw pueng lahoi kângairu pholennae hai thoseh, coe hanelah a tho na hnin vah, ahnimouh teh Bawipa e hmaitung bawilennae koehoi kapek vaiteh, a yungyoe rawknae hoi reknae hah a khang awh han.
Hatdawkvah, maimae Cathut hoi Bawipa Jisuh Khrih e a lungmanae patetlah Bawipa Jisuh Khrih e Min teh nangmouh koehoi bawilennae a kamnue nahanelah thoseh, nangmouh hai Bawipa koehoi bawilen a kamnue nahanelah thoseh, nangmouh teh kaw e lah na kamcu awh tie panuek awh nateh,
hno kahawi sak han lungthonae pueng hoi, na yuemnae koe bawilennae bahu hoi akawi nahanlah kaimouh ni nangmouh hanlah pou ka ratoum awh.
Hmaunawnghanaw, Bawipa Jisuh Khrih a tho nahane hoi ama koe maimouh cungtalah kamkhueng nahane hoi ka kâkuenlah,
Muitha lahoi thoseh, a lawk pâphonae lahoi thoseh, ca na patawn awh e lahoi thoseh, Bawipa e hnin teh yo a tho toe telah a dei awh eiteh, lungpuen tâsuenae tang na tawn awh hoeh nahanlah na dei pouh ngai awh.
Apini hai bangpatetlah hoi hai kâdum sak hanh awh. Hote hnin a pha hoehnahlan kâkapeknae hmaloe awm vaiteh, tamikahawihoehe rawknae capa teh a tâco han.
Ahni teh Cathut hoi bawknae pueng hah a taran vaiteh, amahoima kârasang vaiteh, Cathut e bawkim dawk tahung vaiteh, amahoima Cathut doeh telah a kâpathang han.
Nangmouh hoi rei ka o awh navah hote kongnaw yo ka dei awh e hah na pâkuem awh hoeh maw
Ahni teh amae tue nah a tâco nahanelah, atuvah ka ngang e ao tie hai na panue awh.
Bangtelamaw tetpawiteh, kâlawklaipanae arulawk teh, atuvah a kâroe lahun toe. Hatei kangangkung takhoe lah ao hoehroukrak a ngang han.
Takhoe lah ao torei teh kâlawklaipa e tami a kamnue han. Hote tami kahawihoehe hah Bawipa Jisuh ni amae muitha lawk lahoi raphoe vaiteh, a kumnae raeng hoi a takhoe han.
Rawknae koe ka phat hane taminaw koevah hote tami kahawihoehe a thonae teh, Setan e thawtawknae lahoi dumyennae bahu, mitnoutnae, kângairu hno aphunphun hoi, kamsoumhoehe dumyennae aphunphun hoi a tho han.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, ahnimouh teh, rungngang lah o nahanelah, lawkkatang lungpataw hane ngai awh hoeh.
Hatdawkvah, lawkkatang hah yuem laipalah, kamsoumhoehe hno dawk kahring e naw pueng teh,
lawkkatang ka yuem hoeh niteh lanhoehnae dawk kaawmnaw hah yonphukhangsak nahane doeh.
Hateiteh, Bawipa ni lungpataw e hmaunawnghanaw, nangmouh teh thoungsaknae, lawkkatang yuemnae lahoi rungngangnae dawk pha hanelah Cathut ni hmaloe hoiyah na rawi awh toung dawkvah, nangmouh kecu dawk kaimouh ni Cathut lungmanae pout laipalah ka pholen awh han.
Hot patetlah hanelah kamthang kahawi lahoi nangmouh teh na kaw awh toe. Bangkongtetpawiteh, nangmouh teh, Bawipa Jisuh Khrih e bawilennae hmawngkhai nahanelah doeh.
Hatdawkvah hmaunawnghanaw, lawk lahoi hai thoseh, ca lahoi hai thoseh, kaimouh ni na cangkhai awh e lawkkatang dawk kacaklah kangdout awh nateh na lungpen awh.
Maimanaw lungpataw niteh, a yungyoe lungpahawinae, lungmanae lahoi kahawi e ngaihawinae na ka poe e, maimae Pa Cathut hoi maimae Bawipa Jisuh Khrih ama roeroe ni,
nangmae lungthin a dam sak teh, lawk kahawi, hnokahawi pueng dawk nangmanaw hah na caksak awh naseh.
Ahnoungpoung lah, hmaunawnghanaw, Bawipa e lawkkatang teh, nangmouh koe a kâkahei teh Bawilennae a kamnue e patetlah hmuen tangkuem koehai a kamnue thai nahanelah,
ka kaisue niteh tami kahawihoehe naw kut dawk hoi ka hlout awh thai nahan kaimouh hanelah na ratoum pouh awh.
Hatei, Bawipa teh yuemkamcu e lah ao. Nangmouh na caksak awh vaiteh kahawihoehe hno pueng dawk hoi hlout nahanelah na kabawp awh han.
Kaimouh ni kâ na poe e patetlah nangmouh ni na tarawi awh. Hmalah haiyah bout na tarawi awh han doeh titeh Bawipa kâuep laihoi oupvoutnae ka tawn awh hoeh.
Cathut lungpataw sak nahanelah thoseh, Khrih patetlah hring sak nahanelah thoseh, Bawipa ni nangmae lung hah hroecoe lawiseh.
Hmaunawnghanaw kaimouh koe na kamtu awh e patetlah tarawi laipalah hno kamsoumhoeh lah ka sak e hmaunawnghanaw pueng hah roun awh tie hah maimae Bawipa Jisuh Khrih min lahoi kâ na poe awh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh kaimouh ni ka tawksak e patetlah nangmouh ni bangtelamaw ka tawksak han tie teh na panue awh. Kaimouh ni hno kamsoumhoehlah ka sak awh hoeh.
Apie rawca hai ka cat rumram awh hoeh. Nangmouh thung dawk buet touh boehai na tarawk awh hoeh nahanlah patangpalai laihoi kâyawm awh teh karum khodai thaw ka tawk awh.
Hottelah ka saknae teh hmu han ka ngai awh dawk nahoeh. Nangmanaw ni kamtu hanelah ka tawksak awh e doeh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh nangmouh hoi rei ka o navah ka pangak e teh rawca hai cat nahanh seh telah kâ na poe awh.
Hno kamsoumhoeh lah ka sak niteh banghai tawk laipalah, ma hoi kâkuen hoeh e dawk ka kambawng e tami tangawn na o awh tie ka thai awh.
Hot patet e taminaw koe mae rawca, ca thai nahanelah lungmawng lahoi thaw na tawk thai nahan, Bawipa Jisuh Khrih ni kâ na poe e patetlah tha na poe awh,
Hmaunawnghanaw hnokahawi na sak awh navah lungpoutnae tawn hanh awh.
Hete ca lahoi lawk na thui e patetlah tami buetbuet touh ni tarawi hoehpawiteh, yeirai po nahanelah kâhuikokhai awh hanh.
Hatei hote tami hah taran telah pouk a hanh awh. Hmaunawngha patetlah pouk awh, hroecoe awh.
Roumnae Bawipa ama roeroe ni bangtelae hmuen koe na pha hai thoseh, nangmouh koe lungmawngnae na poe lawiseh. Bawipa teh nangmouh abuemlah koe awm lawiseh.
Hete kutmannae ca heh kai Pawl roeroe ni ka kut hoi ka thut e doeh. Hathateh, ca kathut e pueng dawk e mitnout e lah ao. Kai ni hettelah ouk ka thut.
Maimae Bawipa Jisuh Khrih e lungmanae teh nangmouh pueng koe awm lawiseh. Amen.
Kai Pawl, na ka rungngangkung Cathut hoi, maimouh ni ngaihawi e Jisuh Khrih e kâpoelawk lahoi Jisuh Khrih e guncei lah kaawm e ni yuemnae lahoi ka ca katang lah kaawm e Timote koe ca na patawn.
Na pa Cathut hoi maimae Jisuh Khrih koehoi lungmanae, pahrennae hoi lungmawngnae teh nang koe awm lawiseh.
Masidonia ram lah ka cei navah kai ni na hroecoe e patetlah Efisa kho la na o teh, alouklouk e cangkhainae cangkhai hoeh nahanelah,
lairuipakong hoi ka pout thai hoeh e miphun tâconae hah banglah pouk awh hoeh nahanelah, cingthui haw. Hote hnonaw niteh yuemnae hlak kâounnae doeh a tâco sak.
Hatei kâpoelawk ni ngainae teh, kathounge lungthin hoi thoseh, kathounge mahoima kâpanuenae hoi thoseh, kathounge yuemnae hoi thoseh, kâkuen e lungpatawnae hah doeh.
Hote hno dawk hoi tami tangawn ni a roun awh teh, aphu kaawm hoeh e lawk deinae koe lah a kamlang awh toe.
Bangpatetlae phung koe lah maw kacaklah ka o awh tie hai kâpanuek awh laipalah, kacangkhaikung saya lah o han a ngai awh bo aw.
Kâlawk teh hnokahawi kasaknaw hanelah ta e nahoeh.
Kâlawklaipa hoi lawkkangaihoehnaw, cathutlaipa hoi tamikayonnaw, kathounghoehnaw hoi lawkkatang banglahai ka pouk hoeh e naw, manu kathetnaw hoi na pa kathetnaw,
tami kathetnaw, kamsoumhoehe napui tongpa yonnae kasaknaw, tongpa reira yonnae kasaknaw, tami kaparawtnaw, laithoe kadeinaw, laithoe koe lah thoekâbonaw, kathounge cangkhainae katarannaw pueng hanelah doeh kâlawk teh ta pouh e lah ao. Hote kâlawk hah hmantang ka hno e taminaw teh, hote kâlawk ni hawinae a poe.
Hottelah ka ti navah, Yawhawi Cathut e bawilen kamthang kahawi teh kai na poe toe.
Kai hah thaonae hoi na kakawisakkung maimae Bawipa Khrih Jisuh e a lungmanae teh ka pholen. Bangkongtetpawiteh, ahni ni a thaw tawk hane lah na rawi teh yuemkamcu lah na pouk toe.
Kai teh ahmaloe vah, kapathoekung, kadudamkung, ayâ karektapkung lah ka o eiteh, yuemhoehnae hoi panuek laipalah hoi ka tawksak e a tho dawkvah, lungmanae ka coenae doeh.
Maimae Bawipa e a lungmanae haiyah, Khrih Jisuh thung kaawm e yuemnae hoi lungpatawnae hoi cungtalah pouk e hlak a kuep toe.
Khrih Jisuh ni het talaivan a tho ngainae teh tamikayon rungngang hanlah a tho tie teh, yuemkamcu e hoi dâw hane roeroe lah a kamcu. Hote tamikayonnaw thung dawkvah kai teh kalenpounge lah ka o.
Hateiteh, a yungyoe hringnae coe nahanlah ka yuem hane naw ni a dawn han kawi lah ao nahan, kalenpounge yonnae ka tawn e kai hah Jisuh Khrih ni lungsawnae hoi panguepnae na patue toe.
A yungyoe siangpahrang, kangning e, hmuthaihoehe, Cathut buet touh dueng teh barinae, bawilennae a yungyoe hoi a yungyoe awm lawiseh, Amen.
Ka capa Timote, nang hanelah profet lahoi ka pâpho e naw hoi hete cingthuilawknaw hah nang koe na poe. Hethateh, yuemnae hoi kathounge panuenae lung na tawn teh kahawi e tarankâtuknae na tuk thai nahane doeh.
Tami tangawn ni yuemnae a takhoe awh dawkvah, yuemnae long a rawk teh rawknae koe a pha awh toe.
Hotnaw thung dawkvah Himenaias hoi Alexander a bawk roi. Ahnimouh roi ni Cathut dudamnae lawk a dei roi hoeh nahanelah a kamtu roi nahan Setan kut dawk ka poe toe.
Tami pueng hanelah hai thoseh, siangpahrangnaw hoi kâ katawnnaw hanelah hai thoseh,
ratoum pouh hane hoi lunghawilawkdeinae ahmaloe na sak awh nahan kai ni na hroecoe.
Hottelah tinae teh maimae rungngangkung Cathut hmalah ngai kaawm e lah doeh ao.
Tami pueng rungngang lah o vaiteh, lawkkatang panuenae koe pha sak hanelah Cathut ni a ngainae ao.
Cathut teh buet touh dueng doeh kaawm. Cathut hoi taminaw rahak tami lah kaawm e Khrih Jisuh buet touh dueng doeh laicei lah kaawm.
Ahni ni tami pueng ratang hanelah a tak a pasoung toe. A tue a pha toteh a kamnue sak.
Kai teh kapâphokung lah thoseh, guncei lah thoseh, yuemnae hoi Khrih thung e lawkkatang hah Jentelnaw koe ka pâpho hane saya lahai thoseh, na ta toe. Hottelah ka dei nah laithoe ka dei hoeh, hmantang doeh ka dei.
Tongpanaw ni hmuen tangkuem koe, lungkhueknae, kâounnae awm laipalah, kathounge kut dâw laihoi na ratoum awh nahanlah na ngaikhai awh.
Hot patetvanlah, napuinaw ni samveinae, sui, pale, aphu kaawm e khohnanaw hoi kamthoup laipalah, mitkhet kamcu lah kamthoup awh nateh, lungdo lungnem lahoi kacuemkamui lah awm awh.
Cathut ka barilawa e napuinaw ni a kamthoup hanelah ao e patetlah, kamcu e nuen hoi kamthoup awh na seh.
Napuinaw teh lawkngai laihoi lawkkamuem lah kamtu naseh.
Napui teh tongpanaw lathueng cangkhainae hoi kâtawnnae ka poe hoeh. Napui teh lawkkamuem ao hanlah ao.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, Adam hmaloe a sak hnukkhu Evi sak e lah ao.
Hothloilah, Adam teh tacuek lah awm hoeh, Evi doeh tacuek lah kaawm niteh ka payon.
Hateiteh, napuinaw teh, kacuemkamui lah onae, yuemnae, lungpatawnae, thoungnae dawk awm awh pawiteh, cakhenae dawk rungngang lah ao awh han.
Tami buet touh ni bishop thaw tawk hanelah ngai pawiteh thaw kahawi ka ngai e lah ao.
Bishopnaw teh, tounhoehe, napui buet touh e vâ lah kaawm e, kâhruetcuet e, kacuemkamui lah kaawm e, imyin ka ngai e, ka cangkhai thai e han.
Yamuhri lah kaawm hoeh e, ka pahngawpahrak hoeh e, kamsoum hoeh lahoi tangka hmu ka ngai hoeh e, a lung kanem e, ayâ hoi kâyue hoeh e, tangka ka hounloun hoeh e han.
Ama e imthung kahawicalah ka uk thai niteh, a canaw ka yue ka toun thai e tami han.
Ama e imthungkhu patenghai kahawicalah hrawi thai hoehpawiteh bangtelamaw kawhmoun a khetyawt thai han.
Kâthungtahma e tami mahoeh. Telah nahoeh pawiteh, ahni ni kâoup vaiteh, kahraimathout hoi kâvan e yonphukhangnae dawk bawt payon vaih tie ngaihrinae ao.
Pathoenae awm laipalah kahraimathout mannae dawk hoi a hlout nahan, alawilae taminaw koe bari kaawm e tami han.
Hot patetvanlah, hotunaw hai a lung kacakpounge han. A lai ka samphei e, yamuhri lah kaawm e tami mahoeh. Kathounghoehe tangka hmunae ka ngai hoeh e tami han.
Ma hoi ma kâpanuenae lung a thoung vaiteh yuemnae a dungkawnae hah mangkhak kangdoutkhai e tami han.
Ahnimouh hai tanouknae hmaloe a kâhmo awh hnukkhu, tounhoehe lah awm pawiteh, hotunaw thaw tawk awh naseh.
Ahnimae yunaw hai a lung kacakpounge lah ao awh han. Tamcueklawk ka dei e lah awm laipalah, kâhruetcuet e, lawkkam kacakpounge lah ao awh han.
Hotunaw teh, napui buet touh e vâ lah ao han. A yu a ca kahawicalah ka uk thai e han.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, hotunaw thaw kahawicalah katawknaw teh, amamouh hanelah min hawinae a hmu awh hloilah, Khrih Jisuh thung yuemnae dawkvah, taranhawinae a hmu awh.
Nang koe ca ka thut ngainae teh nang koe karanglah ka tho hane ka ngaihawi ei,
ka hnawng pawiteh Cathut e imthung dawkvah bangtelamaw kâroekâkhawi han tie hah, na panue thai nahanlah, hettelah ka thut teh na patawn. Hote im hateh, kahring Cathut e Kawhmoun doeh, lawkkatang e khom hoi adu pui doeh.
Cathut lawk hoi khosaknae teh atangcalah adungkaw tangngak. Cathut teh takthai dawk a kamnue toe. Muitha lahoi a katang doeh titeh a kampangkhai. Kalvantaminaw nihai a hmu awh toe. Jentelnaw nihai kamthang lawk a thai awh toe. Talaivan taminaw nihai a yuem awh toe. Bawilennae hoi lathueng lah tawm lah ao toe.
Muitha ni kamcengcalah a pâpho e teh, a to hmalah teh dumyennae muithanaw hoi kahraituilinaw e cangkhainae dawkvah dawn awh vaiteh, yuemnae a ceitakhai awh han.
Hote cangkhai e naw teh, amamae panuenae lung hah sumhmaisaan hoi kânep awh niteh, a lai kathout e, tami kahawi lah ka kâsak e naw koehoi doeh a tho.
Ahnimouh ni kâpaluennae cakâ awh vaiteh, kayuem niteh lawkkatang ka panuek e taminaw ni lunghawilawkdeinae lahoi canei hane rawca Cathut ni a sak e hah a hai sak awh han.
Cathut ni a sak e pueng teh ahawi dawkvah lunghawilawkdeinae lahoi hno pawiteh, hnoun hane banghai awm hoeh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, Cathut e lawk lahoi thoseh, ratoum e lahoi thoseh, bangpueng teh a thoung.
Hete lawknaw hah hmaunawnghanaw koe na dei pouh pawiteh, Jisuh Khrih e thaw ka tawk e, yuemnae lawknaw hoi kawkhik e lah na o han.
Napui matawngnaw ni ouk a dei awh e lairuipakongnaw hah takhoe nateh, Cathutlae khosaknae lahoi namahoima kâcangkhai haw.
Takthai dawk kâ cangkhainae teh hawinae moikapap awmhoeh. Cathut lawk dawk khosaknae teh atu e hringnae hoi due hnukkhu e hringnae totouh lawkkamnae ao dawkvah, bangpueng hanelah hawinae ao.
Hethateh yuemkamcu e hoi dâw hane roeroe lah kamcu e doeh.
Hatdawkvah, maimouh teh hot hanelah thapatho teh panki laihoi tawk awh. Bangkongtetpawiteh, tami pueng rungngangkung, alawkpui lah kayuemnaw e rungngangkung lah kaawm e kahring Cathut hah maimouh ni ngaihawi awh.
Hete hnonaw hah kâ poe nateh cangkhaih.
Na nawnae hah apinihai, dudam hanh naseh. Lawk deinae, kâroekâkhawinae, ayânaw lungpatawnae, muitha hoi hringnae, lawkkamcaknae, thoungnae dawkvah, kayuemnaw han khetsin hanelah awm loe.
Kai ka tho hoehroukrak Cakathoung touknae, thapoenae hoi cangkhainae hah panki laihoi pou sak loe.
Kacuenaw e kut toung e hoi sutdeilawk lahoi, nang koe poe lah kaawm e poehno hah noutna laipalah awm hanh.
Na roungnae teh taminaw koe kamnue sak nahanelah, hotnaw hah panki loe.
Nama hoi nama na kâcangkhai nakunghai thoseh, na cangkhai e dawk hai thoseh, kâhruetcuet nateh pou awm loe. Hottelah na tetpawiteh nama hoi na lawk kathainaw hah na rungngang han.
Tongpa matawngnaw hah puenghoi yue laipalah, na pa patetlah thapoe loe. Tongpa kanaw hah hmaunawngha patetlah pouk loe.
Napui matawngnaw hah na manu patetlah pouk nateh, tanglanaw hah kathoungpounge na tawncei patetlah pouk loe.
Lahmai lah kaawm katang e napuinaw hah bari nateh khenyawn loe.
Hateiteh, hote lahmainu ni a ca catounnaw tawn pawiteh, hote ca catounnaw ni Cathut thaw lah a pouk awh vaiteh, mae im a khetyawt hoi, manu na pa mintoenaw khetyawtnae kamtu awh naseh. Hottelah tawknae teh Cathut ni a ngai e doeh.
Khenyawnkung awm laipalah amadueng kaawm e lahmainu teh, Cathut kâuep laihoi karum khodai pout laipalah ouk a ratoum.
Hatei, talai van nawmnae dawk ka cet e lahmainu teh a hring nahlangva kadout e lah ao.
Apinihai tounhoehe lah ao nahan kâ poe loe.
Apipatethai imthung ka khenyawn hoeh e teh yuemnae ka pahnawt e lah ao teh, kayuemhoehnaw hlak hoe a mathoe.
Kum 60 kakuep hoeh rae teh lahmainu lah khoe hanh loe, a vâ buet touh dueng ouk kaawm e,
a canaw kahawicalah ka khen thai e, imyin ka ngai e, tami kathoungnaw e khok ka pâsu e, rucat ka kâhmo e naw ka khenyawn e, kahawi hno kaawm e pueng ka tawk e lah awm pawiteh, lahmai lah khoe han.
A kum kanaw e lahmainunaw teh, lahmainu lah khoe hanh loe. Bangkongtetpawiteh, Khrih e cangkhainae ngâi hoeh, vâ sak hanelah ngai pawiteh,
ahmaloe lawkkam a raphoe dawkvah, yonphukhangnae ao han.
Im touh hnukkhu im touh a luen awh teh, a pangak awh. Hottelah a pangak awh dueng tho laipalah, tamthoe a dei awh teh ayânaw e lai dawk a kâphum awh teh, dei kawi hoeh e hah ouk a dei awh.
Hatdawkvah, kanaw e lahmainu teh a vâ bout a tawn vaiteh, a canaw bout sak naseh. Ayâ ni bout pathoe hoeh nahanlah a imthung kahawicalah bout tawn naseh, pathoenae heh taran ni a tha kâla hoeh nahan lah.
Lahmainu tangawn teh, lam a payon awh teh setan hnuk a kâbang awh toe.
Ka yuem e napui hoehpawiteh, tongpa ni ama hoi kâkuen e lahmainu tawn pawiteh, khenyawn naseh. Hat pawiteh doeh, lahmainu katangnaw hah tarawknae awm laipalah, kawhmoun ni a khetyawt thai han.
Kahawicalah ka uk e kacuenaw, alawkpui lah lawk pâphonae hoi cangkhainae dawkvah, panki laihoi ka tawk e kahrawikungnaw teh, let hni touh barinae lah awm awh naseh.
Cakathoung ni cangkatin lahun e maitotan a pahni moum pouh hanh, thawtawkkung ni a tawknae phu hmu hanelah a kamcu, telah bout a ti.
Kacue ni hno a sakpayon nah, kapanuekkhaikung kahni kathum touh awmhoeh pawiteh hote yonpennae teh dâw pouh hanh loe.
Alouke taminaw ni a taki nahan yonnae ka sak e tami teh taminaw hmalah yue loe.
Kapeknae tawn laipalah, bang patet e hno dawk hai, kâkangkhai e tawn laipalah na tawk nahan, Bawipa Jisuh Khrih hoi Cathut hmalah, rawi lah kaawm e kalvantami hmalah ka patawpoung lah na hroecoe.
Apipatet e lathueng haiyah, kuttoungnae hmatara sak pouh hanh loe. Ayâ alouknaw e lumlai dawk hai bawk hanh loe. Nama hoi nama kamthoung loe.
Na vonpui patawnae hoi atuhoitu na damhoehnae dawkvah, tui dueng net laipalah misurtui hai youn touh net khai loe.
Tami tangawn e yon teh lawkceng hoehnahlan a kamphawng toe. A tangawn e yon teh a hnukkhu doeh ouk a kamphawng.
Hot patetvanlah hnokahawi sak e haiyah, bangpatet teh tang a kamnue, kamnuek hoeh rae hnokahawi sak e hai hrawk thai mahoeh.
Cathut min hoi cangkhainae teh dudam e lah ao hoeh nahan, patoun e san niteh a bawipa hah a bari hanelah a kamcu tie panuek naseh.
A bawipa teh ka yuem e lah awm pawiteh, hmaunawngha doeh tie lung hoi hnephnap laipalah, hoe kahawicalah tawk pouh awh naseh. Bangkongtetpawiteh, kahawicalah tawk pouh e ka coe e bawi teh, ka yuem e tami, lungpataw kawi e tami lahai ao. Hetnaw heh cangkhai nateh hroecoe loe.
Tami buetbuet touh ni ka thuem hoeh e cangkhainae hah a cangkhaia teh, maimae Bawipa Jesuh Khrih e kathounge cangkhainae hoi cathutlae cangkhainae ka tarawi hoeh e tami teh, lunglenpansa lah kaawm niteh banghai ka panuek hoeh e doeh.
Lawklung kâounnae hoi kamcan dawk a lung kapen e lah ao awh. Hot kecu dawkvah, hounroenae, kâyuenae, dudam lawk deinae, lunghringnae ouk a tâco.
Hottelah panuenae lung a kamko dawkvah, lawkkatang ka bawk hoeh e kâounnae lah ao teh, Cathut lawk dawk khosaknae teh aphu ao toungloung katetnaw koe ka pout thai hoeh e kâounnae ouk a tâcokhai.
Hatei, lungkuepnae lahoi Cathut lawk dawk khosaknae teh aphu ao tangngak doeh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, maimouh teh het talaivan dawk banghai sin laipalah tho awh dawkvah, banghai sin laipalah bout tâco awh han tie teh a kamceng.
Hatdawkvah, canei khohna han tawn e ca dawk lungkuep awh sei .
Tawnta han ka ngai e taminaw teh dumyennae dawk thoseh, karap dawk thoseh, taminaw kamkonae dawk ka bawt sak e radueknae dawk thoseh, ouk a bo awh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, tangka lungpatawnae teh kahawihoehe hno pueng e a kung lah ao. Taminaw teh tangka thouk a hounloun awh dawkvah, yuemnae dawk hoi lam a phen awh teh, lungreithainae hoi runae a kâpoe awh.
Hatdawkvah, Oe! Cathut e tami, nang teh hote yonnae hah roun loe. Lannae, Cathut lawk dawk khosaknae, yuemnae, lungpatawnae, panguepnae, lungdo lungnemnae hah pou pâlei haw.
Yuemnae hoi kâkuen e, kahawi e kâtuknae hah tuk nateh, a yungyoe hringnae hah kuen nateh tawn loe. Nang teh hote hringnae hanlah, kaw lah na o dawkvah, kapanuekkhaikungnaw e hmalah kahawicalah na pâpho toe.
Khrih Jisuh a kamnue ditouh, nang teh tounhoehe lah na o nahanlah, kaie kâpoelawk na tarawi nahan,
a cawngca pueng kahring sak e Cathut hmalah hai thoseh, Pontius Pailat bawi hmalah hai thoseh, kahawicalah pâphonae lahoi kampangkhai e Bawipa Jisuh Khrih hmalah hai thoseh, kai ni kâ na poe.
A tue a kuep toteh Cathut ni Khrih a kamnue sak han. Cathut teh yawhawinae ao teh, buet touh dueng e ukkung Bawi lah ao. Siangpahrang pueng e Siangpahrang, bawi pueng e Bawi lah ao.
Bawipa dueng doeh duenae dawk hoi kahlout niteh, rek hnai thai hoeh e angnae dawk kaawm. Taminaw thung dawk api buet touh nihai Cathut teh hmawt awh boihoeh, hmawt hai hmawt thai awh hoeh. Hote Cathut teh bahu hoi barinae a yungyoe awm lawiseh. Amen.
Atu e hringnae dawk tangka katawntanaw teh, kâoupnae lung tawn laipalah, kangning hoeh e hnopai kâuep laipalah, maimouh ni coe hane ka kuep lah na ka poe e kahring Cathut kâuep nahanlah cingthui loe.
Ayânaw hanlah hnokahawi saknae, nuencang kahawi hoi kamsi laipalah ka poe e naw lah coungkacoe ao awh nahan,
hringnae katang a coe awh nahanelah due hnukkhu hringnae adu a ung thai awh nahanlah cingthui loe.
Oe! Timote, nang koe na poe e naw hah tarawi loe, Cathut lawk hoi kâkuen hoeh e ayawmyin lah dei e lawknaw hoi, talai thoumthainae lahoi kâtaran lah deinae hah roun loe.
Hote talai thoumnae hah, tami tangawn ni kampangkhai e lahoi, yuemnae lamthung a phen awh toe. Nang koe lungmanae awm lawiseh. Amen.
Kai Pawl, Khrih Jisuh thung kaawm e hringnae hoi kâkuen e lawkkamnae patetlah, Cathut ngainae lahoi Jisuh Khrih e guncei lah kaawm e ni, ka lungpataw e ka ca Timote koe ca na patawn.
Maimae Bawipa Khrih Jisuh hoi Pa Cathut koe e lungmanae, pahrennae hoi lungmawngnae teh nang koe awm lawiseh.
Mintoenaw ni a bawk awh e Cathut e lungmanae teh ka pholen. Karum khodai ka ratoum navah nang teh na pahnim hoeh.
Na mitphi, kai ni ka pouk navah lunghawinae hoi na kawi thai nahanlah nang hoi kâhmo han dikdik ka doun.
Na minpui Lois hoi na manu Euniki ni yuemnae hmaloe a tawn teh, atu nang nihai yuemnae na tawn tie teh ka panue.
Hatdawkvah, kai ni kut na toung sin e lahoi Cathut ni poehno na poe e hah bout na kâtahrue nahan na thai sak.
Cathut ni takinae muitha na poe hoeh, taranhawinae, lungpatawnae hoi mahoima kâcakuep thainae muitha doeh na poe awh.
Hatdawkvah Bawipa e lawkpanuesaknae dawk kayak hanh, ahni kecu thongim ka bawt e kai hai kayakkhai hanh, Cathut e kamthang kahawi dawk khang thai hringnae ma tawn haw.
Cathut ni teh amae tami roeroe lah coung nahanelah na rungngang teh na kaw awh. Hot teh maimae tawksak thainae dawk nahoeh, amae na pahren lungmanae dawk doeh. Atue kamtawng hoehnahlan, lungmanae teh Khrih Jisuh thung na poe tangcoung e lah ao toe.
Hateiteh atu angnae teh maimae rungngangkung Jisuh Khrih a tho e dawk talai tami pueng koe a kamnue sak. Duenae a raphoe teh hringnae kamthang kahawi hoi angnae koe a sin toe.
Hete kamthang kahawi hramkhai hanelah thoseh, Jentelnaw kacangkhaikung lah thoseh Cathut ni na rawi toe.
Hot kecu dawk hete roedengnae khang awh. Hatei, khoeroe kayakkhai hoeh. Bangkongtetpawiteh, ka yuem e Cathut teh ka panue. Ama koe ka poe e hah hote hnin totouh, Bawipa ni a khetyawt thai tie ka ngaiuep.
Kai ni na cangkhai e Khrih Jisuh thung kaawm e yuemnae hoi lungpatawnae hah khetsin hanelah kacaklah kuen loe.
Maimae thung kaawm e Kathoung Muitha thaonae hoi na kut dawk poe lah kaawm e thaw kahawicalah tawk loe.
Asia ram dawk kaawmnaw ni kai teh na pahnawt awh toe tie hah na panue toe. Ahnimanaw dawkvah, Phygelus hoi Hermogenes hai ao roi.
Onesiphorus ni lung pou na hawi sak dawkvah Cathut ni a imthung koe yawhawinae poe naseh. Sumbawtarui hoi ka o e heh ka kayak khai hoeh.
Rom kho a pha toteh kai na hmu hoehroukrak na tawng.
Hote hnin dawk Cathut koehoi a lungmanae a hmu thai nahanelah, Bawipa ni poe lawiseh. Hahoi, kai hanlah banghloimaw Efisa kho dawk thaw na kabawp teh na khetyawt tie hah na panue.
Ka ca, nang teh Khrih Jisuh thung kaawm e lungmanae lahoi kacaklah awm loe.
Kapanuekkhaikung moikapap ao e patetlah kai koe na thai tangcoung e naw hah, yuemkamcu niteh alouke tami bout ka cangkhai thai hane naw koe patuen poe loe.
Jisuh Khrih e ransa kahawi lah kai hoi reithai khang van loe.
Ransa thaw ka tawk ni a bawipa e lawk a tarawi e patetlah talai koe lah na lung pen hanh.
Yawng kâtânae dawk ka yawng e ni a phunglam patetlah yawng hoehpawiteh, bawilukhung hmawt mahoeh.
Law ka sak nihai hmaloe a patang torei doeh a tawk na phu a ca van.
Ka dei e lawknaw pueng Bawipa ni panuenae na poe e hoi kahawicalah pakhingpalang loe.
Devit catoun duenae koehoi kathaw e Jisuh Khrih kong heh pahnim awh hanh.
Kamthang kahawi kecu dawk tamikapo patetlah na hmu awh, na man awh teh na katek awh. Hateiteh Cathut lawk teh katek thai awh hoeh.
Hatdawkvah rawi lah kaawm e naw teh Khrih Jisuh thung kaawm e rungngangnae hah yungyoe bawilennae hoi cungtalah a hmu thai awh nahanelah kai ni ahnimouh hanelah bangpueng ka khang.
Hetteh yuemkamcu e lawk doeh, ama hoi dout awh pawiteh ama hoi rei hring awh han.
Ama hoi panguep awh pawiteh ama hoi cungtalah rei uk awh han. Na pahnawt pawiteh na pahnawt awh van han.
Maimouh ni yuem awh hoeh nakunghai Bawipa teh yuemkamcu dawkvah, amahoima kâpahnawt thai hoeh.
Bawipa hmalah cungkeihoehe kâoun rumram e naw hah kâhruetcuetnae poe haw. Kâounnae ni hnokahawi thokhai hoeh, kâraphoenae dueng doeh a thokhai.
Nang teh Cathut hmalah yuemkamcu e tami lah na o teh lawkkatang hah kahawicalah kapek thai e, a taran kahawi e thaw katawkkung buet touh lah na kâhmoun thai nahan panki loe.
Cathutlaipa e pathunae lawknaw hah roun loe.
Cangkhai payonnae teh a hmâ hoe kalensakkung lah ao. Himenaias hoi Philetus teh cangkhai payon dawk a kambawng roi.
Ahnimanaw ni lawkkatang lamthung a phen awh teh, kadout tangcoungnaw yo a thaw awh toe telah a dei awh dawkvah, tami tangawn e yuemnae a payon sak awh.
Hateiteh, Bawipa ni amae taminaw hah a panue. Bawipa min kampangkhai e taminaw teh hno kahawihoehe roun han tie hoi tacikkin lah kaawm e Cathut e im du teh a cak.
Kalen e im dawk sui, ngun, thing, talai hoi sak e aphunphun ao teh bari e hno hoi barihoehe hno hai ao.
Hatdawkvah, ka dei tangcoung e patetlah kahawihoehe pahnawt vaiteh, barinae, kathoung niteh imkung ni hno hane kawi lah o han a ngai.
Nang teh nawsainaw ni raduek e roun nateh, lannae, yuemnae, roumnae, lungpatawnae naw hah kacaklah poe kuen loe.
Pathunae lawk kâpaceinae niteh kâyuekâounnae doeh a tâcokhai tie panuek nateh roun loe.
Bawipa e a san teh ayâ hoi lawk pungnae tawn mahoeh, alouknaw koe pahrennae ka tawn e hoi, Lung kasawe tami lah ao han.
Ama ka tarannaw koe lawkkanem hoi cangkhai a ngai. Lawkkatang a dâw nahanelah Cathut ni lung kâthungnae a poe hai a poe yawkaw han doeh.
Hahoi, kahraimathout ni a ngainae patetlah a man e taminaw ni a kâpanue vaiteh, hote mannae dawk hoi a hlout hai a hlout awh han doeh.
A hnukteng e hnin toteh atueng kathoute a tho han tie hah panuek loe.
Bangtelamaw tetpawiteh, amahoima lungkapatawe, tangka ka hounloun e, ka kâoup e, ayâ dudamnae lawk ka dei e, ayâ min mathoe ka poe e, manu na pa lawk ka ngâi hoeh e, hawinae ka panuek hoeh e, ka thoung hoeh e,
pahrennae ka tawn hoeh e, tami ka hmuhma e, tami ka tacuek e, amahoima kâcakuep thai hoeh e, ka pahngawpahrak e, tami kahawinaw lungpataw hoeh e,
lawkkam ka cak hoeh e, lawk ka ngâi hoeh e, lunglenpansa lah kaawm e, Cathut lungpataw hlak hnopai tawnta hoe lungpataw e,
Cathut thaw ka ngai e patetlah ao eiteh Cathut thaw dawk onae hah ka pahnawt e lah ao awh han. Hot patet e taminaw hah roun loe.
Bangkongtetpawiteh ahnimouh thung dawk e tami tangawn teh, imnaw dawk arulahoi a kâen awh teh, radueknae aphunphun hnuk a kâbang awh teh, yon toungloung toungloung ka sak e napui kaponaw hah a man awh.
Hote napui kaponaw teh pou a kamtu eiteh nâtuek hai lawkkatang panuek thai awh hoeh.
Jannes hoi Jambres ni Mosi a taran roi e patetlah ahnimanaw hai lawkkatang hah a taran awh. Ahnimouh teh a lungthin a kamko toung dawkvah ka yuem e patetlah a kâsak awh.
Ahnimanaw teh bout thaw thai awh mahoeh toe. Bangkongtetpawiteh ahnimae pathunae teh ahnimouh roi e pathunae patetlah tami pueng e hmalah a kamphawng han.
Hatei, nang teh kaie cangkhainae, o angnae, pouknae, yuemnae, lungsawnae, lungpatawnae, panguepnae dawk hai thoseh,
Antiok kho, lkonium kho hoi Listra khonaw dawkvah ka kâhmo e rektapnae hoi rucatnae dawk hai thoseh, nangmouh hoi pou ka o. Hot patet e rektapnae hah kai ni ka khang ei, hotnaw pueng dawk hoi Bawipa ni na hlout sak.
Atangcalah, Khrih Jisuh thung cathutlae khosaknae ka ngai e tami pueng teh rektapnae a khang han.
Tamikathoutnaw hoi tami ka dumyen e naw teh ayânaw hai a dum awh teh, ama hai a kâdum awh teh hoe ka mathout e kamkonae koe hoehoe a bo awh han.
Nang teh, nama ni na kamtu teh kacaklah na yuem e dawk awm loe. Bangkongtetpawiteh, nang teh hote hnonaw hah api koehoi maw na kamtu tie hai thoseh,
Khrih Jisuh thung yuem e lahoi rungngangnae hmu thainae hah lungangnae nang na ka poe thai e Kathounge, Cakathoung hoi nangmanaw ca hoi na kahnai e hai thoseh, na panue toe.
Cakathoung dawk a thut e pueng teh Cathut ni kâha a poe e a tho dawkvah, cangkhai nahanelah thoseh, yon pâpho pouh nahanelah thoseh, payon e palan pouh nahanelah thoseh, lannae cangkhai hanelah thoseh, kahawipoung e lah ao.
Het hateh, Cathut e tami ni hnokahawi alouklouk a sak thai nahanlah ka kuep e tami lah ao thai nahane doeh.
Bawipa ama hoi a uknaeram a kamnuenae tueng toteh, kadoutnaw hoi kahringnaw lawk ka ceng hane Cathut hoi Bawipa Jisuh Khrih hmalah kai ni nang hah kâ na poe.
Lawk hah pâpho hanelah coungkacoe awm haw. Atueng o hai, ao hoeh hai thoseh, panki nateh pâpho haw. Lungsaw laihoi cangkhai nateh hroecoe, yue, thapoe loe.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, ato hmalah teh taminaw ni kathounge cangkhainae ngai awh laipalah, a hnâ pathak awh vaiteh, amamouh ni a ngai awh e patetlah saya moikapap hnuk a kâbang awh han.
Lawkkatang tarawi awh laipalah, lairuipakong tarawi awh vaiteh, lam a payon awh han toe,
Nang teh, bangpueng dawk kâhruetcuet loe. Rucatnae hah panguep loe. Evangelist ni a tawk hane kawi hah tawk loe. Na tawk hane thaw hah thouk tawk loe.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, kai teh thuengnae khoungroe van thueng lah ka o toe. Ka due nahane tueng a pha toe.
Kâtuknae teh kahawicalah ka tuk toe. Yawng hane lamthung hai apout totouh ka yawng toe. Yuemnae hai ka kuep sak toe.
Atuvah lannae bawilukhung ni sut na ring toe. Hatnae hnin dawkvah, hmantang lawkcengkung Bawipa ni kai hah na poe han. Hothloilah, a kamnuenae ka lungpataw pueng koehai a poe han.
Kai koe karang tho hanlah panki loe.
Demak teh atu e talaivan hringnae a lungpataw dawkvah, kai na pahnawt teh Thesalon kho lah a yawng toe. Kresen hai Galati ram lah a cei. Titu teh Dalmatia ram lah a cei.
Luk dueng doeh kai koe kaawm. Mark hah thokhai haw loe. Bangkongtetpawiteh, thaw ka tawk navah na kabawmkung kahawipoung lah ao.
Taisikas hai Efisa kho lah ka patoun.
Hahoi, Troas kho Kapulet im ka ceitakhai e angki, cakalawng, hoi alawkpui lah phaivuen cauk hah pahnim laipalah uren thokhai lah a.
Sum ka dêi e Alexander niyah kai dawk kahawihoehe hno thouk a sak. Bawipa ni a sak e patetlah pathung lawiseh.
Nang hai ahni hah kâhruetcuet loe. Bangkongtetpawiteh ahni ni kaimae lawk hah puenghoi a taran toe.
Kai yon na pen awh e ka deicai pasuek navah, apinihai na kambawngkhai hoeh. Taminaw pueng ni na pahnawt awh.
Ahnimouh dawk Bawipa ni yon pen nahanh seh. Tami pueng ni na ka pahnawt nakunghai, kamthang kahawi Jentelnaw koe ka pâpho thai nahanelah doeh. Cathut teh kai koe lah a kampang dawk thaonae hoi na kawi sak. Sendek e pahni dawk hoi na hlout sak.
Hot dueng nahoeh, Bawipa ni kahawihoehe pueng koehoi na hlout sak toe. Amae kalvanlae uknaeram totouh na hrawi han tie ka panue. Hote Bawipa teh a yungyoe hoi a yungyoe pholennae awm lawiseh. Amen.
Priscilla hoi Aquila, Onesiphorus e imthungnaw kut man loe.
Erastas teh Kawrin kho dawk a o. Trophimus teh a pataw dawkvah Miletus khopui dawk ka ceitakhai .
Kasik thapa a pha hoehnahlan na tho thai nahane kâyawm. Ubulas, Puden, Linus, Kalaudia hoi hmaunawnghanaw pueng ni nang teh kut na man awh.
Bawipa Jisuh Khrih teh nange muitha hoi rei awm lawiseh. Nang dawk Cathut lungmanae awm lawiseh. Amen.
Kai Pawl, Cathut e a san lah kaawm niteh, Cathut ni a rawi e taminaw e yuemnae hanlah, Jisuh Khrih e guncei lah kaawm e, Cathut koe lah lawkkatang ka kangdoutkhai kung,
A lai kathout hoeh e Cathut ni, talai a kamtawng hoehnahlan lawk sut a hruek tangcoung e, a yungyoe hringnae hah ngaihawinae,
A tue a pha toteh a lawk a pâpho e lahoi, a kamnue sak teh, hote lawk hah maimouh na ka rungngangkung Cathut e kâpoelawk patetlah kai koe patue lah kaawm e ni,
Cungtalah hmawng e yuemnae dawkvah, ka capa lah kaawm e Titu nang koe hete ca heh ka thut teh na patawn. Cathut hoi maimouh na ka rungngangkung Bawipa Jisuh Khrih e a lungmanae, a pahrennae hoi lungmawngnae teh nang koevah awm yungyoe lawiseh.
Kai ni lawk sut na thui tangcoung e patetlah Krete tuilum vah cum hoeh rae pueng pacum thai nahan, kho tangkuem vah kacuenaw na rawi pouh nahanelah, na hruek e doeh.
Kacue lah kaawm hane teh, yon toun e kaawm hoeh e tami, yu buet touh dueng ka tawn e tami, a canaw ka yuem e tami, lawk ka ngai hoeh e tami mahoeh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, bishop teh Cathut e hno ka kuemkung patetlah tounhoehe, takngainae dawk ka hring hoeh e, a lung kaduem hoeh e, misurtui ka kâso hoeh e, ayâ hoi ka kâhem hoeh e, kaheng lah tangka tawn ka panki hoeh e tami han.
Imyin ka khenyawn thai e tami, tami kathoungnaw ka lungpataw e, a lungthin ka lan e, tamikalan lah kaawm e, tami kathoung lah kaawm e, ka kâcakuep thai e, tami han.
Kathounge cangkhainae hoi a cangkhai thai nahan, katang hoeh e cangkhai e naw a pathung thai han, a kamtu tangcoung e yuemkamcue e lawk kacaklah ka kuen e tami han.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, lawk ka ngai hoeh e tami, ayawmyin e lawk ka dei e tami hoi a lai kathoute tami moi ao awh. A lawkpui lah vuensoma e taminaw thung ao awh.
Ahnimae a pahni hah cakuep pouh awh. Ahnimouh teh kaheng lahoi hno tawn hane a panki awh. Cangkhai kawi hoeh e naw hah a cangkhai awh teh, imthung abuemlah lam a phen sak awh.
Ahnimouh thung e profet buet touh niyah, Kretenaw pueng a laithoe awh, a matheng a paan awh. A kâsokâroum awh teh, a pangakpasa awh ati.
Hete lawkpanuesaknae teh a tang tangngak. Hatdawkvah, ahnimouh hah raprap yue loe, yuemnae dawk a thoung awh nahanelah .
Judahnaw e lairuipakong hoi lawkkatang hnamthun takhainaw kâpoelawknaw hah tarawi pouh hanh.
Kathounge naw koe teh bangpueng a thoung. Kathounghoehe naw, ka yuem hoeh e naw koe teh bangpueng hai thoung hoeh. Amamae lungthin hoi, mahoima kâpanuenae lungthin pateng boehai thoung hoeh.
Cathut ka panue toe ka kâtet awh nakunghai, thaw a tawk awh e lahoi, Cathut a hnoun awh. Panuet ka tho e tami, lawk ka ngai hoeh e tami, kahawi e hno buet touh boehai ka sak panuek hoeh e tami lah ao awh.
Nang teh kathounge cangkhainae hoi ka kamcu e pueng hah pâpho haw.
Tongpa matawngnaw teh, kâhruetcuet e, a lung kacake amahoima kâcakuep e, yuemnae, lungpatawnae, panguepnae dawk a lung thahmei e tami lah o nahanelah pâpho pouh.
Hot patetvanlah, napui matawngnaw hai, nuencang kathoung lah kaawm e, a khuekhaw kaawm hoeh lah ayânaw yon ka pen hoeh e, misurtui ka kâso hoeh e, hnokahawi kacangkhaikung lah ao awh nahan pâpho pouh.
Hot patetvanlah, napui kanawnaw ni a vânaw lungpataw awh nahan, a canaw lungpataw awh nahan,
kacuemkamui lah kathoung lah imlaw ka picai e lah, tami kahawi lah, vâ lawk ka ngai e lah, ao awh teh Cathut lawk pathoe e lah ao hoeh nahan napui matawngnaw ni a cangkhai awh nahan,
hot patetvanlah, tongpa kanawnaw nihai, lawk a ngâi thai nahan cangkhai loe.
Bangpueng koe kahawi e nuen kamtu kawi e lah kamnuek sak. Cangkhainae na sak navah katang e cangkhainae, lungcaknae, barilawa kawi lah onae,
toun kaawm hoeh e, kathounge lawk deinae, kahawihoehe lawk a dei thai awh hoeh nahanelah, a kaya awh nahan kamnuek sak.
Sannaw ni amamae bawi lawk a ngâi awh teh hno puengpa dawk lung ahawi sak awh nahan,
kutsaveksai laipalah, bangpatet e lawkkam e nakunghai kamcengcalah kamnue sak awh nahan, bangpuengpa dawk na ka rungngangkung Cathut e kathounge cangkhainae hoi a kamthoup awh nahan dei pouh nateh yue lah a.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, Cathut e lungmanae teh tami pueng koe a kamnue teh, tami pueng koe rungngangnae hah a tho khai.
Cathutlaipanae, hoi talaivan hno noenae pahnawt teh, mahoima lungthin thoungnae, cathutlae hringnae hoi hring awh thai nahanelah, Cathut lungmanae ni atutueng vah na cangkhai awh.
Ka lentoe poung e Cathut hoi rungngangkung Jisuh Khrih ni bawilen poung lahoi, a kamnue nahane, yawhawi ngaihawinae ring hanelah cangkhai e lah ao.
Yonnae pueng thung hoi na ratang awh nahan, nuen kahawi koe lah cak awh teh, ama hanelah thoungsak nahan Bawi Jisuh Khrih ni amahoima a kâhmoun toe.
Hete hnonaw hah kâtawnnae abuemlahoi cangkhaih, tha poe nateh kâtawnnae lahoi yue lah a. Apinihai nang na dudam hanh naseh.
Taminaw ni kaukkungnaw hoi kâ katawnnaw e lawk a ngâi awh nahan, hnokahawi aphunphun hah a tarawi awh vaiteh coungkacoelah ao nahan,
apihai pathoe laipalah, apihai taran laipalah, lungdonae hoi lungnemnae hah tami pueng koe a sak thai awh nahan dei pouh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh maimouh pueng haiyah, ahmaloe teh lungangnae ka tawn hoeh e tami, lawk ka ngâi hoeh e tami, a lai kathoute tami, aphunphun hah ka doun e tami, phunepnae dueng ka sak e tami, utsinnae hoi hounlounnae dawk ka hring e tami, panuetpasa ka tho e tami, buet touh hoi buet touh ka kâmaithoe e tami lah o awh.
Hatei, maimouh na ka rungngangkung Cathut e a pahrennae hoi a lungpatawnae hah tami koe a kamnue hnukkhu teh,
Maimouh ni tawksak e lannae lahoi tho laipalah, a katha lah khe teh pâsucainae hoi Kathoung Muitha e khekathanae lahoi, amae a lungmanae patetlah doeh na rungngang awh.
Maimouh na ka rungngangkung Jisuh Khrih lahoi, maimouh dawkvah hote Muitha puk ka poum lah na awi awh.
Bangkongtetpawiteh, maimouh teh Cathut e a lungmanae lahoi, lannae koe pha awh teh, a yungyoe hringnae ngaihawi awh e patetlah a râw kacoekung lah o awh nahane doeh.
Hetteh yuemkamcu e lawk doeh. Cathut ka yuem e naw ni, kahawi e hno hah pou a sak awh nahan, kâhruetcuet awh nahan, hete lawknaw hah panki laihoi na cangkhai nahanelah, na ngaikhai. Hote hnonaw teh ahawi dueng laipalah tami pueng hanelah hawinae ka tâcawtkhai e lah ao.
Pathunae lawk pacei e naw, miphun tâconae lairuinaw, kâlawk dawk kâoun kâyuenae naw hah roun loe. Bangkongtetpawiteh, hot patet e naw teh ahawinae awmhoeh. Ayawmyin doeh.
Kâ kapek sak hanelah ka thokhai e tami hah vai touh, vai hni touh yue nateh pâlei lawih.
Hot patet e tami teh a yonnae a panue nahlangva vah, ka yon niteh amahoima ka kâpakhup kâpathan e tami lah doeh ao.
Artemas hoehpawiteh Taisikas hah nang koe ka patoun toteh Nikopolis kho totouh kai koe na tho thai nahan panki loe. Hote kho dawkvah kasik thapa totouh o hanelah ka kâcai.
Kâlawk ka panuek e Zenas hoi Apollos hah banghai a voutnae lah a ceinae lam dawk kahawicalah thak loe.
Kaimae taminaw ni a paw paw laipalah o hoeh nahan, amamouh hno hane kawi a tawn awh thai nahan, hnokahawi hah pou a tawk awh thai nahan kamtu awh naseh.
Kai koe kaawm e pueng ni kut na man awh. Yuemnae lahoi, kaimouh lung na ka pataw e naw hah kut man van loe. Nangmouh pueng koe a lungmanae awm yungyoe lawiseh. Amen.
